src: (2) Die Einfuhren der betreffenden Erzeugnisse kommen nur unter der Voraussetzung in den Genuss der in Absatz 1 genannten Kontingente, dass der angegebene Zollwert mindestens dem gemäß Artikel 29 der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 104/2000 des Rates vom 17. Dezember 1999 über die gemeinsame Marktorganisation für Erzeugnisse der Fischerei und der Aquakultur(2) festgelegten oder festzulegenden Referenzpreis entspricht.

draft: (2) The imports of the products in question only benefit from the quotas mentioned in paragraph 1 if the specified customs value corresponds to at least the reference price set or to be set in accordance with Article 29 of Council Regulation (EC) No 104/2000 of 17 December 1999 on the common organisation of the market in fishery and aquaculture products(2).
hil: Imports of the products in question only benefit from the quotas mentioned in paragraph 1 if the specified customs value corresponds to at least the reference price set or to be set in accordance with Article 29 of Council Regulation (EC) No 104/2000 of 17 December 1999 on the common organisation of the market in fishery and aquaculture products(2)

src: Zweck dieser Richtlinie ist es, die Verwendung von Klärschlamm in der Landwirtschaft so zu regeln, daß schädliche Auswirkungen auf Böden, Vegetation, Tier und Mensch verhindert und zugleich eine einwandfreie Verwendung von Klärschlamm gefördert werden.
ref: The purpose of this Directive is to regulate the use of sewage sludge in agriculture in such a way as to prevent harmful effects on soil, vegetation, animals and man, thereby encouraging the correct use of such sewage sludge.
draft: The purpose of this directive is to regulate the use of sewage sludge in agriculture in such a way that harmful effects on soils, vegetation, animals and humans are prevented and at the same time proper use of sewage sludge is promoted.
hil: The purpose of this directive is to regulate the use of sewage sludge in agriculture in such a way that harmful effects on soils, vegetation, animals, and humans are prevented and at the same time promote proper use of sewage sludge.
compare: The purpose of this directive is to regulate the use of sewage sludge in agriculture in such a way that harmful effects on soils, vegetation, animals, and humans are prevented and at the same time promote proper use of sewage sludge.

src: Mit diesem Verfahren wird im wesentlichen bezweckt, eine bessere Kenntnis der Durchführung des freien Warenverkehrs in den nichtharmonisierten Bereichen zu erlangen und die aufgetretenen Probleme zu ermitteln, um dafür sachgerechte Lösungen zu finden.
ref: Whereas the main purpose of this procedure is to enhance knowledge concerning the implementation of the free movement of goods in non-harmonized sectors and to identify the problems encountered with a view to finding appropriate solutions to them;
draft: With this procedure, the main aim is essentially to obtain a better understanding of the implementation of free movement of goods in non-harmonized areas and to identify the problems that have arisen in order to find appropriate solutions for them.
hil: This procedure essentially aims to acquire a better understanding of the implementation of free movement of goods in non-harmonized areas and to identify the problems that have arisen in order to find appropriate solutions for them.
compare: This procedure essentially aims to acquire a better understanding of the implementation of free movement of goods in non-harmonized areas and to identify the problems that have arisen in order to find appropriate solutions for them.

src: in Erwägung nachstehender Gründe: Nach Artikel 130r des Vertrages trägt die Umweltpolitik der Gemeinschaft zur Verfolgung folgender Ziele bei: Erhaltung und Schutz der Umwelt sowie Verbesserung ihrer Qualität, Schutz der menschlichen Gesundheit und umsichtige und rationelle Verwendung der natürlichen Ressourcen. Ferner arbeiten die Gemeinschaft und die Mitgliedstaaten im Rahmen ihrer Zuständigkeiten auf diesem Gebiet mit den Drittländern und zuständigen internationalen Organisationen zusammen.
ref: Whereas, according to Article 130r of the Treaty, Community policy on the environment is to contribute to the following objectives: preserving, protecting and improving the quality of the environment, protecting human health and the prudent and rational utilization of natural resources; whereas, furthermore, the Community and the Member States are cooperating, within the framework of their respective jurisdictions, with third countries and the relevant international organizations;
draft: Considering the following reasons: According to Article 130r of the Treaty, the Community's environmental policy contributes to the pursuit of the following objectives: preservation and protection of the environment, the improvement of its quality, protection of human health and the rational use of natural resources. Furthermore, the Community and the Member States, within the scope of their respective competencies, shall cooperate with third countries and the relevant international organizations on this subject.
hil: Whereas Article 130r of the Treaty stipulates that the Community's environmental policy contributes to the pursuit of the following objectives: preservation and protection of the environment, the improvement of its quality, protection of human health and the rational use of natural resources; whereas the Community and the Member States, within the scope of their respective competencies, shall cooperate with third countries and the relevant international organizations on this subject.
compare: Considering the following reasons: According to Article 130r of the Treaty, the Community's environmental policy contributes to the pursuit of the following objectives: preservation and protection of the environment, the improvement of its quality, protection of human health and the rational use of natural resources. Furthermore, the Community and the Member States, within the scope of their respective competencies, shall cooperate with third countries and the relevant international organizations on this subject.

src: (2) Der Arbeitsplan sollte eine Strategie zur Entwicklung des Systems enthalten, mit Zielen im Hinblick auf Umweltverbesserungen und Marktdurchdringung, einer nicht erschöpfenden Liste von Produktgruppen, die für die Gemeinschaftsaktionen als vorrangig angesehen werden, und Plänen für die Koordinierung und die Zusammenarbeit in Bezug auf das gemeinschaftliche System und andere Systeme zur Vergabe von Umweltzeichen in den Mitgliedstaaten.
ref: (2) The working plan should include a strategy for the development of the scheme, setting out objectives for environmental improvement and market penetration, a non-exhaustive list of product groups which should be considered as priorities for Community action, and plans for coordination and cooperation between the Community scheme and other eco-label award schemes in Member States.
draft: The work plan should contain a strategy for the development of the system, with goals regarding environmental improvements and market penetration, a non-exhaustive list of product groups that are considered a priority for joint actions, and plans for coordination and cooperation regarding the joint system and other systems for awarding environmental labels in the Member States.
hil: The work plan should include a strategy for developing the system, with goals for environmental improvements and market penetration, a non-exhaustive list of product groups considered a priority for joint actions, and plans for coordination and collaboration regarding the joint system and other systems for granting environmental labels in the Member States.
compare: The work plan should contain a strategy for the development of the system, with goals regarding environmental improvements and market penetration, a non-exhaustive list of product groups that are considered a priority for joint actions, and plans for coordination and cooperation regarding the joint system and other systems for awarding environmental labels in the Member States.

src: Mit der Entscheidung 97/569/EG der Kommission (3), zuletzt geändert durch die Entscheidung 98/220/EG (4), wurden vorläufige Listen der Betriebe in Drittländern aufgestellt, die Fleischerzeugnisse produzieren.
ref: Whereas provisional lists of establishments in third countries producing meat products have been drawn up by Commission Decision 97/569/EC (3) as last amended by Decision 98/220/EC (4);
draft: With the decision 97/569/EC of the Commission (3), last amended by decision 98/220/EC (4), preliminary lists were drawn up of establishments in third countries producing meat products.
hil: With Commission Decision 97/569/EC(3), last amended by Decision 98/220/EC(4), preliminary lists were established of establishments in third countries producing meat products.
compare: With the decision 97/569/EC of the Commission (3), last amended by decision 98/220/EC (4), preliminary lists were drawn up of establishments in third countries producing meat products.

src: Die Anwendung der genannten Verordnungen wird so lange nicht die erwartete Wirkung haben, als der innergemeinschaftliche Handelsverkehr durch die derzeitigen Unterschiede zwischen den Gesundheitsvorschriften der Mitgliedstaaten für Fleisch behindert wird.
ref: Whereas, so long as intra-Community trade is hindered by differences between the health requirements of Member States concerning meat, the implementation of the above-mentioned regulations will not have the desired effect;
draft: The application of the regulations mentioned will not have the expected effect as long as intra-Community trade in meat is hindered by the current differences between the health regulations of the Member States.
hil: Whereas the application of the aforementioned regulations will not have the expected effect as long as intra-Community trade in meat is hindered by the current differences between the health regulations of the Member States.
compare: The application of the regulations mentioned will not have the expected effect as long as intra-Community trade in meat is hindered by the current differences between the health regulations of the Member States.

src: in Erwägung nachstehender Gründe : Die technischen Vorschriften , denen Zugmaschinen nach den einzelstaatlichen Rechtsvorschriften genügen müssen , betreffen unter anderem auch die Abschleppeinrichtung und den Rückwärtsgang .
ref: Whereas the technical requirements which tractors must satisfy pursuant to national laws relate inter alia to the coupling device and to the reverse;
draft: Considering the following reasons: The technical regulations that towing vehicles must comply with according to the national legal regulations include, among other things, the towing device and the reverse gear.
hil: Whereas technical regulations that towing vehicles must comply with according to national legal regulations include, among others, the towing device and the reverse gear.
compare: Considering the following reasons: The technical regulations that towing vehicles must comply with according to the national legal regulations include, among other things, the towing device and the reverse gear.

src: auf Antrag in dem Mitgliedstaat, in dem das Basissaatgut entweder erzeugt oder amtlich anerkannt wurde, als Zertifiziertes Saatgut amtlich anerkannt wird, wenn dieses Saatgut einer Feldbesichtigung unterzogen worden ist, die den in einer Gleichstellungsentscheidung nach Artikel 23 Absatz 1 Buchstabe a) vorgesehenen Voraussetzungen für die betreffende Kategorie genügt, und wenn in amtlicher Prüfung festgestellt worden ist, dass die Voraussetzungen des Anhangs I Teil B für diese Kategorie erfuellt sind.
ref: shall, on request, be officially certified as certified seed in any of those Member States where the basic seed was either produced or officially certified, if the seed has undergone field inspection satisfying the conditions laid down in an equivalence decision made under Article 23(1)(a) for the relevant category, and if official examination has shown that the conditions laid down in Annex I, part B for the same category are satisfied.
draft: Upon request in the Member State in which the basic seed has either been produced or officially recognized, certified seed is recognized as such if it has undergone field inspection that meets the conditions provided for the relevant category in an equivalence decision within the meaning of Article 23(1)(a) and if it has been established by official testing that the conditions for this category laid down in Part B of Annex I have been met.
hil: Upon request in the Member State in which the basic seed has either been produced or officially recognized, certified seed is recognized as such if it has undergone field inspection that meets the conditions provided for the relevant category in an equivalence decision within the meaning of Article 23(1)(a) and if it has been established by official testing that the conditions for this category laid down in Part B of Annex I have been met.
compare: Upon request in the Member State in which the basic seed has either been produced or officially recognized, certified seed is recognized as such if it has undergone field inspection that meets the conditions provided for the relevant category in an equivalence decision within the meaning of Article 23(1)(a) and if it has been established by official testing that the conditions for this category laid down in Part B of Annex I have been met.

src: (86) Die steuerliche Belastung wäre viel geringer als die der Firmen in den Mutterländern Vereinigtes Königreich und Spanien. Der Höchstsatz für Steuern in Gibraltar läge bei 15 %, während der Steuersatz im Vereinigten Königreich und in Spanien mindestens 30 % beträgt und sogar noch höher sein kann.
ref: (86) The tax burden would be much lower than that incurred by businesses in metropolitan United Kingdom and in Spain: total tax liability in Gibraltar would be capped at 15 %, whereas the rate of taxation in the United Kingdom and in Spain is at least 30 % and can be even higher.
draft: The tax burden would be much lower than that of companies based in the home countries United Kingdom and Spain. The maximum tax rate in Gibraltar would be 15 %, while the tax rate in the United Kingdom and in Spain is at least 30 % and can even be higher.
hil: The tax burden would be much lower than that of companies based in their home countries United Kingdom and Spain. The maximum tax rate in Gibraltar would be 15 %, whereas in the United Kingdom and Spain, the tax rate is at least 30 % and can even be higher.
compare: The tax burden would be much lower than that of companies based in the home countries United Kingdom and Spain. The maximum tax rate in Gibraltar would be 15 %, while the tax rate in the United Kingdom and in Spain is at least 30 % and can even be higher.

src: (1) Die Kommission wird von dem Verwaltungsausschuß für Getreide, nachstehend 'Ausschuß' genannt, unterstützt.
ref: 1. The Commission shall be assisted by the Management Committee for Cereals, hereinafter referred to as 'the Committee'.
draft: The commission is supported by the grain administrative committee, hereinafter referred to as the "committee".
hil: The commission is supported by the Grain Administrative Committee, hereinafter referred to as the 'committee'.
compare: The commission is supported by the grain administrative committee, hereinafter referred to as the "committee".

src: Besteht die Gefahr, daß der Markt der Gemeinschaft während des Zeitraums von zwei Jahren, für den eine Beihilfe festgesetzt worden ist, gestört wird, so kann der Rat auf Vorschlag der Kommission mit qualifizierter Mehrheit die Änderung der Beihilfe für das zweite Wirtschaftsjahr des betreffenden Zeitraums beschließen.
ref: If, for the two-year period for which aid has been fixed, the stability of the market in the Community appears to be seriously threatened, the Council, acting by a qualified majority on a proposal from the Commission, may order the aid for the second year of the period in question to be modified.
draft: Is there a danger that the market of the Community will be disturbed during the two-year period for which aid has been granted, the Council, on a proposal from the Commission, may decide by a qualified majority to amend the aid for the second financial year of that period.
hil: If there is a risk that the market of the Community will be disturbed during the two-year period for which aid has been granted, the Council, on a proposal from the Commission and by a qualified majority, may decide to amend the aid for the second financial year of that period.
compare: Is there a danger that the market of the Community will be disturbed during the two-year period for which aid has been granted, the Council, on a proposal from the Commission, may decide by a qualified majority to amend the aid for the second financial year of that period.

src: (4) Nach der Aussetzung des endgültigen Antidumpingzolls überwachte die Kommission im Einklang mit Randnummer (15) des Beschlusses 2004/264/EG weiterhin die Marktbedingungen für Koks 80 +.
ref: (4) Following the suspension of the definitive anti-dumping duty by the Decision, the Commission has, in accordance with recital (15) of the Decision, continued to monitor the market situation of coke 80 +.
draft: After the definitive suspension of the anti-dumping duty, the Commission continued to monitor the market conditions for coke 80+ in accordance with recital (15) of Decision 2004/264/EC.

src: Um der je nach Mitgliedstaat unterschiedlichen Erzeugungs- und Vermarktungssituation Rechnung zu tragen, sollten die Mitgliedstaaten die Voraussetzungen festlegen, unter denen Erzeugergruppierungen, die einen Anerkennungsplan unterbreiten, die vorläufige Anerkennung erhalten können.
ref: As a result, in order to take account of different production and marketing circumstances in the various Member States, the latter should lay down certain conditions for the grant of preliminary recognition to producer groups which submit a recognition plan.
draft: To take into account the different production and marketing situations depending on each Member State, the Member States should establish the conditions under which producer groups submitting a recognition plan can obtain provisional recognition.

src: a) alle Tiere gemäß Artikel 2 der Richtlinie 64/432/EWG, die sich in einem Betrieb befinden, durch eine Ohrmarke mit einem alphanumerischen Code von nicht mehr als 14 Zeichen gekennzeichnet werden, aufgrund dessen jedes einzelne Tier sowie der Betrieb, in dem es geboren wurde, identifiziert werden können, und daß Stiere, die an kulturellen oder sportlichen Veranstaltungen - mit Ausnahme von Messen und Ausstellungen - teilnehmen sollen, nach einem von der Kommission anerkannten System gekennzeichnet werden, das gleichwertige Garantien bietet.
ref: (a) all animals listed in Article 2 of Directive 64/432/EEC present on the holding are identified with an eartag bearing on alphanumeric code, which shall not exceed 14 characters, which make it possible to identify each animal individually along with the holding on which it was born or, in the case of bulls intended for cultural and sporting events with the exception of fairs and exhibitions, by an identification system offering equivalent guarantees recognized by the Commission.
draft: All animals according to Article 2 of Directive 64/432/EEC, which are located in a holding, shall be identified by an ear tag bearing an alphanumeric code of not more than 14 characters by virtue of which each individual animal and the holding in which it was born can be identified and that bulls intended for cultural or sporting events, other than fairs and exhibitions, shall be identified by a system of a standard approved by the Commission which provides equivalent guarantees.
hil: All animals located in a holding according to Article 2 of Directive 64/432/EEC shall be identified by an ear tag bearing an alphanumeric code of no more than 14 characters, by virtue of which each individual animal and the holding in which it was born can be identified. Bulls intended to participate in cultural or sporting events, except for fairs and exhibitions, shall be identified by a system recognized by the Commission, which provides equivalent guarantees.
compare: All animals according to Article 2 of Directive 64/432/EEC, which are located in a holding, shall be identified by an ear tag bearing an alphanumeric code of not more than 14 characters by virtue of which each individual animal and the holding in which it was born can be identified and that bulls intended for cultural or sporting events, other than fairs and exhibitions, shall be identified by a system of a standard approved by the Commission which provides equivalent guarantees.

src: In der ersten Phase wird ein homologer Impfstoff verwendet, der aus dem Originalsaatstamm CK/Pak/1995-H7N3 hergestellt wird, während in der zweiten Phase ein heterologer Impfstoff aus dem Originalsaatstamm A/CK/Italy/AG-473/1999-H7N1 eingesetzt werden soll.
ref: For the initial phase a homologous vaccine is obtained from the master seed strain CK/Pak/1995-H7N3 and for the following period starting from early 2003 a heterologous vaccine with the master seed strain A/CK/Italy/AG-473/1999-H7N1 shall be used.
draft: In the first phase, a homologous vaccine is used which is produced from the original strain CK/Pak/1995-H7N3, while in the second phase, a heterologous vaccine from the original strain A/CK/Italy/AG-473/1999-H7N1 should be used.
hil: In the first phase, a homologous vaccine made from the original strain CK/Pak/1995-H7N3 is used, while in the second phase, a heterologous vaccine made from the original strain A/CK/Italy/AG-473/1999-H7N1 should be used.

src: Bei einer schweren Marktstörung im Sinne des Artikels 7 der Richtlinie 96/75/EG kann die Kommission auf Antrag eines Mitgliedstaats, nach Stellungnahme des Ausschusses gemäß Artikel 8 jener Richtlinie und nach dem dort vorgesehenen Verfahren die "Alt-für-neu-Regelung" für einen begrenzten Zeitraum gemäß Artikel 7 jener Richtlinie wieder in Kraft setzen und gegebenenfalls um Strukturbereinigungsmaßnahmen ergänzen.
ref: In the event of serious disturbance on the market, as defined in Article 7 of Directive 96/75/EC and, at the request of a Member State, after the Committee referred to in Article 8 of the said Directive has given its opinion and following the procedure laid down in the same Article, the Commission may reactivate the "old-for-new" rule for a limited period, in accordance with Article 7 of the said Directive, accompanied or not by structural improvement measures.
draft: In the event of a severe market disruption within the meaning of Article 7 of Directive 96/75/EC, the Commission may, at the request of a Member State, and after an opinion has been sought from the Committee referred to in Article 8 of that Directive, and in accordance with the procedure provided for therein, re-establish the "scrapping for old vehicles" scheme for a limited period in accordance with Article 7 of that Directive and, where appropriate, supplement it with structural adjustment measures.
hil: In the event of a severe market disruption within the meaning of Article 7 of Directive 96/75/EC, the Commission may, at the request of a Member State, and after an opinion has been sought from the Committee referred to in Article 8 of that Directive, and in accordance with the procedure provided for therein, re-establish the 'scrapping for old vehicles' scheme for a limited period in accordance with Article 7 of that Directive and, where appropriate, supplement it with structural adjustment measures.
compare: In the event of a severe market disruption within the meaning of Article 7 of Directive 96/75/EC, the Commission may, at the request of a Member State, and after an opinion has been sought from the Committee referred to in Article 8 of that Directive, and in accordance with the procedure provided for therein, re-establish the "scrapping for old vehicles" scheme for a limited period in accordance with Article 7 of that Directive and, where appropriate, supplement it with structural adjustment measures.

src: Um das ordnungsgemässe Funktionieren der gemeinschaftlichen Vorschriften über Verbrauchsteuern zum 1. Januar 1993 zu gewährleisten, sind ferner die Richtlinie 76/308/EWG des Rates vom 15. März 1976 über die gegenseitige Unterstützung bei der Beitreibung von Forderungen im Zusammenhang mit Maßnahmen, die Bestandteil des Finanzierungssystems des Europäischen Ausrichtungs- und Garantiefonds für die Landwirtschaft sind, sowie von Abschöpfungen und Zöllen und bezueglich der Mehrwertsteuer (5) und die Richtlinie 92/81/EWG des Rates vom 19. Oktober 1992 zur Harmonisierung der Struktur der Verbrauchsteuern auf Mineralöle (6) zu ändern -
ref: Whereas, finally, in order to ensure the smooth operation of Community provisions on excise duties on 1 January 1993, Council Directive 76/308/EEC of 15 March 1976 on mutual assistance for the recovery of claims resulting from operations forming part of the system of financing the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund, and of agricultural levies and customs duties, and in respect of value added tax (5) and Council Directive 92/81/EEC of 19 October 1992 on the harmonization of the structures of excise duties on mineral oils (6) need to be amended,
draft: To ensure the proper functioning of the common provisions on consumption taxes as of 1st January 1993, Directive 76/308/EEC of 15 March 1976 on mutual assistance for the recovery of claims relating to measures forming part of the financing system of the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund, as well as levies and duties and concerning value-added tax (5) and Directive 92/81/EEC of 19 October 1992 on the harmonisation of the structures of excise duties on mineral oils (6) must also be amended -
hil: To ensure the proper functioning of the community provisions on consumption taxes as of 1st January 1993, Council Directive 76/308/EEC of 15 March 1976 on mutual assistance for the recovery of claims relating to measures forming part of the financing system of the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund, as well as levies and duties, and concerning value-added tax (5) and Council Directive 92/81/EEC of 19 October 1992 on the harmonisation of structures of excise duties on mineral oils (6) must also be amended.
compare: To ensure the proper functioning of the common provisions on consumption taxes as of 1st January 1993, Directive 76/308/EEC of 15 March 1976 on mutual assistance for the recovery of claims relating to measures forming part of the financing system of the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund, as well as levies and duties and concerning value-added tax (5) and Directive 92/81/EEC of 19 October 1992 on the harmonisation of the structures of excise duties on mineral oils (6) must also be amended -

src: Die Behauptung von KLM, diese Tabelle habe nur in Verbindung mit der Studie gelesen werden können, ist unbegründet, da jeder Hinweis auf die Studie fehlt.

src: Sollte eine neue finanzielle Vorausschau für die Zeit nach 2000 verabschiedet werden, so wird der Betrag für diese Zusammenarbeit im Einklang mit der finanziellen Vorausschau ermittelt und hängt von einer Entscheidung der Haushaltsbehörde ab, die im Rahmen des jährlichen Haushaltsverfahrens über ihn beschließt.
ref: Should new financial perspectives be adopted for the period after 2000, the amount of this cooperation shall be determined in accordance with the financial perspectives and conditional upon the budgetary authority deciding the amount in the annual budgetary procedure.
draft: If a new financial forecast for the period after 2000 is adopted, the amount for this cooperation will be determined in accordance with the financial forecast and will depend on a decision of the budgetary authority, which will decide on it as part of the annual budgetary procedure.
hil: If a new financial forecast is adopted for the period after 2000, the amount for this cooperation will be determined in accordance with the financial forecast and will depend on a decision of the budgetary authority, which will decide on it as part of the annual budgetary procedure.
compare: If a new financial forecast for the period after 2000 is adopted, the amount for this cooperation will be determined in accordance with the financial forecast and will depend on a decision of the budgetary authority, which will decide on it as part of the annual budgetary procedure.

src: (1) Nach der Richtlinie 2001/18/EG haben die Mitgliedstaaten und gegebenenfalls die Kommission sicherzustellen, dass mögliche schädliche Auswirkungen auf die menschliche Gesundheit und die Umwelt, die unmittelbar oder mittelbar durch den Gentransfer von genetisch veränderten Organismen (nachstehend "GVO" genannt) auf andere Organismen auftreten können, gemäß Anhang II der genannten Richtlinie Fall für Fall sorgfältig geprüft werden.
ref: (1) Under Directive 2001/18/EC, Member States and, where appropriate, the Commission must ensure that potential adverse effects on human health and the environment, which may occur directly or indirectly through gene transfer from genetically modified organisms (hereinafter GMOs) to other organisms, are accurately assessed on a case-by-case basis in accordance with Annex II to that Directive.
draft: According to Directive 2001/18/EC, Member States and, where appropriate, the Commission shall ensure that any possible adverse effects on human health and the environment, whether direct or indirect, that may arise from the deliberate release into the environment of genetically modified organisms ('GMOs'), as defined in Annex II to that Directive, are subject to a case-by-case evaluation in accordance with that Annex II.
hil: According to Directive 2001/18/EC, Member States and, where appropriate, the Commission shall ensure that any possible adverse effects on human health and the environment, whether direct or indirect, that may arise from the deliberate release into the environment of genetically modified organisms ('GMOs'), as defined in Annex II to that Directive, are subject to a case-by-case evaluation in accordance with that Annex II.
compare: According to Directive 2001/18/EC, Member States and, where appropriate, the Commission shall ensure that any possible adverse effects on human health and the environment, whether direct or indirect, that may arise from the deliberate release into the environment of genetically modified organisms ('GMOs'), as defined in Annex II to that Directive, are subject to a case-by-case evaluation in accordance with that Annex II.

src: Die Zollbehörden jedes Mitgliedstaats können einer Person, die die Voraussetzungen nach Artikel 399 erfuellt und Waren im gemeinschaftlichen Versandverfahren befördern will - nachstehend "zugelassener Versender" genannt -, die Bewilligung erteilen, der Abgangsstelle weder die Waren zu gestellen noch die Anmeldung zum gemeinschaftlichen Versandverfahren für diese Waren vorzulegen.
ref: The customs authorities of each Member State may authorize any person who fulfils the conditions laid down in Article 399 and who intends to carry out Community transit operations (hereinafter referred as 'the authorized consignor`) not to present at the office of departure either the goods concerned or the Community transit declaration in respect of those goods.
draft: The customs authorities of each Member State may grant permission to a person who meets the conditions laid down in Article 399 and who wishes to transport goods under the Community Transit procedure - hereinafter referred to as an "approved sender" - neither to present the goods to the customs office of exit nor to submit the declaration for the Community Transit procedure for these goods.
hil: The customs authorities of each Member State may grant approval to a person, who fulfills the conditions set out in Article 399 and intends to transport goods under the Community Transit procedure, hereinafter referred to as an "approved sender", to neither present the goods to the customs office of exit nor submit the declaration for the Community Transit procedure for these goods.
compare: The customs authorities of each Member State may grant permission to a person who meets the conditions laid down in Article 399 and who wishes to transport goods under the Community Transit procedure - hereinafter referred to as an "approved sender" - neither to present the goods to the customs office of exit nor to submit the declaration for the Community Transit procedure for these goods.

src: Solange diese Rücklage den Betrag des eingezahlten Kapitals gemäß Artikel 3 Absatz 2 nicht erreicht, müssen mindestens 15 % des Überschusses für das Geschäftsjahr abzüglich etwaiger Verlustvorträge entnommen werden.
ref: Until such time as the legal reserve is equal to the capital referred to in Article 3(2), the amount allocated to it may not be less than 15 % of the surplus for the financial year after deduction of any losses carried over.
draft: As long as this reserve has not reached the amount of the paid-in capital according to Article 3 (2), at least 15% of the surplus for the financial year, less any loss carryforwards, must be withdrawn.
hil: As long as this reserve has not reached the amount of the paid-in capital according to Article 3 (2), at least 15% of the surplus for the fiscal year, minus any loss carryforwards, must be withdrawn.
compare: As long as this reserve has not reached the amount of the paid-in capital according to Article 3 (2), at least 15% of the surplus for the financial year, less any loss carryforwards, must be withdrawn.

src: (5) Über die Maßnahmen nach Absatz 2 hinaus prüft der Ausschuß die von seinem Vorsitzenden von sich aus oder auf Ersuchen des Vertreters eines Mitgliedstaats aufgeworfenen Fragen, die die Anwendung der Gemeinschaftsbestimmungen für den Verbrauchsteuerbereich mit Ausnahme derjenigen betreffen, auf die in Artikel 30 dieser Richtlinie Bezug genommen wird.

In addition to the measures referred to in paragraph 2, the Committee shall examine the matters by its chairman, either on his own initiative or at the request of the representative of a Member State, concerning the application of Community provisions on excise duties, except for those referred to in Article 30 of this Directive.

src: (9) Die Mitgliedstaaten stellen sicher, dass kein Material, das aus gemäß Teil B absichtlich freigesetzten GVO stammt, in den Verkehr gebracht wird, außer in Übereinstimmung mit Teil C.

draft: The Member States shall ensure that no material derived from GMOs intentionally released into the environment pursuant to Part B is placed on the market except in accordance with Part C.

src: Die Vorschriften der Mitgliedstaaten enthalten Anforderungen nicht nur hinsichtlich der baulichen Sicherheit, sondern auch bezüglich Gesundheit, Dauerhaftigkeit, Energieeinsparung, Umweltschutz, Aspekten der Wirtschaftlichkeit und anderer Belange des öffentlichen Interesses.
ref: Whereas Member States have provisions, including requirements, relating not only to building safety but also to health, durability, energy economy, protection of the environment, aspects of economy, and other aspects important in the public interest;
draft: The regulations of the member states contain requirements not only for structural safety, but also for health, durability, energy efficiency, environmental protection, aspects of cost-effectiveness and other matters of public interest.
hil: Member States shall prescribe requirements not only for structural safety, but also for health, durability, energy efficiency, environmental protection, aspects of cost-effectiveness and other matters of public interest.
compare: The regulations of the member states contain requirements not only for structural safety, but also for health, durability, energy efficiency, environmental protection, aspects of cost-effectiveness and other matters of public interest.

src: (17) Bei der Einführung der Regelung im Jahr 1984 wurde grundsätzlich festgelegt, dass die einem Betrieb entsprechende Referenzmenge im Fall des Verkaufs, der Verpachtung oder der Vererbung des Betriebs mit den Flächen auf den Käufer, den Pächter bzw. den Erben übertragen wird.
ref: (17) When the scheme was introduced in 1984, the principle was established that when a farm is sold, leased or transferred by inheritance, the corresponding reference quantity is transferred to the purchaser, tenant or heir together with the relevant land.
draft: (17) When the regulation was introduced in 1984, it was basically determined that the reference quantity corresponding to a company will be transferred to the buyer, the lessee or the heir with the areas in case of sale, lease or inheritance of the company.
hil: It was basically determined upon the introduction of the regulation in 1984 that the reference quantity corresponding to a company will be transferred to the buyer, lessee, or heir along with the areas in case of sale, lease or inheritance of the company.
compare: It was basically determined upon the introduction of the regulation in 1984 that the reference quantity corresponding to a company will be transferred to the buyer, lessee, or heir along with the areas in case of sale, lease or inheritance of the company.

src: b) Das von IPC vorgebrachte Argument zu den unterschiedlichen Entfernungen zwischen dem Bergwerk in New Brunswick und seinen Inlandsmärkten in Kanada und den belarussischen und russischen Bergwerken und deren Ausfuhrhäfen ist nicht relevant, da der Normalwert und der Ausfuhrpreis gemäß Artikel 2 Absatz 10 der Grundverordnung auf derselben Stufe, d. h. ab Bergwerk, miteinander verglichen werden.
ref: (b) The point raised by IPC concerning the differences in the distances between the New Brunswick mine and its domestic markets in Canada and the Belarusian and Russian mines and their export ports is not relevant as normal value and export price are compared, in accordance with Article 2(10) of the basic Regulation, at the same level, i.e. ex-mine.
draft: b) The argument put forward by IPC concerning the different distances between the mine in New Brunswick and its domestic markets in Canada, and the Belarusian and Russian mines and their export ports, is not relevant, since the normal value and the export price are compared at the same level, i.e. at mine, in accordance with Article 2(10) of the basic regulation.
hil: The argument put forward by IPC regarding the different distances between the mine in New Brunswick and its domestic markets in Canada, and the Belarusian and Russian mines and their export ports, is not relevant because according to Article 2(10) of the basic regulation, the normal value and the export price are compared at the same level, i.e. at the mine.
compare: The argument put forward by IPC regarding the different distances between the mine in New Brunswick and its domestic markets in Canada, and the Belarusian and Russian mines and their export ports, is not relevant because according to Article 2(10) of the basic regulation, the normal value and the export price are compared at the same level, i.e. at the mine.

src: Die Kommission nahm diesen Umstand mit Schreiben vom 22. September 2003 zur Kenntnis und wies Frankreich darauf hin, dass die von der Kommission am 17. September 2003 gestellten Bedingungen erfüllt seien und damit die mit der Ermächtigung angestrebte Aussetzungsanordnung nicht mehr zur Anwendung komme.
ref: By letter dated 22 September 2003, the Commission took note of this and informed France that, since the conditions set by the Commission on 17 September 2003 had been met, there was no longer any need to pursue the suspension injunction that had been imposed.
draft: The commission took note of this circumstance with a letter dated September 22, 2003, and informed France that the conditions set by the commission on September 17, 2003 had been met and that the suspension order aimed at with the authorization would no longer apply.
hil: The commission acknowledged this fact with a letter dated September 22, 2003, and informed France that the conditions set by the commission on September 17, 2003, had been met and that the suspension order aimed at with the authorization would no longer apply.
compare: The commission took note of this circumstance with a letter dated September 22, 2003, and informed France that the conditions set by the commission on September 17, 2003 had been met and that the suspension order aimed at with the authorization would no longer apply.

src: Der Gerichtshof der Europäischen Gemeinschaften ist für alle Streitsachen zwischen der Agentur und ihrem Personal innerhalb der Grenzen und nach den Bedingungen zuständig, die in den Statutsregeln für dieses Personal festgelegt sind.
ref: The Court of Justice of the European Communities shall have jurisdiction in all disputes between the Agency and its staff within the limits and on the conditions laid down in the general terms of recruitment and employment applicable to the said staff.
draft: "The Court of Justice of the European Communities is competent for all disputes between the agency and its staff within the limits and under the conditions laid down by the statutory rules for this staff."
hil: Where disputes arise between the agency and its staff within the limits and under the conditions set out in the Staff Regulations for officials of the European Communities, these shall be settled by the Court of Justice of the European Communities.
compare: "The Court of Justice of the European Communities is competent for all disputes between the agency and its staff within the limits and under the conditions laid down by the statutory rules for this staff."

src: Die Notwendigkeit, die Abweichung über die vorgesehenen Mengen hinaus gegebenenfalls weiter zu gewähren, wird unter Anhörung der kambodschanischen Behörden geprüft.

src: Die unmittelbar mit den Sitzungen des Ausschusses zusammenhängenden Kosten, mit Ausnahme der Reise- und Aufenthaltskosten, übernimmt die gastgebende Vertragspartei.

src: Unter dem Vorbehalt der Gegenseitigkeit wird das in Artikel 1 genannte Abkommen in Form eines Briefwechsels zwischen der Europäischen Gemeinschaft und der Ukraine zur Verlängerung und Änderung des Abkommens ab 1. Januar 2005 vorläufig angewandt, bis die für seinen Abschluss erforderlichen Verfahren abgeschlossen sind.
ref: Subject to reciprocity, the Agreement in the form of an Exchange of Letters referred to in Article 1 shall be applied on a provisional basis as from 1 January 2005 pending the completion of the procedures for its conclusion.
draft: Under the condition of reciprocity, the agreement mentioned in Article 1 is provisionally applied in the form of an exchange of letters between the European Community and Ukraine for the extension and amendment of the agreement as of January 1, 2005, until the procedures necessary for its conclusion are completed.
hil: Under the condition of reciprocity, the agreement referred to in Article 1 is provisionally applied, as of January 1, 2005, in the form of an exchange of letters between the European Community and Ukraine concerning the extension and amendment of the agreement, until the procedures required for its conclusion are completed.
compare: Under the condition of reciprocity, the agreement referred to in Article 1 is provisionally applied, as of January 1, 2005, in the form of an exchange of letters between the European Community and Ukraine concerning the extension and amendment of the agreement, until the procedures required for its conclusion are completed.

src: (4) Die nach diesem Artikel gewährten Vorteile sind auf Veranlassung eines oder mehrerer der betroffenen Mitgliedstaaten gleichzeitig von allen betroffenen Mitgliedstaaten zu widerrufen."

src: (2) Infolge einer Umstrukturierung der neuseeländischen Behörden ist aus der für Genußtauglichkeitsbescheinigungen für Fischereierezgunisse zuständigen Behörde, dem "Ministry of Agriculture and Fisheries" (MAF), das "Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry" geworden. Diese neue Behörde ist entsprechend ausgerüstet, um die Anwendung der geltenden Rechtsvorschriften wirksam überprüfen zu können. Der Name der in der Entscheidung 94/448/EG genannten zuständigen Behörde ist daher zu ändern.
ref: (2) Whereas, following a restructuring of the New Zealand Government, the competent authority for health certificates for fishery products (MAF) has changed from the Ministry of Agriculture and Fisheries into the Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry; and whereas this new authority is capable of effectively verifying the application of the laws in force; whereas it is, therefore, necessary to modify the nomination of the competent authority mentioned in Decision 94/448/EC;
draft: (2) As a result of a restructuring of New Zealand's authorities, the "Ministry of Agriculture and Fisheries" (MAF), which was responsible for certification of fitness for consumption of fishing products, has become the "Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry". This new authority is equipped to effectively check the application of the applicable legal regulations. Therefore, the name of the authority responsible as referred to in decision 94/448/EC must be changed.
hil: As a result of a restructuring of New Zealand's authorities, the organization responsible for certification of fitness for consumption of fishing products, the 'Ministry of Agriculture and Fisheries' (MAF), has become the 'Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry'. This new authority is equipped to effectively check the application of the applicable legal regulations. Therefore, the name of the authority referred to in decision 94/448/EC must be changed.
compare: (2) As a result of a restructuring of New Zealand's authorities, the "Ministry of Agriculture and Fisheries" (MAF), which was responsible for certification of fitness for consumption of fishing products, has become the "Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry". This new authority is equipped to effectively check the application of the applicable legal regulations. Therefore, the name of the authority responsible as referred to in decision 94/448/EC must be changed.

src: h) Ausarbeitung von Vorschriften und Verfahren für die Fischereiüberwachung mit dem Ziel, die Einhaltung der von den Vertragsparteien angenommenen Erhaltungs- und Bewirtschaftungsmaßnahmen sicherzustellen, gegebenenfalls einschließlich eines Schiffsüberwachungssystems, sowie Vorschriften für Bordkontrollen der in dem Gebiet tätigen Fischereifahrzeuge;
ref: (h) develop rules and procedures for the monitoring, control and surveillance of fishing activities in order to ensure compliance with conservation and management measures adopted by the Meeting of the Parties including, where appropriate, a system of verification incorporating vessel monitoring and observation, and rules concerning the boarding and inspection of vessels operating in the Area;
draft: h) Preparation of regulations and procedures for fisheries monitoring with the aim of ensuring compliance with the conservation and management measures adopted by the contracting parties, including, if necessary, a vessel monitoring system, as well as regulations for onboard inspections of fishing vessels operating in the area.
hil: The preparation of regulations and procedures for fisheries monitoring with the aim of ensuring compliance with the conservation and management measures adopted by the contracting parties, including, if necessary, a vessel monitoring system. Furthermore, regulations for onboard inspections of fishing vessels operating in the area should also be developed.
compare: h) Preparation of regulations and procedures for fisheries monitoring with the aim of ensuring compliance with the conservation and management measures adopted by the contracting parties, including, if necessary, a vessel monitoring system, as well as regulations for onboard inspections of fishing vessels operating in the area.

src: (227) Die Kommission zog daher den Schluss, dass die eingeführte Ware und die Gemeinschaftsware trotz der in diesen Stellungnahmen beschriebenen angeblichen technischen Unterschiede bei den Produkteigenschaften und der Qualität als "gleichartig oder unmittelbar konkurrierend" anzusehen sind.
ref: (227) The Commission has concluded that despite the alleged technical differences in the product characteristics and qualities identified in those submissions, the imported product and the Community product are "like or directly competing".
draft: (227) Therefore, the Commission concluded that the imported goods and the Community goods, despite the alleged technical differences in the product characteristics and quality described in these statements, should be considered as "similar or directly competitive".
hil: Therefore, the Commission concluded that despite the alleged technical differences in product characteristics and quality described in these statements, the imported goods and the community goods must be regarded as 'similar or directly competitive'.
compare: Therefore, the Commission concluded that despite the alleged technical differences in product characteristics and quality described in these statements, the imported goods and the community goods must be regarded as 'similar or directly competitive'.

src: (3) Um den zugunsten anderer Fleischarten gesunkenen Verbrauch von Rindfleisch in der Gemeinschaft zu normalisieren und die Wettbewerbsfähigkeit von Rindfleischerzeugnissen auf den internationalen Märkten zu verbessern, muß der Umfang der Marktstützung schrittweise verringert werden. Angesichts der sich daraus ergebenden Folgen für die Erzeuger sollte die im Rahmen der gemeinsamen Marktorganisation gewährte Einkommensbeihilfe angepaßt und umgestaltet werden. Zu diesem Zweck ist die Einführung einer umfassenden Regelung für die Direktzahlungen an die Erzeuger angezeigt. Der Umfang dieser Zahlungen sollte sich parallel zur schrittweisen Verringerung der Marktstützung entwickeln.
ref: (3) Whereas, in order to rebalance meat consumption in the Community to the benefit of the beef sector and to improve the competitiveness of these products on the international markets, the level of market support should be gradually reduced; whereas, given the consequences for producers, the level of income aid provided for under the common market organisation should be adapted and reshaped; whereas, to that end, it is appropriate to establish a comprehensive scheme of direct payments for producers; whereas the amounts of these payments should develop in parallel with the gradual reduction of market support;
draft: (3) In order to normalize the decreased consumption of beef in favor of other types of meat in the community and to improve the competitiveness of beef products in international markets, the scope of market support must be gradually reduced. In view of the resulting consequences for producers, the income support granted under the common market organization should be adjusted and restructured. For this purpose, the introduction of a comprehensive system of direct payments to producers is necessary. The level of these payments should develop in parallel with the gradual reduction of market support.
hil: In order to normalize the decreased consumption of beef in favor of other types of meat in the community and to improve the competitiveness of beef products in international markets, the scope of market support must be gradually reduced. In view of the resulting consequences for producers, the income support granted under the common market organization should be adjusted and restructured. For this purpose, the introduction of a comprehensive system of direct payments to producers is necessary. The level of these payments should develop in parallel with the gradual reduction of market support.
compare: (3) In order to normalize the decreased consumption of beef in favor of other types of meat in the community and to improve the competitiveness of beef products in international markets, the scope of market support must be gradually reduced. In view of the resulting consequences for producers, the income support granted under the common market organization should be adjusted and restructured. For this purpose, the introduction of a comprehensive system of direct payments to producers is necessary. The level of these payments should develop in parallel with the gradual reduction of market support.

src: ( 1 ) Es wird ein Ausschuß für die Anpassung der Richtlinien im Sinne des Artikels 16 an den technischen Fortschritt , im folgenden " Ausschuß " genannt , eingesetzt , der aus Vertretern der Mitgliedstaaten besteht und in dem ein Vertreter der Kommission den Vorsitz führt .
ref: 1. A Committee for adjustment to technical progress of the Directives referred to in Article 16 (hereinafter called "the Committee") is hereby set up. It shall consist of representatives of the Member States with a representative of the Commission as chairman.
draft: (1) A committee for adapting the guidelines in accordance with Article 16 to technical progress, hereinafter referred to as "committee", shall be established, consisting of representatives of the Member States and chaired by a representative of the Commission.
hil: "A committee for adapting the guidelines in accordance with Article 16 to technical progress, hereinafter referred to as \"committee\", shall be established, consisting of representatives of the member states and chaired by a representative of the Commission."
compare: (1) A committee for adapting the guidelines in accordance with Article 16 to technical progress, hereinafter referred to as "committee", shall be established, consisting of representatives of the Member States and chaired by a representative of the Commission.

src: Es ist angebracht, daß während eines ersten Zeitabschnitts - und zwar bis zur Schaffung eines gemeinsamen Sortenkatalogs - diese Beschränkungen insbesondere das Recht der Mitgliedstaaten umfassen, den Saatgutverkehr auf Sorten zu beschränken, die für ihr Gebiet landeskulturellen Wert besitzen.
ref: Whereas, during a first stage, until a common catalogue of varieties has been established, the restrictions allowed should include in particular the right of Member States to restrict the marketing of certified seed to those varieties which are of value for cropping and use in their own territory;

src: in Erwägung nachstehender Gründe: Die Unterschiede zwischen den einzelstaatlichen Rechtsvorschriften über Lebensmittelzusatzstoffe und deren Verwendung behindern den freien Verkehr mit Lebensmitteln. Sie können zu ungleichen Wettbewerbsbedingungen führen und dadurch die Errichtung oder das Funktionieren des Gemeinsamen Marktes unmittelbar beeinträchtigen.
ref: Whereas differences between national laws relating to food additives and the conditions for their use hinder the free movement of foodstuffs; whereas they may create conditions of unfair competition, thereby directly affecting the establishment or functioning of the common market;
draft: Taking into consideration the following reasons: The differences between national regulations on food additives and their use hinder the free movement of food. They can lead to unequal conditions of competition and thus directly affect the establishment or functioning of the Common Market.
hil: Whereas disparities between the provisions of national legislation on food additives and their use hinder the free movement of food, may lead to unequal conditions of competition and thereby directly affect the establishment or functioning of the common market.
compare: Taking into consideration the following reasons: The differences between national regulations on food additives and their use hinder the free movement of food. They can lead to unequal conditions of competition and thus directly affect the establishment or functioning of the Common Market.

src: Während der Übergangszeit muß jedoch bei der Verwendung der Einheiten im Meßwesen im Handel zwischen den Mitgliedstaaten Klarheit herrschen , um vor allem den Verbraucher zu schützen . Als hierzu geeignet erscheint die den Mitgliedstaaten auferlegte Verpflichtung , bei den während der Übergangszeit aus anderen Mitgliedstaaten eingeführten Waren und Ausrüstungen die Verwendung zusätzlicher Angaben zu akzeptieren .
ref: Whereas, during the transitional period, it is essential, particularly in order to protect the consumer, to maintain a clear position on the use of units of measurement in trade between the Member States ; whereas the obligation on the Member States to allow use of supplementary indications on products and equipment imported from other Member States during this transitional period seems to serve this purpose well; (1)OJ No L 243, 29.10.1971, p. 29.
draft: During the transitional period, however, clarity must prevail in the use of units in measurement in trade between Member States, especially to protect the consumer. The obligation imposed on the Member States to accept the use of additional information on goods and equipment imported during the transitional period from other Member States appears to be suitable for this purpose.
hil: During the transitional period, clarity must prevail in the use of units in measurement in trade between Member States, especially to protect the consumer. The obligation imposed on the Member States to accept the use of additional information on goods and equipment imported during the transitional period from other Member States appears to be suitable for this purpose.
compare: During the transitional period, however, clarity must prevail in the use of units in measurement in trade between Member States, especially to protect the consumer. The obligation imposed on the Member States to accept the use of additional information on goods and equipment imported during the transitional period from other Member States appears to be suitable for this purpose.

src: Wenn die Mitgliedstaaten diese Vorschriften erlassen, nehmen sie in diesen Vorschriften selbst oder durch einen Hinweis bei der amtlichen Veröffentlichung auf diese Richtlinie Bezug .

src: Die Geltungsdauer der Ermächtigung gemäß Artikel 1 endet mit dem Inkrafttreten einer Richtlinie zur Straffung der Ausnahmeregelungen gemäß Artikel 27 der Richtlinie 77/388/EWG zur Verhinderung der Umgehung der MwSt. im Wege der Unterbewertung von Leistungen zwischen verbundenen Personen oder am 1. Juni 2009, je nachdem, welcher Zeitpunkt früher liegt.
ref: The authorisation granted under Article 1 shall expire on the date of entry into force of a Directive rationalising the derogations pursuant to Article 27 of Directive 77/388/EEC which counter avoidance of VAT through the valuation of supplies between connected persons, or on the 1 June 2009, whichever is the earlier.
draft: The validity period of the authorization according to Article 1 ends with the entry into force of a directive to streamline the exemption provisions according to Article 27 of Directive 77/388/EEC to prevent the circumvention of VAT by undervaluation of services between affiliated persons or on June 1, 2009, whichever is earlier.
hil: The authorization period in accordance with Article 1 ends with the entry into force of a directive to streamline the exemption provisions according to Article 27 of Directive 77/388/EEC to prevent the circumvention of VAT by undervaluation of services between affiliated persons, or on June 1, 2009, whichever is earlier.
compare: The validity period of the authorization according to Article 1 ends with the entry into force of a directive to streamline the exemption provisions according to Article 27 of Directive 77/388/EEC to prevent the circumvention of VAT by undervaluation of services between affiliated persons or on June 1, 2009, whichever is earlier.

src: Die Einführung einer Regelung zur Registrierung dieser Verträge obliegt den Mitgliedstaaten. Es ist vorzusehen, daß sie eine damit beauftragte Stelle benennen.

hil: Rules for registering these contracts are the responsibility of the Member States and they are required to appoint a designated authority for this purpose.
compare: The introduction of a regulation for the registration of these contracts is the responsibility of the Member States. It is to be provided that they appoint a designated authority for this purpose.

src: (8) Der Rat bekräftigt seine Überzeugung, dass Städtepartnerschaften angesichts der wichtigen Rolle, die sie bei der Förderung der Identität als Bürger und des gegenseitigen Verständnisses zwischen den Völkern Europas spielen können, weiterhin unterstützt werden müssen.
ref: (8) The Council reaffirms its belief in the need to continue supporting town-twinning schemes, given the important role that they can play in promoting civic identity and mutual understanding between the people of Europe.
draft: "The council reaffirms its conviction that twinning arrangements, in view of their important role in promoting the identity of citizens and mutual understanding between the peoples of Europe, must continue to be supported."
hil: The Council reaffirms its conviction that twinning arrangements, given the important role they can play in promoting identity as citizens and mutual understanding among the peoples of Europe, must continue to be supported.
compare: "The council reaffirms its conviction that twinning arrangements, in view of their important role in promoting the identity of citizens and mutual understanding between the peoples of Europe, must continue to be supported."

src: (7) Unbeschadet der Sanktionen gemäß den Artikeln 26 und 27 zahlen die Mitgliedstaaten den Erzeugerorganisationen oder ihren Vereinigungen innerhalb von vier Monaten nach Eingang des vollständigen Zahlungsantrags den Betrag der gemeinschaftlichen Rücknahmevergütung, abzüglich der Nettoeinnahmen, die diese mit den aus dem Markt genommenen Erzeugnissen erzielt haben.
ref: 7. Subject to the penalties provided for in Articles 26 and 27, the Member States shall pay the Community withdrawal compensation to producer organisations or their associations, minus the net receipts they have earned on the products withdrawn from the market, within four months of receiving their complete payment application file.
draft: (7) Without prejudice to the sanctions referred to in Articles 26 and 27, Member States shall pay the producer organisations or their associations, within four months of receipt of the full payment application, the amount of the community withdrawal premium, less the net income earned by those organisations from the products taken off the market.
hil: Without prejudice to the sanctions referred to in Articles 26 and 27, Member States shall pay the producer organizations or their associations, within four months of receiving the complete payment application, the amount of the community withdrawal premium, minus the net income earned by those organizations from the products taken off the market.
compare: (7) Without prejudice to the sanctions referred to in Articles 26 and 27, Member States shall pay the producer organisations or their associations, within four months of receipt of the full payment application, the amount of the community withdrawal premium, less the net income earned by those organisations from the products taken off the market.

src: Die vorherigen Prüfungen im Sinne der Artikel 4 und 5 müssen eine Untersuchung der hydrogeologischen Bedingungen der betreffenden Zone, der etwaigen Reinigungskraft des Bodens und des Untergrundes sowie der Gefahren einer Verschmutzung und einer Beeinträchtigung der Qualität des Grundwassers durch die Ableitung umfassen und die Feststellung ermöglichen, ob die Ableitung in das Grundwasser vom Gesichtspunkt des Umweltschutzes aus eine angemessene Lösung darstellt.
ref: The prior investigations referred to in Articles 4 and 5 shall include examination of the hydrogeological conditions of the area concerned, the possible purifying powers of the soil and subsoil and the risk of pollution and alteration of the quality of the groundwater from the discharge and shall establish whether the discharge of substances into groundwater is a satisfactory solution from the point of view of the environment.
draft: The previous tests in accordance with Articles 4 and 5 must include an investigation of the hydrogeological conditions of the relevant zone, the possible cleaning power of the soil and subsoil as well as the hazards of contamination and impairment of the quality of the groundwater by the discharge, and enable it to be determined whether the discharge into the groundwater represents an appropriate solution from the environmental protection point of view.
hil: The previous tests in accordance with Articles 4 and 5 must include an investigation of the hydrogeological conditions of the relevant zone, the possible cleaning power of the soil and subsoil, as well as the hazards of contamination and impairment of the quality of the groundwater by the discharge, and enable the determination of whether the discharge into the groundwater represents an appropriate solution from the point of view of environmental protection.
compare: The previous tests in accordance with Articles 4 and 5 must include an investigation of the hydrogeological conditions of the relevant zone, the possible cleaning power of the soil and subsoil as well as the hazards of contamination and impairment of the quality of the groundwater by the discharge, and enable it to be determined whether the discharge into the groundwater represents an appropriate solution from the environmental protection point of view.

ref: 1. The export refund on wheat flour, meslin flour and rye flour, wheat groats, wheat meal and malt shall be fixed taking account of the quality of the basic cereal necessary to manufacture 1 000 kg of the product in question.

src: (2) Bescheinigungen der Gemeinschaft, die die Konformität mit harmonisierten Normen bestätigen und nach den Verfahren erworben wurden, die in den im vorstehenden Absatz bezeichneten Richtlinien vorgesehen sind, bleiben bis zum 31. Juni 2003 gültig, sofern sie nicht vor diesem Zeitpunkt ungültig werden; die Gültigkeit beschränkt sich jedoch auf die Konformität mit solchen harmonisierten Normen, auf die in den bezeichneten Richtlinien hingewiesen wird.
ref: 2. EC certificates of conformity to the harmonized standards obtained in accordance with the procedures laid down in the Directives referred to in paragraph 1 shall continue to be valid until 30 June 2003 unless they expire before that date. Their validity shall continue to be limited to the harmonized standards indicated in the aforementioned Directives.
draft: (2) Certificates of conformity with harmonized standards, which have been obtained through the procedures provided for in the directives referred to in the preceding paragraph and confirm conformity with harmonized standards referred to in the said directives, shall remain valid until 31 June 2003, provided they do not become invalid before that date. However, their validity shall be confined to conformity with harmonized standards referred to in the said directives.
hil: Certificates of conformity with harmonized standards, acquired according to the procedures provided for in the directives referred to in the preceding paragraph and confirming conformity with harmonized standards referred to in the said directives, shall remain valid until 31 June 2003, provided they do not become invalid before that date. However, their validity is limited to the conformity with harmonized standards referred to in the said directives.
compare: Certificates of conformity with harmonized standards, acquired according to the procedures provided for in the directives referred to in the preceding paragraph and confirming conformity with harmonized standards referred to in the said directives, shall remain valid until 31 June 2003, provided they do not become invalid before that date. However, their validity is limited to the conformity with harmonized standards referred to in the said directives.

src: Finanzierungen, die politische Parteien auf europäischer Ebene aus dem Gesamthaushaltsplan der Europäischen Union oder aus anderen Quellen erhalten, dürfen nicht der unmittelbaren oder mittelbaren Finanzierung anderer politischer Parteien und insbesondere nationaler politischer Parteien dienen, auf die weiterhin die nationalen Regelungen Anwendung finden.

src: Das Protokoll zum Europa-Mittelmeer-Abkommen zur Gründung einer Assoziation zwischen den Europäischen Gemeinschaften und ihren Mitgliedstaaten einerseits und dem Königreich Marokko andererseits anlässlich des Beitritts der Tschechischen Republik, der Republik Estland, der Republik Zypern, der Republik Lettland, der Republik Litauen, der Republik Ungarn, der Republik Malta, der Republik Polen, der Republik Slowenien und der Slowakischen Republik zur Europäischen Union wird im Namen der Europäischen Gemeinschaft und ihrer Mitgliedstaaten genehmigt.
ref: The Protocol to the Euro-Mediterranean Agreement establishing an association between the European Communities and their Member States, of the one part, and the Kingdom of Morocco, of the other part, to take account of the accession of the Czech Republic, the Republic of Estonia, the Republic of Cyprus, the Republic of Latvia, the Republic of Lithuania, the Republic of Hungary, the Republic of Malta, the Republic of Poland, the Republic of Slovenia and the Slovak Republic to the European Union, is hereby approved on behalf of the European Community and its Member States.
draft: The protocol for the Euro-Mediterranean Agreement establishing an association between the European Communities and their Member States, on the one hand, and the Kingdom of Morocco on the other, on the occasion of the accession of the Czech Republic, the Republic of Estonia, the Republic of Cyprus, the Republic of Latvia, the Republic of Lithuania, the Republic of Hungary, the Republic of Malta, the Republic of Poland, the Republic of Slovenia and the Slovak Republic to the European Union is approved on behalf of the European Community and its Member States.
hil: The protocol for the Euro-Mediterranean Agreement establishing an association between the European Communities and their Member States, on the one hand, and the Kingdom of Morocco on the other, on the occasion of the accession of the Czech Republic, the Republic of Estonia, the Republic of Cyprus, the Republic of Latvia, the Republic of Lithuania, the Republic of Hungary, the Republic of Malta, the Republic of Poland, the Republic of Slovenia and the Slovak Republic to the European Union is approved on behalf of the European Community and its Member States.
compare: The protocol for the Euro-Mediterranean Agreement establishing an association between the European Communities and their Member States, on the one hand, and the Kingdom of Morocco on the other, on the occasion of the accession of the Czech Republic, the Republic of Estonia, the Republic of Cyprus, the Republic of Latvia, the Republic of Lithuania, the Republic of Hungary, the Republic of Malta, the Republic of Poland, the Republic of Slovenia and the Slovak Republic to the European Union is approved on behalf of the European Community and its Member States.

src: Dies zeigt, dass der Bundesregierung und der begünstigten Werft unmissverständlich klar gemacht wurde, worin der Sinn und Zweck der Entscheidung besteht: dass nämlich die genehmigte Beihilfe einen Höchstbetrag darstellt, der nur insoweit ausgeschöpft werden darf, als er für den Erfolg des Umstrukturierungsvorhabens unbedingt erforderlich ist.
ref: That makes it evident that the concept of the decision was made clear to Germany and the beneficiary: the aid approved is a maximum amount, which is to be granted only insofar as it is strictly necessary for the success of the restructuring process.
draft: This shows that the federal government and the beneficiary shipyard were unambiguously made clear about the purpose of the decision, namely that the approved aid amount represents a maximum amount that may only be used to the extent that it is absolutely necessary for the success of the restructuring project.
hil: This shows that the federal government and the beneficiary shipyard were unambiguously made clear about the purpose of the decision, namely that the approved aid amount represents a maximum amount that may only be used to the extent that it is absolutely necessary for the success of the restructuring project.

src: (5) Es gilt, die Ex-situ- und In-situ-Erhaltung genetischer Ressourcen in der Landwirtschaft (einschließlich In-situ-/On-farm-Erhaltung und -entwicklung) zu fördern.
ref: (5) The ex situ and in situ conservation of genetic resources in agriculture (including in situ/on-farm conservation and development) should be promoted.
draft: (5) It is important to promote the ex-situ and in-situ conservation of genetic resources in agriculture (including in-situ/on-farm conservation and development).
hil: It is desirable to promote the ex-situ and in-situ conservation of genetic resources in agriculture (including in-situ/on-farm conservation and development) according to (5). This conservation should cover all plant, microbial, and animal genetic resources that are or could prove useful for agriculture and rural development, including forest genetic resources, and should be in line with the needs of the Common Agricultural Policy with respect to conserving genetic resources and increasing the use of under-utilised breeds and varieties in agricultural production.
compare: (5) It is important to promote the ex-situ and in-situ conservation of genetic resources in agriculture (including in-situ/on-farm conservation and development).

src: Die technischen Anforderungen, denen Kraftfahrzeuge gemäß den einzelstaatlichen Rechtsvorschriften genügen müssen, betreffen unter anderem die Geschwindigkeitsbegrenzung für bestimmte Fahrzeugklassen.

src: Die Kommission sorgt für die Koordinierung und die Kohärenz der Interventionen, die im Rahmen dieser Verordnung aus dem Gemeinschaftshaushalt durchgeführt werden, sowie für die Koordinierung und die Kohärenz dieser Interventionen mit denjenigen der Europäischen Investitionsbank und anderer Finanzinstrumente der Gemeinschaft sowie mit denjenigen der Internationalen Finanzinstitutionen.

src: (8) Um der wachsenden Sorge über die Produktion von amphetaminartigen Aufputschmitteln zu begegnen, sollten die Einfuhrkontrollen für die wichtigsten Ausgangsstoffe für synthetische Drogen durch gemeinsame Verfahren und Anforderungen weiter verschärft werden, die auf einzelne Sendungen ausgerichtete Kontrollen ermöglichen.
ref: (8) In order to address the heightened concern about the production of amphetamine-type stimulants, import control mechanisms for the main synthetic drug precursors should be further strengthened through common procedures and requirements allowing individual consignment-based controls to be carried out.
draft: To address the growing concern about the production of amphetamine-like stimulants, import controls for the main starting materials for synthetic drugs should be further tightened through common procedures and requirements that allow controls focused on individual shipments.
hil: To address the growing concern regarding the production of amphetamine-like stimulants, import controls for the main starting materials for synthetic drugs should be further tightened through common procedures and requirements that allow controls focused on individual shipments.
compare: To address the growing concern about the production of amphetamine-like stimulants, import controls for the main starting materials for synthetic drugs should be further tightened through common procedures and requirements that allow controls focused on individual shipments.

src: (4) Um ein Überschreiten der zusätzlichen Kontingente zu verhindern, ist der Mitgliedstaat, in dessen Gebiet die Messe stattfindet, aufzufordern, zum einen dafür zu sorgen, dass die Gesamtmengen in den bescheinigten Kaufverträgen diese zusätzlichen Kontingentsmengen nicht übersteigen, und zum anderen der Kommission nach Abschluss der Messe diese Gesamtmengen mitzuteilen.
ref: (4) In order to avoid overutilisation of the additional quotas it is appropriate to request the Member State on the territory of which the fair is taking place, on the one hand, to ensure that the total amounts covered by certified contracts do not exceed the limits set for these additional quotas and, on the other hand, to inform the Commission after closure of the fair of the total quantities covered by such certified contracts.
draft: To prevent exceeding the additional quotas, the Member State in whose territory the fair takes place must be asked, on the one hand, to ensure that the total quantities in the certified purchase contracts do not exceed these additional quota quantities, and on the other hand, to inform the Commission of these total quantities after the fair has ended.
hil: To prevent exceeding the additional quotas, the Member State in whose territory the fair takes place must be asked, on the one hand, to ensure that the total quantities in the certified purchase contracts do not exceed these additional quota quantities, and on the other hand, to inform the Commission of these total quantities after the fair has ended.
compare: To prevent exceeding the additional quotas, the Member State in whose territory the fair takes place must be asked, on the one hand, to ensure that the total quantities in the certified purchase contracts do not exceed these additional quota quantities, and on the other hand, to inform the Commission of these total quantities after the fair has ended.

src: (35) Des Weiteren hat Frankreich die Kommission ersucht, die Vereinbarkeit der Maßnahmen mit dem Gemeinsamen Markt direkt auf der Grundlage von Artikel 87 Absatz 3 Buchstabe c) EG-Vertrag zu prüfen, falls die Genehmigungsvoraussetzung bei Zugrundelegung der Umstrukturierungsleitlinien nicht erfüllt sei.
ref: (35) Furthermore, France asked the Commission to consider the compatibility of the financial measures in question with the common market directly on the basis of Article 87(3)(c) of the EC Treaty if the aid were not compatible under the Restructuring Guidelines.

hil: Member States shall send the Commission the list of operators approved for the allocation of quotas pursuant to Article 3(3) of the said Regulation, which are to be opened on 1 January 2004, by 20 December 2003 in accordance with the provisions of Annex I, Part H of the said Regulation.
