src: Veranschlagt sind verschiedene Ausgaben für die Sicherheit der Gebäude, insbesondere die Gebäudeüberwachungsverträge, die Miete und die Wiederauffüllung der Feuerlöscher, die Anschaffung und die Unterhaltung der Brandbekämpfungsgeräte, die Erneuerung der Ausrüstung der als freiwillige Brandschutzhelfer tätigen Beamten, die Kosten der gesetzlich vorgeschriebenen Kontrollen.
ref: This appropriation is intended to cover miscellaneous expenditure on buildings relating to security and safety, in particular contracts governing building surveillance, hire and replenishment of extinguishers, purchase and maintenance of fire-fighting equipment, replacement of equipment for officials acting as voluntary firemen, costs of carrying out statutory inspections.
draft: Various expenses are budgeted for building security, in particular building surveillance contracts, rent and refilling of fire extinguishers, acquisition and maintenance of firefighting equipment, renewal of equipment for officers acting as voluntary firefighters, and costs of legally required inspections.
hil: Various expenses are budgeted for building security, in particular building surveillance contracts, rent and refilling of fire extinguishers, acquisition and maintenance of firefighting equipment, renewal of equipment for officers acting as voluntary firefighters, and costs of legally required inspections.
compare: Various expenses are budgeted for building security, in particular building surveillance contracts, rent and refilling of fire extinguishers, acquisition and maintenance of firefighting equipment, renewal of equipment for officers acting as voluntary firefighters, and costs of legally required inspections.

src: - Kann nachgewiesen werden, daß bei einer konventionellen Beurteilung die gefährliche Eigenschaft wegen Wirkungen wie Antagonismus überschätzt würde, so sind diese Wirkungen bei der Einstufung der Zubereitung zu berücksichtigen.
ref: - that, owing to effects such as antagonism, a conventional assessment would overestimate the toxicological hazard, those effects shall be taken into account in classifying the preparation.
draft: It can be demonstrated that with a conventional assessment, the hazardous property would be overestimated due to effects such as antagonism, so these effects must be taken into account when classifying the preparation.
hil: It can be demonstrated that with a conventional assessment, the hazardous property would be overestimated due to effects such as antagonism, so these effects must be taken into account when classifying the preparation.
compare: It can be demonstrated that with a conventional assessment, the hazardous property would be overestimated due to effects such as antagonism, so these effects must be taken into account when classifying the preparation.

src: Der gemäß Artikel 52 der Richtlinie 78/660/EWG eingesetzte Kontaktausschuß hat ausserdem folgende Aufgaben: a) unbeschadet der Artikel 169 und 170 des Vertrages eine gleichmässige Anwendung dieser Richtlinie durch eine regelmässige Abstimmung, insbesondere in konkreten Anwendungsfragen, zu erleichtern;
ref: THE CONTACT COMMITTEE SET UP PURSUANT TO ARTICLE 52 OF DIRECTIVE 78/660/EEC SHALL ALSO : ( A ) FACILITATE , WITHOUT PREJUDICE TO ARTICLES 169 AND 170 OF THE TREATY , HARMONIZED APPLICATION OF THIS DIRECTIVE THROUGH REGULAR MEETINGS DEALING , IN PARTICULAR , WITH PRACTICAL PROBLEMS ARISING IN CONNECTION WITH ITS APPLICATION ;
draft: The contact committee established pursuant to Article 52 of Directive 78/660/EEC shall also have the following tasks: (a) to facilitate, without prejudice to Articles 169 and 170 of the Treaty, a uniform application of this Directive by means of regular coordination, in particular in specific application issues;
hil: The contact committee established pursuant to Article 52 of Directive 78/660/EEC shall also have the following tasks: (a) to facilitate a uniform application of this Directive by means of regular coordination, in particular in specific application issues, without prejudice to Articles 169 and 170 of the Treaty.
compare: The contact committee established pursuant to Article 52 of Directive 78/660/EEC shall also have the following tasks: (a) to facilitate, without prejudice to Articles 169 and 170 of the Treaty, a uniform application of this Directive by means of regular coordination, in particular in specific application issues;

src: in Erwägung nachstehender Gründe: Gemäß Artikel 2 Absatz 3 des Beitrittsvertrags können die Organe der Europäischen Gemeinschaften vor dem Beitritt die in Artikel 396 der Akte genannten Maßnahmen erlassen, die nur vorbehaltlich des Inkrafttretens des Vertrages und zum Zeitpunkt dieses Inkrafttretens in Kraft treten.
ref: Whereas, under Article 2 (3) of the Treaty of Accession, the institutions of the European Communities may adopt, before accession, the measures referred to in Article 396 of the Act, such measures entering into force subject to and on the date of the entry into force of the Treaty;
draft: Considering the following reasons: According to Article 2 (3) of the Accession Treaty, the organs of the European Communities may adopt the measures referred to in Article 396 of the Act prior to accession, which only take effect subject to the entry into force of the Treaty and at the time of its entry into force.
hil: Whereas, under Article 2(3) of the Accession Treaty, the organs of the European Communities may adopt, prior to accession, the measures referred to in Article 396 of the Act which only take effect subject to the entry into force of the Treaty and at the time of its entry into force.
compare: Considering the following reasons: According to Article 2 (3) of the Accession Treaty, the organs of the European Communities may adopt the measures referred to in Article 396 of the Act prior to accession, which only take effect subject to the entry into force of the Treaty and at the time of its entry into force.

src: f) Bedingungen und Tarife für den Anschluss neuer Elektrizitätserzeuger, um zu gewährleisten, dass diese objektiv, transparent und nichtdiskriminierend sind, unter besonderer Berücksichtigung der Kosten und der Vorteile der verschiedenen Technologien zur Elektrizitätserzeugung aus erneuerbaren Energiequellen, der dezentralen Erzeugung und der Kraft-Wärme-Kopplung;
ref: (f) the terms, conditions and tariffs for connecting new producers of electricity to guarantee that these are objective, transparent and non-discriminatory, in particular taking full account of the costs and benefits of the various renewable energy sources technologies, distributed generation and combined heat and power;
draft: f) Conditions and tariffs for the connection of new electricity producers to ensure that these are objective, transparent, and non-discriminatory, with special consideration given to the costs and benefits of various technologies for electricity generation from renewable energy sources, decentralized generation, and combined heat and power.
hil: Conditions and tariffs for connecting new electricity generators must be established to ensure that they are objective, transparent, and non-discriminatory, taking particular account of the costs and benefits of different technologies for generating electricity from renewable energy sources, decentralized generation, and combined heat and power.
compare: f) Conditions and tariffs for the connection of new electricity producers to ensure that these are objective, transparent, and non-discriminatory, with special consideration given to the costs and benefits of various technologies for electricity generation from renewable energy sources, decentralized generation, and combined heat and power.

src: c) Erhebt ein Mitgliedstaat oder die Kommission binnen drei Monaten, nachdem die Mitgliedstaaten von der Kommission gemäß Buchstabe b) unterrichtet wurden, Einwände auf der Grundlage der in Buchstabe a) genannten Kriterien, so wendet die Kommission auf diesen Fall das in Artikel 23 Absatz 2 erwähnte Verfahren an.

draft: c) If a Member State or the Commission raises objections based on the criteria referred to in point (a) within three months of the Member States being informed by the Commission in accordance with point (b), the Commission shall apply the procedure referred to in Article 23(2) to that case.

compare: c) If a Member State or the Commission raises objections based on the criteria referred to in point (a) within three months of the Member States being informed by the Commission in accordance with point (b), the Commission shall apply the procedure referred to in Article 23(2) to that case.

src: (1) Wird in einem bei einem dänischen Gericht anhängigen Fall die Frage der Gültigkeit oder Auslegung dieses Abkommens aufgeworfen, so ersucht das betreffende Gericht den Gerichtshof um eine Entscheidung in dieser Frage, wenn unter denselben Umständen ein Gericht eines anderen Mitgliedstaats der Europäischen Union im Hinblick auf die Zustellungsverordnung sowie die dazu gehörigen Durchführungsbestimmungen nach Artikel 2 Absatz 1 dieses Abkommens dies ebenfalls tun müsste.
ref: 1. Where a question on the validity or interpretation of this Agreement is raised in a case pending before a Danish court or tribunal, that court or tribunal shall request the Court of Justice to give a ruling thereon whenever under the same circumstances a court or tribunal of another Member State of the European Union would be required to do so in respect of the Regulation on the service of documents and its implementing measures referred to in Article 2(1) of this Agreement.
draft: If, in a case pending before a Danish court, the question of the validity or interpretation of this Agreement arises and a court of another Member State of the European Union, under the same circumstances and with reference to the Service Regulation and the implementing provisions thereof pursuant to Article 2 (1) of this Agreement, would also have to request a decision from the Court of Justice of the European Union on that question, the court seized of the case shall refer the matter to the Court of Justice of the European Union for a ruling.
hil: If the question of the validity or interpretation of this Agreement is raised in a case pending before a Danish court, the court concerned shall request a decision on this matter from the Court of Justice of the European Union if, under the same circumstances, a court of another Member State of the European Union would also be required to do so with regard to the Service Regulation and the implementing provisions thereof pursuant to Article 2(1) of this Agreement.
compare: If, in a case pending before a Danish court, the question of the validity or interpretation of this Agreement arises and a court of another Member State of the European Union, under the same circumstances and with reference to the Service Regulation and the implementing provisions thereof pursuant to Article 2 (1) of this Agreement, would also have to request a decision from the Court of Justice of the European Union on that question, the court seized of the case shall refer the matter to the Court of Justice of the European Union for a ruling.

src: 13e Wenn auf den eingetragenen Inhaber lautende Anteile oder Inhaberanteile zum ersten Mal ausgegeben werden oder wenn Marktentwicklungen es erforderlich machen, dass eine Variante geändert wird oder mehrere Varianten miteinander kombiniert werden, können die NZBen Ausnahmeregelungen im Hinblick auf die Regelungen der Absätze 13c und 13d für ein Jahr gewähren."
ref: 13e. If registered shares/units or bearer shares/units are issued for the first time or if market developments require a change of option or combination of options, NCBs may grant derogations for one year in respect of the requirements set out in paragraphs 13c and d."
draft: 13e If shares or owner shares registered in the name of the bearer are issued for the first time or if market developments require a variant to be changed or several variants to be combined, the NZBs may grant exceptions with regard to the provisions of paragraphs 13c and 13d for one year.
hil: If bearer shares or registered shares in the name of the holder are issued for the first time, or if market developments require a change in a variant or the combination of several variants, the NZBs may grant exceptional arrangements in relation to the provisions of paragraphs 13c and 13d for one year.
compare: 13e If shares or owner shares registered in the name of the bearer are issued for the first time or if market developments require a variant to be changed or several variants to be combined, the NZBs may grant exceptions with regard to the provisions of paragraphs 13c and 13d for one year.

src: (16) Die in dieser Verordnung vorgesehenen Maßnahmen entsprechen der Stellungnahme des Ausschusses für den Zollkodex -

src: Eine Saatgutfirma oder ein Zuechter, der Saatgut in einem anderen Mitgliedstaat als in dem, wo die Zulassung oder Registrierung erfolgt ist, vermehrt oder vermehren lässt, muß dem für die Gewährung der Beihilfe zuständigen Mitgliedstaat auf Anforderung dieses Staates sämtliche zur Kontrolle des Anrechts auf Gewährung der Beihilfe notwendigen Angaben liefern.
ref: A seed establishment or a breeder growing seed or having seed grown in a Member State other than that in which approval or registration took place must supply that other Member State, on request, with all the information required for checking entitlement to aid.
draft: A seed company or breeder who multiplies or has seed propagated in another Member State than where authorization or registration took place must, at the request of this state, provide all the necessary information for verifying the entitlement to grant aid to the Member State in charge of granting aid.
hil: The seed company or breeder who multiplies or has seed propagated in another Member State than the one where authorization or registration took place must provide, upon request of that state, all the information necessary for verifying the entitlement to grant aid to the Member State responsible for granting the aid.
compare: A seed company or breeder who multiplies or has seed propagated in another Member State than where authorization or registration took place must, at the request of this state, provide all the necessary information for verifying the entitlement to grant aid to the Member State in charge of granting aid.

src: c) lebende oder tote Exemplare, die als Hausrat zum Besitz einer Person gehören, die in die Gemeinschaft einreist, um sich dort niederzulassen.

src: (139) Nach der Auswertung der Stellungnahmen der Beteiligten und der Bemerkungen Portugals stellt die Kommission fest, dass die zwischen 1994 und 1997 gewährten Kapitalerhöhungen RTP einen finanziellen Vorteil gewährt haben.
ref: (139) After considering the comments from third parties and the Portuguese authorities, the Commission concludes that the capital increases in the period 1994 to 1997 provided a financial advantage for RTP.
draft: (139) After evaluating the statements of the parties involved and the comments of Portugal, the Commission concludes that the capital increases granted to RTP between 1994 and 1997 have provided a financial advantage.
hil: After evaluating the statements of the parties involved and Portugal's comments, the Commission concludes that the capital increases granted to RTP between 1994 and 1997 have provided a financial advantage.
compare: After evaluating the statements of the parties involved and Portugal's comments, the Commission concludes that the capital increases granted to RTP between 1994 and 1997 have provided a financial advantage.

src: Die Sicherheit wird jedoch freigegeben, wenn der Marktbeteiligte nachweist, daß mindestens 1 500 Tonnen Getreideerzeugnisse das Zollgebiet der Gemeinschaft auf einem hochseefähigen Schiff verlassen haben.
ref: However, the security shall be released where the operator provides proof that a quantity of at least 1 500 tonnes of cereals products has left the customs territory of the Community on a vessel suitable for sea transport.
draft: However, security is released if the market participant proves that at least 1,500 tons of grain products have left the customs territory of the Community on a high-sea vessel.
hil: The security will be released, however, if the market participant proves that at least 1,500 tons of grain products have left the customs territory of the Community on a high-sea vessel.
compare: However, security is released if the market participant proves that at least 1,500 tons of grain products have left the customs territory of the Community on a high-sea vessel.

src: (4) Bevor die Zweigniederlassung der Verwaltungsgesellschaft ihre Tätigkeit aufnimmt, verfügen die zuständigen Behörden des Aufnahmemitgliedstaats über einen Zeitraum von zwei Monaten nach Eingang der in Absatz 2 genannten Angaben zur Vorbereitung der Beaufsichtigung der Verwaltungsgesellschaft und erforderlichenfalls zur Angabe der Bedingungen - einschließlich der in den Artikeln 44 und 45 genannten Vorschriften des Aufnahmemitgliedstaats sowie der im Falle der individuellen Portfolioverwaltung gemäß Artikel 5 Absatz 3 und bei der Anlageberatung und im Verwahrungsgeschäft einzuhaltenden Wohlverhaltensregeln -, die aus Gründen des Allgemeininteresses für die Ausübung dieser Tätigkeit im Aufnahmemitgliedstaat gelten.
ref: 4. Before the branch of a management company starts business, the competent authorities of the host Member State shall, within two months of receiving the information referred to in paragraph 2, prepare for the supervision of the management company and, if necessary, indicate the conditions, including the rules mentioned in Articles 44 and 45 in force in the host Member State and the rules of conduct to be respected in the case of provision of the portfolio management service mentioned in Article 5(3) and of investment advisory services and custody, under which, in the interest of the general good, that business must be carried on in the host Member State.
draft: Before the branch of the management company starts its activities, the competent authorities of the host Member State shall have a period of two months from the receipt of the information referred to in paragraph 2 to prepare for the supervision of the management company and, where necessary, to specify the conditions - including the rules referred to in Articles 44 and 45 of the host Member State as well as the standards of conduct to be observed in the case of individual portfolio management pursuant to Article 5(3) and in investment advice and custody business - which apply for reasons of public interest to the exercise of that activity in the host Member State.
hil: Before the branch office of the management company commences its activities, the competent authorities of the host Member State shall have a period of two months from the receipt of the information referred to in paragraph 2 to prepare for the supervision of the management company and, where necessary, to indicate the conditions, including the provisions referred to in Articles 44 and 45 of the host Member State, as well as the conduct rules applicable in the case of individual portfolio management in accordance with Article 5(3) and in investment advice and custody business, that apply for reasons of public interest to the exercise of this activity in the host Member State.
compare: Before the branch of the management company starts its activities, the competent authorities of the host Member State shall have a period of two months from the receipt of the information referred to in paragraph 2 to prepare for the supervision of the management company and, where necessary, to specify the conditions - including the rules referred to in Articles 44 and 45 of the host Member State as well as the standards of conduct to be observed in the case of individual portfolio management pursuant to Article 5(3) and in investment advice and custody business - which apply for reasons of public interest to the exercise of that activity in the host Member State.

src: in Erwägung nachstehender Gründe: Nach der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 3051/95 haben Unternehmen und Mitgliedstaaten den Internationalen Code für Maßnahmen zur Organisation eines sicheren Schiffsbetriebs, der von der Versammlung der Internationalen Seeschiffahrtsorganisation (IMO) durch die Entschließung A.741 (18) vom 4. November 1993 verabschiedet worden ist, bei Ro-Ro-Fähren, die Häfen von Mitgliedstaaten der Gemeinschaft anlaufen oder verlassen, einzuhalten.
ref: Whereas Regulation (EC) No 3051/95 provides that companies and Member States are to comply with the provisions of the International Safety Management Code, adopted by the International Maritime Organization (IMO) through Assembly Resolution A.741 (18) of 4 November 1993, in respect of ro-ro ferries operating to or from ports of the Member States of the Community;
draft: Considering the following reasons: According to Regulation (EC) No 3051/95, companies and Member States must comply with the International Code for the Safe Operation of Ships, adopted by Resolution A.741(18) of the International Maritime Organization (IMO) on November 4, 1993, for Ro-Ro ferries calling at or departing from ports of Member States of the Community.
hil: Whereas companies and Member States are required to comply with the International Code for the Safe Operation of Ships for Ro-Ro ferries calling at or departing from ports of Member States of the Community, which was adopted by Resolution A.741(18) of the International Maritime Organization (IMO) on November 4, 1993, under Regulation (EC) No 3051/95.
compare: Considering the following reasons: According to Regulation (EC) No 3051/95, companies and Member States must comply with the International Code for the Safe Operation of Ships, adopted by Resolution A.741(18) of the International Maritime Organization (IMO) on November 4, 1993, for Ro-Ro ferries calling at or departing from ports of Member States of the Community.

src: Dieser Beschluss tritt am 3. Juni 2006 in Kraft, sofern dem Gemeinsamen EWR-Ausschuss alle Mitteilungen nach Artikel 103 Absatz 1 des Abkommens vorliegen [6].

src: Entsprechend dem in demselben Artikel niedergelegten Grundsatz der Verhältnismäßigkeit geht dieser Beschluss nicht über das zur Erreichung dieser Ziele erforderliche Maß hinaus.

src: (1) Die Mitgliedstaaten benennen Zollstellen, die die Überprüfungen und die Förmlichkeiten für die Einfuhr der unter diese Verordnung fallenden Arten in die Gemeinschaft im Hinblick auf die Ermittlung von deren zollrechtlicher Bestimmung im Sinne der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 2913/92 und für die Ausfuhr aus der Gemeinschaft vornehmen, und geben an, welche dieser Zollstellen speziell für lebende Exemplare bestimmt sind.
ref: 1. Member States shall designate customs offices for carrying out the checks and formalities for the introduction into and export from the Community, in order to assign to them a customs-approved treatment or use, within the meaning of Regulation (EEC) No 2913/92, of specimens of species covered by this Regulation and shall state which offices are specifically intended to deal with live specimens.
draft: (1) The Member States shall designate customs offices to carry out the checks and formalities for the importation of the species covered by this Regulation into the Community with a view to determining their customs status within the meaning of Regulation (EEC) No. 2913/92 and for the exportation from the Community, and shall specify which of these customs offices are designated specifically for live specimens.
hil: The Member States shall designate customs offices to carry out the checks and formalities for the importation of the species covered by this Regulation into the Community for the purpose of determining their customs status within the meaning of Regulation No. 2913/92 and for the exportation from the Community, and shall specify which of these customs offices are designated specifically for live specimens.
compare: (1) The Member States shall designate customs offices to carry out the checks and formalities for the importation of the species covered by this Regulation into the Community with a view to determining their customs status within the meaning of Regulation (EEC) No. 2913/92 and for the exportation from the Community, and shall specify which of these customs offices are designated specifically for live specimens.

src: (1) Verstößt ein Fahrzeug oder ein Fahrzeugführer gegen die Bestimmungen dieses Abkommens, so kann die zuständige Behörde der Vertragspartei, in dessen Gebiet es zu diesem Verstoß gekommen ist, den Vorfall der zuständigen Behörde der anderen Vertragspartei melden, die die gesetzlich vorgesehenen Maßnahmen ergreifen kann.
ref: 1. In the event of an infringement of the provisions of this Agreement by a road vehicle, or by a driver of such a vehicle, the competent authority of the Contracting Party in whose territory the infringement occurred may notify the infringement to the competent authority of the other Contracting Party which may take steps as provided by its national laws.
draft: If a vehicle or a driver violates the provisions of this Agreement, the competent authority of the Contracting Party in whose territory the violation has occurred may report the incident to the competent authority of the other Contracting Party, which may take the legally prescribed measures.
hil: The competent authority of the Contracting Party, in whose territory a vehicle or driver violates the provisions of this Agreement, may report the incident to the competent authority of the other Contracting Party, which may take the legally prescribed measures.
compare: The competent authority of the Contracting Party, in whose territory a vehicle or driver violates the provisions of this Agreement, may report the incident to the competent authority of the other Contracting Party, which may take the legally prescribed measures.

src: 5. Für die Zwecke der Prämie für Eiweißpflanzen gemäß Titel IV Kapitel 2 der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1782/2003 und der Flächenzahlung für landwirtschaftliche Kulturpflanzen gemäß Titel IV Kapitel 10 derselben Verordnung, sind unter "Süßlupinen" die Lupinensorten mit einem Bitterkornanteil von höchstens 5 % zu verstehen, der nach dem Verfahren des Anhangs I zu ermitteln ist.
ref: 5. For the purpose of the protein crop premium provided for in Title IV Chapter 2 of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 and arable crops area payment provided for in Title IV Chapter 10 of that Regulation, "sweet lupins" shall means those varieties of lupins producing seed comprising not more than 5 % bitter seeds. The bitter seed content shall be calculated in accordance with the test set out in Annex I to this Regulation.
draft: 5. For the purposes of the premium for protein crops in accordance with Title IV Chapter 2 of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 and the area payment for agricultural crops in accordance with Title IV Chapter 10 of the same Regulation, "sweet lupins" means lupin varieties with a bitter seed content of not more than 5 %, which is to be determined by the method set out in Annex I.
hil: For the purposes of the premium for protein crops in accordance with Title IV Chapter 2 of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 and the area payment for agricultural crops in accordance with Title IV Chapter 10 of the same Regulation, "sweet lupins" means lupin varieties with a bitter seed content of not more than 5%, which is to be determined by the method set out in Annex I.
compare: 5. For the purposes of the premium for protein crops in accordance with Title IV Chapter 2 of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 and the area payment for agricultural crops in accordance with Title IV Chapter 10 of the same Regulation, "sweet lupins" means lupin varieties with a bitter seed content of not more than 5 %, which is to be determined by the method set out in Annex I.

src: (11) Aus den jüngsten Statistiken geht hervor, dass sich die Zahlungsdisziplin in vielen Mitgliedstaaten seit Annahme der Empfehlung vom 12. Mai 1995 im günstigsten Falle nicht verbessert hat.

src: (2) Die Mitgliedstaaten sind jedoch nicht verpflichtet, den in Absatz 1 genannten Diplomen, Prüfungszeugnissen und sonstigen Befähigungsnachweisen für die Gründung neuer, der Öffentlichkeit zugänglicher Apotheken Wirkung zu verleihen.

src: (3) Der IPI-Kodex stützt sich hauptsächlich auf das Übereinkommen zur Durchführung des Artikels VI des GATT 1994, weicht aber davon ab, wenn dies durch die besondere Natur der Kaufgeschäfte bei Schiffen gerechtfertigt ist. Es empfiehlt sich daher, die Bestimmungen des IPI-Kodex in Gemeinschaftsrecht umzusetzen, soweit möglich auf der Grundlage des Wortlauts der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 384/96 des Rates vom 22. Dezember 1995 über den Schutz gegen gedumpte Einfuhren aus nicht zur Europäischen Gemeinschaft gehörenden Ländern (3).
ref: (3) Whereas the text of this IPI Code is mainly based on the Agreement on Implementation of Article VI of GATT 1994, but deviates from this Agreement when warranted by the specific nature of ship-purchase transactions; whereas it is therefore appropriate to transpose the language of the IPI Code into Community legislation, to the extent possible on the basis of the text of Council Regulation (EC) No 384/96 of 22 December 1995 on protection against dumped imports from countries not members of the European Communities (3);
draft: The IPI Code is primarily based on the Agreement on Implementation of Article VI of the GATT 1994, but deviates from it if justified by the particular nature of ship purchase transactions. It is therefore advisable to implement the provisions of the IPI Code into Community law, as far as possible on the basis of the wording of Council Regulation (EC) No. 384/96 of 22 December 1995 on protection against dumped imports from countries not belonging to the European Community (3).
hil: The IPI Code is primarily based on the Agreement on Implementation of Article VI of the GATT 1994, but deviates from it if justified by the particular nature of ship purchase transactions. It is recommended to implement the provisions of the IPI Code into Community law, as far as possible on the basis of the wording of Council Regulation (EC) No. 384/96 of 22 December 1995 on protection against dumped imports from countries not belonging to the European Community (3).
compare: The IPI Code is primarily based on the Agreement on Implementation of Article VI of the GATT 1994, but deviates from it if justified by the particular nature of ship purchase transactions. It is therefore advisable to implement the provisions of the IPI Code into Community law, as far as possible on the basis of the wording of Council Regulation (EC) No. 384/96 of 22 December 1995 on protection against dumped imports from countries not belonging to the European Community (3).

src: Gegebenenfalls wird die nicht verwendete Menge, d. h. die Differenz zwischen der verfügbaren Menge und der zugeteilten Gesamtmenge, zu der für die Tranche Nr. 2 vorgesehenen Menge hinzugefügt.
ref: Where appropriate, the unused quantity, or the difference between the available quantity and the total quantity awarded, shall be added to the quantity fixed for tranche 2.
draft: If necessary, the unused amount, i.e. the difference between the available quantity and the allocated total quantity, will be added to the quantity intended for batch no. 2.
hil: The unused amount, i.e. the difference between the available quantity and the allocated total quantity, will be added to the quantity intended for batch no. 2, if applicable.

src: (3) Könnte für die Waren der vorübergehenden Ausfuhr bei ihrer Überführung in den zollrechtlich freien Verkehr ein ermässigter Zollsatz oder Zollfreiheit aufgrund einer besonderen Verwendung in Anspruch genommen werden, so wird dieser Satz zugrunde gelegt, sofern die Waren in dem Land, in dem sie veredelt werden oder zuletzt veredelt worden sind, den Vorgängen unterzogen worden sind, die für die betreffende Verwendung vorgesehen sind.
ref: 3. Where temporary export goods could qualify on their release for free circulation for a reduced or zero rate of duty by virtue of their end use, that rate shall be taken into account provided that the goods underwent operations consistent with such an end-use in the country where the processing operation or last such operation took place.
draft: (3) If a reduced customs rate or exemption from duty can be claimed for goods temporarily exported when they are transferred to duty-free circulation due to a special use, this rate is applied provided that the goods have been subjected to the operations planned for the specific use in the country in which they are or were last processed.
hil: If a reduced customs rate or exemption from duty can be claimed for goods temporarily exported when they are transferred to duty-free circulation due to a special use, this rate is applied provided that the goods have been subjected to the operations planned for the specific use in the country in which they are or were last processed.
compare: (3) If a reduced customs rate or exemption from duty can be claimed for goods temporarily exported when they are transferred to duty-free circulation due to a special use, this rate is applied provided that the goods have been subjected to the operations planned for the specific use in the country in which they are or were last processed.

src: Der Verwalter ist nach den üblichen Verfahren der Organisation befugt , zur Vergütung der von ihr im Rahmen dieses Abkommens erbrachten Dienstleistungen jedem Empfänger eines Sonderaktionsdarlehens eine an die Organisation zu zahlende Bearbeitungsgebühr in Höhe von jährlich drei Viertel eines Prozents ( 3/4 von 1 % ) des in Anspruch genommenen , in dem betreffenden Zeitpunkt noch nicht zurückgezahlten Darlehenskapitalbetrags in einer für die Organisation annehmbaren Währung in Rechnung zu stellen .
ref: Consistent with the normal procedures of the Association, the administrator is authorized to require each borrower under a Special Action Credit to pay to the Association a service charge at the rate of three fourths of one per cent (3/4 of 1 %) per annum, payable in any currency acceptable to the Association, (1) As those terms are defined from time to time by or pursuant to Resolutions of the United Nations General Assembly. on the principal amount of the Credit withdrawn and outstanding from time to time to compensate it for the services rendered hereunder.
draft: The administrator is authorized, according to the usual procedures of the organization, to charge a processing fee payable to the organization of three-quarters of one percent (3/4 of 1%) of the loan principal amount not yet repaid at the time in question, in an acceptable currency for the organization, to each recipient of a special action loan for the services provided by it under this Agreement.
hil: The administrator is authorized, according to the usual procedures of the organization, to charge a processing fee payable to the organization of three-quarters of one percent (3/4 of 1%) of the loan principal amount not yet repaid at the time in question, in an acceptable currency for the organization, to each recipient of a special action loan for the services provided by it under this Agreement.
compare: The administrator is authorized, according to the usual procedures of the organization, to charge a processing fee payable to the organization of three-quarters of one percent (3/4 of 1%) of the loan principal amount not yet repaid at the time in question, in an acceptable currency for the organization, to each recipient of a special action loan for the services provided by it under this Agreement.

src: (2) Gemäß Artikel 6 Absatz 3 der Richtlinie hat die Kommission in ihrer Entscheidung 98/242/EG(3) bestätigt, dass die für Azafenidin vorgelegten Unterlagen grundsätzlich die an die Daten und Informationen gestellten Anforderungen des Anhangs II bzw. für ein Pflanzenschutzmittel, das diesen Wirkstoff enthält, diejenigen des Anhangs III der Richtlinie erfuellen.
ref: (2) In accordance with the provisions of Article 6(3) of the Directive the Commission confirmed in its Decision 98/242/EC(3) that the dossier submitted for azafenidin could be considered as satisfying, in principle, the data and information requirements of Annex II and for a plant protection product containing this active substance, of Annex III to the Directive.

src: Die den Mitgliedstaaten belassene Möglichkeit, die Anwendung ihres eigenen Rechts für Versicherungsverträge vorzuschreiben, bei denen die Versicherungsunternehmen Verpflichtungen in ihrem Hoheitsgebiet eingehen, stellt deshalb eine hinreichende Sicherung für die Versicherungsnehmer dar.
ref: Therefore, the opportunity afforded to the Member States of imposing the application of their law to assurance contracts covering commitments within their territories is likely to provide adequate safeguards for policy holders.

src: Eine längere Laufzeit als 10 Jahre ist dabei nur in Ausnahmefällen, und zwar insbesondere bei umfangreichen und langfristigen Investitionen, vor allem in Verbindung mit vertraglichen Verpflichtungen, möglich.
ref: Any period longer than 10 years shall be possible only in exceptional cases, in particular, where there is large-scale, long-term investment, and particularly where such investment is covered by contractual commitments.
draft: A longer term than 10 years is only possible in exceptional cases, especially for extensive and long-term investments, especially in connection with contractual obligations.
hil: In exceptional cases, a longer term of more than 10 years is possible, especially for extensive and long-term investments, particularly in connection with contractual obligations.
compare: In exceptional cases, a longer term of more than 10 years is possible, especially for extensive and long-term investments, particularly in connection with contractual obligations.

src: Die für die jeweiligen Erzeugnisse des Sektors zu gewährenden Ausfuhrerstattungen müssen aus diesem Grund je hl und unabhängig vom Alkoholgehalt festgesetzt werden. Damit Mißverständnisse vermieden werden, ist die Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 2137/93 aufzuheben. Außerdem sind mehrere Drittländer in der Liste der erstattungsbegünstigten Drittländer zu streichen.
ref: Whereas it is therefore necessary to fix the amount of the export refunds per hectolitre for the various types of products in the sector, regardless of their degree of alcohol; whereas, with a view to clarity, Regulation (EEC) No 2137/93 should be repealed and certain countries should be removed from the list of third countries in respect of which refunds apply;
draft: The export refunds to be granted for the respective products of the sector must therefore be fixed per hectolitre and independently of the alcohol content. In order to avoid misunderstandings, Regulation (EC) No 2137/93 should be repealed. In addition, several third countries should be removed from the list of third countries eligible for refunds.
hil: Export refunds granted for the respective products of the sector must be fixed per hectolitre and independently of the alcohol content for this reason. To avoid misunderstandings, Regulation (EEC) No 2137/93 should be repealed. Additionally, several third countries need to be removed from the list of third countries eligible for refunds.
compare: The export refunds to be granted for the respective products of the sector must therefore be fixed per hectolitre and independently of the alcohol content. In order to avoid misunderstandings, Regulation (EC) No 2137/93 should be repealed. In addition, several third countries should be removed from the list of third countries eligible for refunds.

src: Bei den auf Grund von Ernteverträgen durchgeführten Lieferungen kann es vorkommen, daß diese insbesondere hinsichtlich der Liefermenge nicht mit den getroffenen Vereinbarungen übereinstimmen. Um genaue Informationen über den Absatz des Hopfens zu erhalten, ist es daher notwendig, auch diese Lieferungen einzutragen.
ref: Whereas deliveries effected under contracts concluded in advance may not tally, particularly in amount, with the provisions agreed ; whereas it is accordingly necessary, in order to have precise particulars of the marketing of hops, that these deliveries be likewise registered;
draft: "In case of deliveries carried out on the basis of harvest contracts, it may happen that they do not correspond to the agreements made, especially with regard to the delivery quantity. Therefore, in order to obtain accurate information on the sale of hops, it is necessary to also record these deliveries."
hil: To avoid any discrepancies between delivery quantities and the agreements made, it is necessary to record all deliveries carried out on the basis of harvest contracts. This is essential to obtain accurate information about the sale of hops.
compare: "In case of deliveries carried out on the basis of harvest contracts, it may happen that they do not correspond to the agreements made, especially with regard to the delivery quantity. Therefore, in order to obtain accurate information on the sale of hops, it is necessary to also record these deliveries."

src: b) "In-vitro-Diagnostikum" jedes Medizinprodukt, das als Reagenz, Reagenzprodukt, Kalibriermaterial, Kontrollmaterial, Kit, Instrument, Apparat, Gerät oder System - einzeln oder in Verbindung miteinander - nach der vom Hersteller festgelegten Zweckbestimmung zur In-vitro-Untersuchung von aus dem menschlichen Körper stammenden Proben, einschließlich Blut- und Gewebespenden, verwendet wird und ausschließlich oder hauptsächlich dazu dient, Informationen zu liefern
ref: (b) 'in vitro diagnostic medical device` means any medical device which is a reagent, reagent product, calibrator, control material, kit, instrument, apparatus, equipment, or system, whether used alone or in combination, intended by the manufacturer to be used in vitro for the examination of specimens, including blood and tissue donations, derived from the human body, solely or principally for the purpose of providing information:
draft: b) "In-vitro diagnostic" means any medical device which is a reagent, reagent product, calibrator, control material, kit, instrument, apparatus, equipment or system, whether used alone or in combination, intended by the manufacturer to be used for in vitro examination of specimens derived from the human body, including blood and tissue donations, and which is intended to provide information, either alone or in association with other products.
hil: Each medical device as a reagent, reagent product, calibration material, control material, kit, instrument, apparatus, equipment or system - used alone or in combination - intended for in vitro examination of specimens originating from the human body, including blood and tissue donations, according to the purpose determined by the manufacturer, and which serves exclusively or mainly to provide information, is referred to as an 'in vitro diagnostic product'
compare: b) "In-vitro diagnostic" means any medical device which is a reagent, reagent product, calibrator, control material, kit, instrument, apparatus, equipment or system, whether used alone or in combination, intended by the manufacturer to be used for in vitro examination of specimens derived from the human body, including blood and tissue donations, and which is intended to provide information, either alone or in association with other products.

src: Handelt es sich bei der relevanten Person um eine juristische Person, so gilt die genannte Vorschrift auch für alle juristischen oder natürlichen Personen, die für die genannte juristische Person im Rahmen eines Arbeitsvertrags o. src: (25) Vereinbarungen, die nicht ohne weiteres unter die Gruppenfreistellung fallen, weil sie Bestimmungen enthalten, die durch die Verordnung nicht ausdrücklich freigestellt, aber von der Freistellung auch nicht ausdrücklich ausgeschlossen werden, was unter anderem für die in Artikel 4 Absatz 2 genannten Bestimmungen gilt, werden unter bestimmten Voraussetzungen gleichwohl für die Anwendung des Artikels 85 Absatz 3 in Betracht kommen.
ref: (25) Agreements which are not automatically covered by the exemption because they contain provisions that are not expressly exempted by this Regulation and not expressly excluded from exemption, including those lsited in Article 4 (2), may, in certain circumstances, nonetheless be presumed to be eligible for application of the block exemption.

hil: Agreements that do not easily fall under the block exemption regulation, because they contain provisions that are not expressly exempted by the regulation but are also not expressly excluded from the exemption, which applies in particular to the provisions referred to in Article 4 (2), may nevertheless be considered for the purposes of applying Article 85 (3) under certain conditions.

Notwithstanding the provisions of point 7, in respect of benefits in kind, the provisions of Article 27 of the Regulation shall be deemed to apply to any person who is entitled to both a pension under special schemes for civil servants, the armed forces and the judicial administration and a pension under the legislation of another Member State.`
draft: 8. Notwithstanding number 7, Article 27 shall apply to in-kind benefits in respect of persons who are entitled to a retirement pension under one of the special schemes for civil servants, the armed forces and the judiciary as well as to a pension under the legislation of another Member State."
hil: Notwithstanding number 7, Article 27 shall apply to in-kind benefits in respect of persons who are entitled to a retirement pension under one of the special schemes for civil servants, the armed forces and the judiciary as well as to a pension under the legislation of another Member State.
compare: 8. src: Gemäß einer konstanten Rechtsprechung des Gerichtshofs der Europäischen Gemeinschaften [21] führt jede staatliche Beihilfe, die die Stellung eines Unternehmens gegenüber anderen konkurrierenden Unternehmen im innergemeinschaftlichen Handel verstärkt, zu einer Wettbewerbsverzerrung.
ref: The Court of Justice of the European Communities has consistently held [21] that any State aid which strengthens the position of an enterprise in relation to other enterprises competing in intra-Community trade distorts competition.
draft: According to a constant jurisprudence of the European Court of Justice [21], every state aid that strengthens the position of an enterprise compared to other competing enterprises in intra-Community trade leads to a distortion of competition.
hil: According to a constant jurisprudence of the European Court of Justice [21], every state aid that strengthens the position of an enterprise compared to other competing enterprises in intra-Community trade leads to a distortion of competition.
compare: According to a constant jurisprudence of the European Court of Justice [21], every state aid that strengthens the position of an enterprise compared to other competing enterprises in intra-Community trade leads to a distortion of competition.

src: (16) Transparenz in Bezug auf die Zugangs- und Zusammenschaltungsbedingungen einschließlich der Preise beschleunigt den Verhandlungsprozess, verhindert Streitigkeiten und bietet den Marktteilnehmern die Gewissheit, dass ein bestimmter Dienst ohne Diskriminierung erbracht wird.
ref: (16) Transparency of terms and conditions for access and interconnection, including prices, serve to speed-up negotiation, avoid disputes and give confidence to market players that a service is not being provided on discriminatory terms.

src: Zum Zeitpunkt der Erweiterung werden die aufteilbaren Gesamtausgaben durch eine Anpassung um einen Betrag verringert, der den jährlichen Vorbeitrittsausgaben in den beitretenden Ländern entspricht; damit wird sichergestellt, dass Ausgaben, die gegenwärtig für die Korrektur nicht berücksichtigt werden, auch künftig bei der Berechnung des Korrekturbetrags außer Betracht bleiben.
ref: Accordingly, at the time of enlargement, an adjustment will reduce "total Allocated Expenditure" by an amount equivalent to the annual pre-accession expenditure in the acceding countries, thereby ensuring that expenditure which is unabated remains so.
draft: At the time of enlargement, the divisible total expenditure will be reduced by an amount corresponding to the annual pre-accession expenditure in the acceding countries by means of an adjustment; this ensures that expenditure which is not currently taken into account for correction will also be disregarded in future when calculating the correction amount.
hil: At the time of enlargement, the divisible total expenditure will be reduced by an amount corresponding to the annual pre-accession expenditure in the acceding countries by means of an adjustment, ensuring that expenses, which are currently not considered for correction, will also remain disregarded in future when calculating the correction sum.
compare: At the time of enlargement, the divisible total expenditure will be reduced by an amount corresponding to the annual pre-accession expenditure in the acceding countries by means of an adjustment; this ensures that expenditure which is not currently taken into account for correction will also be disregarded in future when calculating the correction amount.

src: Mit Ausnahme von Streitigkeiten bezueglich einer Feststellung des Rates nach Artikel 19 oder einer vom Rat daraufhin getroffenen Maßnahme sind Streitigkeiten , die aus der Auslegung oder Anwendung dieses Übereinkommens entstehen und die nicht im Verhandlungsweg oder durch ein anderes von der Organisation , der Gemeinschaft und den Staaten vereinbartes Verfahren beigelegt werden , auf Antrag einer Partei einem Schiedsgericht zu unterbreiten , das aus fünf Schiedsrichtern besteht .
ref: Any dispute arising out of the interpretation or application of this Agreement except a dispute with regard to a finding by the Board under Article 19 or an action taken by the Board pursuant to such a finding, which is not settled by negotiation or another procedure agreed to by the Agency, the Community and the States shall, at the request of any one of them, be submitted to an arbitral tribunal composed of five arbitrators.
draft: With the exception of disputes regarding a determination by the Council under Article 19 or a measure taken by the Council in pursuance thereof, disputes arising out of the interpretation or application of this Convention which cannot be settled through negotiation or other procedure agreed to by the Organization, the Community and the States concerned shall, at the request of any party to the dispute, be referred to an arbitral tribunal. The tribunal shall be constituted from five arbitrators.
hil: With the exception of disputes regarding a determination by the Council under Article 19 or a measure taken by the Council in pursuance thereof, disputes arising from the interpretation or application of this Convention, which cannot be settled through negotiation or any other procedure agreed to by the Organization, the Community, and the States concerned, shall, at the request of any party to the dispute, be submitted to an arbitral tribunal consisting of five arbitrators.
compare: With the exception of disputes regarding a determination by the Council under Article 19 or a measure taken by the Council in pursuance thereof, disputes arising from the interpretation or application of this Convention, which cannot be settled through negotiation or any other procedure agreed to by the Organization, the Community, and the States concerned, shall, at the request of any party to the dispute, be submitted to an arbitral tribunal consisting of five arbitrators.

src: Übersteigt der Betrag der unterstützungsfähigen Ausgaben die verfügbaren Haushaltsmittel, so wird der in Unterabsatz 3 genannte Satz für die finanzielle Beteiligung der Gemeinschaft entsprechend gesenkt.
ref: If the total eligible expenditure exceeds the financial resources available, the Community's financial participation rate referred to in the third subparagraph shall be reduced accordingly.
draft: If the amount of eligible expenses exceeds the available budgetary resources, the rate referred to in paragraph 3 for the financial participation of the Community shall be correspondingly reduced.
hil: If the amount of eligible expenses exceeds the available budgetary resources, the rate referenced in Subparagraph 3 for the financial participation of the Community shall be correspondingly reduced.
compare: If the amount of eligible expenses exceeds the available budgetary resources, the rate referred to in paragraph 3 for the financial participation of the Community shall be correspondingly reduced.

src: (2) Aufgrund eines Versehens bei der Ausarbeitung der Richtlinie 2002/36/EG der Kommission vom 29. April 2002 zur Änderung bestimmter Anhänge der Richtlinie 2000/29/EG des Rates über Maßnahmen zum Schutz der Gemeinschaft gegen die Einschleppung und Ausbreitung von Schadorganismen der Pflanzen und Pflanzenerzeugnisse(3) sind unberechtigterweise neue Bestimmungen über Erde und Nährsubstrat, das Pflanzen anhaftet oder beigefügt ist, mit Ursprung in Zypern und Malta erlassen worden.
ref: (2) Due to a clerical error in the preparation of Commission Directive 2002/36/EC(3) amending certain annexes to Directive 2000/29/EC, new provisions as regards soil and growing medium, attached to or associated with plants, originating in Cyprus and Malta were unduly adopted.
draft: (2) Due to an error in the drafting of Commission Directive 2002/36/EC of 29 April 2002 amending certain Annexes to Council Directive 2000/29/EC on protective measures against the introduction into the Community of organisms harmful to plants or plant products(3), new provisions on soil and growing media adhering to or accompanying plants originating in Cyprus and Malta have been wrongly adopted.
hil: (2) Having regard to Commission Directive 2002/36/EC of 29 April 2002 amending certain Annexes to Council Directive 2000/29/EC on protective measures against the introduction into the Community of organisms harmful to plants or plant products(3), and in particular Article 11(3)(c) and Article 11(3a) thereof, new provisions on soil and growing media adhering to or accompanying plants originating in Cyprus and Malta have been wrongly adopted.
compare: (2) Due to an error in the drafting of Commission Directive 2002/36/EC of 29 April 2002 amending certain Annexes to Council Directive 2000/29/EC on protective measures against the introduction into the Community of organisms harmful to plants or plant products(3), new provisions on soil and growing media adhering to or accompanying plants originating in Cyprus and Malta have been wrongly adopted.

src: Vorbehaltlich des Abschlusses der jeweiligen internen Verfahren senken die Europäische Gemeinschaft und die Vereinigten Staaten von Amerika ihre am 1. Juli 1997 geltenden Zölle auf die Waren der nachstehenden Positionen des Harmonisierten Systems 1996 in vier gleichen Raten am 1. Juli 1997, am 1. Januar 1998, am 1. Januar 1999 und am 1. Januar 2000 bis zum vollständigen Zollabbau. Davon ausgenommen ist Rum (Position 2208 40), für den die im Anhang niedergelegten besonderen Bestimmungen gelten.
ref: Subject to the completion of our respective internal procedures, and with the exception of rum (2208 40) for which the special provisions set out in the Annex apply, the EC and US will eliminate their duties scheduled to be in force on 1 July 1997 for the HS 96 headings listed below in four equal stages commencing 1 July 1997, followed by further reductions on 1 January 1998, 1 January 1999 and 1 January 2000:
draft: Subject to the completion of their respective internal procedures, the European Community and the United States of America will reduce their customs duties applicable as of 1 July 1997 on the goods falling within the following items of the Harmonised System 1996, by four equal annual amounts on 1 July 1997, 1 January 1998, 1 January 1999 and 1 January 2000, until complete elimination of the customs duties. This does not apply to rum (position 2208 40), for which specific provisions set out in the Annex shall apply.
hil: Subject to the completion of their respective internal procedures, the European Community and the United States of America will reduce their customs duties applicable as of 1 July 1997 on the goods falling within the following items of the Harmonised System 1996, by four equal annual amounts on 1 July 1997, 1 January 1998, 1 January 1999 and 1 January 2000, until complete elimination of the customs duties. This does not apply to rum (position 2208 40), for which specific provisions set out in the Annex shall apply.
compare: Subject to the completion of their respective internal procedures, the European Community and the United States of America will reduce their customs duties applicable as of 1 July 1997 on the goods falling within the following items of the Harmonised System 1996, by four equal annual amounts on 1 July 1997, 1 January 1998, 1 January 1999 and 1 January 2000, until complete elimination of the customs duties. This does not apply to rum (position 2208 40), for which specific provisions set out in the Annex shall apply.

src: (5) Der WLA erklärte, dass beim Auslösen vom Fleisch des Kopfes und der Zunge bei Rindern, die für den menschlichen Verzehr bestimmt sind, zur Vermeidung jeglichen BSE-Risikos eine Kontaminierung mit Gewebe des zentralen Nervensystems und der Tonsillen zu vermeiden ist.
ref: (5) The SSC has stated that contamination with central nervous tissue and tonsil material are to be avoided when harvesting head meat and tongues of bovine animals for human consumption, to avoid any risk of BSE.
draft: The WLA stated that when slaughtering cattle intended for human consumption, it is necessary to avoid contamination with central nervous system and tonsil tissues in order to avoid any risk of BSE when removing meat from the head and tongue.
hil: The WLA declared that in order to avoid any risk of BSE when removing meat from the heads and tongues of cattle intended for human consumption, contamination with tissues of the central nervous system and tonsils must be avoided.
compare: The WLA declared that in order to avoid any risk of BSE when removing meat from the heads and tongues of cattle intended for human consumption, contamination with tissues of the central nervous system and tonsils must be avoided.

src: (4) Zu Unrecht gezahlte oder zurückzufordernde Beträge sind an die Kommission zurückzuzahlen.

src: Die Mitgliedstaaten sollten insbesondere zwei getrennte Maßnahmenbündel zur Beschränkung der Nachfrage in Betracht ziehen, d. h. ein Bündel von "weichen" und höchst kosteneffektiven Maßnahmen für kleinere sowie eines für größere Störungen in der Ölversorgung.
ref: In particular, Member States should consider two separate sets of demand restraint measures, one set of "soft" and highly cost-effective measures for minor oil supply disruptions and another set for major ones.
draft: Member States should consider two separate packages of measures to restrict demand, in particular a package of "soft" and highly cost-effective measures for smaller disruptions, as well as one for larger disruptions in oil supply.
hil: Member States should consider two separate packages of measures to restrict demand, in particular a package of 'soft' and highly cost-effective measures for smaller disruptions, as well as one for larger disruptions in oil supply.
compare: Member States should consider two separate packages of measures to restrict demand, in particular a package of "soft" and highly cost-effective measures for smaller disruptions, as well as one for larger disruptions in oil supply.

src: (1) Gemäß Artikel 5 der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 729/70 und Artikel 7 der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1258/1999 sowie gemäß Artikel 8 Absätze 1 und 2 der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1663/95 der Kommission vom 7. Juli 1995 mit Durchführungsbestimmungen zu der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 729/70 des Rates bezüglich des Rechnungsabschlussverfahrens des EAGFL, Abteilung Garantie [3] nimmt die Kommission die notwendigen Überprüfungen vor, teilt den Mitgliedstaaten die Ergebnisse ihrer Überprüfungen mit, nimmt die Bemerkungen der Mitgliedstaaten zur Kenntnis, führt bilaterale Gespräche, um zu einem Einvernehmen mit den betreffenden Mitgliedstaaten zu gelangen und teilt ihnen schließlich unter Bezugnahme auf die Entscheidung 94/442/EG der Kommission zur Schaffung eines Schlichtungsverfahrens im Rahmen des Rechnungsabschlusses des EAGFL, Abteilung Garantie [4] förmlich ihre Schlussfolgerungen mit.
ref: (1) Article 5 of Regulation (EEC) No 729/70, Article 7 of Regulation (EC) No 1258/1999, and Article 8(1) and (2) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 1663/95 of 7 July 1995 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 729/70 regarding the procedure for the clearance of the accounts of the EAGGF Guarantee Section [3] provide that the Commission is to make the necessary verifications, inform the Member States of its findings, take account of the Member States’ comments, initiate bilateral discussions and then formally communicate its conclusions to the Member States, referring to Commission Decision 94/442/EC of 1 July 1994 setting up a conciliation procedure in the context of the clearance of the accounts of the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund (EAGGF) Guarantee Section [4].
draft: According to Article 5 of Council Regulation (EEC) No 729/70 and Article 7 of Regulation (EC) No 1258/1999, and Article 8(1) and (2) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 1663/95 of 7 July 1995 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 729/70 in respect of the procedure for the clearance of the accounts of the EAGGF Guarantee Section [3], the Commission carries out the necessary checks, informs the Member States of the results of these checks, takes note of Member States' observations, holds bilateral discussions in order to reach agreement with the Member States concerned and finally, referring to Commission Decision 94/442/EC establishing a conciliation procedure within the framework of the clearance of the accounts of the EAGGF Guarantee Section [4], formally communicates its conclusions to them.
hil: According to Article 5 of Council Regulation (EEC) No 729/70 and Article 7 of Regulation (EC) No 1258/1999, and Article 8(1) and (2) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 1663/95 of 7 July 1995 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 729/70 in respect of the procedure for the clearance of the accounts of the EAGGF Guarantee Section [3], the Commission carries out the necessary checks, informs the Member States of the results of these checks, takes note of Member States' observations, holds bilateral discussions in order to reach agreement with the Member States concerned and finally, referring to Commission Decision 94/442/EC establishing a conciliation procedure within the framework of the clearance of the accounts of the EAGGF Guarantee Section [4], formally communicates its conclusions to them.
compare: According to Article 5 of Council Regulation (EEC) No 729/70 and Article 7 of Regulation (EC) No 1258/1999, and Article 8(1) and (2) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 1663/95 of 7 July 1995 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 729/70 in respect of the procedure for the clearance of the accounts of the EAGGF Guarantee Section [3], the Commission carries out the necessary checks, informs the Member States of the results of these checks, takes note of Member States' observations, holds bilateral discussions in order to reach agreement with the Member States concerned and finally, referring to Commission Decision 94/442/EC establishing a conciliation procedure within the framework of the clearance of the accounts of the EAGGF Guarantee Section [4], formally communicates its conclusions to them.

src: "Eine Bezugnahme auf die norwegische Sprachfassung ist als Bezugnahme sowohl auf die schriftsprachliche norwegische Sprachfassung ("yrkessjåførbevis") als auch die neunorwegische Sprachfassung ("yrkessjåførprov") zu verstehen.""
ref: "A reference to the Norwegian language shall be understood as a reference to both Literary Norwegian ("yrkessjåførbevis") and New Norwegian ("yrkessjåførprov").""
draft: "A reference to the Norwegian language version is to be understood as a reference to both the written Norwegian language version ("yrkessjåførbevis") and the new Norwegian language version ("yrkessjåførprov")."

src: Die Mitgliedstaaten einzeln können eine solche Datenbank nicht einrichten und verwalten. Unter Wahrung des Subsidiaritätsprinzips wird die Gemeinschaft nur in dem Masse tätig, wie es notwendig ist, um einerseits eine Zusammenfassung der in den statistischen Dateien der Mitgliedstaaten enthaltenen Daten und andererseits im Hinblick auf das reibungslose Funktionieren einer gemeinschaftlichen Datenbank eine enge Zusammenarbeit zwischen den Mitgliedstaaten zu gewährleisten.
ref: Whereas the Member States acting separately cannot create and manage a database of that type; whereas the Community therefore, in line with the principle of subsidiarity, will intervene only to ensure that the data contained in the Member States' statistical files are grouped together and to guarantee close coordination between the Member States with a view to the smooth operation of the Community database;
draft: The individual member states cannot establish and manage such a database. In compliance with the principle of subsidiarity, the Community only acts to the extent necessary to ensure, on the one hand, a summary of the data contained in the statistical files of the Member States and, on the other hand, a close cooperation between the Member States with a view to ensuring the smooth functioning of a Community database.
hil: The individual member states cannot establish and manage such a database. In compliance with the principle of subsidiarity, the Community only acts to the extent necessary to ensure, on the one hand, a summary of the data contained in the statistical files of the Member States and, on the other hand, a close cooperation between the Member States with a view to ensuring the smooth functioning of a Community database.
compare: The individual member states cannot establish and manage such a database. In compliance with the principle of subsidiarity, the Community only acts to the extent necessary to ensure, on the one hand, a summary of the data contained in the statistical files of the Member States and, on the other hand, a close cooperation between the Member States with a view to ensuring the smooth functioning of a Community database.

src: (31) Darin wird ausgeführt, dass spezifische Faktoren, die den Zugang von KMU zum Kapital beeinträchtigen, wie unvollständige oder asymmetrische Informationen oder hohe Transaktionskosten, zu einem Marktversagen führen können, das staatliche Beihilfen rechtfertigt.

ref: 1. Member States shall ensure that the third-country nationals concerned are granted a reflection period allowing them to recover and escape the influence of the perpetrators of the offences so that they can take an informed decision as to whether to cooperate with the competent authorities.

src: Unabhängigkeit sollte verstanden werden als die Abwesenheit jeglicher signifikanter Interessenskonflikte; in diesem Zusammenhang sollte entsprechende Aufmerksamkeit namentlich jenen Gefahren gewidmet werden, die aus der Tatsache herrühren, dass ein Vertreter im Verwaltungs-/Aufsichtsrat enge Verbindungen mit einem Konkurrenten des Unternehmens hat.
ref: Independence should be understood as the absence of any material conflict of interest; in this context, proper attention should be paid namely to any threats which might arise from the fact that a representative on the board has close ties with a competitor of the company.
draft: Independence should be understood as the absence of any significant conflicts of interest; in this context, particular attention should be paid to those dangers arising from the fact that a representative on the management/supervisory board has close connections with a competitor of the company.
hil: Independence should be understood as the absence of any significant conflicts of interest; in this context, particular attention should be paid to those dangers arising from the fact that a representative on the management/supervisory board has close connections with a competitor of the company.
compare: Independence should be understood as the absence of any significant conflicts of interest; in this context, particular attention should be paid to those dangers arising from the fact that a representative on the management/supervisory board has close connections with a competitor of the company.

src: Die Maßnahme droht den Wettbewerb insbesondere dann zu verfälschen und den innergemeinschaftlichen Handel zu beeinträchtigen, wenn diejenigen, die in ihren Genuss kommen, mit Produkten aus anderen Mitgliedstaaten im Wettbewerb stehen, auch wenn sie ihre Produkte nicht exportieren.
ref: In particular, it threatens to distort competition and affect trade in cases where the recipients compete with products coming from other Member States, even if they do not export their own products.
draft: The measure threatens to distort competition, particularly if those who benefit from it compete with products from other Member States, even if they do not export their products.
hil: The measure risks distorting competition, particularly when those who benefit from it compete with products from other Member States, even if they do not export their products, thus impairing intra-Community trade.
compare: The measure risks distorting competition, particularly when those who benefit from it compete with products from other Member States, even if they do not export their products, thus impairing intra-Community trade.

src: 6. "Betreiber" jede natürliche oder juristische Person des privaten oder öffentlichen Rechts, die die berufliche Tätigkeit ausübt oder bestimmt oder der - sofern dies in den nationalen Rechtsvorschriften vorgesehen ist - die ausschlaggebende wirtschaftliche Verfügungsmacht über die technische Durchführung einer solchen Tätigkeit übertragen wurde, einschließlich des Inhabers einer Zulassung oder Genehmigung für eine solche Tätigkeit oder der Person, die die Anmeldung oder Notifizierung einer solchen Tätigkeit vornimmt;
ref: 6. "operator" means any natural or legal, private or public person who operates or controls the occupational activity or, where this is provided for in national legislation, to whom decisive economic power over the technical functioning of such an activity has been delegated, including the holder of a permit or authorisation for such an activity or the person registering or notifying such an activity;
draft: 6. "Operator" means any natural or legal person, whether private or public, who carries out or determines the professional activity, or who - if provided for in national legal provisions - has decisive economic control over the technical implementation of such an activity, including the holder of an authorisation or approval for such an activity, or the person who undertakes the registration or notification of such an activity.
hil: Operator means any natural or legal person, whether private or public, who carries out or determines the professional activity, or who - if provided for in national legal provisions - has decisive economic control over the technical implementation of such an activity, including the holder of an authorization or approval for such an activity, or the person who undertakes the registration or notification of such an activity.
compare: 6. "Operator" means any natural or legal person, whether private or public, who carries out or determines the professional activity, or who - if provided for in national legal provisions - has decisive economic control over the technical implementation of such an activity, including the holder of an authorisation or approval for such an activity, or the person who undertakes the registration or notification of such an activity.

src: Am 6. Dezember 2004 legte die belgische Regierung der Europäischen Kommission gemäß Artikel 37 Euratom-Vertrag die allgemeinen Angaben zum Plan zur Ableitung radioaktiver Stoffe aus Änderungsarbeiten am Gebäude 131X (Pamela-Gebäude) am Standort 1 des Unternehmens "Belgoprocess plc" vor.
ref: On 6 December 2004, the European Commission received from the Belgian Government, in accordance with Article 37 of the Euratom Treaty, General Data relating to the plan for the disposal of radioactive waste resulting from modifications of Building 131X (Pamela) at Site-1 of Belgoprocess plc.
draft: On December 6th, 2004, the Belgian Government presented to the European Commission, in accordance with Article 37 Euratom Treaty, the general information on the plan for the discharge of radioactive substances resulting from modification work on Building 131X (Pamela-Building) at Site 1 of the company "Belgoprocess plc".
hil: The general information on the plan for the discharge of radioactive substances resulting from modification work on Building 131X (Pamela-Building) at Site 1 of the company "Belgoprocess plc" was presented to the European Commission by the Belgian Government on December 6, 2004, in accordance with Article 37 of the Euratom Treaty.
compare: On December 6th, 2004, the Belgian Government presented to the European Commission, in accordance with Article 37 Euratom Treaty, the general information on the plan for the discharge of radioactive substances resulting from modification work on Building 131X (Pamela-Building) at Site 1 of the company "Belgoprocess plc".

src: (11) Freiwillige Akkreditierungssysteme, die auf eine Steigerung des Niveaus der erbrachten Dienste abzielen, können Zertifizierungsdiensteanbietern den geeigneten Rahmen für die Weiterentwicklung ihrer Dienste bieten, um das auf dem sich entwickelnden Markt geforderte Maß an Vertrauen, Sicherheit und Qualität zu erreichen. Diese Systeme sollten die Entwicklung bester Praktiken durch Zertifizierungsdiensteanbieter fördern. Zertifizierungsdiensteanbietern sollte es freistehen, sich akkreditieren zu lassen und Akkreditierungssysteme zu nutzen.
ref: (11) Voluntary accreditation schemes aiming at an enhanced level of service-provision may offer certification-service-providers the appropriate framework for developing further their services towards the levels of trust, security and quality demanded by the evolving market; such schemes should encourage the development of best practice among certification-service-providers; certification-service-providers should be left free to adhere to and benefit from such accreditation schemes;
draft: (11) Voluntary accreditation systems that aim to increase the level of services provided can provide certification service providers with the appropriate framework for the development of their services in order to achieve the required level of trust, security, and quality in the developing market. These systems should promote the development of best practices by certification service providers. Certification service providers should be free to get accredited and use accreditation systems.
hil: Voluntary accreditation systems that aim to increase the level of services provided can provide certification service providers with the appropriate framework for the development of their services in order to achieve the required level of trust, security, and quality in the developing market. These systems should promote the development of best practices by certification service providers. Certification service providers should be free to get accredited and use accreditation systems.
compare: (11) Voluntary accreditation systems that aim to increase the level of services provided can provide certification service providers with the appropriate framework for the development of their services in order to achieve the required level of trust, security, and quality in the developing market. These systems should promote the development of best practices by certification service providers. Certification service providers should be free to get accredited and use accreditation systems.

src: g) "Lebensmittel-Testmaterial": Probe eines Lebensmittels, das von einem Tier gewonnen wurde, welches mit Futtermitteln mit oder ohne den Futtermittelzusatzstoff, der Gegenstand des Antrags ist, gefüttert wurde; solche Proben sind zur experimentellen Untersuchung der Analysemethode zur Bestimmung des Futtermittelzusatzstoffs im Rückstand/in den Rückständen oder im Metaboliten/in den Metaboliten zu verwenden.
ref: (g) "food test material" means a food sample derived from an animal that has been fed with feedingstuffs with or without the inclusion of the feed additive which is the object of the application, to be used for experimental studies on the method of analysis for the determination of the feed additive in the residue(s) or metabolite(s).
draft: g) "Food test material": Sample of a food product obtained from an animal that was fed with feedstuffs containing or not containing the feed additive subject to the application; such samples are to be used for experimental investigation of the analytical method for determining the feed additive in the residue(s) or metabolite(s).
hil: "Food test material": Sample of a food product obtained from an animal that was fed with feedstuffs containing or not containing the feed additive subject to the application; such samples are to be used for experimental investigation of the analytical method for determining the feed additive in the residue(s) or metabolite(s).
compare: g) "Food test material": Sample of a food product obtained from an animal that was fed with feedstuffs containing or not containing the feed additive subject to the application; such samples are to be used for experimental investigation of the analytical method for determining the feed additive in the residue(s) or metabolite(s).
