src: (1) Es ist notwendig, bis zum Inkrafttreten des am 29. Oktober 2001 in Luxemburg unterzeichneten Stabilisierungs- und Assoziierungsabkommen zwischen den Europäischen Gemeinschaften und ihren Mitgliedstaaten einerseits und der Republik Kroatien andererseits das Interimsabkommen über Handel und Handelsfragen zwischen der Europäischen Gemeinschaft einerseits und der Republik Kroatien andererseits zu unterzeichnen.
ref: (1) Pending the entry into force of the Stabilisation and Association Agreement between the European Communities and their Member States, of the one part, and the Republic of Croatia, of the other part, signed at Luxembourg on 29 October 2001, it is necessary to sign the Interim Agreement on trade and trade-related matters between the European Community, of the one part, and the Republic of Croatia, of the other part.
draft: It is necessary to sign the Interim Agreement on Trade and Trade Issues between the European Community on the one hand and the Republic of Croatia on the other hand until the entry into force of the Stabilization and Association Agreement signed on October 29, 2001 in Luxembourg between the European Communities and their Member States on the one hand and the Republic of Croatia on the other.
hil: It is necessary to sign the Interim Agreement on Trade and Trade Issues between the European Community on the one hand and the Republic of Croatia on the other hand until the entry into force of the Stabilization and Association Agreement signed on October 29, 2001 in Luxembourg between the European Communities and their Member States on the one hand and the Republic of Croatia on the other.
compare: It is necessary to sign the Interim Agreement on Trade and Trade Issues between the European Community on the one hand and the Republic of Croatia on the other hand until the entry into force of the Stabilization and Association Agreement signed on October 29, 2001 in Luxembourg between the European Communities and their Member States on the one hand and the Republic of Croatia on the other.

src: (75) Außerdem wird die Auffassung vertreten, daß angesichts der Tatsache, daß das beschriebene System von der Regierung des Ausfuhrlandes autonom verwaltet wird, dessen Beibehaltung bzw. Abschaffung keinen Einfluß darauf haben darf, ob die Gemeinschaftsinstitutionen feststellen, daß es bei einem Maßnahmenverzicht erneut zu einem schädigenden Dumping kommt.
ref: (75) Furthermore, in view of the fact that the system described above is run autonomously by the government of the exporting country, it is considered that its existence or abolition cannot have any influence on the decision of the Community institutions whether or not injurious dumping would recur in the absence of measures.
draft: Furthermore, the view is held that given the fact that the described system is autonomously managed by the government of the exporting country, its maintenance or abolition must not have any influence on whether the community institutions find that a abstention from measures will lead to harmful dumping again.
hil: Furthermore, it is argued that, given the fact that the described system is autonomously managed by the government of the exporting country, its maintenance or abolition must not influence whether the community institutions find that abstaining from measures will lead to harmful dumping again.
compare: Furthermore, it is argued that, given the fact that the described system is autonomously managed by the government of the exporting country, its maintenance or abolition must not influence whether the community institutions find that abstaining from measures will lead to harmful dumping again.

src: Solange keine gemeinschaftlichen Vorschriften bestehen, können jedoch die zuständigen Behörden die Genehmigung für ein Tierarzneimittel verweigern, sofern diese Maßnahme zum Schutz der öffentlichen Gesundheit, zum Schutz der Verbraucher oder der Gesundheit der Tiere notwendig ist;
ref: However, pending Community rules, the competent authorities may refuse to grant authorization for a veterinary medicinal product where such action is necessary for the protection of public, consumer or animal health;
draft: As long as there are no common regulations, the responsible authorities can refuse approval for a veterinary medicinal product, provided that this measure is necessary to protect public health, protect consumers or protect the health of animals.
hil: As long as there are no common regulations, the competent authorities may refuse approval for a veterinary medicinal product if this measure is necessary to protect public health, consumers or animal health.
compare: As long as there are no common regulations, the competent authorities may refuse approval for a veterinary medicinal product if this measure is necessary to protect public health, consumers or animal health.

src: Um die Einhaltung dieser Kriterien überprüfen zu können, sind gemeinschaftliche Analysemethoden festzulegen.

hil: To ensure compliance with these criteria, joint analysis methods need to be established.

src: Bemerken die in Artikel 25 genannten Mitgliedstaaten oder Island und Norwegen oder das Generalsekretariat des Rates einen Irrtum, eine Ungenauigkeit, eine Auslassung oder einen anderen sachlichen Fehler im Wortlaut des Ausschreibungstextes, so kann das Generalsekretariat dies den Beteiligten unter genau den gleichen Bedingungen wie denen der Ausschreibung mitteilen;
ref: if the Member States referred to in Article 25, or Iceland and Norway, or the General Secretariat of the Council notice an error, a lack of precision, an omission or any other type of clerical defect in the text of the invitation to tender, the General Secretariat may, in a manner identical with that applicable in respect of the original invitation to tender, inform the persons concerned accordingly;
draft: Notice the Member States mentioned in Article 25, or Iceland and Norway, or the General Secretariat of the Council of an error, inaccuracy, omission or other factual error in the wording of the tender text, the General Secretariat may inform the parties concerned under exactly the same conditions as those of the tender.
hil: Where the Member States referred to in Article 25, Iceland and Norway or the General Secretariat of the Council notice an error, inaccuracy, omission or other factual mistake in the wording of the tender text, the General Secretariat may inform the parties concerned under exactly the same conditions as those of the tender.
compare: Where the Member States referred to in Article 25, Iceland and Norway or the General Secretariat of the Council notice an error, inaccuracy, omission or other factual mistake in the wording of the tender text, the General Secretariat may inform the parties concerned under exactly the same conditions as those of the tender.

src: (19) Halten es Mitgliedstaaten für erforderlich, strengere als die in Anhang I Teile A und B vorgesehenen Werte oder Werte für zusätzliche Parameter, die nicht in Anhang I aufgeführt sind, für den Schutz der menschlichen Gesundheit jedoch erforderlich sind, festzulegen, so müssen sie diese der Kommission mitteilen.
ref: (19) Whereas, when Member States deem it necessary to adopt standards more stringent than those set out in Annex I, Parts A and B, or standards for additional parameters not included in Annex I but necessary to protect human health, they must notify the Commission of those standards;
draft: (19) If Member States consider it necessary to establish values stricter than those provided for in Annex I, Parts A and B, or values for additional parameters which are necessary for the protection of human health but which are not listed in Annex I, they shall inform the Commission thereof.

src: c) Maßnahmen zur gezielten Unterstützung, für die wegen ihrer Eignung und ihres Nutzens im Hinblick auf die Ziele und den wissenschaftlichen und technologischen Inhalt des spezifischen Programms bei der Kommission ein Zuschuss beantragt werden kann, soweit das Arbeitsprogramm des spezifischen Programms dies vorsieht und ein solcher Antrag nicht in den Geltungsbereich einer offenen Aufforderung zur Einreichung von Vorschlägen fällt,
ref: (c) specific support actions with particular characteristics and value to the objectives and the scientific and technological content of the specific programme, for which grant applications may be submitted to the Commission if so provided for in the work programme of the specific programme and where such a request does not fall within the scope of an open call for proposals;
draft: c) Measures for targeted support, for which a grant can be requested from the Commission due to their suitability and usefulness with regard to the objectives and scientific and technological content of the specific programme, provided that the work programme of the specific programme provides for this and such a request does not fall within the scope of an open call for proposals.
hil: Measures for targeted support, for which a grant can be requested from the Commission due to their suitability and usefulness with regard to the objectives and scientific and technological content of the specific programme, provided that the work programme of the specific programme provides for this and such a request does not fall within the scope of an open call for proposals.
compare: c) Measures for targeted support, for which a grant can be requested from the Commission due to their suitability and usefulness with regard to the objectives and scientific and technological content of the specific programme, provided that the work programme of the specific programme provides for this and such a request does not fall within the scope of an open call for proposals.

src: Die Republik Griechenland und Irland sehen sich, wenngleich in unterschiedlichem Maße, einer schwierigen Zahlungsbilanzlage und dem Sachzwang einer hohen Auslandsverschuldung gegenüber. Eine unverzügliche und vollständige Liberalisierung des Kapitalverkehrs dieser beiden Mitgliedstaaten würde die Fortsetzung der Maßnahmen erschweren, die sie zur Verbesserung ihrer außenwirtschaftlichen Lage und zur verstärkten Anpassung ihres Finanzsystems an die Erfordernisse eines integrierten Finanzmarktes der Gemeinschaft eingeleitet haben. Gemäß Artikel 8c des Vertrages sind diesen beiden Mitgliedstaaten zusätzliche, ihrer besonderen Situation angemessene Fristen für die Anwendung der sich aus dieser Richtlinie ergebenden Verpflichtungen einzuräumen.
ref: Whereas the Hellenic Republic and Ireland are faced, albeit to differing degrees, with difficult balance-of-payments situations and high levels of external indebtedness; whereas the immediate and complete liberalization of capital movements by those two Member States would make it more difficult for them to continue to apply the measures they have taken to improve their external positions and to reinforce the capacity of their financial systems to adapt to the requirements of an integrated financial market in the Community; whereas it is appropriate, in accordance with Article 8c of the Treaty, to grant to those two Member States, in the light of their specific circumstances, further time in which to comply with the obligations arising from this Directive;
draft: The Republic of Greece and Ireland, albeit to varying degrees, are facing a difficult balance of payments situation and the imperative of high external debt. An immediate and complete liberalization of the capital movements of these two Member States would hinder the continuation of measures they have taken to improve their external economic situation and to strengthen the adaptation of their financial systems to the requirements of an integrated financial market of the Community. Pursuant to Article 8c of the Treaty, these two Member States should be granted additional periods appropriate to their special situations for the implementation of the obligations resulting from this Directive.
hil: Although to varying degrees, the Republic of Greece and Ireland are facing a difficult balance of payments situation and the imperative of high external debt. Immediate and complete liberalization of the capital movements of these two member states would hinder the continuation of measures they have taken to improve their external economic situation and to align their financial systems with the requirements of an integrated financial market of the Community. Pursuant to Article 8c of the Treaty, these two Member States should be granted additional periods appropriate to their special situations for the implementation of the obligations resulting from this Directive.
compare: The Republic of Greece and Ireland, albeit to varying degrees, are facing a difficult balance of payments situation and the imperative of high external debt. An immediate and complete liberalization of the capital movements of these two Member States would hinder the continuation of measures they have taken to improve their external economic situation and to strengthen the adaptation of their financial systems to the requirements of an integrated financial market of the Community. Pursuant to Article 8c of the Treaty, these two Member States should be granted additional periods appropriate to their special situations for the implementation of the obligations resulting from this Directive.

src: ( 1 ) Stellt ein Mitgliedstaat anhand einer ausführlichen Begründung fest , daß eine gemäß Artikel 1 erlassene Maßnahme in einem bestimmten Fall aus technischen Gründen nicht angebracht oder in einem bestimmten Fall hinsichtlich der Überprüfung einer gesundheitlich bedeutsamen Frage nicht aussagekräftig genug ist , so kann dieser Mitgliedstaat in seinem Gebiet die Anwendung der betreffenden Maßnahme ausschließlich in dem besagten Fall vorübergehend aussetzen .
ref: 1. Where a Member State has detailed evidence that a measure adopted in accordance with Article 1 is inappropriate in a particular case for technical reasons or because it is insufficiently conclusive for the examination of an important health question, that Member State may temporarily suspend the measure in question in its territory but only for that particular case.
draft: (1) If a Member State, based on a detailed justification, determines that a measure adopted in accordance with Article 1 is not appropriate in a particular case for technical reasons or is not sufficiently indicative in a particular case regarding the examination of a question of significant health importance, that Member State may suspend the application of the measure in question exclusively in the said case on a temporary basis in its territory.
hil: If a Member State establishes based on a detailed justification that a measure adopted in accordance with Article 1 is not appropriate in a particular case for technical reasons, or is not sufficiently conclusive in a particular case regarding the examination of a question of significant health importance, that Member State may temporarily suspend the application of the measure in question exclusively in the said case in its territory.
compare: (1) If a Member State, based on a detailed justification, determines that a measure adopted in accordance with Article 1 is not appropriate in a particular case for technical reasons or is not sufficiently indicative in a particular case regarding the examination of a question of significant health importance, that Member State may suspend the application of the measure in question exclusively in the said case on a temporary basis in its territory.

src: (12) Für die Anwendung von Absatz 6 Unterabsatz 1 kann die Kommission davon ausgehen, dass die Einhaltung der internationalen Verpflichtungen nicht in Frage gestellt wird, wenn die Gesamtsumme der einer gegebenen Ausschreibung entsprechenden Beträge, für die ein oder mehrere Wirtschaftsbeteiligte eine oder mehrere Bescheinigungen beantragt haben, die aber noch nicht erteilt worden sind, 2 Mio. EUR nicht übersteigt.
ref: 12. For the purposes of applying the first subparagraph of paragraph 6, the Commission may consider that there is no danger of international commitments not being met if the sum of the amounts corresponding to a single invitation to tender for which one or more applications for certificates have been made by one or more operators and for which no certificate has yet been issued does not exceed EUR 2 million.
draft: For the application of paragraph 6, subsection 1, the Commission may assume that compliance with international obligations is not called into question if the total amount of the amounts corresponding to a given tender for which one or more economic operators have applied for one or more certificates but which have not yet been issued does not exceed EUR 2 million.
hil: The Commission can assume for the purposes of Paragraph 6, Subsection 1 that compliance with international obligations will not be called into question if the total amount of the amounts corresponding to a given tender for which one or more economic operators have applied for one or more certificates but which have not yet been issued, does not exceed EUR 2 million.
compare: The Commission can assume for the purposes of Paragraph 6, Subsection 1 that compliance with international obligations will not be called into question if the total amount of the amounts corresponding to a given tender for which one or more economic operators have applied for one or more certificates but which have not yet been issued, does not exceed EUR 2 million.

src: Es trifft zwar zu, dass der Gehalt an Spurenelementen für Verwender in der chemischen Industrie von Bedeutung ist, dies rechtfertigt jedoch nicht die Schlussfolgerung, dass es sich um eine andere Ware handelt als das in der Hüttenindustrie verwendete Silicium.
ref: However, whilst the levels of trace elements are important to chemical users, this is not sufficient to conclude that it is a separate product from silicon consumed by metallurgical users.
draft: While it is true that the content of trace elements is important for users in the chemical industry, this does not justify the conclusion that it is a different product than the silicon used in the metallurgical industry.
hil: While it is true that the content of trace elements is important for users in the chemical industry, this does not justify the conclusion that it is a different product than the silicon used in the metallurgical industry.
compare: While it is true that the content of trace elements is important for users in the chemical industry, this does not justify the conclusion that it is a different product than the silicon used in the metallurgical industry.

hil: Pursuant to Regulation (EC) No. 1493/1999, the operative event for the exchange rate that applies to the permanent abandonment premium shall be the first day of the wine year in which the application for the premium has been submitted.

src: Das Ergebnis ist mit Vorsicht zu betrachten, da keine vollständige Untersuchung der Einfuhren von Ringbuchmechaniken aus Thailand durchgeführt wurde und bei der Berechnung nur ein vom Wirtschaftszweig der Gemeinschaft übermitteltes Preisangebot auf der Stufe fob Bangkok zugrunde gelegt werden konnte, das für Warentypen galt, die im UZ und danach aus Thailand in die Gemeinschaft ausgeführt wurden.
ref: The result should be viewed with caution, since in the absence of a full investigation on imports of RBM from Thailand, the calculation could only be based on a FOB Bangkok price offer provided by the Community industry for product types exported from Thailand to the Community during and after the IP.
draft: The result should be viewed with caution, as no complete examination of the imports of ring binder mechanisms from Thailand was conducted and only a price offer transmitted by the Community industry at the fob Bangkok level could be taken into account in the calculation, which applied to types of goods exported from Thailand to the Community in the UZ and thereafter.
hil: The result should be viewed with caution, as no complete examination of the imports of ring binder mechanisms from Thailand was conducted and only a price offer transmitted by the Community industry at the fob Bangkok level could be taken into account in the calculation, which applied to types of goods exported from Thailand to the Community in the UZ and thereafter.
compare: The result should be viewed with caution, as no complete examination of the imports of ring binder mechanisms from Thailand was conducted and only a price offer transmitted by the Community industry at the fob Bangkok level could be taken into account in the calculation, which applied to types of goods exported from Thailand to the Community in the UZ and thereafter.

ref: (43) Since the injury level found in the original investigation is higher than the dumping margin found in the present review, the level of the duties should be set at that of the dumping margin found, namely at 21,0 %.
draft: (43) Since the damage range calculated in the initial investigation is higher than the dumping range determined in this review, the duties should be set at 21.0% based on the dumping range.

src: (136) Die Unternehmen, die Einwände gegen die Einführung von Maßnahmen erhoben, fürchten folglich, dass es bei der Versorgung mit hochwertigen Steinen und angemessener technischer Unterstützung zu Engpässen kommen könnte.

src: (4) Einige Mitgliedstaaten sind im Begriff, Vorschriften über die Energieeffizienz von Vorschaltgeräten für Leuchtstofflampen zu erlassen. Derartige Vorschriften könnten Hemmnisse für den Handel mit diesen Produkten in der Gemeinschaft bilden.
ref: (4) Some Member States are on the point of adopting provisions relating to the efficiency of ballasts for fluorescent lighting, which might create barriers to trade in these products in the Community.
draft: Some Member States are in the process of enacting regulations on the energy efficiency of ballasts for fluorescent lamps. Such regulations could create barriers to trade in these products within the Community.
hil: Some Member States are about to enact regulations on the energy efficiency of ballasts for fluorescent lamps. Such regulations could create barriers to trade in these products within the Community. Harmonized standards developed by private organizations and must remain non-binding provisions in accordance with the general guidelines for cooperation between the Commission and CEN and CENELEC ratified on November 13, 1984.
compare: Some Member States are in the process of enacting regulations on the energy efficiency of ballasts for fluorescent lamps. Such regulations could create barriers to trade in these products within the Community.

src: Der Schutz der öffentlichen Gesundheit und der Umwelt erfordert demnächst eine weitere Herabsetzung dieser Grenzwerte ; der beim Bau von Kraftfahrzeugmotoren erzielte Fortschritt ermöglicht es bereits jetzt , diese Werte zu verringern , ohne daß die Herabsetzung den Zielen der Politik der Gemeinschaft auf anderen Gebieten , insbesondere demjenigen der rationellen Energienutzung , zuwiderläuft .
ref: Whereas the requirements relating to the protection of public health and the environment require a further short term reduction in these limits ; whereas the technical advances made in engine design now enable a reduction of this type to be made without running counter to Community policy aims in other fields and in particular that of the rational use of energy;
draft: The protection of public health and the environment soon requires a further reduction of these limits; progress achieved in the construction of automobile engines already allows these limits to be reduced without contradicting the Community's policy goals in other areas, particularly that of efficient energy use.
hil: The protection of public health and the environment will soon require a further reduction of these limits; progress achieved in the construction of automobile engines already enables these limits to be reduced without contradicting the Community's policy goals in other areas, particularly that of efficient energy use.
compare: The protection of public health and the environment will soon require a further reduction of these limits; progress achieved in the construction of automobile engines already enables these limits to be reduced without contradicting the Community's policy goals in other areas, particularly that of efficient energy use.

src: Durch die schrittweise Anerkennung der Gleichwertigkeit von gesundheitspolizeilichen Maßnahmen und die Anerkennung des Tiergesundheitsstatus, die Anwendung des Regionalisierungsprinzips und die Verbesserung von Kommunikation und Zusammenarbeit wird das Abkommen dazu beitragen, den beiderseitigen Handel mit lebenden Tieren und Tierprodukten zwischen der Europäischen Gemeinschaft und Kanada zu erleichtern.
ref: Whereas the Agreement will contribute towards facilitating bilateral trade between the European Community and Canada in live animals and animal products through the progressive recognition of the equivalence of sanitary measures, the recognition of animal health status, the application of regionalisation and the improvement of communication and cooperation;
draft: Through the gradual recognition of the equivalence of health-police measures and the recognition of animal health status, the application of the regionalization principle and the improvement of communication and collaboration, the agreement will help to facilitate bilateral trade in live animals and animal products between the European Community and Canada.
hil: Through the gradual recognition of the equivalence of health-police measures and the recognition of animal health status, the application of the regionalization principle and the improvement of communication and collaboration, the Agreement will contribute to facilitating bilateral trade in live animals and animal products between the European Union and Canada.
compare: Through the gradual recognition of the equivalence of health-police measures and the recognition of animal health status, the application of the regionalization principle and the improvement of communication and collaboration, the agreement will help to facilitate bilateral trade in live animals and animal products between the European Community and Canada.

src: (14) Die Überwachung der Fischerei mit Treibnetzen bereitet daher besondere Schwierigkeiten. Es empfiehlt sich, spezifische Bestimmungen für diese Tätigkeit zu erlassen.

src: Ist der Begünstigte infolge von Flurbereinigungsverfahren oder anderweitigen, ähnlichen öffentlichen Bodenordnungsverfahren an der Erfuellung seiner eingegangenen Verpflichtungen gehindert, so treffen die Mitgliedstaaten die erforderlichen Vorkehrungen, um die Verpflichtungen an die neue Lage des Betriebs anzupassen.
ref: Where a beneficiary is unable to continue to comply with commitments given because the holding is reparcelled or is the subject of other similar public land-consolidation measures, Member States shall take the measures necessary to allow the commitments to be adapted to the new situation of the holding.

src: Erhöhte positive Deckungsbeiträge resultierten aus einer Neugestaltung des Preismodells von Berliner Bank und Berliner Sparkasse durch eine Vereinheitlichung von (erhöhten) Preisuntergrenzen und die konsequente Ausschöpfung von Cross-Selling-Potenzialen sowie zunehmende Arbeitsteilung von Kundenbetreuern.
ref: Improved contribution margins would result from a rearrangement of the Berliner Bank and Berliner Sparkasse price model by standardising (increased) lower limits and exhausting all cross‐selling potential, together with greater division of labour among account managers.
draft: Increased positive contribution margins resulted from a redesign of the pricing model of Berliner Bank and Berliner Sparkasse through standardization of (increased) price floors and the consistent exploitation of cross-selling potentials as well as increasing division of labor among customer advisors.
hil: The increased positive contribution margins resulted from a redesign of the pricing model of Berliner Bank and Berliner Sparkasse through the standardization of (increased) price floors, consistent exploitation of cross-selling potentials, and an increasing division of labor among customer advisors.

src: Diese Richtlinie gilt jedoch weiterhin für öffentliche Aufträge, die von öffentlichen Auftraggebern vergeben werden, die eine oder mehrere Tätigkeiten gemäß Artikel 6 der Richtlinie 2004/17/EG ausüben, und die der Durchführung dieser Tätigkeiten dienen, solange der betreffende Mitgliedstaat von der in Artikel 71 Absatz 1 Unterabsatz 2 der genannten Richtlinie vorgesehenen Möglichkeit Gebrauch macht, um die Anwendung der Maßnahmen zu verschieben.
ref: However, this Directive shall continue to apply to public contracts awarded by contracting authorities carrying out one or more of the activities referred to in Article 6 of Directive 2004/17/EC and awarded for those activities, insofar as the Member State concerned takes advantage of the option referred to in the second subparagraph of Article 71 thereof to defer its application.
draft: However, this directive still applies to public contracts awarded by public authorities carrying out one or more activities covered by Article 6 of Directive 2004/17/EC and serving the performance of these activities, for as long as the Member State concerned makes use of the option provided for in Article 71(1)(b)2 of that Directive to postpone the application of the measures.
hil: This directive, however, still applies to public contracts awarded by public contractors who carry out one or more activities in accordance with Article 6 of Directive 2004/17/EC and which serve the performance of such activities, as long as the Member State concerned makes use of the option provided for in Article 71(1)(b)2 of that directive to postpone the application of the measures.
compare: However, this directive still applies to public contracts awarded by public authorities carrying out one or more activities covered by Article 6 of Directive 2004/17/EC and serving the performance of these activities, for as long as the Member State concerned makes use of the option provided for in Article 71(1)(b)2 of that Directive to postpone the application of the measures.

src: (2) Die Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 2658/87 hat allgemeine Vorschriften für die Auslegung der Kombinierten Nomenklatur festgelegt. Diese Vorschriften gelten auch für die Auslegung jeder anderen Nomenklatur, die die Kombinierte Nomenklatur - auch nur teilweise oder unter etwaiger Hinzufügung von Unterteilungen - übernimmt und die aufgrund besonderer gemeinschaftlicher Regelungen aufgestellt wurde, um tarifliche oder sonstige Maßnahmen im Rahmen des Warenverkehrs anzuwenden.
ref: (2) Whereas Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87 has set down the general rules for the interpretation of the Combined Nomenclature and these rules also apply to any other nomenclature which is wholly or partly based on it or which adds any additional subdivisions to it and which is established by specific Community provisions, with a view to the application of tariff or other measures relating to trade in goods;
draft: (2) Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87 lays down general rules for the interpretation of the Combined Nomenclature. These rules shall also apply, mutatis mutandis, to the interpretation of any other nomenclature which is wholly or partly based on the Combined Nomenclature or which presupposes the application thereof by virtue of common rules laid down by the Community to the extent that such rules relate to tariff or other measures affecting trade in goods.
hil: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87 lays down general provisions for the interpretations of the Combined Nomenclature and applies to the interpretation of any other nomenclature that adopts the Combined Nomenclature, even partially or with the addition of subdivisions, and that has been established due to special community regulations to apply tariff or other measures to trade in goods.
compare: (2) Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87 lays down general rules for the interpretation of the Combined Nomenclature. These rules shall also apply, mutatis mutandis, to the interpretation of any other nomenclature which is wholly or partly based on the Combined Nomenclature or which presupposes the application thereof by virtue of common rules laid down by the Community to the extent that such rules relate to tariff or other measures affecting trade in goods.

src: a) Die betreffende Person hat mit Erfolg eine von den zuständigen italienischen Behörden durchgeführte spezifische Eignungsprüfung abgelegt, bei der überprüft wurde, ob sie Kenntnisse und Fähigkeiten besitzt, die denen derjenigen Personen vergleichbar sind, die Inhaber eines in Anhang V Nummer 5.3.2. für Italien aufgeführten Ausbildungsnachweises sind;

src: (10) Abweichend von der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1291/2000 der Kommission vom 9. Juni 2000 mit gemeinsamen Durchführungsvorschriften für Einfuhr- und Ausfuhrlizenzen sowie Vorausfestsetzungsbescheinigungen für landwirtschaftliche Erzeugnisse(6) sind die an die Lizenzen gebundenen Rechte auf die erfolgreichen Bieter zu beschränken, um Spekulationsgeschäften vorzubeugen.
ref: (10) By way of derogation from Commission Regulation (EC) No 1291/2000 of 9 June 2000 laying down common detailed rules for the application of the system of import and export licences and advance fixing certificates for agricultural products(6), the rights deriving from licences should be confined to the successful tenderers to avoid speculation.

hil: The rights attached to licenses are to be restricted to successful bidders as a measure of preventing speculation transactions, deviating from the Regulation (EC) No 1291/2000 of the Commission of 9 June 2000, which lays down common detailed rules for the application of the system for the import and export of agricultural products and for the granting of import and export licenses for those products(6).

src: (184) Daher wird der Schluss gezogen, dass die Einfuhren mit Ursprung in Pakistan wahrscheinlich zu der bedeutenden Schädigung des Wirtschaftszweigs der Gemeinschaft beigetragen haben.

src: (74) Unter diesen Bedingungen könnte der Wirtschaftszweig der Gemeinschaft, der bereits jetzt Verluste verzeichnet, nicht mit solchen Billigeinfuhren in umfangreichen Mengen konkurrieren, da erstens Preisunterschiede auf diesem Markt eine sofortige Änderung der Bezugsquellen zur Folge haben (Mikroplatten sind in dieser Hinsicht mit Rohstoffen vergleichbar) und zweitens der Wirtschaftszweig der Gemeinschaft bereits alle erforderlichen Umstrukturierungsmaßnahmen durchgeführt hat und schon zu äußerst niedrigen Kosten produziert.
ref: (74) In such conditions, the Community industry, already loss-making, would not be able to compete with high quantities sold at such low prices because firstly, a difference in prices in this market (microdisks are a commodity-like product) leads to immediate substitution in supplies and secondly, the Community industry has already made all the necessary efforts to restructure itself and is already operating at very low costs.
draft: Under these conditions, the Community's industry, which already records losses, would be unable to compete with such low-cost imports in significant amounts, since first, price differences on this market have an immediate effect on a change of sources of supply (in this respect, microplates are comparable to raw materials), and secondly, the Community's industry has already carried out all the necessary restructuring measures and is already producing at extremely low cost.
hil: Under these conditions, the Community's industry, which already records losses, would be unable to compete with such low-cost imports in significant amounts, since first, price differences on this market have an immediate effect on a change of sources of supply (in this respect, microplates are comparable to raw materials), and secondly, the Community's industry has already carried out all the necessary restructuring measures and is already producing at extremely low cost.
compare: Under these conditions, the Community's industry, which already records losses, would be unable to compete with such low-cost imports in significant amounts, since first, price differences on this market have an immediate effect on a change of sources of supply (in this respect, microplates are comparable to raw materials), and secondly, the Community's industry has already carried out all the necessary restructuring measures and is already producing at extremely low cost.

src: Unter diese Ausnahmeregelung würden etwa 25000 landwirtschaftliche Betriebe in den Niederlanden mit einer Fläche von etwa 900000 Hektar fallen.
ref: Approximately 25000 farms in the Netherlands and approximately 900000 hectares are concerned by that request for derogation.
draft: Under this exception rule, approximately 25,000 agricultural businesses in the Netherlands with an area of about 900,000 hectares would fall.
hil: According to this exception regulation, about 25,000 agricultural companies in the Netherlands with a total area of around 900,000 hectares would be affected.
compare: Under this exception rule, approximately 25,000 agricultural businesses in the Netherlands with an area of about 900,000 hectares would fall.

src: (5) Die Republik Island verpflichtet sich, bei der Unterzeichnung dieses Abkommens eine Erklärung über den Verzicht auf Schadenersatzansprüche gegenüber den an einer EU-Krisenbewältigungsoperation, an der die Republik Island teilnimmt, beteiligten Staaten abzugeben.
ref: 5. The Republic of Iceland undertakes to make a declaration as regards the waiver of claims against any State participating in an EU crisis-management operation in which the Republic of Iceland participates, and to do so when signing this Agreement.

hil: The Republic of Iceland commits to submitting a declaration of renunciation of claims for damages against the states involved in an EU crisis management operation in which the Republic of Iceland participates upon signing this agreement.

src: 19. "zuständige Behörde" eine von einer Vertragspartei des Protokolls benannte zuständige Behörde oder die entsprechende zuständige Stelle einer Nichtvertragspartei, welche die nach dem Protokoll erforderlichen Verwaltungsaufgaben bzw. die entsprechenden Aufgaben, falls es sich um eine Nichtvertragspartei handelt, wahrnimmt und von der betreffenden Partei mit der Wahrnehmung dieser Aufgaben betraut ist;
ref: 19. "competent authority" means a competent authority designated by a Party to the Protocol, or the relevant equivalent body of a non-Party, which is responsible for performing the administrative functions required by the Protocol, or equivalent functions in the case of a non-Party, and is authorised to act on its behalf with respect to those functions;
draft: "Competent authority" means a competent authority designated by a Contracting Party to the Protocol or the corresponding competent body of a non-Contracting Party which carries out the administrative tasks required by the Protocol or the corresponding tasks, if it is a non-Contracting Party, and which has been entrusted by the party concerned with the performance of these tasks.
hil: The "competent authority" means a competent authority designated by a contracting party of the protocol or the corresponding competent body of a non-contracting party, which performs the administrative tasks required by the protocol or the corresponding tasks, if it is a non-contracting party, and which has been entrusted by the relevant party with the performance of these tasks.
compare: "Competent authority" means a competent authority designated by a Contracting Party to the Protocol or the corresponding competent body of a non-Contracting Party which carries out the administrative tasks required by the Protocol or the corresponding tasks, if it is a non-Contracting Party, and which has been entrusted by the party concerned with the performance of these tasks.

src: (1) Für alle Arbeitsplätze, an denen das Risiko einer Strahlenexposition durch ionisierende Strahlen mit einer möglichen Überschreitung von 1 mSv pro Jahr oder eine Äquivalentdosis von einem Zehntel der Dosisgrenzwerte für die Augenlinse, die Haut und die Extremitäten gemäß Artikel 9 Absatz 2 gegeben ist, sind Strahlenschutzvorkehrungen zu treffen.
ref: 1. For the purposes of radiation protection, arrangements shall be made as regards all workplaces where there is a possibility of exposure to ionizing radiation in excess of 1 mSv per year on an equivalent dose of 10 of the dose limits for the lens of the eyes, skin and extremities laid down in Article 9 (2).
draft: For all workplaces where the risk of radiation exposure from ionizing radiation exceeds 1 mSv per year or an equivalent dose of one-tenth of the dose limits for the lens of the eye, the skin and extremities according to Article 9(2) is given, radiation protection measures must be taken.
hil: Radiation protection measures must be taken for all workplaces where the risk of ionizing radiation exposure exceeds 1 mSv per year or an equivalent dose of one-tenth of the dose limits for the lens of the eye, skin, and extremities according to Article 9(2).
compare: For all workplaces where the risk of radiation exposure from ionizing radiation exceeds 1 mSv per year or an equivalent dose of one-tenth of the dose limits for the lens of the eye, the skin and extremities according to Article 9(2) is given, radiation protection measures must be taken.

ref: 3. On basis of the data sheets referred to in paragraph 2 the SCF will evaluate the substances for their compliance with the general use criteria.

src: (1) Die Mitgliedstaaten schreiben vor, dass Packungen mit Basissaatgut, mit Zertifiziertem Saatgut aller Art und mit Handelssaatgut amtlich oder unter amtlicher Überwachung so verschlossen werden, dass sie nicht geöffnet werden können, ohne dass das Verschlusssystem verletzt wird oder dass das in Artikel 12 Absatz 1 vorgesehene amtliche Etikett oder die Verpackung Spuren einer Manipulation zeigen.
ref: 1. Member States shall require that packages of basic seed, certified seed of all categories and commercial seed, be sealed officially or under official supervision in such a manner that they cannot be opened without damaging the sealing system or leaving evidence of tampering on either the official label provided for in Article 12(1) or the package.
draft: The member states stipulate that packages containing basic seed, certified seeds of all kinds, and commercial seeds must be sealed by official or under official supervision in such a way that they cannot be opened without violating the closing system or without the official label provided for in Article 12(1) or the packaging showing evidence of manipulation.
hil: Member States shall require that packages containing basic seed, certified seeds of all kinds and commercial seeds are sealed under official supervision or officially in such a way as not to be opened without infringing the sealing system and without showing evidence of manipulation of the official label referred to in Article 12(1) or the packaging.
compare: The member states stipulate that packages containing basic seed, certified seeds of all kinds, and commercial seeds must be sealed by official or under official supervision in such a way that they cannot be opened without violating the closing system or without the official label provided for in Article 12(1) or the packaging showing evidence of manipulation.

src: Die Kommission wird solche Änderungen erforderlichenfalls im Rahmen der ihr nach dem Vertrag übertragenen Durchführungsbefugnisse vornehmen, nachdem sie den Beratenden Bankenausschuß konsultiert hat.
ref: The Commission shall accordingly make such modifications as are necessary, after consulting the Banking Advisory Committee, within the limits of the implementing powers conferred on the Commission by the Treaty.
draft: The commission will make such changes as necessary within the framework of its implementing powers conferred on it by the Treaty, after consulting the Advisory Banking Committee.
hil: The Commission will make such changes as necessary within the framework of its implementing powers conferred on it by the Treaty, after consulting the Advisory Banking Committee.
compare: The commission will make such changes as necessary within the framework of its implementing powers conferred on it by the Treaty, after consulting the Advisory Banking Committee.

src: a) "Eigenmasse" ist die Reinmasse der Waren ausschließlich aller Umschließungen; sofern aufgrund von Artikel 10 Absatz 4 der Grundverordnung keine anders lautenden Vorschriften erlassen wurden, ist die Eigenmasse für jede Unterposition der Kombinierten Nomenklatur in Kilogramm anzugeben.
ref: (a) "net mass" means the actual mass of the good excluding all packaging; failing any provisions to the contrary adopted pursuant to Article 10(4) of the Basic Regulation, the net mass shall be expressed in kilograms for each subheading of the Combined Nomenclature;
draft: "Eigenmasse" is the pure weight of the goods excluding all packaging; unless otherwise provided for by Article 10(4) of the Basic Regulation, the net weight must be given in kilograms for each subheading of the Combined Nomenclature.
hil: "Net weight" means the weight of goods without packaging; where no other provisions have been adopted pursuant to Article 10(4) of the Basic Regulation, net weight must be indicated in kilograms for each subheading of the Combined Nomenclature.
compare: "Eigenmasse" is the pure weight of the goods excluding all packaging; unless otherwise provided for by Article 10(4) of the Basic Regulation, the net weight must be given in kilograms for each subheading of the Combined Nomenclature.

src: Die umfangreichen Investitionen des Wirtschaftszweigs der Gemeinschaft sind ferner ein Anzeichen dafür, dass das Unternehmen für die betroffene Ware eine langfristige Strategie in der Gemeinschaft verfolgt.
ref: The large investment made by the Community industry also indicates that the company has a long term Community-based strategy for the product concerned.
draft: The extensive investments of the community's economic sector are also an indication that the company is pursuing a long-term strategy for the affected product in the community.
hil: "The extensive investments of the Community industry are also an indication that the company is pursuing a long-term strategy for the affected product in the Community. "
compare: "The extensive investments of the Community industry are also an indication that the company is pursuing a long-term strategy for the affected product in the Community. "

src: Der Verarbeiter muss jederzeit in der Lage sein, anhand entsprechender Produktionsaufzeichnungen die Nämlichkeit und die Verwendung des eingeführten Rindfleischs nachzuweisen.

src: (1) Zur Ermittlung des Zollwerts im Sinne des Artikels 30 Absatz 2 Buchstabe d) des Zollkodex (ermittelter Zollwert) darf keine Zollbehörde von einer nicht in der Gemeinschaft ansässigen Person verlangen oder sie dazu verpflichten, Buchhaltungskonten oder andere Unterlagen zur Ermittlung dieses Wertes zur Überprüfung vorzulegen oder zugänglich zu machen.
ref: 1. In applying Article 30 (2) (d) of the Code (computed value), the customs authorities may not require or compel any person not resident in the Community to produce for examination, or to allow access to, any account or other record for the purposes of determining this value.
draft: For the determination of the customs value in accordance with Article 30(2)(d) of the Customs Code (determined customs value), no customs authority may require or obligate a person not resident in the Community to submit or make available accounting records or other documents for the determination of this value for inspection.
hil: The customs authority may not require or compel a person not resident in the Community to submit or make available accounting records or other documents for inspection for the determination of the customs value within the meaning of Article 30(2)(d) of the Customs Code (determined customs value).
compare: For the determination of the customs value in accordance with Article 30(2)(d) of the Customs Code (determined customs value), no customs authority may require or obligate a person not resident in the Community to submit or make available accounting records or other documents for the determination of this value for inspection.

ref: (4) Following an investigation concerning the alleged circumvention of anti-dumping measures imposed by Council Regulation (EC) No 119/97 by imports of RBM consigned from Vietnam, the measures were extended to imports consigned from Vietnam by Council Regulation (EC) No 1208/2004 [5].

src: (92) Gemäß Artikel 32 der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1493/1999 wird für bestimmte Destillationen der Ankaufspreis für Wein gesenkt, der Erzeugern zu zahlen ist, die den Alkoholgehalt durch Zugabe von Saccharose oder von konzentriertem Traubenmost erhöht haben, für den die Beihilfe nach Artikel 34 dieser Verordnung beantragt oder gewährt wurde.
ref: (92) In the case provided for in Article 32 of Regulation (EC) No 1493/1999, for some types of distillation the buying-in price for wine should be reduced where producers have increased the alcoholic strength by adding sucrose or concentrated grape must for which they have either received or applied for aid under Article 34 of that Regulation.
draft: According to Article 32 of Regulation (EC) No 1493/1999, the purchase price for wine is reduced for certain distillations that have increased the alcohol content by adding sucrose or concentrated grape must, for which aid has been applied for or granted under Article 34 of this Regulation.
hil: According to Article 32 of Regulation (EC) No 1493/1999, the purchase price for wine is reduced for certain distillations to be paid to producers who have increased the alcohol content by adding sucrose or concentrated grape must for which aid has been requested or granted under Article 34 of this Regulation.
compare: According to Article 32 of Regulation (EC) No 1493/1999, the purchase price for wine is reduced for certain distillations that have increased the alcohol content by adding sucrose or concentrated grape must, for which aid has been applied for or granted under Article 34 of this Regulation.

src: Für den Fall, daß nach der Vermarktung von lebenden Muscheln ein Gesundheitsproblem auftaucht, müssen sich der Versandbetrieb und das ursprüngliche Erntegebiet feststellen lassen. Daher müssen Registrier- und Kennzeichnungsvorschriften erlassen werden, die es ermöglichen, den Weg, den eine Sendung nach der Ernte genommen hat, nachzuvollziehen.
ref: Whereas it is important, should a health problem occur after the placing on the market of live bivalve molluscs to be able to trace back the establishment of dispatch and the harvesting area of origin; whereas it is therefore necessary to introduce a registration and labelling system which will enable the route of a batch after harvesting to be followed;
draft: In case a health problem arises after the marketing of live mussels, the shipping company and the original harvesting area must be identified. Therefore, registration and labeling regulations must be issued that allow to trace the path taken by a shipment after harvesting.
hil: In the event that a health problem arises after the marketing of live mussels, the shipping company and the original harvesting area must be identified. Therefore, registration and labeling regulations must be enacted that enable the path taken by a shipment after harvesting to be retraced.
compare: In the event that a health problem arises after the marketing of live mussels, the shipping company and the original harvesting area must be identified. Therefore, registration and labeling regulations must be enacted that enable the path taken by a shipment after harvesting to be retraced.

src: Gemäß der Richtlinie 83/189/EWG ( 7 ) müssen die Mitgliedstaaten der Kommission alle Entwürfe von technischen Vorschriften für Maschinen, Apparate und Anlagen mitteilen .
ref: Whereas, pursuant to Directive 83/189/EEC (7), Member States are required to notify the Commission of any draft technical regulations relating to machines, equipment and installations;
draft: According to Directive 83/189/EEC ( 7 ), Member States must notify the Commission of all drafts of technical regulations for machines, apparatus and equipment.  The numerical reference in parentheses "(7)" likely refers to a footnote in the original text.
hil: According to Directive 83/189/EEC ( 7 ), Member States must notify the Commission of all drafts of technical regulations for machines, apparatus and equipment.
compare: According to Directive 83/189/EEC ( 7 ), Member States must notify the Commission of all drafts of technical regulations for machines, apparatus and equipment.  The numerical reference in parentheses "(7)" likely refers to a footnote in the original text.

src: Die in Unterabsatz 2 genannten Behälter und Tanks und der letzte Termin für den Beginn der Anwendung dieser Richtlinie in Bezug auf diese Behälter und Tanks werden nach dem Verfahren des Artikels 9 festgelegt."
ref: The receptacles and tanks referred to in the second subparagraph and the latest date for the application of this Directive as regards those receptacles and tanks shall be determined in accordance with the procedure laid down in Article 9.";
draft: "The containers and tanks mentioned in paragraph 2 and the final deadline for the start of the application of this directive with regard to these containers and tanks shall be determined in accordance with the procedure laid down in Article 9."
hil: The containers and tanks mentioned in paragraph 2 and the final deadline for the commencement of the application of this directive with regard to these containers and tanks shall be determined in accordance with the procedure laid down in Article 9.

src: (3) Das Personal lässt sich bei der Wahrnehmung seiner Aufgaben unter der Aufsicht des Kollegiums von den Zielen und dem Mandat von Eurojust leiten und darf von keiner Regierung, Behörde, Organisation oder Person außerhalb von Eurojust Weisungen erbitten oder entgegennehmen.
ref: 3. Under the authority of the College, the staff shall carry out its tasks bearing in mind the objectives and mandate of Eurojust, without seeking or accepting instructions from any government, authority, organisation or person extraneous to Eurojust.
draft: (3) The staff, in carrying out its duties under the supervision of the College, shall be guided by the objectives and mandate of Eurojust and shall not seek or take instructions from any government, authority, organization or person outside Eurojust.
hil: 3. The staff, while performing its duties under the supervision of the College, shall be guided by the objectives and mandate of Eurojust and shall not seek or receive any instructions from any government, authority, organization or person outside Eurojust.
compare: (3) The staff, in carrying out its duties under the supervision of the College, shall be guided by the objectives and mandate of Eurojust and shall not seek or take instructions from any government, authority, organization or person outside Eurojust.

src: (195) Bei der vorgenannten Stellungnahme wird zu Recht davon ausgegangen, daß aus einer Verbesserung der Rentabilität im Bezugszeitraum nicht zwangsläufig der Schluß zu ziehen ist, daß dem Wirtschaftszweig der Gemeinschaft keine bedeutende Schädigung verursacht wurde.
ref: (195) The above statement rightly suggests that an improvement in profitability during the period considered does not automatically lead to the conclusion that the Community industry did not suffer material injury.
draft: In the aforementioned statement, it is rightly assumed that an improvement in profitability during the reference period does not necessarily lead to the conclusion that the Community industry has not suffered significant damage.
hil: In the aforementioned statement, it is rightfully assumed that an improvement in profitability during the reference period does not necessarily lead to the conclusion that the community's industry has not suffered material injury.
compare: In the aforementioned statement, it is rightly assumed that an improvement in profitability during the reference period does not necessarily lead to the conclusion that the Community industry has not suffered significant damage.

src: Jedoch kann festgestellt werden, daß eine drohende Schädigung mit größerer Wahrscheinlichkeit eintreten wird, wenn die gedumpten Einfuhren anhalten.
ref: However, it may be determined that a threat of injury is more likely to be realized if the dumped imports continue.
draft: However, it can be stated that a potential harm is more likely to occur if the dumped imports continue.
hil: Given that no other new arguments were received regarding the cause of injury suffered by the Community industry, the conclusion that dumped imports, taken in isolation, had caused injury to the Community industry, as stated in recital 99 of the provisional duty Regulation, is confirmed.
compare: However, it can be stated that a potential harm is more likely to occur if the dumped imports continue.

src: (14) Wie auch in der Ausgangsuntersuchung weisen das in den USA hergestellte und dort auf dem Inlandsmarkt verkaufte Kumarin und die aus China in die Gemeinschaft ausgeführte Ware sowie die vom Wirtschaftszweig der Gemeinschaft hergestellte und auf dem Gemeinschaftsmarkt verkaufte Ware den Untersuchungsergebnissen zufolge exakt dieselben materiellen Eigenschaften und Verwendungen auf und sind daher gleichartig im Sinne von Artikel 1 Absatz 4 der Grundverordnung.
ref: (14) As in the original investigation, coumarin produced and sold on the domestic market in the analogue country (USA) and that exported to the Community from the PRC as well as coumarin produced and sold by the Community industry in the Community market were found to have effectively identical physical characteristics and uses and are thus like products within the meaning of Article 1(4) of the basic Regulation.
draft: As in the initial examination, the coumarin produced in the USA and sold on the domestic market there, as well as the goods exported from China to the Community, and the goods produced by the Community industry and sold on the Community market, have exactly the same material properties and uses according to the investigation results and are therefore similar within the meaning of Article 1(4) of the basic regulation.
hil: As in the initial examination, the coumarin produced in the USA and sold on the domestic market there, as well as the goods exported from China to the Community, and the goods produced by the Community industry and sold on the Community market, have exactly the same material properties and uses according to the investigation results and are therefore similar within the meaning of Article 1(4) of the basic regulation.
compare: As in the initial examination, the coumarin produced in the USA and sold on the domestic market there, as well as the goods exported from China to the Community, and the goods produced by the Community industry and sold on the Community market, have exactly the same material properties and uses according to the investigation results and are therefore similar within the meaning of Article 1(4) of the basic regulation.

src: Die Kommission überwacht das Funktionieren dieser Entscheidung und unterrichtet den nach Artikel 31 der Richtlinie 95/46/EG eingesetzten Ausschuss über relevante Erkenntnisse; dazu zählen auch Erkenntnisse, die sich auf die Beurteilung in Artikel 1 dieser Entscheidung auswirken könnten, wonach Argentinien ein angemessenes Schutzniveau im Sinne von Artikel 25 der Richtlinie 95/46/EG bietet, ferner Erkenntnisse, die darauf hindeuten, dass diese Entscheidung in diskriminierender Weise angewandt wird.
ref: The Commission shall monitor the functioning of this Decision and report any pertinent findings to the Committee established under Article 31 of Directive 95/46/EC, including any evidence that could affect the finding in Article 1 of this Decision that protection in Argentina is adequate within the meaning of Article 25 of Directive 95/46/EC and any evidence that this Decision is being implemented in a discriminatory way.
draft: The Commission monitors the functioning of this decision and informs the committee established under Article 31 of Directive 95/46/EC of relevant findings; this includes findings which may have an impact on the assessment made pursuant to Article 1 of this Decision that Argentina ensures an adequate level of protection under Article 25 of Directive 95/46/EC, and findings which indicate that this Decision is being implemented in a discriminatory way.
hil: The Commission monitors the functioning of this decision and informs the committee established under Article 31 of Directive 95/46/EC of relevant findings, including findings that may impact the assessment under Article 1 of this Decision that Argentina provides an adequate level of protection within the meaning of Article 25 of Directive 95/46/EC, and findings that suggest that this Decision is being applied in a discriminatory manner.
compare: The Commission monitors the functioning of this decision and informs the committee established under Article 31 of Directive 95/46/EC of relevant findings; this includes findings which may have an impact on the assessment made pursuant to Article 1 of this Decision that Argentina ensures an adequate level of protection under Article 25 of Directive 95/46/EC, and findings which indicate that this Decision is being implemented in a discriminatory way.

src: - Gemeinsame Erklärung des Europäischen Parlaments, des Rates und der Kommission vom 30. Juni 1982 über verschiedene Maßnahmen zur Gewährleistung einer besseren Abwicklung des Haushaltsverfahrens(1);
ref: - the Joint Declaration by the European Parliament, the Council and the Commission of 30 June 1982 on various measures to improve the budgetary procedure(1),
draft: Joint Declaration of the European Parliament, the Council and the Commission of 30 June 1982 on various measures to ensure better management of the budgetary procedure(1);
hil: Joint Declaration of the European Parliament, the Council, and the Commission of 30 June 1982 on various measures to ensure better management of the budgetary procedure(1).
compare: Joint Declaration of the European Parliament, the Council, and the Commission of 30 June 1982 on various measures to ensure better management of the budgetary procedure(1).

src: Dank der Abschöpfungsregelung kann auf alle sonstigen Schutzmaßnahmen an den Aussengrenzen der Gemeinschaft verzichtet werden. Der Mechanismus der gemeinsamen Preise und Abschöpfungen kann sich jedoch unter besonderen Umständen als unzureichend erweisen. Damit der Gemeinschaftsmarkt in solchen Fällen gegen möglicherweise daraus entstehende Störungen nicht ohne Schutz bleibt, nachdem die früheren Einfuhrhemmnisse beseitigt worden sind, muß es der Gemeinschaft ermöglicht werden, rasch alle erforderlichen Maßnahmen zu treffen.
ref: Whereas the levy system makes it possible to dispense with all other protective measures at the external frontiers of the Community ; whereas, however, the common price and levy machinery may, in exceptional circumstances, prove defective ; whereas in such cases, so as not to leave the Community market without defence against disturbances which may arise therefrom after the import barriers which existed previously have been removed, the Community should be enabled to take all necessary measures without delay;
draft: Thanks to the skim-off rule, all other protective measures at the external borders of the Community can be dispensed with. However, the mechanism of common prices and levies may prove insufficient under particular circumstances. In order to ensure that the Community market is not left unprotected against any disturbances possibly arising from this after the previous import barriers have been removed, the Community must be able to take all necessary measures quickly.
hil: Thanks to the skim-off rule, all other protective measures at the external borders of the Community can be dispensed with. However, under exceptional circumstances, the joint pricing and skim-off mechanism may prove insufficient. In order to avoid leaving the Common Market unprotected against any disturbances that may arise from this after the previous import barriers have been removed, the Community must be enabled to take all necessary measures quickly.
compare: Thanks to the skim-off rule, all other protective measures at the external borders of the Community can be dispensed with. However, the mechanism of common prices and levies may prove insufficient under particular circumstances. In order to ensure that the Community market is not left unprotected against any disturbances possibly arising from this after the previous import barriers have been removed, the Community must be able to take all necessary measures quickly.

src: (2) Aufgrund der Einführung einer Zahlung für Hopfen an Erzeugergemeinschaften mit Artikel 68a Absatz 2 der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1782/2003 und Artikel 171 der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1973/2004 der Kommission vom 29. Oktober 2004 mit Durchführungsvorschriften zu der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1782/2003 des Rates hinsichtlich der Stützungsregelungen nach Titel IV und IVa der Verordnung und der Verwendung von Stilllegungsflächen für die Erzeugung von Rohstoffen [3] ist es erforderlich, die Verordnung (EG) Nr. 796/2004 in verschiedenen Punkten zu ändern und besondere Bestimmungen hinsichtlich des Anwendungsverfahrens und der Kontrollen dieser Beihilferegelung einzuführen.
ref: (2) Following the introduction of a payment for hops to producer groups in the second paragraph of Article 68a of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 and Article 171 of Commission Regulation (EC) No 1973/2004 of 29 October 2004 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 as regards the support schemes provided for in Titles IV and IVa of that Regulation and the use of land set aside for the production of raw materials [3], Regulation (EC) No 796/2004 needs to be amended in several respects and it is also appropriate to introduce particular provisions with regard to the application procedure and controls for that aid scheme.
draft: (2) Due to the introduction of payment for hops to producer groups under Article 68a(2) of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 and Article 171 of Commission Regulation (EC) No 1973/2004 of 29 October 2004 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulations (EC) No 1782/2003 in respect of the support schemes provided for in Titles IV and IVa of the Regulation and the use of set-aside land for the production of raw materials [3], it is necessary to amend Regulation (EC) No 796/2004 in various respects and to introduce specific provisions relating to the application procedure and control of this aid scheme.
hil: Due to the introduction of payment for hops to producer groups under Article 68a(2) of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 and Article 171 of Commission Regulation (EC) No 1973/2004 of 29 October 2004 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulations (EC) No 1782/2003 in respect of the support schemes provided for in Titles IV and IVa of the Regulation and the use of set-aside land for the production of raw materials [3], it is necessary to amend Regulation (EC) No 796/2004 in various respects and to introduce specific provisions relating to the application procedure and control of this aid scheme.
compare: (2) Due to the introduction of payment for hops to producer groups under Article 68a(2) of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 and Article 171 of Commission Regulation (EC) No 1973/2004 of 29 October 2004 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulations (EC) No 1782/2003 in respect of the support schemes provided for in Titles IV and IVa of the Regulation and the use of set-aside land for the production of raw materials [3], it is necessary to amend Regulation (EC) No 796/2004 in various respects and to introduce specific provisions relating to the application procedure and control of this aid scheme.

src: (3) Mit der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 1764/92 des Rates vom 29. Juni 1992 zur Änderung der Einfuhrregelung der Gemeinschaft für bestimmte Agrarerzeugnisse mit Ursprung in Ägypten, Algerien, Israel, Jordanien, Libanon, Malta, Marokko, Syrien, Tunesien und Zypern(8) sind der schrittweise Abbau der Zölle beschleunigt und die Mengen der in den Protokollen zu den Assoziations- oder Kooperationsabkommen mit den jeweiligen Mittelmeerländern vorgesehenen Zollkontingente und Referenzmengen erhöht worden.
ref: (3) Council Regulation (EEC) No 1764/92 of 29 June 1992 amending the arrangements for the import into the Community of certain agricultural products originating in Algeria, Cyprus, Egypt, Israel, Jordan, Lebanon, Malta, Morocco, Syria and Tunisia(8), accelerated the tariff dismantling and provided for an increase of the volumes of the tariff quotas and reference quantities laid down in the Protocols to the Association or Cooperation Agreements with the Mediterranean countries in question.
draft: With Regulation (EEC) No 1764/92 of 29 June 1992, the Council amended the import arrangements of certain agricultural products originating in Egypt, Algeria, Israel, Jordan, Lebanon, Malta, Morocco, Syria, Tunisia and Cyprus(8), thus accelerating the gradual dismantling of tariffs and increasing the quantities of customs quotas and reference quantities provided for in the Protocols to the Association or Cooperation Agreements with the Mediterranean countries concerned.
hil: With Regulation (EEC) No 1764/92 of 29 June 1992, the Council accelerated the gradual dismantling of tariffs and increased the quantities of customs quotas and reference quantities provided for in the Protocols to the Association or Cooperation Agreements with the Mediterranean countries concerned, regarding certain agricultural products originating in Egypt, Algeria, Israel, Jordan, Lebanon, Malta, Morocco, Syria, Tunisia and Cyprus(8).
compare: With Regulation (EEC) No 1764/92 of 29 June 1992, the Council amended the import arrangements of certain agricultural products originating in Egypt, Algeria, Israel, Jordan, Lebanon, Malta, Morocco, Syria, Tunisia and Cyprus(8), thus accelerating the gradual dismantling of tariffs and increasing the quantities of customs quotas and reference quantities provided for in the Protocols to the Association or Cooperation Agreements with the Mediterranean countries concerned.

src: (1) Die Mitgliedstaaten veröffentlichen vor dem 15. Mai 2004 das Verzeichnis der Sorten, die nur in den Jahren 2004 und 2005 für die Prämie in Betracht kommen, und übermitteln das Verzeichnis vor dem 30. Juni 2004 der Kommission.

src: 3. "wesentlich": das Know-how umfaßt Informationen, die nützlich sein müssen, d. h. es kann von ihm zum Zeitpunkt des Vertragschlusses erwartet werden, daß es die Wettbewerbsstellung des Lizenznehmers verbessert, indem es ihm beispielsweise hilft, in einen neuen Markt vorzudringen oder indem es ihm einen Wettbewerbsvorteil gegenüber anderen Herstellern oder Dienstleistungserbringern verschafft, die zu dem überlassenen geheimen Know-how oder anderem vergleichbaren geheimen Know-how keinen Zugang haben;
ref: (3) 'substantial` means that the know-how includes information which must be useful, i.e. can reasonably be expected at the date of conclusion of the agreement to be capable of improving the competitive position of the licensee, for example by helping him to enter a new market or giving him an advantage in competition with other manufacturers or providers of services who do not have access to the licensed secret know-how or other comparable secret know-how;
draft: "Essential": The know-how comprises information that must be useful, i.e. at the time of contract conclusion it can be expected to improve the licensee's competitive position by helping him, for example, to enter a new market or by giving him a competitive edge over other manufacturers or service providers who do not have access to the secret know-how or other comparable secret know-how transferred.
hil: "Essential": The know-how comprises information that must be useful, i.e. at the time of contract conclusion it can be expected to improve the licensee's competitive position by helping him, for example, to enter a new market or by giving him a competitive edge over other manufacturers or service providers who do not have access to the secret know-how or other comparable secret know-how transferred."
compare: "Essential": The know-how comprises information that must be useful, i.e. at the time of contract conclusion it can be expected to improve the licensee's competitive position by helping him, for example, to enter a new market or by giving him a competitive edge over other manufacturers or service providers who do not have access to the secret know-how or other comparable secret know-how transferred.

src: (52) Zwei indische ausführende Hersteller wandten ein, die kumulative Beurteilung der Einfuhren sei ungerechtfertigt, da der Anstieg und das absolute Volumen der Einfuhren aus Indien gemessen an den Einfuhren aus Korea und den Verkaufsmengen des Wirtschaftszweigs der Gemeinschaft unbedeutend gewesen seien.
ref: (52) Two Indian exporting producers claimed that a cumulative assessment of imports was unjustified because the growth as well as the absolute volume of Indian imports was insignificant when compared to Korean imports and to the sales volume of the Community industry.
draft: (52) Two Indian exporting manufacturers argued that the cumulative assessment of imports was unjustified because the increase and absolute volume of imports from India were insignificant compared to imports from Korea and sales volumes of the Community industry.
hil: According to two Indian exporting manufacturers, the cumulative assessment of imports was not justified as the increase and absolute volume of imports from India were insignificant when compared to imports from Korea and sales volumes of the Community's economic sector.
compare: According to two Indian exporting manufacturers, the cumulative assessment of imports was not justified as the increase and absolute volume of imports from India were insignificant when compared to imports from Korea and sales volumes of the Community's economic sector.

src: (1) Im Rahmen des Binnenmarktes sind für den innergemeinschaftlichen Handel in Bezug auf das Herstellen, die Verarbeitung, den Vertrieb und die Einfuhr aus Drittländern von unter Anhang I des Vertrags fallenden Lebensmitteln tierischen Ursprungs spezifische Hygienevorschriften festgelegt worden.
ref: (1) In the context of the single market, specific animal health rules have been laid down to govern intra-Community trade in the production, processing, distribution and introduction from third countries of products of animal origin for human consumption included in Annex I to the Treaty.
draft: As part of the internal market, specific hygiene regulations have been established for the intra-Community trade in, with respect to the manufacture, processing, distribution, and import from third countries of foodstuffs of animal origin falling within the scope of Annex I to the Treaty.
hil: As part of the internal market, specific hygiene regulations have been established for the intra-Community trade in, with respect to the manufacture, processing, distribution, and import from third countries of foodstuffs of animal origin falling within the scope of Annex I to the Treaty.
compare: As part of the internal market, specific hygiene regulations have been established for the intra-Community trade in, with respect to the manufacture, processing, distribution, and import from third countries of foodstuffs of animal origin falling within the scope of Annex I to the Treaty.

src: In diesem Zusammenhang vertrat die Kommission die Ansicht, dass die Behörden von Gibraltar steuerbefreiten Unternehmen über die Steuerbefreiung staatliche Beihilfe gewähren [43].

src: Wasserstoffperoxid, Peressigsäure, Carbetocin, Quillaja-Saponine, Butyl-4-hydroxybenzoat, Butyl-4-hydroxybenzoat-Natriumsalz und Benzyl-4-hydroxybenzoat-Natriumsalz sollten in Anhang II der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 2377/90 aufgenommen werden.

src: Auf dieser Grundlage ist es mehr als wahrscheinlich, daß bei einem Außerkrafttreten der Maßnahmen erneut bedeutende Mengen ausgeführt werden (durch Nutzung der brachliegenden Produktionskapazität und/oder Umleitung der gegenwärtig für die USA bestimmten Ausfuhren).
ref: On this basis, it is more than likely that exports in significant quantities would recur (by using idle production capacities and/or by redirecting exports currently destined for the United States of America), should measures be repealed.
draft: Based on this, it is more than likely that if the measures are lifted, significant amounts will again be exported (by using idle production capacity and/or redirecting exports currently intended for the USA).
hil: It is highly likely that, based on this, if the measures are lifted, significant amounts will be exported again (by use of idle production capacity and/or redirection of exports currently intended for the USA).

src: "Erhaltung" alle Maßnahmen zum Schutz und zur Rehabilitation der Wälder, insbesondere Maßnahmen zum Schutz oder zur Wiederherstellung der biologischen Vielfalt und der ökologischen Funktionen des Waldökosystems, bei möglichst weitgehender Sicherstellung ihres gegenwärtigen und künftigen Nutzwertes für die Menschheit, insbesondere die vom Waldökosystem abhängige Bevölkerung;
ref: "Conservation" means all activities to preserve and rehabilitate forests, in particular activities designed to protect or restore the biological diversity and ecological functions of the forest ecosystem, while securing as far as possible their current and future value for mankind and in particular for forest-dependent people.
draft: "Conservation" includes all measures for the protection and rehabilitation of forests, especially measures for the protection or restoration of the biological diversity and ecological functions of the forest ecosystem, while ensuring their current and future usefulness for humanity, particularly for populations dependent on the forest ecosystem.
hil: Conservation means all measures to protect and rehabilitate forests, especially measures to protect or restore the biological diversity and ecological functions of the forest ecosystem while ensuring their present and future value for humanity, particularly for forest-dependent peoples who inhabit forests or claim them as their traditional home and for all people living in or near forests who have traditionally been directly and to a large extent dependent on forests.
compare: "Conservation" includes all measures for the protection and rehabilitation of forests, especially measures for the protection or restoration of the biological diversity and ecological functions of the forest ecosystem, while ensuring their current and future usefulness for humanity, particularly for populations dependent on the forest ecosystem.
