src: Um den Handel mit diesen Ländern nicht zu stören und sicherzustellen, dass nur Erzeugnisse in diese Länder ausgeführt werden, für die keine Erstattungen gezahlt wurden, sollten daher sobald wie möglich besondere Bestimmungen für die Ausstellung von Lizenzen für diese Länder festgelegt werden.
ref: In order to avoid disrupting trade with these countries and guarantee that only products which have not benefited from refunds are exported to them, specific arrangements for the issue of licences to these countries should be drawn up as soon as possible.
draft: To avoid disturbing trade with these countries and to ensure that only products for which no refunds have been paid are exported to these countries, special provisions for the issuance of licenses for these countries should therefore be established as soon as possible.
hil: Special provisions for issuing licenses to these countries should be established as soon as possible to avoid disrupting trade with these countries and to ensure that only products for which no refunds have been paid are exported to these countries.
compare: Special provisions for issuing licenses to these countries should be established as soon as possible to avoid disrupting trade with these countries and to ensure that only products for which no refunds have been paid are exported to these countries.

src: (2) Wird die Subvention nicht nach Maßgabe der hergestellten, produzierten, ausgeführten oder beförderten Menge gewährt, so wird die Höhe der anfechtbaren Subvention bestimmt, indem der Gesamtwert der Subvention in angemessener Weise der während des untersuchten Subventionierungszeitraums produzierten, verkauften oder ausgeführten Menge der betreffenden Waren zugerechnet wird.
ref: 2. Where the subsidy is not granted by reference to the quantities manufactured, produced, exported or transported, the amount of countervailable subsidy shall be determined by allocating the value of the total subsidy, as appropriate, over the level of production, sales or exports of the products concerned during the investigation period for subsidization.
draft: (2) If the subsidy is not granted according to the quantity produced, manufactured, exported or transported, the amount of the contestable subsidy shall be determined by allocating the total value of the subsidy, in an appropriate manner, to the quantity of the goods concerned produced, sold, or exported during the period of investigation into the subsidy.
hil: If the subsidy is not granted based on the quantity produced, manufactured, exported or transported, the amount of the controllable subsidy shall be determined by allocating the total value of the subsidy, in an appropriate manner, to the quantity of the goods concerned produced, sold, or exported during the investigated subsidy period.
compare: (2) If the subsidy is not granted according to the quantity produced, manufactured, exported or transported, the amount of the contestable subsidy shall be determined by allocating the total value of the subsidy, in an appropriate manner, to the quantity of the goods concerned produced, sold, or exported during the period of investigation into the subsidy.

src: Die Mitgliedstaaten übermitteln der Kommission für jede Art oder Sortengruppe, für die eine Beihilfe festgesetzt worden ist, sowie für jeden Typ von Hybridmais zur Aussaat, für den ein Referenzpreis festgesetzt worden ist, die im Anhang aufgeführten Angaben zu den dort genannten Terminen.
ref: Member States shall communicate to the Commission, for each species or group of varieties for which an aid has been fixed and for each type of hybrid maize for sowing for which a reference price has been fixed, the information listed in the Annex by the dates specified therein.
draft: The Member States shall communicate to the Commission, for each type or group of varieties for which aid has been fixed, and for each type of hybrid maize for sowing for which a reference price has been fixed, the information listed in the Annex by the deadlines mentioned therein.
hil: As soon as aid has been fixed for each type or group of varieties, and for each type of hybrid maize for planting for which a reference price has been fixed, Member States shall communicate the information listed in the annex by the deadlines specified therein to the Commission.
compare: The Member States shall communicate to the Commission, for each type or group of varieties for which aid has been fixed, and for each type of hybrid maize for sowing for which a reference price has been fixed, the information listed in the Annex by the deadlines mentioned therein.

ref: 3. For fisheries operations in the Mediterranean, any amount greater than 50 kg of live-weight equivalent of any species retained on board shall be recorded in the logbook.
draft: (3) During fishing in the Mediterranean, each species kept on board, whose quantity exceeds 50 kg in terms of live weight equivalent and which is listed in Annex VII, is recorded in the logbook.

src: (42) Weiterhin wird ausgeführt, dass der für eine Transaktion innerhalb einer Unternehmensgruppe herangezogene Preis nicht unbedingt auf dem Marktpreis basieren müsse.
ref: (42) It is also claimed that the price used in an internal transaction within a group does not necessarily have to be market based.
draft: Furthermore, it is stated that the price used for a transaction within a corporate group does not necessarily have to be based on the market price.
hil: Furthermore, it is stated that the price used for a transaction within a corporate group does not necessarily have to be based on the market price.
compare: Furthermore, it is stated that the price used for a transaction within a corporate group does not necessarily have to be based on the market price.

src: Um die Anwendung dieser Richtlinie zu erleichtern, sollte ein Verfahren angewandt werden, durch das im Rahmen des Ständigen Futtermittelausschusses eine enge Zusammenarbeit zwischen den Mitgliedstaaten und der Kommission herbeigeführt wird -
ref: Whereas, in order to facilitate implementation of this Directive, a procedure should be applied which establishes close co-operation between Member States and the Commission within the Standing Committee for Feeding-stuffs;
draft: To facilitate the application of this directive, a procedure should be applied to bring about close cooperation between the Member States and the Commission within the Standing Committee on Feedingstuffs.
hil: To facilitate the application of this directive, provision should be made for a procedure ensuring close cooperation between the Member States and the Commission, through the Standing Committee on Feedingstuffs.
compare: To facilitate the application of this directive, a procedure should be applied to bring about close cooperation between the Member States and the Commission within the Standing Committee on Feedingstuffs.

src: - Reisende, die sich aus privaten Gründen nach Dänemark begeben, können die am 31. Dezember 1992 geltenden Freigrenzen für Zigaretten, Zigarillos oder Rauchtabak sowie für alkoholische Getränke in Anspruch nehmen.
ref: - private travellers entering Denmark shall benefit from the allowance in force on 31 December 1992 for cigarettes, cigarillos or smoking tobacco and for spirit drinks,
draft: Travelers who go to Denmark for private reasons can still claim the duty-free limits for cigarettes, cigarillos or smoking tobacco as well as for alcoholic beverages in effect on December 31, 1992.
hil: Where travelers go to Denmark for private reasons, they can claim the duty-free limits for cigarettes, cigarillos or smoking tobacco as well as for alcoholic beverages which were in effect on December 31, 1992.
compare: Travelers who go to Denmark for private reasons can still claim the duty-free limits for cigarettes, cigarillos or smoking tobacco as well as for alcoholic beverages in effect on December 31, 1992.

src: (2) Zur Sicherstellung einer angemessenen Versorgung des Gemeinschaftsmarktes mit Rohzucker, zur Raffination bestimmt, der KN-Codes 1701 11 10 und 1701 12 10 und Melassen des KN-Codes 1703 durch deren Einfuhr aus Drittländern kann die Kommission abweichend von Absatz 1 nach dem Verfahren des Artikels 42 Absatz 2 die Anwendung von Einfuhrzöllen für diese Erzeugnisse ganz oder teilweise aussetzen und die Modalitäten dieser Aussetzung festlegen.
ref: 2. Notwithstanding paragraph 1, to ensure that the Community market is adequately supplied with raw sugar for refining falling within CN codes 1701 11 10 and 1701 12 10 molasses falling within CN code 1703 by means of imports from third countries, the Commission may suspend in whole or in part the application of import duties on these products and lay down the detailed rules for any such suspension in accordance with the procedure laid down in Article 42(2).
draft: To ensure adequate provision of raw sugar for refining under CN codes 1701 11 10 and 1701 12 10 and molasses under CN code 1703 to the Community market by means of their importation from third countries, the Commission may, by way of derogation from paragraph 1 and in accordance with the procedure laid down in Article 42(2), suspend the application of import duties on these products, in whole or in part, and fix the conditions for such suspension.
hil: To ensure adequate provision of raw sugar for refining under CN codes 1701 11 10 and 1701 12 10 and molasses under CN code 1703 to the Community market by means of their importation from third countries, the Commission may suspend the application of import duties on these products, in whole or in part, and fix the conditions for such suspension, by way of derogation from paragraph 1 and in accordance with the procedure laid down in Article 42(2).
compare: To ensure adequate provision of raw sugar for refining under CN codes 1701 11 10 and 1701 12 10 and molasses under CN code 1703 to the Community market by means of their importation from third countries, the Commission may suspend the application of import duties on these products, in whole or in part, and fix the conditions for such suspension, by way of derogation from paragraph 1 and in accordance with the procedure laid down in Article 42(2).

src: Unterschiede in den Bestimmungen über die Bekämpfung der Verunreinigung durch Industrieanlagen, die zur Zeit in den verschiedenen Mitgliedstaaten gelten oder angepasst werden, können zu ungleichen Wettbewerbsbedingungen führen und sich damit unmittelbar auf das Funktionieren des Gemeinsamen Marktes auswirken. Es ist daher angezeigt, auf diesem Gebiet eine Angleichung der Rechtsvorschriften gemäß Artikel 100 des Vertrages vorzunehmen.
ref: Whereas disparities between the provisions in force or being amended in the Member States as regards the control of pollution from industrial plants can create unequal conditions of competition and thereby directly affect the functioning of the common market; whereas it is therefore necessary to approximate legislation in this field pursuant to Article 100 of the Treaty;
draft: Differences in the provisions for combating pollution from industrial plants that are currently in force or being adapted in the various Member States can lead to unequal competitive conditions and thus have an immediate effect on the functioning of the common market. It is therefore appropriate to harmonize the legislation in this area in accordance with Article 100 of the Treaty.
hil: Differences in provisions for combating pollution from industrial plants that are currently in force or being adapted in various member states may lead to unequal competition conditions and consequently directly affect the functioning of the Common Market. Therefore, it is appropriate to harmonize legislation in this area in accordance with Article 100 of the Treaty.
compare: Differences in the provisions for combating pollution from industrial plants that are currently in force or being adapted in the various Member States can lead to unequal competitive conditions and thus have an immediate effect on the functioning of the common market. It is therefore appropriate to harmonize the legislation in this area in accordance with Article 100 of the Treaty.

src: (18) In seiner ursprünglichen Stellungnahme legte Deutschland dar, die Maßnahme diene dem Ausgleich des Marktversagens im Immobilienbereich, der nicht in der Lage sei, insbesondere neu gegründeten Unternehmen Räume zu einem für sie tragbaren Preis anzubieten.
ref: (18) In its original comments, Germany argued that the measure was aimed at rectifying market failure in the real estate sector, which was unable to provide start-ups in particular with facilities at prices they could afford.
draft: Germany stated in its original statement that the measure was intended to compensate for market failure in the real estate sector, which was unable to offer space to newly established companies at a price that was affordable for them.
hil: Germany stated in its initial statement that the measure was aimed at compensating for market failure in the real estate sector, which was unable to offer particularly newly founded companies premises at a price that was affordable for them.
compare: Germany stated in its original statement that the measure was intended to compensate for market failure in the real estate sector, which was unable to offer space to newly established companies at a price that was affordable for them.

src: 1. "Gericht" alle Behörden der Mitgliedstaaten, die für Rechtssachen zuständig sind, die gemäß Artikel 1 in den Anwendungsbereich dieser Verordnung fallen;
ref: 1. the term "court" shall cover all the authorities in the Member States with jurisdiction in the matters falling within the scope of this Regulation pursuant to Article 1;
draft: "Court" means all the authorities of the Member States which are competent for legal proceedings that fall within the scope of this Regulation pursuant to Article 1.
hil: As per Article 1, the term "court" denotes all the authorities of the Member States which are responsible for judicial proceedings falling within the scope of this Regulation, and such authorities shall include those competent for legal matters.
compare: "Court" means all the authorities of the Member States which are competent for legal proceedings that fall within the scope of this Regulation pursuant to Article 1.

src: (1) Beantragt ein Mitgliedstaat bei der Kommission die Anwendung von Schutzmaßnahmen nach Artikel 31 oder 32 des Abkommens, so übermittelt er ihr die erforderlichen Informationen zur Begründung seines Antrags.
ref: 1. Where a Member State requests the Commission to apply safeguard measures as provided for in Articles 31 or 32 of the Agreement, it shall provide the Commission, in support of its request, with the information needed to justify it.
draft: "A member state requesting protective measures under Article 31 or 32 of the Agreement shall provide the Commission with the necessary information to substantiate its request."
hil: If a Member State applies to the Commission for the application of protective measures under Article 31 or 32 of the Agreement, it shall submit to the Commission the necessary information to justify its request.
compare: "A member state requesting protective measures under Article 31 or 32 of the Agreement shall provide the Commission with the necessary information to substantiate its request."

src: Für einige der in der Richtlinie 86/109/EWG aufgeführten Arten gilt diese Beschränkung des Verkehrs ab 1. Juli 1989. Es hat sich nunmehr gezeigt, daß die Mitgliedstaaten für eine Reihe von Arten zu diesem Zeitpunkt noch nicht genügend Basissaatgut und zertifiziertes Saatgut erzeugen können, um den innergemeinschaftlichen Bedarf an Saatgut zu decken.
ref: Whereas for some of the species referred to in Directive 86/109/EEC this marketing restriction applies as from 1 July 1989; whereas it now appears that, for a number of these species, Member States will not be in a position, at that date, to produce sufficient basic seed and certified seed to satisfy the demand for seed within the Community;
draft: For some of the species listed in Directive 86/109/EEC, this traffic restriction applies from 1 July 1989. It has now been shown that at this time, member states still cannot produce enough basic seed and certified seed for a number of species to meet the intra-community demand for seed.
hil: For some of the species listed in Directive 86/109/EEC, this traffic restriction applies from 1 July 1989. It is now evident that at this time, Member States cannot yet produce sufficient basic and certified seed for a number of species to cover intra-community demand for seed.
compare: For some of the species listed in Directive 86/109/EEC, this traffic restriction applies from 1 July 1989. It has now been shown that at this time, member states still cannot produce enough basic seed and certified seed for a number of species to meet the intra-community demand for seed.

src: Hat der Rat nach Ablauf einer Frist von drei Monaten von seiner Befassung an keinen Beschluß gefaßt, so werden die vorgeschlagenen Maßnahmen von der Kommission erlassen, es sei denn, der Rat hat sich mit einfacher Mehrheit gegen diese Maßnahmen ausgesprochen.
ref: If, on the expiry of a period of three months, from the date of referral to the Council, the Council has not acted, the proposed measures shall be adopted by the Commission, save where the Council has decided against the said measures by a simple majority.
draft: If, after a period of three months from their referral to the Council, the latter has not acted, the proposed measures shall be adopted by the Commission, except where the Council has acted by a simple majority against the said measures.
hil: If the Council has not adopted any decision within three months from the date of referral to it, the proposed measures shall be adopted by the Commission, unless the Council has rejected the said measures by a simple majority.
compare: If, after a period of three months from their referral to the Council, the latter has not acted, the proposed measures shall be adopted by the Commission, except where the Council has acted by a simple majority against the said measures.

src: - Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1128/1999 der Kommission vom 28. Mai 1999 mit Durchführungsbestimmungen betreffend ein Zollkontingent für bis zu 80 kg schwere Kälber mit Ursprung in bestimmten Drittländern(5), geändert durch die Verordnung (EG) Nr. 2857/2000(6),

hil: With the Regulation (EC) No. 1128/1999 of the Commission of 28 May 1999 laying down detailed rules for the implementation of a tariff quota for calves weighing up to 80 kg originating in certain third countries(5), as amended by Regulation (EC) No. 2857/2000(6).
compare: Regulation (EC) No. 1128/1999 of the Commission of 28 May 1999 laying down detailed rules for the implementation of a tariff quota for calves weighing up to 80 kg originating in certain third countries(5), as amended by Regulation (EC) No. 2857/2000(6).

src: Stellt eine Vertragspartei in ihren Beziehungen zu der anderen Vertragspartei Dumping-Praktiken fest , so kann sie gemäß den in Artikel 28 festgelegten Voraussetzungen und Verfahren im Einklang mit den Bestimmungen des Übereinkommens zur Durchführung von Artikel VI des Allgemeinen Zoll - und Handelsabkommens geeignete Maßnahmen gegen diese Praktiken treffen .
ref: If one of the Contracting Parties finds that dumping is taking place in trade with the other Contracting Party, it may take appropriate measures against this practice in accordance with the Agreement on Implementation of Article VI of the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade, under the conditions and in accordance with the procedures laid down in Article 28.
draft: If a contracting party establishes dumping practices in its relations with the other contracting party, it may, in accordance with the conditions and procedures laid down in Article 28 and in accordance with the provisions of the Agreement on Implementation of Article VI of the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade, take appropriate measures against such practices.
hil: If a contracting party establishes dumping practices in its relations with the other contracting party, it may, in accordance with the conditions and procedures laid down in Article 28 and in accordance with the provisions of the Agreement on Implementation of Article VI of the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade, take appropriate measures against such practices.
compare: If a contracting party establishes dumping practices in its relations with the other contracting party, it may, in accordance with the conditions and procedures laid down in Article 28 and in accordance with the provisions of the Agreement on Implementation of Article VI of the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade, take appropriate measures against such practices.

src: Soweit in den Mitgliedstaaten für diese Erzeugnisse bereits Rechts - und Verwaltungsvorschriften bestehen , weichen sie in wesentlichen Punkten voneinander ab . Sie wirken sich damit unmittelbar auf die Errichtung und das Funktionieren des Gemeinsamen Marktes aus , so daß ihre Harmonisierung angezeigt ist .
ref: Whereas the provisions laid down in the Member States by law, regulation or administrative action concerning these products, in so far as they exist, differ as regards their basic principles ; whereas it follows that they directly affect the establishment and functioning of the common market and should therefore be harmonized;
draft: As far as legal and administrative regulations already exist for these products in the member states, they differ significantly from each other in essential points. They thus have an immediate effect on the establishment and functioning of the common market, so their harmonization is necessary.
hil: Whereas legal and administrative regulations for these products already exist in certain Member States, they differ significantly from each other in essential points, which has an immediate impact on the establishment and functioning of the common market. Therefore, their harmonization is necessary.
compare: Whereas legal and administrative regulations for these products already exist in certain Member States, they differ significantly from each other in essential points, which has an immediate impact on the establishment and functioning of the common market. Therefore, their harmonization is necessary.

src: Zur Unterstützung des Friedensprozesses im Nahen Osten ist die Hilfe der Gemeinschaft durch neue Maßnahmen zu verstärken, die die Ausfuhren aus dem Westjordanland und dem Gazastreifen fördern können; zu diesem Zweck sollte die Zollpräferenzbehandlung auf Schnittblumen ausgedehnt werden. Folglich ist die vorgenannte Verordnung zu ändern.
ref: Whereas, in order to support the peace process in the Middle East, Community aid needs to be stepped up by implementing new measures for encouraging exports from the West Bank and the Gaza Strip and whereas, to that end, it is necessary to extend preferential tariff treatment to cut flowers; whereas the abovementioned Regulation should be amended accordingly;
draft: To support the peace process in the Middle East, the assistance of the community needs to be strengthened through new measures that can promote exports from the West Bank and Gaza Strip; for this purpose, the customs preference treatment should be extended to cut flowers. Therefore, the above regulation needs to be amended.
hil: To support the peace process in the Middle East, new measures need to be taken by the community to enhance assistance that can promote exports from the West Bank and Gaza Strip, for which purpose customs preference treatment should be extended to cut flowers. Therefore, the above mentioned regulation needs to be amended.
compare: To support the peace process in the Middle East, the assistance of the community needs to be strengthened through new measures that can promote exports from the West Bank and Gaza Strip; for this purpose, the customs preference treatment should be extended to cut flowers. Therefore, the above regulation needs to be amended.

src: (9) Die Kommission hat geprüft, ob eine Zusammenlegung der Fahrzeuggruppen II und III durchführbar ist, und sie hat die tatsächliche Betriebsweise von leichten Nutzfahrzeugen im städtischen und außerstädtischen Verkehr und die besonderen Merkmale dieser Fahrzeuge untersucht.
ref: (9) Whereas the Commission has examined the feasibility of amalgamating vehicle classes II and III, the actual conditions under which light commercial vehicles are driven in urban and extra-urban traffic and the special characteristics of those vehicles;
draft: "The commission has examined whether merging vehicle groups II and III is feasible, and has investigated the actual operating mode of light commercial vehicles in urban and non-urban traffic and the special features of these vehicles."
hil: The Commission examined the feasibility of merging vehicle categories II and III, and investigated the actual operating practices of light commercial vehicles in urban and non-urban traffic, as well as the unique characteristics of these vehicles.
compare: "The commission has examined whether merging vehicle groups II and III is feasible, and has investigated the actual operating mode of light commercial vehicles in urban and non-urban traffic and the special features of these vehicles."

src: - Validité limitée

draft: Limited validity

src: (1) Dieser Vertrag wird in einer Urschrift in englischer, arabischer, chinesischer, französischer, russischer und spanischer Sprache unterzeichnet, wobei jede Fassung gleichermaßen verbindlich ist.
ref: 1. This Treaty is signed in a single original in English, Arabic, Chinese, French, Russian and Spanish languages, the versions in all these languages being equally authentic.
draft: This contract shall be signed in a single original in the English, Arabic, Chinese, French, Russian and Spanish languages, each version being equally authentic.
hil: This contract shall be signed in a single original in the English, Arabic, Chinese, French, Russian and Spanish languages, each version being equally authentic.
compare: This contract shall be signed in a single original in the English, Arabic, Chinese, French, Russian and Spanish languages, each version being equally authentic.

src: (4) Die Mitgliedstaaten tragen dafür Sorge, dass auf Erzeugnisse, die während des Zeitraums gemäß Artikel 56 Absatz 1 von Tieren empfänglicher Arten gewonnen wurden, folgende Maßnahmen Anwendung finden:
ref: 4. Member States shall ensure that the following measures are applied to products derived from animals of susceptible species and produced during the period referred to in Article 56(1):
draft: (4) The Member States shall ensure that the following measures are applied to products obtained from susceptible species of animals during the period referred to in Article 56(1).
hil: The Member States shall ensure that the following measures are applied to products obtained from susceptible species of animals during the period referred to in Article 56(1):
compare: (4) The Member States shall ensure that the following measures are applied to products obtained from susceptible species of animals during the period referred to in Article 56(1).

src: Werden Erzeugnisse in das Zollgebiet der Gemeinschaft verbracht und im Hoheitsgebiet des Mitgliedstaats, der die Kontrollen durchführt, nicht zum zollrechtlich freien Verkehr abgefertigt, so stellt die zuständige Behörde dem Betreffenden ein Dokument mit Angaben über die Art der durchgeführten Kontrollen und ihre Ergebnisse aus.
ref: Whereas when products are introduced into the customs territory of the Community and are not released for free circulation in the territory of the Member State which carries out the checks the competent authority shall provide the person concerned with a document indicating the type of check carried out and its outcome;
draft: When goods are brought into the customs territory of the Community and not cleared for free circulation under customs law in the territory of the Member State carrying out the checks, the competent authority shall issue the person concerned with a document containing information on the type of checks carried out and their results.

src: (1) Die Mitgliedstaaten richten ein EDV-gestütztes Frühwarnsystem ein, durch das das zentrale Verbindungsbüro oder eine Verbindungsstelle des Abgangsmitgliedstaats der verbrauchsteuerpflichtigen Waren dem zentralen Verbindungsbüro des Bestimmungsmitgliedstaats eine Informations- oder Warnmeldung übermitteln kann, sobald diesem Verbindungsbüro bzw. dieser Verbindungsstelle die BVD-Informationen vorliegen, spätestens aber beim Versand der Waren.
ref: 1. Member States shall introduce an electronic early warning system under which the central liaison office or a liaison department in the Member State of departure of the excisable products can send an information or warning message to the liaison office in the Member State of destination as soon as that liaison office or liaison department is in possession of the AAD information, and at the latest when the products are dispatched.
draft: The member states establish a computer-based early warning system through which the central liaison office or a liaison office of the departing member state of the excise goods can transmit information or warning messages to the central liaison office of the destination member state as soon as this liaison office or liaison point has the BVD information, but no later than the shipment of the goods.
hil: The Member States establish a computer-based early warning system, through which the central liaison office or a liaison point of the departing member state of the excise goods can transmit information or warning messages to the central liaison office of the destination member state as soon as this liaison office or liaison point has the BVD information, but no later than the shipment of the goods.
compare: The member states establish a computer-based early warning system through which the central liaison office or a liaison office of the departing member state of the excise goods can transmit information or warning messages to the central liaison office of the destination member state as soon as this liaison office or liaison point has the BVD information, but no later than the shipment of the goods.

src: "Transparenz" bedeutet, daß die Auskunftgebenden Anspruch auf Informationen über die Rechtsgrundlage, die Zwecke, für die die Daten angefordert werden, und die vorgesehenen Schutzmaßnahmen haben.
ref: 'transparency` shall mean the right of respondents to have information on the legal basis, the purposes for which the data are required and the protective measures adopted.
draft: "Transparency" means that those providing information have the right to information about the legal basis, the purposes for which the data is requested, and the intended protective measures.
hil: Transparency means that those providing information have the right to information about the legal basis, the purposes for which the data is requested, and the intended protective measures.
compare: "Transparency" means that those providing information have the right to information about the legal basis, the purposes for which the data is requested, and the intended protective measures.

src: Ebenso hat jeder Steuerpflichtige für die in Artikel 28b Teil B Absatz 1 genannten Lieferungen von Gegenständen und für unter den Bedingungen des Artikels 28c Teil A ausgeführte Lieferungen von Gegenständen eine Rechnung entweder selbst auszustellen oder dafür Sorge zu tragen, dass eine Rechnung von seinem Kunden oder in seinem Namen und für seine Rechnung von einem Dritten ausgestellt wird.
ref: Every taxable person shall also ensure that an invoice is issued, either by himself or by his customer or, in his name and on his behalf, by a third party, in respect of the supplies of goods referred to in Article 28b(B)(1) and in respect of goods supplied under the conditions laid down in Article 28c(A).
draft: Likewise, each taxpayer must either issue an invoice himself or ensure that an invoice is issued by his customer or on his behalf and for his account by a third party for the supplies of goods mentioned in Article 28b Section B Paragraph 1 and for supplies of goods made under the conditions of Article 28c Section A.
hil: Likewise, every liable person shall either issue an invoice himself or ensure that an invoice is issued by his customer or in his name and for his account by a third party for supplies of goods referred to in Article 28b, Part B, Paragraph 1, and supplies of goods made under the conditions of Article 28c, Part A.
compare: Likewise, each taxpayer must either issue an invoice himself or ensure that an invoice is issued by his customer or on his behalf and for his account by a third party for the supplies of goods mentioned in Article 28b Section B Paragraph 1 and for supplies of goods made under the conditions of Article 28c Section A.

src: (42) Nach der Unterrichtung über die vorläufigen Feststellungen unterrichteten die beiden ausführenden Hersteller Samyang Corporation und SK Chemicals Co. Ltd. die Kommission über ihren Beschluss, ihr Polyestergeschäft in dem Jointventure Huvis Corporation zusammenzuführen.

src: (4) Im Rahmen der Verwirklichung des Binnenmarkts sollte der Anwendungsbereich der Richtlinie 96/53/EG insofern auf den innerstaatlichen Verkehr ausgedehnt werden, als diese Richtlinie Merkmale regelt, die sich auf die Wettbewerbsbedingungen im Verkehrssektor, insbesondere auf die Werte für die höchstzulässige Länge und Breite von Fahrzeugen für die Personenbeförderung, erheblich auswirken.
ref: (4) In the implementation of the internal market, the scope of Directive 96/53/EC should be extended to national transport in so far as it concerns characteristics that significantly affect the conditions of competition in the transport sector and in particular the values relating to the maximum authorised length and width of vehicles intended for the carriage of passengers.
draft: As part of the implementation of the internal market, the scope of Directive 96/53/EC should be extended to domestic transport insofar as this directive regulates characteristics that have a significant impact on competition conditions in the transport sector, particularly on the values for the maximum length and width of vehicles for passenger transport.
hil: As part of the implementation of the internal market, the scope of Directive 96/53/EC should be extended to domestic transport insofar as this directive regulates characteristics that have a significant impact on competition conditions in the transport sector, particularly on the values for the maximum length and width of vehicles for passenger transport.
compare: As part of the implementation of the internal market, the scope of Directive 96/53/EC should be extended to domestic transport insofar as this directive regulates characteristics that have a significant impact on competition conditions in the transport sector, particularly on the values for the maximum length and width of vehicles for passenger transport.

src: Das EG-Prüfverfahren beruht auf den TSI. Diese TSI werden im Auftrag der Kommission von einem gemeinsamen Gremium ausgearbeitet, in dem die Infrastrukturbetreiber, die Eisenbahnunternehmen und die Industrie vertreten sind. Die Bezugnahme auf die TSI ist zwingend vorgeschrieben, um die Interoperabilität des transeuropäischen Hochgeschwindigkeitsbahnsystems sicherzustellen; diese TSI unterliegen Artikel 18 der Richtlinie 93/38/EWG.
ref: Whereas the EC verification procedure is based on TSIs; whereas those TSIs are drawn up to the order of the Commission by the joint body representing the infrastructure managers, the railway companies and the industry; whereas the reference to TSIs is required in order to ensure interoperability of the trans-European high-speed rail system and whereas those TSIs are subject to the provisions of Article 18 of Directive 93/38/EEC;
draft: The EC verification procedure is based on the TSI. These TSI are developed on behalf of the Commission by a joint committee in which the infrastructure operators, railway companies, and industry are represented. Referring to the TSI is mandatory in order to ensure the interoperability of the trans-European high-speed rail system; these TSI are subject to Article 18 of Directive 93/38/EEC.  TSI stands for Technical Specifications for Interoperability, EC stands for European Commission.
hil: The EC verification procedure is based on the TSI. These TSI are developed on behalf of the Commission by a joint committee in which the infrastructure operators, railway companies, and industry are represented. Referring to the TSI is mandatory in order to ensure the interoperability of the trans-European high-speed rail system; these TSI are subject to Article 18 of Directive 93/38/EEC.
compare: The EC verification procedure is based on the TSI. These TSI are developed on behalf of the Commission by a joint committee in which the infrastructure operators, railway companies, and industry are represented. Referring to the TSI is mandatory in order to ensure the interoperability of the trans-European high-speed rail system; these TSI are subject to Article 18 of Directive 93/38/EEC.  TSI stands for Technical Specifications for Interoperability, EC stands for European Commission.

src: (12) Die Rechte der Arbeitnehmer mit Ausnahme der Mitbestimmungsrechte sollten weiterhin den Vorschriften der Mitgliedstaaten unterliegen, die in der Richtlinie 98/59/EG des Rates vom 20. Juli 1998 über Massenentlassungen [4], der Richtlinie 2001/23/EG des Rates vom 12. März 2001 über die Wahrung von Ansprüchen der Arbeitnehmer beim Übergang von Unternehmen, Betrieben oder Unternehmens- oder Betriebsteilen [5], der Richtlinie 2002/14/EG des Europäischen Parlaments und des Rates vom 11. März 2002 zur Festlegung eines allgemeinen Rahmens für die Unterrichtung und Anhörung der Arbeitnehmer in der Europäischen Gemeinschaft [6] sowie der Richtlinie 94/45/EG des Rates vom 22. September 1994 über die Einsetzung eines Europäischen Betriebsrats oder die Schaffung eines Verfahrens zur Unterrichtung und Anhörung der Arbeitnehmer in gemeinschaftsweit operierenden Unternehmen und Unternehmensgruppen [7] genannt sind.
ref: (12) Employees’ rights other than rights of participation should remain subject to the national provisions referred to in Council Directive 98/59/EC of 20 July 1998 on collective redundancies [4], Council Directive 2001/23/EC of 12 March 2001 on the safeguarding of employees’ rights in the event of transfers of undertakings, businesses or parts of undertakings or businesses [5], Directive 2002/14/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 11 March 2002 establishing a general framework for informing and consulting employees in the European Community [6] and Council Directive 94/45/EC of 22 September 1994 on the establishment of a European Works Council or a procedure in Community-scale undertakings and Community-scale groups of undertakings for the purposes of informing and consulting employees [7].
draft: The rights of workers except for the right to participate should continue to be subject to the regulations of the Member States, which are mentioned in Directive 98/59/EC of the Council of 20 July 1998 on mass layoffs [4], Directive 2001/23/EC of the Council of 12 March 2001 on the safeguarding of employees' rights in the event of transfers of undertakings, businesses or parts of undertakings or businesses [5], Directive 2002/14/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 11 March 2002 establishing a general framework for informing and consulting employees in the European Community [6] and Directive 94/45/EC of the Council of 22 September 1994 on the establishment of a European Works Council or a procedure in Community-scale undertakings and Community-scale groups of undertakings for the purposes of informing and consulting employees [7].
hil: The rights of employees, with the exception of co-determination rights, should continue to be subject to the regulations of the Member States, which are mentioned in Council Directive 98/59/EC of 20 July 1998 on mass redundancies [4], Council Directive 2001/23/EC of 12 March 2001 on the safeguarding of employees' rights in the event of transfers of undertakings, businesses or parts of undertakings or businesses [5], European Parliament and Council Directive 2002/14/EC of 11 March 2002 establishing a general framework for informing and consulting employees in the European Community [6] and Council Directive 94/45/EC of 22 September 1994 on the establishment of a European Works Council or a procedure in Community-scale undertakings and Community-scale groups of undertakings for the purposes of informing and consulting employees [7].
compare: The rights of employees, with the exception of co-determination rights, should continue to be subject to the regulations of the Member States, which are mentioned in Council Directive 98/59/EC of 20 July 1998 on mass redundancies [4], Council Directive 2001/23/EC of 12 March 2001 on the safeguarding of employees' rights in the event of transfers of undertakings, businesses or parts of undertakings or businesses [5], European Parliament and Council Directive 2002/14/EC of 11 March 2002 establishing a general framework for informing and consulting employees in the European Community [6] and Council Directive 94/45/EC of 22 September 1994 on the establishment of a European Works Council or a procedure in Community-scale undertakings and Community-scale groups of undertakings for the purposes of informing and consulting employees [7].

src: (1) Im Rahmen der Richtlinie 2001/32/EG der Kommission vom 8. Mai 2001 zur Anerkennung pflanzengesundheitlich besonders gefährdeter Schutzgebiete innerhalb der Gemeinschaft und zur Aufhebung der Richtlinie 92/76/EWG(3), zuletzt geändert durch die Richtlinie 2002/29/EG(4), wurden bestimmte Gebiete Portugals als Schutzgebiete im Hinblick auf Gonipterus scutellatus Gyll anerkannt.
ref: (1) Under Commission Directive 2001/32/EC of 8 May 2001 recognising protected zones exposed to particular plant health risks in the Community and repealing Directive 92/76/EEC(3), as last amended by Directive 2002/29/EC(4), certain areas of Portugal are recognised as protected zones in respect of Gonipterus scutellatus Gyll.
draft: As part of Directive 2001/32/EC of the Commission of 8 May 2001 on the recognition of plant health protection areas particularly endangered within the Community and the repeal of Directive 92/76/EEC (3), last amended by Directive 2002/29/EC (4), certain areas of Portugal were recognized as protection areas with regard to Gonipterus scutellatus Gyll.
hil: Under the Directive 2001/32/EC of the Commission of 8 May 2001 on the recognition of plant health protection areas particularly endangered within the Community and the repeal of Directive 92/76/EEC(3), last amended by Directive 2002/29/EC(4), certain areas of Portugal have been recognized as protected areas with regard to Gonipterus scutellatus Gyll.

src: (1) Auf Anforderung des Amtes oder, wenn es das Ergebnis der technischen Prüfung zur Beurteilung der Sorte für ausreichend hält, übersendet das Prüfungsamt dem Amt einen Prüfungsbericht und im Falle, daß es die in den Artikeln 7, 8 und 9 festgelegten Voraussetzungen als erfuellt erachtet, eine Beschreibung der Sorte.
ref: 1. The Examination Office shall, at the request of the Office or if it deems the results of the technical examination to be adequate to evaluate the variety, send the Office an examination report, and, where it considers that the conditions laid down in Articles 7 to 9 are complied with, a description of the variety.
draft: On request of the authority, or if the result of the technical examination is considered sufficient for the assessment of the variety, the examination office shall send a test report to the authority and, if it considers the requirements laid down in Articles 7, 8 and 9 to have been met, a description of the variety.
hil: Upon request of the authority, or if the result of the technical examination is deemed sufficient to evaluate the variety, the examination office shall send a test report to the authority and, if it considers the requirements laid down in Articles 7, 8 and 9 to have been met, a description of the variety.
compare: On request of the authority, or if the result of the technical examination is considered sufficient for the assessment of the variety, the examination office shall send a test report to the authority and, if it considers the requirements laid down in Articles 7, 8 and 9 to have been met, a description of the variety.

src: (29) Bei dem vierten Modell entsprachen die Inlandsverkäufe über den Stückkosten weniger als 10 % der Verkäufe.

src: Es gelten die Bestimmungen über die besondere Verwendung des Artikels 82 der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 2913/92 des Rates(9) sowie die Artikel 291 bis 300 der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 2454/93 der Kommission(10).

src: Der Wortlaut der Entscheidung 2005/53/EG in isländischer und norwegischer Sprache, der in der EWR-Beilage des Amtsblatts der Europäischen Union veröffentlicht wird, ist verbindlich.
ref: The text of Decision 2005/53/EC in the Icelandic and Norwegian languages, to be published in the EEA Supplement to the Official Journal of the European Union, shall be authentic.
draft: The wording of decision 2005/53/EC in Icelandic and Norwegian, which will be published in the EEA supplement to the Official Journal of the European Union, is binding.

src: Die Mitgliedstaaten können mit ihren Maßnahmen über die in dieser Richtlinie festgelegten Mindeststandards hinausgehen und eine umfassendere Weiterverwendung gestatten.
ref: Member States' policies can go beyond the minimum standards established in this Directive, thus allowing for more extensive re-use.
draft: The Member States may go beyond the minimum standards set out in this Directive with their measures and allow for more comprehensive re-use.
hil: The Member States may exceed the minimum standards set out in this Directive with their measures and allow for a more comprehensive re-use.
compare: The Member States may exceed the minimum standards set out in this Directive with their measures and allow for a more comprehensive re-use.

src: (2) Es ist insbesondere vorausgesetzt, daß die Zollwertanmeldung nach Absatz 1 nur von einer Person abgegeben werden darf, die ihren Wohnsitz oder Geschäftssitz im Zollgebiet der Gemeinschaft hat und alle Tatsachen über die in der Zollwertanmeldung zu bestätigenden Umstände zur Verfügung hat.
ref: 2. It shall be a particular requirement that the value declaration prescribed in paragraph 1 shall be made only by a person who has his residence or place of business in the customs territory of the Community and is in possession of the relevant facts.
draft: (2) It is particularly stipulated that the customs value declaration according to paragraph 1 may only be submitted by a person who has their residence or place of business in the customs territory of the Community and has all the facts available regarding the circumstances to be confirmed in the customs value declaration.
hil: It is particularly assumed that the customs value declaration according to paragraph 1 may only be submitted by a person who has his or her residence or place of business in the customs territory of the Community and has all the facts available concerning the circumstances to be confirmed in the customs value declaration.
compare: (2) It is particularly stipulated that the customs value declaration according to paragraph 1 may only be submitted by a person who has their residence or place of business in the customs territory of the Community and has all the facts available regarding the circumstances to be confirmed in the customs value declaration.

src: Bis zu einer späteren Koordinierung müssen die Mitgliedstaaten die gesetzlichen Vorschriften der übrigen Mitgliedstaaten berücksichtigen, in denen der im ersten Unterabsatz genannte Grundsatz niedergelegt ist.
ref: Pending further coordination, the Member States shall take account of existing rules defining the principle stated in the first subparagraph under other Member States' legislation.
draft: Until further coordination, Member States must take into account the legal provisions of other Member States in which the principle referred to in the first subparagraph is laid down.

src: Die Mitgliedstaaten bestimmen die für die Ausstellung der in Artikel 8 Absatz 2 und in Artikel 9 sowie der in Artikel 10 Absatz 2 genannten Bescheinigungen zuständigen Behörden und Stellen.

src: (1) Das Gemeinschaftsprogramm gemäß Artikel 1 umfasst gezielte Aktionen, konzertierte Aktionen und flankierende Maßnahmen gemäß den Artikeln 5, 6 und 7.

src: (1) Liegt die Vorauszahlung über dem für die betreffende Ausfuhr oder für eine entsprechende Ausfuhr geschuldeten Betrag, so leitet die zuständige Behörde unverzüglich das Verfahren des Artikels 29 der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 2220/85 ein, damit der Ausführer den Unterschied zwischen diesen beiden Beträgen zuzüglich 10 % zahlt.
ref: 1. Where the amount paid in advance is higher than that actually payable on the exports or equivalent exports, the competent authority shall initiate without delay the procedure provided for in Article 29 of Regulation (EEC) No 2220/85 with a view to repayment by the exporter of the difference between those two sums, increased by 10 %.
draft: If the prepayment exceeds the amount owed for the export in question or for a corresponding export, the competent authority shall immediately initiate proceedings under Article 29 of Regulation (EEC) No 2220/85 so that the exporter pays the difference between these two amounts plus 10%.
hil: If the prepayment exceeds the amount owed for the respective export or a corresponding export, the competent authority shall immediately initiate the procedure referred to in Article 29 of Regulation (EEC) No 2220/85 so that the exporter pays the difference between these two amounts plus 10%.
compare: If the prepayment exceeds the amount owed for the respective export or a corresponding export, the competent authority shall immediately initiate the procedure referred to in Article 29 of Regulation (EEC) No 2220/85 so that the exporter pays the difference between these two amounts plus 10%.

src: Sie können zu diesem Zweck vorsehen, dass Kleinpackungen, die in ihrem Gebiet abgefuellt worden sind, amtlich oder unter amtlicher Überwachung verschlossen werden.

src: Mit dieser Verordnung wird die Europäische Stiftung für Berufsbildung (nachstehend Stiftung genannt) errichtet, die zur Weiterentwicklung der Berufsbildungssysteme der Länder Mittel- und Osteuropas beitragen soll, die der Rat in der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 3906/89 oder in späteren einschlägigen Rechtsakten als für eine Wirtschaftshilfe in Betracht kommend bezeichnet.
ref: This Regulation hereby establishes the European Training Foundation (hereinafter referred to as the Foundation) whose objective shall be to contribute to the development of the vocational training systems of the countries of Central and Eastern Europe designated as eligible for economic aid by the Council in Regulation (EEC) No 3906/89 or in any subsequent relevant legal act.
draft: With this regulation, the European Foundation for Vocational Training (hereinafter referred to as the Foundation) is established, which is intended to contribute to the development of vocational training systems in Central and Eastern European countries that are designated by the Council in Regulation (EEC) No 3906/89 or in subsequent relevant legal acts as eligible for economic assistance.
hil: With this regulation, the European Foundation for Vocational Training (hereinafter referred to as the Foundation) is established, which is intended to contribute to the development of vocational training systems in Central and Eastern European countries that are designated by the Council in Regulation (EEC) No 3906/89 or in subsequent relevant legal acts as eligible for economic assistance.
compare: With this regulation, the European Foundation for Vocational Training (hereinafter referred to as the Foundation) is established, which is intended to contribute to the development of vocational training systems in Central and Eastern European countries that are designated by the Council in Regulation (EEC) No 3906/89 or in subsequent relevant legal acts as eligible for economic assistance.

src: Diese Richtlinie ist eine Einzelrichtlinie mit Anforderungen an die elektromagnetische Störfestigkeit im Sinne des Artikels 2 Absatz 2 der Richtlinie 89/336/EWG.

src: (3) Nach Artikel 4 Absatz 2 Buchstabe a) der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 880/92 darf das Umweltzeichen nicht für Erzeugnisse vergeben werden, bei denen es sich um gefährliche Stoffe oder Zubereitungen im Sinne der Richtlinien 67/548/EWG des Rates(2), zuletzt geändert durch die Richtlinie 98/73/EG der Kommission(3), und 88/379/EWG des Rates(4), zuletzt geändert durch die Richtlinie 96/65/EWG der Kommission(5), handelt. Es darf aber für Erzeugnisse vergeben werden, die gefährliche Stoffe und Zubereitungen enthalten, sofern sie den Zielen des gemeinschaftlichen Systems zur Vergabe eines Umweltzeichens entsprechen.
ref: (3) Whereas Article 4(2)(a) of Regulation (EEC) No 880/92 states that an eco-label shall not be awarded to products which are substances or preparations classified as dangerous in accordance with Council Directive 67/548/EEC(2) as last ameded by Commission Directive 98/73/EC(3) and Council Directive 88/379/EEC(4), as last amended by Commission Directive 96/65/EC(5), but it may be awarded to products containing such substances or preparations in so far as they meet the objectives of the Community eco-label award scheme;
draft: After Article 4 (2) (a) of Regulation (EEC) No 880/92, the eco-label may not be awarded to products which are dangerous substances or preparations within the meaning of Council Directive 67/548/EEC(2), as amended most recently by Commission Directive 98/73/EC(3), and Directive 88/379/EEC of the Council(4), as amended most recently by Commission Directive 96/65/EC(5). However, it may be awarded to products containing dangerous substances and preparations if they meet the objectives of the Community eco-labelling scheme.
hil: According to Article 4 (2) (a) of Regulation (EEC) No 880/92, the eco-label may not be awarded to products which are dangerous substances or preparations within the meaning of Council Directive 67/548/EEC(2), as amended most recently by Commission Directive 98/73/EC(3), and Directive 88/379/EEC of the Council(4), as amended most recently by Commission Directive 96/65/EC(5). However, it may be awarded to products containing dangerous substances and preparations if they meet the objectives of the Community eco-labelling scheme.
compare: After Article 4 (2) (a) of Regulation (EEC) No 880/92, the eco-label may not be awarded to products which are dangerous substances or preparations within the meaning of Council Directive 67/548/EEC(2), as amended most recently by Commission Directive 98/73/EC(3), and Directive 88/379/EEC of the Council(4), as amended most recently by Commission Directive 96/65/EC(5). However, it may be awarded to products containing dangerous substances and preparations if they meet the objectives of the Community eco-labelling scheme.

src: (1) Anhang IX des Abkommens wurde durch das am 14. Oktober 2003 in Luxemburg unterzeichnete Übereinkommen über die Beteiligung der Tschechischen Republik, der Republik Estland, der Republik Zypern, der Republik Lettland, der Republik Litauen, der Republik Ungarn, der Republik Malta, der Republik Polen, der Republik Slowenien und der Slowakischen Republik am Europäischen Wirtschaftsraum [1] geändert.
ref: (1) Annex IX to the Agreement was amended by the Agreement on the participation of the Czech Republic, the Republic of Estonia, the Republic of Cyprus, the Republic of Hungary, the Republic of Latvia, the Republic of Lithuania, the Republic of Malta, the Republic of Poland, the Republic of Slovenia and the Slovak Republic in the European Economic Area signed on 14 October 2003 in Luxembourg [1].
draft: Appendix IX of the Agreement was amended by the Agreement on the Participation of the Czech Republic, the Republic of Estonia, the Republic of Cyprus, the Republic of Latvia, the Republic of Lithuania, the Republic of Hungary, the Republic of Malta, the Republic of Poland, the Republic of Slovenia and the Slovak Republic in the European Economic Area [1] signed on 14 October 2003 in Luxembourg.
hil: Appendix IX of the Agreement was amended by the Agreement on the Participation of the Czech Republic, the Republic of Estonia, the Republic of Cyprus, the Republic of Latvia, the Republic of Lithuania, the Republic of Hungary, the Republic of Malta, the Republic of Poland, the Republic of Slovenia and the Slovak Republic in the European Economic Area [1] signed on 14 October 2003 in Luxembourg.
compare: Appendix IX of the Agreement was amended by the Agreement on the Participation of the Czech Republic, the Republic of Estonia, the Republic of Cyprus, the Republic of Latvia, the Republic of Lithuania, the Republic of Hungary, the Republic of Malta, the Republic of Poland, the Republic of Slovenia and the Slovak Republic in the European Economic Area [1] signed on 14 October 2003 in Luxembourg.

src: In einer auf Grund des Artikels 1 erlassenen Verordnung kann bestimmt werden, daß sie mit rückwirkender Kraft für Vereinbarungen und aufeinander abgestimmte Verhaltensweisen gilt, für die am Tage des Inkrafttretens der Verordnung eine Erklärung mit rückwirkender Kraft nach Artikel 6 der Verordnung Nr. 17 hätte abgegeben werden können.
ref: A regulation pursuant to Article 1 may stipulate that it shall apply with retroactive effect to agreements and concerted practices to which, at the date of entry into force of that regulation, a decision issued with retroactive effect in pursuance of Article 6 of Regulation No 17 would have applied.
draft: In an ordinance issued pursuant to Article 1, it may be determined that it applies with retroactive effect to agreements and coordinated behaviors, for which a retroactive declaration in accordance with Article 6 of Regulation No 17 could have been made on the day the regulation came into force.
hil: In an ordinance issued pursuant to Article 1, it may be determined that it applies retroactively to agreements and concerted practices for which a retroactive declaration under Article 6 of Regulation No. 17 could have been made on the day of the regulation's entry into force.
compare: In an ordinance issued pursuant to Article 1, it may be determined that it applies with retroactive effect to agreements and coordinated behaviors, for which a retroactive declaration in accordance with Article 6 of Regulation No 17 could have been made on the day the regulation came into force.

src: Der wissenschaftliche und technische Fortschritt macht bestimmte Änderungen im Anhang der Richtlinie 79/117/EWG erforderlich .
ref: Whereas the development of scientific and technical knowledge makes necessary certain amendments to the Annex to Directive 79/117/EEC;
draft: The scientific and technological progress necessitates certain modifications to the appendix of Directive 79/117/EEC.
hil: In view of the scientific and technological progress, certain modifications are necessary in the Annex of Directive 79/117/EEC.
compare: In view of the scientific and technological progress, certain modifications are necessary in the Annex of Directive 79/117/EEC.

src: 5. zubereitete Erzeugnisse: Fischereierzeugnisse, die durch Arbeitsgänge wie Ausnehmen, Köpfen, Zerteilen, Filetieren, Zerkleinern usw. in ihrer anatomischen Beschaffenheit verändert wurden;
ref: 5. 'prepared products' means any fishery product which has undergone an operation affecting its anatomical wholeness, such as gutting, heading, slicing, filleting, chopping, etc.;
draft: 5. prepared products: Fishery products that have been changed in their anatomical structure by operations such as gutting, heading, dividing, filleting, mincing, etc.
hil: 5. prepared products: Fishery products that have been changed in their anatomical structure by operations such as gutting, heading, dividing, filleting, mincing, etc.
compare: 5. prepared products: Fishery products that have been changed in their anatomical structure by operations such as gutting, heading, dividing, filleting, mincing, etc.

src: (1) Beim Warenverkehr zwischen der Gemeinschaft in ihrer Zusammensetzung vom 31. Dezember 1985 und Spanien und Portugal sowie zwischen beiden Mitgliedstaaten gilt das Intrastat-System auch für Waren, für welche die Zölle und Abgaben mit gleicher Wirkung noch nicht vollständig beseitigt worden sind oder für die nach der Beitrittsakte noch andere Maßnahmen gelten.
ref: 1. In connection with trade between the Community as constituted on 31 December 1985 and Spain or Portugal, and between those two last-mentioned Member States, the Intrastat system shall also apply to goods still liable to certain customs duties and charges having equivalent effect or which remain subject to other measures laid down by the Act of Accession.
draft: For trade in goods between the Community in its composition as of 31 December 1985 and Spain and Portugal, as well as between the two Member States, the Intrastat system also applies to goods for which customs duties and charges with equivalent effect have not yet been completely eliminated or for which other measures apply following the Act of Accession.
hil: For trade in goods between the Community as constituted on 31 December 1985 and Spain and Portugal, as well as between the two member states, the Intrastat system also applies to goods for which customs duties and charges with equivalent effect have not yet been completely eliminated, or for which other measures apply following the Accession Treaty.
compare: For trade in goods between the Community in its composition as of 31 December 1985 and Spain and Portugal, as well as between the two Member States, the Intrastat system also applies to goods for which customs duties and charges with equivalent effect have not yet been completely eliminated or for which other measures apply following the Act of Accession.

src: ENTSCHEIDUNG DER KOMMISSION vom 26. Januar 1994 zur Festlegung der Tiergesundheitsbedingungen und tierärztlichen Beurkundung für die Einfuhr von Fleischerzeugnissen aus Bahrain und zur Änderung der Entscheidung 79/542/EWG des Rates sowie der Entscheidung 91/449/EWG der Kommission (Text von Bedeutung für den EWR) (94/59/EG)
ref: COMMISSION DECISION of 26 January 1994 concerning the animal health condition and veterinary certification for the importation of meat products from Bahrain and amending Council Decision 79/542/EEC and Commission Decision 91/449/EEC (Text with EEA relevance) (94/59/EC)
draft: COMMISSION DECISION of 26 January 1994 laying down the animal health conditions and veterinary certification for the import of meat products from Bahrain and amending Decision 79/542/EEC of the Council and Decision 91/449/EEC of the Commission (Text relevant for the EEA) (94/59/EC)
hil: COMMISSION DECISION of 26 January 1994 laying down the animal health conditions and veterinary certification for the import of meat products from Bahrain and amending Council Decision 79/542/EEC and Commission Decision 91/449/EEC (Text with EEA relevance) (94/59/EC)
compare: COMMISSION DECISION of 26 January 1994 laying down the animal health conditions and veterinary certification for the import of meat products from Bahrain and amending Decision 79/542/EEC of the Council and Decision 91/449/EEC of the Commission (Text relevant for the EEA) (94/59/EC)

src: Es sollte Ungarn daher gestattet werden, bestimmte Kategorien von Erzeugern von der Verpflichtung zur Destillation der bei der Weinbereitung anfallenden Nebenerzeugnisse zu befreien.
ref: Hungary should therefore be authorised to exempt certain categories of producers from the obligation to distil by-products of wine-making.
draft: Therefore, Hungary should be allowed to exempt certain categories of producers from the obligation to distill by-products generated during wine production.
hil: "Therefore, Hungary should be allowed to exempt certain categories of wine producing countries from the obligation to distill by-products generated during wine production."
compare: Therefore, Hungary should be allowed to exempt certain categories of producers from the obligation to distill by-products generated during wine production.

src: Jegliche vorgeschlagene Maßnahmen würden in einer Höhe festgesetzt, die weitere Einfuhren auch in der Zukunft ermöglichen würden, allerdings zu nicht gedumpten bzw. nicht schädigenden Preisen, je nachdem, ob die Dumping- oder die Schadensspanne niedriger ist.
ref: In fact, any measures to be proposed are to be set at a level which will enable the continuation of imports also in future, but at prices that are non-dumped or non-injurious, whichever is the lower.
draft: Any proposed measures would be set at a level that would allow for further imports in the future, but at non-dumped or non-injurious prices, depending on whether the dumping or injury margin is lower.
hil: Any proposed measures would be set at a level that would allow for further imports in the future, but at non-dumped or non-injurious prices, depending on whether the dumping or injury margin is lower.
compare: Any proposed measures would be set at a level that would allow for further imports in the future, but at non-dumped or non-injurious prices, depending on whether the dumping or injury margin is lower.

src: in Erwägung nachstehender Gründe : Die technischen Vorschriften , denen die Zugmaschinen nach den nationalen Rechtsvorschriften genügen müssen , betreffen unter anderem auch den Anschluß für die Beleuchtungs - und Lichtsignaleinrichtungen von Geräten , Maschinen oder Anhängern .
ref: Whereas the technical requirements with which tractors must comply pursuant to national laws relate, inter alia, to the power connection for lighting and light-signalling devices on tools, machinery or trailers;
draft: Considering the following reasons: The technical regulations which the tractive units have to comply with according to the national legal provisions, also concern, among other things, the connection for the lighting and light signal devices of devices, machines or trailers.
hil: Whereas, in view of the following reasons: The technical regulations, which tractive units must comply with according to national regulations, also concern, among other things, the connection for the lighting and light signal devices of devices, machines or trailers.
compare: Considering the following reasons: The technical regulations which the tractive units have to comply with according to the national legal provisions, also concern, among other things, the connection for the lighting and light signal devices of devices, machines or trailers.

src: Die mit diesen Nebenerzeugnissen erzielten Gewinne schwankten je nach Zeitraum erheblich und wurden in ihren Büchern separat als außerordentliche Erträge ausgewiesen.
ref: The profit on these by-products fluctuated substantially in time and was shown separately as extraordinary income in their accounts.
draft: The profits achieved with these by-products varied considerably depending on the period and were shown separately in their books as extraordinary income.
hil: The profits achieved with these by-products varied considerably depending on the period and were shown separately in their books as extraordinary income.
compare: The profits achieved with these by-products varied considerably depending on the period and were shown separately in their books as extraordinary income.

src: (5) Die Stellungnahme des Verbands schwedischer Unternehmen ist bei der Kommission fristgerecht [3] eingegangen und der schwedischen Regierung zugeleitet worden, um ihr Gelegenheit zur Äußerung zu bieten.
ref: (5) The comments from the Confederation of Swedish Enterprises were received in due time [3] and were forwarded by the Commission to the Swedish Government, which was given the opportunity to react.
draft: The statement of the Association of Swedish Enterprises has been received by the commission in due time and forwarded to the Swedish government to provide them with an opportunity for comment.

src: Damit die finanzielle und technische Zusammenarbeit effizient durchgeführt werden kann, ist es Aufgabe der Kommission, das Personal einzustellen und verwaltungsmässig zu betreuen, für das örtliche Personal Regeln der verwaltungsmässigen Betreuung festzulegen und Ausbildungsaktionen für die Angehörigen der Entwicklungsländer zu organisieren.
ref: Whereas, in order to ensure that the said financial and technical cooperation is implemented efficiently, the Commission has been called upon to recruit and administer such staff, lay down rules for the administration of local staff and organize training schemes for nationals of the developing countries;
draft: To ensure that financial and technical cooperation can be carried out efficiently, it is the responsibility of the Commission to recruit personnel, provide administrative support, establish rules for local personnel management, and organize training actions for the officials from developing countries.
hil: To ensure that financial and technical cooperation can be carried out efficiently, it is the Commission's task to recruit and administratively manage personnel, establish rules for the administrative management of local personnel, and organize training initiatives for officials from developing countries.
compare: To ensure that financial and technical cooperation can be carried out efficiently, it is the responsibility of the Commission to recruit personnel, provide administrative support, establish rules for local personnel management, and organize training actions for the officials from developing countries.

src: Dennoch wurde auf die nicht nachrangigen Forderungen in den Gruppen HAG 3 und PBS 3 vollständig verzichtet, während die nicht nachrangigen Gläubiger in den Gruppen HAG 2 und PBS 5 einen proportionalen Anteil der Zahlungen erhielten.
ref: Despite this fact, the non-lower-ranking claims within groups HAG 3 and PBS 3 were waived completely, while the non-lower-ranking creditors in groups HAG 2 and PBS 5 received a proportional share of payment.
draft: Nevertheless, there was a complete waiver of the non-subordinate claims in the HAG 3 and PBS 3 groups, while the non-subordinate creditors in the HAG 2 and PBS 5 groups received a proportional share of the payments.
hil: Nevertheless, non-subordinated claims in the HAG 3 and PBS 3 groups were completely waived, while non-subordinated creditors in the HAG 2 and PBS 5 groups received a proportional share of the payments.
compare: Nevertheless, there was a complete waiver of the non-subordinate claims in the HAG 3 and PBS 3 groups, while the non-subordinate creditors in the HAG 2 and PBS 5 groups received a proportional share of the payments.

src: 3. Im Falle des Rückkaufs der Anteile des ausgeschlossenen Mitglieds durch den FONDS wird deren Preis durch ihren Wert bestimmt, der sich aus den Büchern des FONDS zum Zeitpunkt des Erlöschens der Mitgliedschaft des Mitglieds des FONDS ergibt, wobei dieser Preis den Nennwert der betreffenden Anteile nicht übersteigen darf.
ref: 3. In the event of the shares of a member which has been expelled being repurchased by the FUND, their price shall be the value shown by the books of the FUND at the date on which membership of the FUND is terminated, although such price may not be greater than the nominal value of the shares in question.
draft: 3. In the event of the repurchase of the shares of the excluded member by the FUND, their price will be determined by their value, which arises from the books of the FUND at the time of the termination of the membership of the member of the FUND, whereby this price must not exceed the nominal value of the shares in question.
hil: 3. In the event of repurchase of the shares of the excluded member by the FUND, their price shall be determined by their value arising from the books of the FUND at the time of the termination of membership of the FUND member, not exceeding the nominal value of the respective shares.
compare: 3. In the event of the repurchase of the shares of the excluded member by the FUND, their price will be determined by their value, which arises from the books of the FUND at the time of the termination of the membership of the member of the FUND, whereby this price must not exceed the nominal value of the shares in question.

src: Dem Programm zufolge soll die Schuldenquote im Programmzeitraum um 12,4 Prozentpunkte auf 84,2 % des BIP im Jahr 2008 sinken.
ref: The programme projects the debt ratio to decline by 12.4 percentage points over the programme period to 84.2 % of GDP in 2008.
draft: According to the program, the debt ratio should decrease by 12.4 percentage points to 84.2% of GDP in 2008 during the program period.
hil: "According to the program, the debt ratio should decrease by 12.4 percentage points to 84.2% of GDP in 2008 during the program period."
compare: According to the program, the debt ratio should decrease by 12.4 percentage points to 84.2% of GDP in 2008 during the program period.

src: Für die Beobachtung der Preisentwicklung ist es erforderlich, diese Preise nach allgemeinen Regeln zu ermitteln. Bei den Weltmarktpreisen sind die Preise auf den Märkten der dritten Länder und in den Bestimmungsländern sowie die in den dritten Ländern festgestellten Erzeugerpreise und die Preise frei Grenze der Gemeinschaft zu berücksichtigen. Bei den Preisen in der Gemeinschaft empfiehlt es sich, sich auf die Preise auf den repräsentativen Märkten der Gemeinschaft und die Preise bei der Ausfuhr zu stützen.
ref: Whereas if price trends are to be noted prices must be determined in accordance with general principles ; whereas to this end prices on third country markets and in countries of destination, producer prices recorded in third countries and free-at-Community-frontier prices should be taken into account when prices on the world market are being determined ; whereas prices ruling on the representative markets of the Community and prices ruling on exportation should be used as a basis in determining Community prices;
draft: For the observation of price development, it is necessary to determine these prices according to general rules. In the case of world market prices, prices in third country markets and destination countries as well as producer prices determined in third countries and prices free of border in the community must be taken into account. When it comes to prices within the community, it is advisable to rely on prices in the representative markets of the community and prices for exports.
hil: In order to observe price development, it is necessary to determine these prices according to general rules. In the case of world market prices, prices in third-country markets and destination countries, as well as producer prices determined in third countries and prices free of border in the community, must be taken into account. For prices within the community, it is advisable to rely on prices in the representative markets of the community and export prices.
compare: In order to observe price development, it is necessary to determine these prices according to general rules. In the case of world market prices, prices in third-country markets and destination countries, as well as producer prices determined in third countries and prices free of border in the community, must be taken into account. For prices within the community, it is advisable to rely on prices in the representative markets of the community and export prices.

src: (1) Die finanzielle Gegenleistung gemäß Artikel 6 des Abkommens wird für den in Artikel 1 genannten Zeitraum auf 2340000 EUR festgesetzt.
ref: 1. For the period referred to in Article 1, the financial contribution referred to in Article 6 of the Agreement shall be EUR 2340000.
draft: The financial compensation according to Article 6 of the Agreement is set at EUR 2,340,000 for the period mentioned in Article 1.
hil: The financial compensation according to Article 6 of the Agreement for the period mentioned in Article 1 is fixed at EUR 2,340,000.
compare: The financial compensation according to Article 6 of the Agreement is set at EUR 2,340,000 for the period mentioned in Article 1.

src: Die alten geregelten Verbindlichkeiten für abgebrannte Brennelemente bezögen sich auf AGR-Brennelemente, die vor dem Termin der tatsächlichen Umstrukturierung in Reaktoren geladen wurden.
ref: The United Kingdom submits that contracted historic spent fuel liabilities relate to AGR fuel loaded into reactors prior to the restructuring effective date.
draft: The old regulated obligations for spent fuel elements referred to AGR fuel elements that were loaded in reactors before the actual restructuring date.
hil: The old regulated obligations for spent fuel elements referred to AGR fuel elements loaded in reactors prior to the date of actual restructuring.
compare: The old regulated obligations for spent fuel elements referred to AGR fuel elements loaded in reactors prior to the date of actual restructuring.

src: Es sollte weder Einschränkungen hinsichtlich der technischen Mittel geben, mit denen dieser Anschluss vorgenommen wird, so dass sowohl leitungsgebundene als auch drahtlose Technologien zulässig sind, noch sollte es Einschränkungen dabei geben, welche Unternehmen alle Universaldienstverpflichtungen oder einen Teil davon erbringen.
ref: There should be no constraints on the technical means by which the connection is provided, allowing for wired or wireless technologies, nor any constraints on which operators provide part or all of universal service obligations.
draft: There should be no restrictions on the technical means by which this connection is made, so that both wired and wireless technologies are permitted, nor should there be any restrictions on which companies provide all or part of the universal service obligations.
hil: There should be no restrictions on the technical means by which this connection is made, allowing both wired and wireless technologies to be used, nor should there be any restrictions on which companies provide all or part of the universal service obligations.
compare: There should be no restrictions on the technical means by which this connection is made, so that both wired and wireless technologies are permitted, nor should there be any restrictions on which companies provide all or part of the universal service obligations.
