src: Im Hinblick auf das Ziel der Vertragsparteien, ihre Sicherheit in allen ihren Formen zu stärken, findet dieses Abkommen Anwendung auf als Verschlusssachen eingestufte Informationen bzw. als Verschlusssache eingestuftes Material jedweder Form, die (das) von den Vertragsparteien bereitgestellt oder zwischen den Vertragsparteien ausgetauscht werden (wird).
ref: In order to fulfill the objectives of strengthening the security of each of the Parties in all ways, this Agreement applies to classified information or material in any form either provided or exchanged between the Parties.
draft: With regard to the objective of the contracting parties to strengthen their security in all its forms, this agreement applies to classified information or classified material of any form provided by or exchanged between the contracting parties.
hil: With regard to the objective of the contracting parties to strengthen their security in all its forms, this agreement applies to classified information or classified material of any form provided by or exchanged between the contracting parties.
compare: With regard to the objective of the contracting parties to strengthen their security in all its forms, this agreement applies to classified information or classified material of any form provided by or exchanged between the contracting parties.

src: c) Die Kommission befaßt den Ständigen Ausschuß für Pflanzenschutz umgehend mit der Angelegenheit und unterbreitet ihm nach Möglichkeit einen Vorschlag für die Festlegung eines vorübergehend geltenden Rückstandshöchstwertes in Anhang II; diese Festlegung erfolgt nach dem Verfahren des Artikels 7.
ref: (c) the Commission shall immediately refer the matter to the Standing Committee on Plant Health and, if possible, submit a proposal aimed at establishing in Annex II a temporary maximum residue level, which shall be adopted in accordance with the procedure laid down in Article 7.
draft: c) The Commission immediately informs the Standing Committee on Plant Health of the matter and submits to it, where possible, a proposal for the fixing of a temporary maximum residue limit in Annex II; this fix shall be adopted in accordance with the procedure laid down in Article 7.
hil: c) The Commission shall immediately inform the Standing Committee on Plant Protection of the matter and submit to it a proposal, where possible, for the establishment of a temporary maximum residue limit applicable in Annex II; that establishment shall be carried out according to Article 7 procedure.
compare: c) The Commission immediately informs the Standing Committee on Plant Health of the matter and submits to it, where possible, a proposal for the fixing of a temporary maximum residue limit in Annex II; this fix shall be adopted in accordance with the procedure laid down in Article 7.

src: (3) Aufgrund der Ausnahmeregelung dürften bis zum Inkrafttreten des am 25. November 2004 unterzeichneten Freihandelsabkommens zwischen Tunesien und der Türkei und bis zur Änderung des Protokolls im Hinblick auf die Paneuropa-Mittelmeer-Kumulierung, Gewebe mit Ursprung in der Türkei zur Herstellung von zur Ausfuhr in die Europäische Union bestimmten Kleidungsstücken mit Ursprung in Tunesien verwendet werden.
ref: (3) Pending the entry into force of the Tunisia-Turkey Free Trade Agreement signed on 25 November 2004 and pending the amendment of the abovementioned Protocol for the purpose of Pan-Euro-Mediterranean cumulation, the derogation would allow the manufacture in Tunisia of originating garments from fabrics originating in Turkey for export to the European Union.
draft: Due to the exception regulation, until the entry into force of the free trade agreement signed between Tunisia and Turkey on November 25, 2004 and until the amendment of the protocol regarding Pan-Euro-Mediterranean cumulation, fabrics originating from Turkey may be used for the production of clothing originating from Tunisia intended for export to the European Union.
hil: According to the exception regulation, fabrics originating from Turkey could be used for the production of clothing originating from Tunisia intended for export to the European Union until the entry into force of the free trade agreement signed between Tunisia and Turkey on November 25, 2004 and until the amendment of the protocol regarding Pan-Euro-Mediterranean cumulation.
compare: Due to the exception regulation, until the entry into force of the free trade agreement signed between Tunisia and Turkey on November 25, 2004 and until the amendment of the protocol regarding Pan-Euro-Mediterranean cumulation, fabrics originating from Turkey may be used for the production of clothing originating from Tunisia intended for export to the European Union.

src: Die Menge von Destillationserzeugnissen, für die der Brenner im Laufe eines Weinwirtschaftsjahres einen Vertrag abschließen kann, ist auf die Menge begrenzt, die von diesem Brenner im Rahmen der Destillation gemäß diesem Kapitel im selben Wirtschaftsjahr oder während eines der beiden vorangegangenen Wirtschaftsjahre gewonnen wurde.
ref: The quantity of alcohol for which a distiller may conclude storage contracts during a given wine year may not exceed the quantity of products obtained by that distiller by distillation under this chapter during that wine year or one of the two years preceding it.
draft: The amount of distillation products for which the distiller can enter into a contract during a wine business year is limited to the amount that has been obtained by this distiller during distillation according to this chapter in the same business year or during either of the two preceding business years.
hil: The amount of distillation products for which the distiller can enter into a contract during a wine business year is limited to the amount that has been obtained by this distiller during destillation according to this chapter in the same business year or during either of the two preceding business years.
compare: The amount of distillation products for which the distiller can enter into a contract during a wine business year is limited to the amount that has been obtained by this distiller during distillation according to this chapter in the same business year or during either of the two preceding business years.

src: Unter Vorprobe ist eine für Analysezwecke geeignete Teilprobe aus den Laboratoriumssammelproben zu verstehen, die ihrerseits aus einer Lieferung des zu prüfenden Gutes entnommen worden ist.
ref: 'Test sample` means a sample of a suitable size for analysis, taken from laboratory bulk samples in turn taken from a batch of articles for analysis.
draft: Under preliminary test, a subsample suitable for analysis purposes is to be understood from the laboratory collection samples, which in turn has been taken from a delivery of the goods to be tested.
hil: For analysis purposes, a suitable sub-sample from the laboratory collection samples, which in turn has been taken from a delivery of the goods to be tested, is to be understood as a preliminary sample.
compare: Under preliminary test, a subsample suitable for analysis purposes is to be understood from the laboratory collection samples, which in turn has been taken from a delivery of the goods to be tested.

src: (3) Die Mitgliedstaaten teilen der Kommission in einem Jahresbericht ihre Kontrolltätigkeit, die Ergebnisse ihrer Kontrollen sowie die allgemeinen Angaben und die Grundsatzfragen mit, die die wichtigsten Probleme betreffen, die insbesondere durch strittige Fälle bei der Anwendung dieser Verordnung aufgeworfen werden.
ref: 3. Member States shall inform the Commission, by means of annual reports, of the details and results of their inspections and of the overall data and questions of principle concerning the most important problems arising out of the application of this Regulation and, in particular, matters in dispute.
draft: (3) Member States shall, on an annual basis, inform the Commission of their control activities, the results of those controls, and the general information and fundamental questions that relate to the main problems raised by contentious cases that arise in the application of this regulation.
hil: Member States shall inform the Commission of their control activities, the results of those controls, and the general information and fundamental questions that relate to the main problems raised by contentious cases that arise in the application of this regulation, in an annual report.

src: Darüber hinaus wurde festgestellt, dass die Einfuhrmengen aus der Ukraine in die EU-10 seit der Erweiterung rückläufig sind, wobei wie unter Randnummer (30) der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 991/2004 festgehalten insbesondere vor der Erweiterung Ende 2003 und Anfang 2004 ein ungewöhnlich hoher Zuwachs der Ausfuhren aus der Ukraine in die EU-10 zu beobachten war.
ref: In addition, it was noted that import volumes from Ukraine into the EU-10 had declined since enlargement, however, as indicated in recital (30) of Regulation (EC) No 991/2004, abnormal increases were found in import volumes prior to enlargement in 2003 and the first months of 2004.
draft: In addition, it was found that import volumes from Ukraine to the EU-10 have been declining since the enlargement, whereas, as stated in recital (30) of Regulation (EC) No 991/2004, particularly before the enlargement at the end of 2003 and the beginning of 2004, an unusually high increase in exports from Ukraine to the EU-10 was observed.
hil: In addition, it has been found that import volumes from Ukraine to the EU-10 have been declining since the enlargement, whereas an unusually high increase in exports from Ukraine to the EU-10 was observed particularly before the enlargement at the end of 2003 and the beginning of 2004, as stated in recital (30) of Regulation (EC) No 991/2004.
compare: In addition, it was found that import volumes from Ukraine to the EU-10 have been declining since the enlargement, whereas, as stated in recital (30) of Regulation (EC) No 991/2004, particularly before the enlargement at the end of 2003 and the beginning of 2004, an unusually high increase in exports from Ukraine to the EU-10 was observed.

src: (8) Zur Erhöhung der Sicherheit und zur Vermeidung von Wettbewerbsverzerrungen muß das Ziel darin bestehen, die Sicherheitsbestimmungen dieser Richtlinie auf alle Fischereifahrzeuge von 24 Meter Länge und mehr anzuwenden, die in den Fischereizonen der Gemeinschaft im Einsatz sind, und zwar unabhängig davon, welche Flagge sie führen. Dieses Ziel muß für Fischereifahrzeuge unter der Flagge eines Drittstaates, die in den inneren Gewässern oder dem Küstenmeer eines Mitgliedstaates im Einsatz sind oder ihren Fang in einem Hafen eines Mitgliedstaates anlanden, nach den allgemeinen Regeln des Völkerrechts erreicht werden.
ref: (8) Whereas, in order to enhance safety and to avoid distortions of competition, the aim must be pursued of applying the safety rules of this Directive to all fishing vessels of 24 metres in length and over, operating in the fishing zones of the Community, irrespective of the flag they fly; whereas this must be achieved, for fishing vessels flying the flag of third States operating in the internal waters or territorial sea of a Member State or landing their catch in a port of a Member State, in accordance with the general rules of international law;
draft: To increase security and avoid distortions of competition, the objective must be to apply the safety rules of this directive to all fishing vessels of 24 meters or more in length that are operating in the fishing zones of the Community, regardless of the flag they fly. For fishing vessels sailing under the flag of a third country that are operating in the internal waters or territorial seas of a Member State or landing their catch in a port of a Member State, this objective must be achieved in accordance with the general rules of international law.
hil: In order to increase safety and prevent distortions of competition, the objective must be to enforce the safety regulations of this directive for all fishing vessels with a length of 24 meters or more operating in the fishing zones of the Community, regardless of their flag. This objective must be achieved under the general rules of international law for fishing vessels flying the flag of a third country that are operating in the internal waters or territorial seas of a Member State or landing their catch in a port of a Member State.
compare: To increase security and avoid distortions of competition, the objective must be to apply the safety rules of this directive to all fishing vessels of 24 meters or more in length that are operating in the fishing zones of the Community, regardless of the flag they fly. For fishing vessels sailing under the flag of a third country that are operating in the internal waters or territorial seas of a Member State or landing their catch in a port of a Member State, this objective must be achieved in accordance with the general rules of international law.

src: In begründeten Fällen können Mitgliedstaaten Schätzungen vorlegen, vorausgesetzt, die richtigen Daten werden spätestens mit den Angaben für das nachfolgende Jahr unterbreitet.

ref: 2 . THE RELIEF REFERRED TO IN PARAGRAPH 1 SHALL APPLY TO SPARE PARTS , COMPONENTS OR ACCESSORIES SPECIFICALLY FOR THE ARTICLES IN QUESTION , AND TO THE TOOLS TO BE USED FOR THE MAINTENANCE , CHECKING , CALIBRATION OR REPAIR OF THE SAID ARTICLES PROVIDED THAT SUCH SPARE PARTS , COMPONENTS , ACCESSORIES OR TOOLS ARE IMPORTED AT THE SAME TIME AS THE SAID ARTICLES , OR , IF IMPORTED SUBSEQUENTLY , THAT THEY CAN BE IDENTIFIED AS BEING INTENDED FOR ARTICLES PREVIOUSLY ADMITTED DUTY-FREE , OR WHICH WOULD BE ENTITLED TO RELIEF AT THE TIME WHEN SUCH RELIEF IS REQUESTED FOR THE SPECIFIC SPARE PARTS , COMPONENTS OR ACCESSORIES AND TOOLS IN QUESTION .
draft: (2) The exemption from fees mentioned in paragraph 1 applies to spare parts, components, or specific accessories of the respective objects as well as to tools for maintenance, inspection, calibration, or repair of these objects, provided that these spare parts, components, accessories, or tools are imported at the same time as these objects or that it is recognizable in the case of later importation that they are intended for objects that have been imported free of duty at an earlier point in time or that can be imported duty-free at the time at which the exemption from fees for spare parts, components, specific accessories, or tools is requested.
hil: (2) The exemption from fees mentioned in paragraph 1 applies to spare parts, components or specific accessories of the respective items, as well as to tools for maintenance, inspection, calibration or repair of these items, provided that these spare parts, components, accessories or tools are imported at the same time as these items or that it is recognizable in the case of later importation that they are intended for items that have been previously imported free of duty or that can be imported duty-free at the time when the exemption from fees for spare parts, components, specific accessories or tools is requested.
compare: (2) The exemption from fees mentioned in paragraph 1 applies to spare parts, components, or specific accessories of the respective objects as well as to tools for maintenance, inspection, calibration, or repair of these objects, provided that these spare parts, components, accessories, or tools are imported at the same time as these objects or that it is recognizable in the case of later importation that they are intended for objects that have been imported free of duty at an earlier point in time or that can be imported duty-free at the time at which the exemption from fees for spare parts, components, specific accessories, or tools is requested.

src: Im Rahmen dieses Verfahrens müssen gegebenenfalls Unterlagen, die die Notwendigkeit häufiger Reisen hinreichend belegen, vorgesehen werden; hierbei handelt es sich vor allem um Unterlagen, aus denen familiäre Verbindungen oder soziale, wirtschaftliche oder sonstige Gründe hervorgehen.
ref: This procedure shall provide for the submission when appropriate of documentation demonstrating the need for frequent travel, in particular documents concerning family links or social, economic or other motives.

src: Die Mitgliedstaaten sollten es der Kommission durch Bereitstellung der notwendigen Informationen ermöglichen, gegebenenfalls nach ihrem Ermessen die Anhänge zu ändern. Diese Änderungen sollten nach dem in dieser Entscheidung festgelegten Verfahren erfolgen, um eine enge Zusammenarbeit zwischen den Mitgliedstaaten und der Kommission innerhalb des Ständigen Futtermittelausschusses zu bewirken -
ref: Whereas Member States should enable the Commission, by providing the necessary information, to amend the Annexes when it sees fit; whereas such amendments should be made using the procedure laid down by this Decision in order to establish close cooperation between Member States and the Commission within the Standing Committee on Feedingstuffs,
draft: The Member States should enable the Commission to amend the annexes, if necessary at its discretion, by providing the necessary information. These changes should be made in accordance with the procedure set out in this Decision in order to achieve close cooperation between the Member States and the Commission within the Standing Committee on Animal Nutrition.
hil: The Member States should enable the Commission to change the annexes, if necessary at their discretion, by providing the necessary information. These amendments should be carried out in accordance with the procedure set out in this decision to achieve close cooperation between the Member States and the Commission within the Standing Committee on Animal Nutrition.
compare: The Member States should enable the Commission to amend the annexes, if necessary at its discretion, by providing the necessary information. These changes should be made in accordance with the procedure set out in this Decision in order to achieve close cooperation between the Member States and the Commission within the Standing Committee on Animal Nutrition.

src: (1) Zur Überprüfung der Übereinstimmung mit den Bestimmungen zur guten klinischen Praxis und zur guten Herstellungspraxis benennen die Mitgliedstaaten Inspektoren, die die Aufgabe haben, in den an einer klinischen Prüfung beteiligten Stellen, insbesondere in der Prüfstelle bzw. den Prüfstellen, am Herstellungsort des Prüfpräparats, in allen an der Prüfung beteiligten Laboratorien und/oder in den Einrichtungen des Sponsors, Inspektionen durchzuführen.
ref: 1. To verify compliance with the provisions on good clinical and manufacturing practice, Member States shall appoint inspectors to inspect the sites concerned by any clinical trial conducted, particularly the trial site or sites, the manufacturing site of the investigational medicinal product, any laboratory used for analyses in the clinical trial and/or the sponsor's premises.
draft: To verify compliance with the provisions on good clinical practice and good manufacturing practice, Member States appoint inspectors who are responsible for conducting inspections at the sites involved in a clinical trial, in particular at the trial site(s), at the place of manufacture of the investigational medicinal product, at all laboratories involved in the trial and/or at the sponsor's facilities.
hil: Member States appoint inspectors to verify compliance with the provisions on good clinical practice and good manufacturing practice. The inspectors are responsible for conducting inspections at the sites involved in a clinical trial, in particular at the trial site(s), at the place of manufacture of the investigational medicinal product, at all laboratories involved in the trial, and/or at the sponsor's facilities.
compare: To verify compliance with the provisions on good clinical practice and good manufacturing practice, Member States appoint inspectors who are responsible for conducting inspections at the sites involved in a clinical trial, in particular at the trial site(s), at the place of manufacture of the investigational medicinal product, at all laboratories involved in the trial and/or at the sponsor's facilities.

src: (1) Die in Anhang A.1 aufgeführte Ausrüstung, die den einschlägigen internationalen Instrumenten entspricht und nach den Konformitätsbewertungsverfahren hergestellt wurde, muß mit der Kennzeichnung versehen sein, die der Hersteller oder sein in der Gemeinschaft ansässiger Bevollmächtigter angebracht hat.

src: Die zunehmenden Probleme im Zusammenhang mit der Überlastung des Straßen- und Schienennetzes, der Sicherheit im Verkehr, der Umwelt, dem Einsparen von Energie und der Lebensqualität des Bürgers erfordern im Interesse der Allgemeinheit einen forcierteren Ausbau und eine bessere Nutzung des Potentials der Binnenschiffahrt, indem insbesondere deren Wettbewerbsfähigkeit verbessert wird.
ref: Whereas the growing problems of road and rail saturation, transport safety, environment, energy saving and quality of life of the citizen call, in the public interest, for greater development and better use of the transport potential offered by inland waterway, in particular by improving its competitiveness;
draft: The increasing problems associated with the overload of road and rail networks, traffic safety, the environment, energy saving and the citizens' quality of life require, in the interest of the general public, a more accelerated expansion and a better utilization of the potential of inland navigation, especially by improving its competitiveness.

compare: The increasing problems associated with the overload of road and rail networks, traffic safety, the environment, energy saving and the citizens' quality of life require, in the interest of the general public, a more accelerated expansion and a better utilization of the potential of inland navigation, especially by improving its competitiveness.

src: In Anbetracht der Art der von dieser Koordinierung betroffenen Sektoren sollte diese unter Wahrung der Anwendung der genannten Grundsätze einen Rahmen für faire Handelspraktiken schaffen und ein Hoechstmaß an Flexibilität ermöglichen.
ref: In view of the nature of the sectors affected by such coordination, the latter should, while safeguarding the application of those principles, establish a framework for sound commercial practice and should allow maximum flexibility.
draft: Given the nature of the sectors affected by this coordination, it should establish a framework for fair trade practices while maintaining the application of the principles mentioned and allowing for a high degree of flexibility.
hil: Taking into account the nature of the sectors affected by this coordination, it should establish a framework for fair trading practices while maintaining the application of the mentioned principles and allowing for maximum flexibility.
compare: Given the nature of the sectors affected by this coordination, it should establish a framework for fair trade practices while maintaining the application of the principles mentioned and allowing for a high degree of flexibility.

src: Ausserdem verpflichten sich die vorgenannten Mitgliedstaaten bzw. Gebiete, die Bedingungen von Anhang A Kapitel 1 Abschnitt II Nummer 2 zu erfuellen. Somit sind diese Mitgliedstaaten und Gebiete als amtlich frei von Brucellose (Br. melitensis) anzuerkennen.

src: (1) Die Kommission kann auf Antrag eines Mitgliedstaats oder von sich aus beschließen, auf Erzeugnisse mit Ursprung in Libanon die Schutzmaßnahmen zu treffen, deren Anwendung sich die Europäische Wirtschaftsgemeinschaft in Artikel 12 des Abkommens vorbehalten hat ; insbesondere können die Libanon von der Gemeinschaft gewährten zollmässigen und sonstigen Zugeständnisse vorübergehend ganz oder teilweise zurückgezogen werden.
ref: 1. The Commission may, at the request of a Member State or on its own initiative, decide to apply to products originating in the Lebanon the protective measures which the European Economic Community reserves the right to take in Article 12 of the Agreement, including the temporary, total or partial withdrawal of tariff or other concessions granted by the Community to the Lebanese Republic.
draft: The Commission may, at the request of a Member State or on its own initiative, decide to take protective measures against products originating in Lebanon, the application of which the European Economic Community has reserved for itself under Article 12 of the Agreement; in particular, the customs and other concessions granted by the Community to Lebanon may be temporarily withdrawn in whole or in part.
hil: The Commission may, at the request of a Member State or on its own initiative, decide to take protective measures against products originating in Lebanon, the application of which the European Economic Community has reserved for itself under Article 12 of the Agreement; in particular, the customs and other concessions granted by the Community to Lebanon may be temporarily withdrawn in whole or in part.
compare: The Commission may, at the request of a Member State or on its own initiative, decide to take protective measures against products originating in Lebanon, the application of which the European Economic Community has reserved for itself under Article 12 of the Agreement; in particular, the customs and other concessions granted by the Community to Lebanon may be temporarily withdrawn in whole or in part.

src: (7) Nach Diskussionen im Ständigen Ausschuss für Pflanzenschutz hat die Kommission in Übereinstimmung mit dem Ausschuss festgelegt, welche zusätzlichen Datenanforderungen zumindest erforderlich sind, um zu bestimmen, ob die in Erwägungsgrund 4 genannten Wirkstoffe die Anforderungen von Artikel 5 der Richtlinie 91/414/EWG erfuellen.

src: (279) Die Untersuchung ergab, dass die PSF-Industrie der Gemeinschaft im UZ 70 % aus PET-Flaschen wiederverwertete Stoffe verwendete und somit bei weitem der wichtigste Verwender solcher Verpackungsabfälle ist [12].

hil: According to the investigation, the PSF industry in the Community used 70% of recycled PET bottles in the reference period and is therefore by far the most important user of such packaging waste [12].
compare: The investigation revealed that in the EU, 70% of recycled PET bottles were used in the PSF industry, making it by far the most important user of such packaging waste [12].

src: Stellt ein Drittstaatsangehöriger einen Asylantrag im internationalen Transitbereich eines Flughafens eines Mitgliedstaats, so ist dieser Mitgliedstaat für die Prüfung des Asylantrags zuständig.
ref: Where the application for asylum is made in an international transit area of an airport of a Member State by a third-country national, that Member State shall be responsible for examining the application.
draft: If a third-country national submits an asylum application in the international transit area of an airport in a Member State, that Member State is responsible for examining the asylum application.
hil: If a third-country national submits an asylum application in the international transit area of an airport in a Member State, that Member State is responsible for examining the asylum application.

src: Barsicherheit in diesem Sinne ist nur ein auf einem Konto gutgeschriebener Betrag oder eine vergleichbare Geldforderung (beispielsweise Geldmarkt-Sichteinlagen), wodurch Bargeld ausdrücklich ausgeschlossen wird.
ref: Cash refers only to money which is represented by a credit to an account, or similar claims on repayment of money (such as money market deposits), thus explicitly excluding banknotes.
draft: Bar security in this sense is only an amount credited to an account or a comparable monetary claim (for example, money market sight deposits), whereby cash is explicitly excluded.
hil: Cash safety, in this sense, only refers to an amount credited to an account, or a comparable monetary claim (such as money market sight deposits), with cash expressly excluded.
compare: Bar security in this sense is only an amount credited to an account or a comparable monetary claim (for example, money market sight deposits), whereby cash is explicitly excluded.

src: Im letzten Jahr der Durchführung eines Programms führt eine von dem Mitgliedstaat nach Zustimmung der Kommission ausgewählte unabhängige Stelle eine externe Bewertung der geplanten und genehmigten Maßnahmen durch.
ref: During the final year of a programme, an external evaluation of the planned and approved measures shall be carried out by an independent body selected by the Member State with the approval of the Commission.
draft: In the last year of implementing a program, an independent body selected by the member state with the approval of the Commission carries out an external evaluation of the planned and approved measures.
hil: Whereas, in the last year of implementing a program, an independent body selected by the member state with the agreement of the Commission carries out an external evaluation of the planned and approved measures.
compare: In the last year of implementing a program, an independent body selected by the member state with the approval of the Commission carries out an external evaluation of the planned and approved measures.

src: Die anzuwendende Kürzung wird von der Kommission nach dem Verfahren des Artikels 17 in einer Höhe festgesetzt, die gewährleistet, daß die in landwirtschaftlichen Ecu ausgedrückten getätigten Ausgaben nicht über denjenigen Ausgaben liegen, die getätigt worden wären, wenn die betreffende GHM nicht überschritten worden wäre.
ref: The reduction to be applied shall be set by the Commission in accordance with the procedure laid down in Article 17 and shall be such as to ensure that expenditure expressed in agricultural ecu does not exceed that what would have been attained if the relevant MGQ had not been exceeded.

hil: The applicable reduction shall be determined by the Commission, in accordance with the procedure set out in Article 17, at a level which ensures that the expenditure incurred expressed in agricultural ECU does not exceed the expenditure that would have been incurred if the relevant MMG had not been exceeded.

src: Die KR behauptete ferner, die EXIM-FIC seien nicht spezifisch, da sie von vielen unterschiedlichen Wirtschaftszweigen in Anspruch genommen werden könnten und das Kriterium der Auslandsinvestitionen im Sinne des Artikels 2 Absatz 1 Buchstabe b) des ÜSAM objektiv und neutral sei.
ref: The GOK also states that, because EXIM-FIC is available to a wide variety of industries and since the criterion of foreign investment is objective and neutral within the meaning of Article 2(1)(b) of the ASCM, EXIM-FIC is not specific.

src: (5) Die Tatsache, daß ein erheblicher Anteil am Kapital einer Gesellschaft erworben wird, stellt für sich allein noch keine im Sinne dieser Richtlinie zu berücksichtigende Beteiligung dar, wenn der Erwerb lediglich als zeitweilige Kapitalanlage erfolgt, die keine Einflußnahme auf die Struktur und die Finanzpolitik des Unternehmens gestattet.
ref: (5) Whereas the sole fact of having acquired a significant proportion of a company's capital does not constitute participation for the purposes of this Directive if that holding has been acquired solely as a temporary investment which does not make it possible to exercise influence over the structure or financial policy of the undertaking;
draft: The fact that a significant share of the capital of a company is acquired does not in itself constitute a participation to be taken into account within the meaning of this Directive, if the acquisition is merely a temporary investment that does not allow any influence on the structure and financial policy of the company.
hil: The acquisition of a significant share in the capital of a company alone does not constitute a participation to be taken into account in the sense of this Directive, if the acquisition is only made as a temporary investment, which does not allow any influence on the structure and financial policy of the company.
compare: The acquisition of a significant share in the capital of a company alone does not constitute a participation to be taken into account in the sense of this Directive, if the acquisition is only made as a temporary investment, which does not allow any influence on the structure and financial policy of the company.

src: (2) Zu den Maßnahmen im Bereich der Friedenskonsolidierung und der Konfliktprävention und -beilegung gehören vor allem die Unterstützung der ausgewogenen Verteilung der politischen, wirtschaftlichen, sozialen und kulturellen Möglichkeiten auf alle Teile der Gesellschaft, der Stärkung der demokratischen Legitimität und der Effizienz der Staatsführung, der Einrichtung effizienter Mechanismen für die friedliche Beilegung von Konflikten zwischen Gruppeninteressen und der Überbrückung der Trennungslinien zwischen den verschiedenen Teilen der Gesellschaft sowie die Unterstützung einer aktiven und organisierten Zivilgesellschaft.
ref: 2. The activities in the field of peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution shall in particular include support for balancing political, economic, social and cultural opportunities among all segments of society, for strengthening the democratic legitimacy and effectiveness of governance, for establishing effective mechanisms for the peaceful conciliation of group interests, for bridging dividing lines among different segments of society as well as support for an active and organised civil society.
draft: (2) Measures in the area of peace consolidation and conflict prevention and resolution mainly include supporting the balanced distribution of political, economic, social, and cultural opportunities to all parts of society, strengthening democratic legitimacy and state governance efficiency, setting up efficient mechanisms for peaceful resolution of conflicts between group interests, bridging the divides between different parts of society, and supporting an active and organized civil society.
hil: Measures in the field of peace consolidation and conflict prevention and resolution include, above all, supporting the balanced distribution of political, economic, social, and cultural opportunities to all parts of society, strengthening democratic legitimacy and the efficiency of state leadership, setting up efficient mechanisms for the peaceful settlement of conflicts between group interests, bridging the dividing lines between different parts of society, and supporting an active and organized civil society.
compare: (2) Measures in the area of peace consolidation and conflict prevention and resolution mainly include supporting the balanced distribution of political, economic, social, and cultural opportunities to all parts of society, strengthening democratic legitimacy and state governance efficiency, setting up efficient mechanisms for peaceful resolution of conflicts between group interests, bridging the divides between different parts of society, and supporting an active and organized civil society.

src: in Erwägung nachstehender Gründe: Aquarelle, Gouachen und Pastelle werden in der Gemeinschaft aufgrund unterschiedlicher Kunstauffassungen teils den Gemälden und teils den Zeichnungen zugeordnet. Der Anhang der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 3911/92 (4) unterscheidet zwischen Zeichnungen, die vollständig von Hand auf und aus allen Stoffen hergestellt sind (Kategorie 4), sowie Bildern und Gemälden, die vollständig von Hand auf und aus allen Stoffen hergestellt sind (Kategorie 3). Da für jede Kategorie ein anderer Hoechstbetrag gilt, könnte die unterschiedliche Behandlung von Aquarellen, Gouachen und Pastellen durch die verschiedenen Mitgliedstaaten zu erheblichen Verzerrungen im Binnenmarkt führen. Zur Durchführung der Verordnung ist folglich zu entscheiden, in welche Kategorie Aquarelle, Gouachen und Pastelle gehören, damit in der ganzen Gemeinschaft die gleichen Hoechstbeträge angewandt werden.
ref: Whereas according to different artistic traditions within the Community water-colour, gouache and pastel pictures are variously regarded as being either paintings or drawings; whereas category 4 of the Annex to Regulation No 3911/92 (4) includes drawings executed entirely by hand on any medium in any material and category 3 includes pictures and paintings executed entirely by hand on any medium in any material; whereas the financial thresholds which apply to these two categories are different; whereas in the internal market this could lead to serious differences of treatment for water-colour, gouache and pastel pictures depending upon the Member State in which they are situated; whereas it is necessary to decide for the purposes of the application of the Regulation into which category they shall fall to ensure that the financial thresholds applied shall be the same throughout the Community;
draft: Considering the following reasons: Watercolors, gouaches, and pastels are assigned in the community partly to paintings and partly to drawings due to different artistic concepts. The appendix of Regulation (EEC) No 3911/92 (4) distinguishes between drawings which are wholly made by hand on any material (category 4) and pictures and paintings which are wholly made by hand on any material (category 3). Since a different maximum amount applies for each category, the differing treatment of watercolors, gouaches, and pastels by the various Member States could lead to significant distortions in the internal market. To implement the regulation, it is therefore necessary to decide in which category watercolors, gouaches, and pastels belong so that the same maximum amounts are applied throughout the community.
hil: Whereas, due to different artistic concepts, watercolors, gouaches, and pastels are partially assigned to paintings and partially to drawings within the community. The annex of Regulation (EEC) No. 3911/92 (4) distinguishes between drawings which are wholly made by hand on any material (category 4) and pictures and paintings which are wholly made by hand on any material (category 3). As a different maximum amount applies for each category, the differing treatment of watercolors, gouaches, and pastels by the various Member States could lead to significant distortions in the internal market. Therefore, to implement the regulation, it is necessary to decide in which category watercolors, gouaches, and pastels belong so that the same maximum amounts are applied throughout the community.
compare: Considering the following reasons: Watercolors, gouaches, and pastels are assigned in the community partly to paintings and partly to drawings due to different artistic concepts. The appendix of Regulation (EEC) No 3911/92 (4) distinguishes between drawings which are wholly made by hand on any material (category 4) and pictures and paintings which are wholly made by hand on any material (category 3). Since a different maximum amount applies for each category, the differing treatment of watercolors, gouaches, and pastels by the various Member States could lead to significant distortions in the internal market. To implement the regulation, it is therefore necessary to decide in which category watercolors, gouaches, and pastels belong so that the same maximum amounts are applied throughout the community.

src: (22) Das Inkrafttreten dieser Verordnung muss zeitlich aufgeschoben erfolgen, um alle Mitgliedstaaten in die Lage zu versetzen, die Richtlinie 2001/86/EG in innerstaatliches Recht umzusetzen und die für die Gründung und den Geschäftsbetrieb von SE mit Sitz in ihrem Hoheitsgebiet notwendigen Verfahren rechtzeitig einzuführen, dergestalt, dass die Verordnung und die Richtlinie gleichzeitig zur Anwendung gebracht werden können.
ref: (22) The entry into force of this Regulation must be deferred so that each Member State may incorporate into its national law the provisions of Directive 2001/86/EC and set up in advance the necessary machinery for the formation and operation of SEs with registered offices within its territory, so that the Regulation and the Directive may be applied concomitantly.
draft: The entry into force of this regulation must be postponed in time in order to enable all Member States to transpose Directive 2001/86/EC into national law and to introduce in time the procedures necessary for the establishment and operation of SE with registered office in their territory, in such a way that the regulation and the directive can be applied simultaneously.
hil: The entry into force of this regulation must be postponed in time to enable all Member States to transpose Directive 2001/86/EC into national law and to introduce timely the procedures necessary for the establishment and operation of SE with registered office in their territory so that the regulation and the directive can be applied simultaneously.
compare: The entry into force of this regulation must be postponed in time in order to enable all Member States to transpose Directive 2001/86/EC into national law and to introduce in time the procedures necessary for the establishment and operation of SE with registered office in their territory, in such a way that the regulation and the directive can be applied simultaneously.

src: 3. Nutzt ein Mitgliedstaat die Möglichkeit gemäß Artikel 62 Unterabsatz 1 der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1782/2003 und bezieht die Beträge für die Milchprämien und die Ergänzungszahlungen teilweise in die Betriebsprämienregelung ein, so wendet er die in Absatz 1 genannte prozentuale Kürzung in dem Jahr, in dem er diese Möglichkeit nutzt, auf die betreffenden in die Betriebsprämienregelung einbezogenen Beträge an, wobei der Anstieg der Beträge gemäß Artikel 95 Absatz 2 und Artikel 96 Absatz 2 der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1782/2003 berücksichtigt wird.
ref: 3.Where a Member State makes use of the option, provided for in the first subparagraph of Article 62 of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003, to include in part the amounts resulting from dairy premiums and additional payments in the single payment scheme, it shall apply the percentage of reduction referred to in paragraph 1 of this Article to the corresponding amounts included in the single payment scheme in the year in which it makes use of that option, taking into account the increase of the amounts provided for in Article 95 (2) and 96 (2) of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003.
draft: 3. If a Member State makes use of the option provided for in Article 62(1) of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 and partly includes the amounts for milk premiums and the complementary payments in the single payment scheme, it shall apply the percentage reduction referred to in paragraph 1 to the amounts concerned and included in the single payment scheme in the year in which it makes use of that option, taking account of the increase in these amounts in accordance with Articles 95(2) and 96(2) of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003.
hil: Where a Member State makes use of the option provided for in Article 62(1) of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 and includes the amounts for milk premiums and complementary payments partially in the single payment scheme, it shall apply to the relevant included amounts in the single payment scheme the percentage reduction referred to in paragraph 1 in the year in which it makes use of that option, taking into account the increase in the amounts in accordance with Articles 95(2) and 96(2) of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003.
compare: 3. If a Member State makes use of the option provided for in Article 62(1) of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 and partly includes the amounts for milk premiums and the complementary payments in the single payment scheme, it shall apply the percentage reduction referred to in paragraph 1 to the amounts concerned and included in the single payment scheme in the year in which it makes use of that option, taking account of the increase in these amounts in accordance with Articles 95(2) and 96(2) of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003.

src: a) "Flughafen" jedes speziell für das Landen, Starten und Manövrieren von Luftfahrzeugen ausgebaute Gelände, einschließlich der für den Luftverkehr und die Abfertigung der Luftfahrzeuge erforderlichen zugehörigen Einrichtungen, wozu auch die Einrichtungen für die Abfertigung gewerblicher Flugdienste gehören;
ref: (a) 'airport` means any area of land especially adapted for the landing, taking-off and manoeuvres of aircraft, including the ancillary installations which these operations may involve for the requirements of aircraft traffic and services including the installations needed to assist commercial air services;
draft: "Flughafen" is a specially developed area for the landing, takeoff and maneuvering of aircrafts, including the associated facilities required for air traffic and handling of aircrafts, which also includes facilities for handling commercial air services.
hil: "It is a airport. It is a specially developed area for the landing, takeoff and maneuvering of aircraft, including the associated facilities required for air traffic control and handling of aircrafts, which includes the facilities for handling commercial air services."
compare: "Flughafen" is a specially developed area for the landing, takeoff and maneuvering of aircrafts, including the associated facilities required for air traffic and handling of aircrafts, which also includes facilities for handling commercial air services.

src: Die maximale Einfuhrkapazität beträgt 5,3 Mrd. m3 p. a. Da der Erdgassektor noch nicht liberalisiert wurde, wurden bisher für das Terminal keine Vorschriften über den Zugang Dritter erlassen.
ref: Its maximum import capacity is 5.3 bcm p.a. In the absence of liberalisation in the gas sector, so far, no TPA rule has been imposed on the terminal.
draft: The maximum import capacity is 5.3 billion m3 per year. As the gas sector has not yet been liberalized, no regulations have been issued for third-party access to the terminal.

compare: The maximum import capacity is 5.3 billion m3 per year. As the gas sector has not yet been liberalized, no regulations have been issued for third-party access to the terminal.

src: (8) Wegen des Binnenmarktbezugs der Fahrgastbeförderung im Seeverkehr ist eine Maßnahme der Gemeinschaft der effizienteste Weg, um bei Schiffen in der ganzen Gemeinschaft für einen einheitlichen Mindestsicherheitsstandard zu sorgen.
ref: (8) Whereas in view, in particular, of the internal-market dimension of maritime passenger transport, action at Community level is the most effective way of establishing a common minimum level of safety for ships throughout the Community;

src: i) 'Klassenzeugnis' ein von einer Klassifikationsgesellschaft ausgestelltes Dokument, das die strukturelle und mechanische Eignung eines Schiffes für einen bestimmten Zweck oder Dienst gemäß den von jener Gesellschaft festgelegten und veröffentlichten Vorschriften feststellt;

src: in Erwägung nachstehender Gründe: Der Ausschuß für Umweltfragen der Organisation für Zusammenarbeit und wirtschaftliche Entwicklung (ÖCD) hat dem Rat dieser Organisation einen Vorschlag für eine Entscheidung - Empfehlung insbesondere für die zuegige Ratifizierung und Anwendung der Konvention von Basel zur Kontrolle der grenzueberschreitenden Verbringung gefährlicher Abfälle und ihrer Beseitigung vorgelegt, die am 22. März 1989 von einer Reihe von Mitgliedstaaten der ÖCD und der Gemeinschaft unterzeichnet wurde.
ref: Whereas the Environment Committee of the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) has forwarded to the Council of that Organization a draft Decision/recommandation recommending inter alia the ratification and rapid application of the Basle Convention on the control of transboundary movements of hazardous wastes and their disposal, signed on 22 March 1989 by some of the Member States of the OECD, as well as the Community;
draft: Considering the following reasons: The Committee on Environmental Issues of the Organization for Cooperation and Economic Development (OECD) has submitted a proposal for a decision - recommendation to the council of this organization, particularly for the prompt ratification and application of the Basel Convention on the Control of Transboundary Movements of Hazardous Wastes and their Disposal, which was signed on March 22, 1989, by a number of member states of the OECD and the community.
hil: Whereas, The Committee on Environmental Issues of the Organization for Cooperation and Economic Development (OECD) submitted a proposal for a decision - recommendation to the council of this organization, particularly for the prompt ratification and application of the Basel Convention on the Control of Transboundary Movements of Hazardous Wastes and their Disposal, which was signed on March 22, 1989 by a number of member states of the OECD and the community.
compare: Considering the following reasons: The Committee on Environmental Issues of the Organization for Cooperation and Economic Development (OECD) has submitted a proposal for a decision - recommendation to the council of this organization, particularly for the prompt ratification and application of the Basel Convention on the Control of Transboundary Movements of Hazardous Wastes and their Disposal, which was signed on March 22, 1989, by a number of member states of the OECD and the community.

src: (4) Um eine gemeinschaftsweit einheitliche Anwendung der Beihilferegelung zu gewährleisten, sollte eine Liste der beihilfefähigen Sorten von Cannabis sativa L. im Sinne von Artikel 3 Absatz 6 der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 2358/71 aufgestellt werden. Dazu ist die Liste in Anhang B der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 1164/89 der Kommission vom 28. April 1989 zur Durchführung der Beihilferegelung für Faserflachs und Hanf(7), zuletzt geändert durch die Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1313/2000(8), zu verwenden.
ref: (4) In order to ensure uniform application throughout the Community of the rules for granting the aid, a list should be established of the different varieties of Cannabis sativa L. eligible for aid under Article 3(6) of Regulation (EEC) No 2358/71 and the list laid down in Annex B to Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1164/89 of 28 April 1989 laying down detailed rules concerning the aid for fibre flax and hemp(7), as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 1313/2000(8) should be used for that purpose.
draft: In order to ensure a uniform application of the aid scheme throughout the Community, a list of the varieties of Cannabis sativa L. eligible for aid within the meaning of Article 3(6) of Regulation (EEC) No 2358/71 should be drawn up. To this end, the list in Annex B to Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1164/89 of 28 April 1989 laying down detailed rules for the implementation of the aid scheme for flax and hemp (7), as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 1313/2000 (8), should be used.
hil: In order to ensure a uniform application of the aid scheme throughout the Community, a list of the varieties of Cannabis sativa L. eligible for aid within the meaning of Article 3(6) of Regulation (EEC) No 2358/71 should be drawn up. To this end, the list contained in Annex B to Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1164/89 of 28 April 1989 laying down detailed rules for the implementation of the aid scheme for flax and hemp (7), as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 1313/2000 (8), should be used.
compare: In order to ensure a uniform application of the aid scheme throughout the Community, a list of the varieties of Cannabis sativa L. eligible for aid within the meaning of Article 3(6) of Regulation (EEC) No 2358/71 should be drawn up. To this end, the list in Annex B to Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1164/89 of 28 April 1989 laying down detailed rules for the implementation of the aid scheme for flax and hemp (7), as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 1313/2000 (8), should be used.

src: (10) Im Anschluss an die Kommissionsmitteilung "Frauen und Wissenschaft"(5), die Entschließung des Rates vom 20. Februar 2000 zu diesem Thema wird ein Aktionsplan durchgeführt, mit dem die Stellung und die Rolle der Frauen in Wissenschaft und Forschung gestärkt werden sollen; außerdem sind weitere Fördermaßnahmen erforderlich.
ref: (10) Following the Commission Communication "Women and Science", the Council Resolution of 20 May 1999 on women and science(5) and the Resolution of the European Parliament of 3 February 2000 on this scheme, an action plan is being implemented in order to reinforce and increase the place of women in science and research, and further enhanced action is needed.

hil: Following the Commission's communication "Women and Science" (5), the Council resolution of 20 May 1999 on women and science and the European Parliament resolution of 3 February 2000 on the same subject, an action plan will be implemented to strengthen the position and role of women in science and research, and further support measures are also required.

src: Die Schaffung gemeinsamer statistischer Normen für Arbeitskostenindizes ist nur auf der Grundlage eines gemeinschaftlichen Rechtsakts durchführbar, weil nur die Kommission die erforderliche Harmonisierung der statistischen Information auf Gemeinschaftsebene koordinieren kann; hingegen kann die Erhebung der Daten und die Erstellung vergleichbarer Arbeitskostenindizes von den Mitgliedstaaten durchgeführt werden.
ref: The creation of common statistical standards for labour cost indices can only be achieved on the basis of a Community legal act because only the Commission can coordinate the necessary harmonisation of statistical information at Community level, while the collection of data and compilation of comparable labour cost indices can be organised by the Member States.
draft: The creation of common statistical norms for labor cost indices is only feasible on the basis of a community legal act, since only the Commission can coordinate the necessary harmonization of statistical information at the community level; on the other hand, the collection of data and the preparation of comparable labor cost indices can be carried out by the Member States.
hil: The creation of common statistical norms for labor cost indices can only be carried out on the basis of a community legal act, because only the Commission can coordinate the necessary harmonization of statistical information at the community level; on the other hand, the collection of data and the preparation of comparable labor cost indices can be carried out by the Member States.
compare: The creation of common statistical norms for labor cost indices is only feasible on the basis of a community legal act, since only the Commission can coordinate the necessary harmonization of statistical information at the community level; on the other hand, the collection of data and the preparation of comparable labor cost indices can be carried out by the Member States.

src: Der Ort, der Zeitpunkt und die Tagesordnung seines Zusammentretens werden jeweils im gegenseitigen Einvernehmen festgelegt.
ref: It shall meet at a place, on a date and with an agenda, fixed by mutual agreement.
draft: The place, the timing and the agenda of its convening are determined in mutual agreement.
hil: The place, the timing and the agenda of its convening shall be determined by mutual agreement.
compare: The place, the timing and the agenda of its convening shall be determined by mutual agreement.

src: Die Entscheidung 89/471/EWG wird wie folgt geändert:

draft: "The Decision 89/471/EEC is amended as follows:"
hil: Decision 89/471/EEC is hereby amended as follows:
compare: "The Decision 89/471/EEC is amended as follows:"

src: Die zuständige Behörde, die den Vorgang überprüft hat, vermerkt im Feld "Überwachung der Verwendung und/oder Bestimmung" des Kontrollexemplars, daß das Erzeugnis zur weiteren Verarbeitung, Verpackung, Übernahme oder Ausfuhr innerhalb desselben Mitgliedstaats versandt worden ist.
ref: The competent authority which verified the operation shall indicate on the control copy T 5 in the box headed 'Control of use and/or destination' that the product has been sent within the same Member State for further processing, packaging, taking over or export.
draft: The competent authority, which reviewed the process, noted in the field "Monitoring of use and/or purpose" of the control sample that the product has been shipped for further processing, packaging, transfer or export within the same Member State.
hil: The competent authority, which reviewed the process, notes in the field "Monitoring of use and/or purpose" of the control sample that the product has been sent for further processing, packaging, acquisition or export within the same Member State.
compare: The competent authority, which reviewed the process, noted in the field "Monitoring of use and/or purpose" of the control sample that the product has been shipped for further processing, packaging, transfer or export within the same Member State.

src: Jeder Mitgliedstaat trifft die erforderlichen Maßnahmen, um sicherzustellen, dass die unbefugte vorsätzliche schwere Behinderung oder Störung des Betriebs eines Informationssystems, durch Eingeben, Übermitteln, Beschädigen, Löschen, Verstümmeln, Verändern, Unterdrücken oder Unzugänglichmachen von Computerdaten, zumindest dann unter Strafe gestellt wird, wenn kein leichter Fall vorliegt.
ref: Each Member State shall take the necessary measures to ensure that the intentional serious hindering or interruption of the functioning of an information system by inputting, transmitting, damaging, deleting, deteriorating, altering, suppressing or rendering inaccessible computer data is punishable as a criminal offence when committed without right, at least for cases which are not minor.
draft: Each Member State shall take the necessary measures to ensure that the intentional unauthorized serious disruption of the functioning of an information system, by inputting, transmitting, damaging, deleting, deteriorating, altering, suppressing or rendering inaccessible computer data, is punishable at least in cases where there is no minor offence.
hil: Each Member State shall take the necessary measures to ensure that a person who intentionally and without right causes serious interference with the operation of an information system by inputting, transmitting, damaging, deleting, deteriorating, altering, suppressing, or rendering data inaccessible, is punishable in cases where the offense is not minor.
compare: Each Member State shall take the necessary measures to ensure that the intentional unauthorized serious disruption of the functioning of an information system, by inputting, transmitting, damaging, deleting, deteriorating, altering, suppressing or rendering inaccessible computer data, is punishable at least in cases where there is no minor offence.

src: (2) Werden die Verbote gemäß Absatz 1 wegen weiterer Seuchenfälle länger als 30 Tage aufrechterhalten und treten infolgedessen Probleme in Bezug auf das Wohlergehen der Tiere oder andere Probleme bei der Schweinehaltung auf, so kann die zuständige Behörde - vorbehaltlich der Bedingungen des Artikels 10 Absatz 3 - auf begründeten Antrag des Eigentümers genehmigen, dass Schweine aus einem in der Überwachungszone gelegenen Betrieb verbracht und auf direktem Weg transportiert werden:
ref: 2. Where the prohibitions provided for in paragraph 1 are maintained beyond 30 days because of further outbreaks of the disease and where as a result animal welfare or other problems arise in keeping the pigs, subject to the conditions set out in Article 10(3), the competent authority may, following a reasoned application by the owner, authorise removal of pigs from a holding within the surveillance zone to be directly transported to:
draft: (2) If the bans according to paragraph 1 are maintained for more than 30 days due to further outbreaks of epidemics and problems arise in relation to the welfare of animals or other issues in pig farming as a result, the competent authority may - subject to the conditions of Article 10 (3) - approve, on justified request of the owner, the transport of pigs from a farm located in the surveillance zone and transported directly.
hil: If the bans according to paragraph 1 are maintained for more than 30 days due to further outbreaks of epidemics and problems arise in relation to the welfare of animals or other issues in pig farming as a result, the competent authority may, on justified request of the owner and subject to the conditions of Article 10(3), approve the transport of pigs from a farm located in the surveillance zone and transported directly.
compare: If the bans according to paragraph 1 are maintained for more than 30 days due to further outbreaks of epidemics and problems arise in relation to the welfare of animals or other issues in pig farming as a result, the competent authority may, on justified request of the owner and subject to the conditions of Article 10(3), approve the transport of pigs from a farm located in the surveillance zone and transported directly.

src: Gemäß Artikel 7 der Grundverordnung wurde der Vorteil für die Unternehmen auf der Grundlage der für die eingeführten Investitionsgüter nicht entrichteten Zölle berechnet, wobei dieser Betrag über einen Zeitraum verteilt wurde, der dem normalen Abschreibungszeitraum für solche Investitionsgüter in dem betreffenden Wirtschaftszweig entspricht.
ref: Consequently, the benefit to the investigated company has been calculated on the basis of the amount of unpaid customs duty on imported capital goods by spreading this amount across a period which reflects the normal depreciation period of such capital goods in the industry of the product concerned in accordance with Article 7 of the basic Regulation.
draft: According to Article 7 of the basic regulation, the advantage for companies was calculated on the basis of the customs duties not paid for the imported capital goods, with this amount being spread over a period corresponding to the normal depreciation period for such investment goods in the relevant economic sector.
hil: According to Article 7 of the basic regulation, the advantage for companies was calculated on the basis of the customs duties not paid for the imported capital goods, with this amount being spread over a period corresponding to the normal depreciation period for such investment goods in the relevant economic sector.
compare: According to Article 7 of the basic regulation, the advantage for companies was calculated on the basis of the customs duties not paid for the imported capital goods, with this amount being spread over a period corresponding to the normal depreciation period for such investment goods in the relevant economic sector.

src: b) die zuständige Behörde bzw. Kontrollstelle des Drittlandes eine Bescheinigung ausgestellt hat, der zufolge die darin bezeichnete Partie - mit Hilfe von Wirtschaftsmethoden auf der Grundlage von Regeln erzeugt wurde, die denen der Artikel 6 und 7 gleichwertig sind, und - einem Kontrollverfahren unterzogen wurde, dessen Gleichwertigkeit anläßlich der Prüfung nach Absatz 2 Buchstabe b) anerkannt wurde.
ref: (b) the competent authority or body in the third country has issued a certificate of inspection stating that the lot designated in the certificate: - was obtained within a system of production applying rules equivalent to those laid down in Articles 6 and 7, and - was subject to a system of inspection recognized as equivalent in accordance with paragraph 2 (b).
draft: b) the competent authority or control body of the third country has issued a certificate according to which the batch in question has been produced using economic methods based on rules which are equivalent to those of Articles 6 and 7 and has been subjected to an inspection procedure, the equivalence of which has been recognized during the examination referred to in Article 2(2)(b).
hil: b) the competent authority or control body of the third country has issued a certificate according to which the batch in question has been produced using economic methods based on rules equivalent to those of Articles 6 and 7, and has undergone an inspection procedure, the equivalence of which has been recognized during the examination referred to in Article 2(2)(b).
compare: b) the competent authority or control body of the third country has issued a certificate according to which the batch in question has been produced using economic methods based on rules which are equivalent to those of Articles 6 and 7 and has been subjected to an inspection procedure, the equivalence of which has been recognized during the examination referred to in Article 2(2)(b).

src: (1) Findet die in Artikel 70 der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1782/2003 des Rates vom 29. September 2003 mit gemeinsamen Regeln für Direktzahlungen im Rahmen der Gemeinsamen Agrarpolitik und mit bestimmten Stützungsregelungen für Inhaber landwirtschaftlicher Betriebe(44) vorgesehene Ausschlussmöglichkeit Anwendung, so unterbreitet Frankreich der Kommission Programme zur Unterstützung von traditionellen Tätigkeiten im Zusammenhang mit der Rindfleisch- sowie Schaf- und Ziegenfleischerzeugung in den französischen überseeischen Departements.
ref: 1. In case of application of the exclusion provided for in Article 70 of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 of 29 September 2003 establishing common rules for direct support schemes under the common agricultural policy and establishing certain support schemes for farmers(44), France shall present to the Commission programmes to assist traditional activities connected with beef and veal, as well as sheep and goat production and measures to improve product quality, within the limits of the consumption needs of the French Overseas Departments.
draft: Apply the exclusion possibility provided for in Article 70 of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 of the Council of 29 September 2003 on common rules for direct support schemes under the common agricultural policy and establishing certain support schemes for farmers, as referred to in point 44, and France shall submit to the Commission programmes to support traditional activities linked to the production of beef, sheep and goat meat in the French overseas departments.
hil: If the exclusion possibility provided for in Article 70 of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 of the Council of 29 September 2003 on common rules for direct support schemes under the common agricultural policy and establishing certain support schemes for farmers, as referred to in point 44, is applied, France shall submit to the Commission programmes to support traditional activities related to beef production as well as sheep and goat meat production in the French overseas departments.
compare: Apply the exclusion possibility provided for in Article 70 of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 of the Council of 29 September 2003 on common rules for direct support schemes under the common agricultural policy and establishing certain support schemes for farmers, as referred to in point 44, and France shall submit to the Commission programmes to support traditional activities linked to the production of beef, sheep and goat meat in the French overseas departments.

src: Folglich sollte der endgültige Antidumpingzoll für die nichtkooperierenden ausführenden Hersteller in Indonesien angepaßt werden, um die tatsächliche Dumpingspanne widerzuspiegeln, die nach Einführung des endgültigen Ausgleichszolls zur Beseitigung der Auswirkungen der Ausfuhrsubventionen verbleibt.
ref: Therefore, the definitive anti-dumping duty for the non-cooperating Indonesian exporting producers should be adjusted to reflect the actual dumping margin remaining after the imposition of the definitive countervailing duty offsetting the effect of the export subsidies.
draft: Therefore, the final anti-dumping duty for the non-cooperating exporting manufacturers in Indonesia should be adjusted to reflect the actual dumping margin remaining after the introduction of the final countervailing duty to eliminate the effects of export subsidies.
hil: It is therefore necessary to adjust the final anti-dumping duty for non-cooperating exporting manufacturers in Indonesia to reflect the actual dumping margin that remains after the introduction of the final countervailing duty to eliminate the effects of export subsidies.
compare: Therefore, the final anti-dumping duty for the non-cooperating exporting manufacturers in Indonesia should be adjusted to reflect the actual dumping margin remaining after the introduction of the final countervailing duty to eliminate the effects of export subsidies.

src: Der Verwaltungsrat nimmt bis spätestens 30. November eines jeden Jahres anhand eines vom Direktor des Instituts vorgelegten Entwurfs das jährliche Arbeitsprogramm des Instituts für das darauf folgende Jahr an.
ref: No later than 30 November each year, the Board shall, on the basis of a draft submitted by the Director of the Institute, adopt the Institute's annual work programme for the following year.
draft: The board of directors approves the annual work program of the institute for the following year based on a proposal presented by the institute's director no later than November 30th of each year.

src: c) sofern eine Exposition nicht mit anderen Mitteln verhütet werden kann, Durchführung von individuellen Schutzmaßnahmen, die auch eine persönliche Schutzausrüstung umfassen.

hil: c) In cases where exposure cannot be prevented by other means, individual protective measures, including personal protective equipment, must be implemented.

src: (2) Das Verbot nach Absatz 1 gilt jedoch für diejenigen Betriebe, die zwar nicht im Anhang aufgeführt sind, aber am 1. Januar 1982 gemäß Artikel 4 Absatz 3 der Richtlinie 72/462/EWG von den schweizerischen Behörden amtlich zugelassen waren und vorgeschlagen worden sind, erst ab 1. August 1983, es sei denn, daß bis dahin für sie eine gegenteilige Entscheidung gemäß Artikel 4 Absatz 1 der vorgenannten Richtlinie ergeht.
ref: 2. The prohibition referred to in paragraph 1 shall, however, apply only from 1 August 1983 to establishments which are not listed in the Annex but which have been approved and officially proposed by the Swiss authorities as of 1 January 1982 pursuant to Article 4 (3) of Directive 72/462/EEC, unless a decision is taken to the contrary, in accordance with Article 4 (1) of the said Directive, before 1 August 1983.
draft: (2) However, the ban referred to in paragraph 1 shall apply to those establishments which, although not listed in the Annex, were officially approved by the Swiss authorities on 1 January 1982 in accordance with Article 4(3) of Directive 72/462/EEC and proposed only from 1 August 1983, unless a contrary decision is taken for them in accordance with Article 4(1) of the aforementioned Directive by that time.
hil: However, the ban referred to in paragraph 1 shall apply to those establishments which, although not listed in the Annex, were officially approved by the Swiss authorities on 1 January 1982 in accordance with Article 4(3) of Directive 72/462/EEC and proposed only from 1 August 1983, unless a contrary decision is taken for them in accordance with Article 4(1) of the aforementioned Directive by that time.
compare: (2) However, the ban referred to in paragraph 1 shall apply to those establishments which, although not listed in the Annex, were officially approved by the Swiss authorities on 1 January 1982 in accordance with Article 4(3) of Directive 72/462/EEC and proposed only from 1 August 1983, unless a contrary decision is taken for them in accordance with Article 4(1) of the aforementioned Directive by that time.

src: (3) Gemäß Artikel 7 Absatz 3 Unterabsatz 1 der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1260/1999 nimmt die Kommission für Verpflichtungsermächtigungen, die für die Programmplanung von 2000 bis 2006 verfügbar sind, nach transparenten Verfahren eine indikative Aufteilung auf die Mitgliedstaaten vor. Hierbei trägt sie für die Ziele 1 und 2 einem oder mehreren objektiven Kriterien Rechnung, die denjenigen im von der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 2052/88 des Rates vom 24. Juni 1988 über Aufgaben und Effizienz der Strukturfonds und über die Koordinierung ihrer Interventionen untereinander sowie mit denen der Europäischen Investitionsbank und der anderen vorhandenen Finanzinstrumenten(2), zuletzt geändert durch die Verordnung (EG) Nr. 3193/94(3), abgedeckten Zeitraum entsprechen: förderfähige Bevölkerung, regionaler Wohlstand, nationaler Wohlstand und relatives Ausmaß der Strukturprobleme, insbesondere der Arbeitslosigkeit.
ref: (3) Whereas the first subparagraph of Article 7(3) of Regulation (EC) No 1260/1999 stipulates that the Commission is to use transparent procedures to make indicative breakdowns by Member State of the commitment appropriations available for programming in 2000 to 2006 taking full account, for Objectives 1 and 2, of one or more objective criteria similar to those applied during the previous period covered by Council Regulation (EEC) No 2052/88 of 24 June 1988 on the tasks of the Structural Funds and their effectiveness and on coordination of their activities between themselves and with the operations of the European Investment Bank and the other existing financial instruments(2), as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 3193/94(3), namely eligible population, regional prosperity, national prosperity and the relative severity of the structural problems, especially the level of unemployment;
draft: (3) According to Article 7 (3) (1) of Regulation (EC) No 1260/1999, the Commission makes an indicative allocation to the Member States, following transparent procedures, for commitment appropriations available for the programme planning of 2000 to 2006. In doing so, it takes into account one or more objective criteria relating to Objectives 1 and 2, which correspond to those of the period covered by Regulation (EEC) No 2052/88 of the Council of 24 June 1988 on the tasks of the Structural Funds and their efficiency and on coordination measures, and of the European Investment Bank and the other existing financial instruments(2), last amended by Regulation (EC) No 3193/94(3): eligible population, regional prosperity, national prosperity and the relative extent of structural problems, in particular unemployment.
hil: According to Article 7(3)(1) of Regulation (EC) No. 1260/1999, the Commission shall make an indicative allocation to the Member States of commitment appropriations available for the 2000-2006 program planning period through transparent procedures. In doing so, it takes into account one or more objective criteria for Objectives 1 and 2, which correspond to those for the period covered by Regulation (EEC) No. 2052/88 of the Council of 24 June 1988 on the tasks and efficiency of the structural funds and the coordination of their interventions with those of the European Investment Bank and other existing financial instruments (2), last amended by Regulation (EC) No. 3193/94(3): eligible population, regional prosperity, national prosperity, and the relative extent of structural problems, especially unemployment.
compare: (3) According to Article 7 (3) (1) of Regulation (EC) No 1260/1999, the Commission makes an indicative allocation to the Member States, following transparent procedures, for commitment appropriations available for the programme planning of 2000 to 2006. In doing so, it takes into account one or more objective criteria relating to Objectives 1 and 2, which correspond to those of the period covered by Regulation (EEC) No 2052/88 of the Council of 24 June 1988 on the tasks of the Structural Funds and their efficiency and on coordination measures, and of the European Investment Bank and the other existing financial instruments(2), last amended by Regulation (EC) No 3193/94(3): eligible population, regional prosperity, national prosperity and the relative extent of structural problems, in particular unemployment.

src: Die Liste der Betriebe in Argentinien, aus denen die Einfuhr von Fleischerzeugnissen in die Gemeinschaft zugelassen ist, wurde zunächst mit Entscheidung 86/414/EWG der Kommission (3), zuletzt geändert durch Entscheidung 94/463/EG (4), erstellt.

compare: The list of establishments in Argentina from which imports of meat products into the Community are authorized was initially drawn up by Commission Decision 86/414/EEC (3), last amended by Decision 94/463/EC (4).

src: Mangels dieser unmittelbaren Koordinierung scheint es dennoch erwünscht, die Verwirklichung der Niederlassungsfreiheit und des freien Dienstleistungsverkehrs für die betreffenden Tätigkeiten durch den Erlaß von Übergangsmaßnahmen zu erleichtern, wie sie in den Allgemeinen Programmen vorgesehen sind ; damit soll insbesondere vermieden werden, daß die Staatsangehörigen jener Mitgliedstaaten aussergewöhnlich behindert werden, in denen die Aufnahme dieser Tätigkeiten von keinerlei Bedingungen abhängig gemacht wird.
ref: Whereas, in the absence of immediate coordination, it nevertheless appears desirable to make it easier to attain freedom of establishment and freedom to provide services for the activities in question by the adoption of transitional measures of the kind envisaged in the General Programmes, in particular in order to avoid causing exceptional difficulties for nationals of Member States in which the taking up of such activities is not subject to any conditions;
draft: In the absence of direct coordination, it nevertheless seems desirable to facilitate the realization of freedom of establishment and the free movement of services for the activities concerned by adopting transitional measures as provided for in the general programs; this is intended, among other things, to avoid particularly that nationals of those member states are exceptionally obstructed where the pursuit of these activities is subject to no conditions whatsoever.
hil: In the absence of direct coordination, it nevertheless seems desirable to facilitate the realization of freedom of establishment and the free movement of services for the activities concerned by adopting transitional measures as provided for in the general programs; this is intended, among other things, to avoid particularly that nationals of those member states are exceptionally obstructed where the pursuit of these activities is subject to no conditions whatsoever.
compare: In the absence of direct coordination, it nevertheless seems desirable to facilitate the realization of freedom of establishment and the free movement of services for the activities concerned by adopting transitional measures as provided for in the general programs; this is intended, among other things, to avoid particularly that nationals of those member states are exceptionally obstructed where the pursuit of these activities is subject to no conditions whatsoever.

src: Mit dieser Genehmigung verzichtete der portugiesische Staat tatsächlich auf Einnahmen, da er normalerweise Verzugszinsen in Höhe von 1206 Mio. PTE erhalten hätte.

src: In den Absätzen 1, 2 und 4 des Artikels 299 heißt es, dass die Bestimmungen des Vertrags gelten und kein Unterschied zwischen der Rechtsordnung der verschiedenen in jedem Absatz genannten Hoheitsgebiete festzustellen ist, vorbehaltlich bestimmter und ausdrücklich angeführter Ausnahmeregelungen.
