In Artikel 4b Absatz 3 Unterabsatz 1 erhält der einleitende Satzteil folgende Fassung:"Jedes Unternehmen, dem eine Produktionsquote für Isoglucose oder Inulinsirup zugeteilt worden ist, teilt der zuständigen Stelle des Mitgliedstaats, in dessen Hoheitsgebiet die Erzeugung stattfindet, vor dem 1. August mit, welche in Trockenstoff ausgedrückten Mengen Isoglucose bzw. in Weißzucker ausgedrückten Mengen Inulinsirup sich in seinem Besitz befinden und am Ende des vorhergehenden Wirtschaftsjahres im freien Warenverkehr im Gemeinschaftsgebiet gelagert waren, aufgeschlüsselt nach."
ref: 3. in the first subparagraph of Article 4b(3) the opening words are replaced by:"Each undertaking to which a production quota has been granted for isoglucose or inulin syrup shall notify to the competent authority of the Member State in which production took place, before 1 August, the quantities of isoglucose (expressed as dry matter) and of inulin syrup (expressed as white sugar equivalent) owned by it and stored in free circulation on Community territory at the end of the previous marketing year, broken down as follows:";

hil: In Article 4b, paragraph 3, subparagraph 1, the introductory sentence shall be replaced by the following: 'Each company allocated a production quota for isoglucose or inulin syrup shall inform the competent authority of the Member State in whose territory the production takes place before 1 August of the quantities of isoglucose expressed in dry matter and inulin syrup expressed in white sugar which were in its possession and which were stored in free circulation in the Community at the end of the previous marketing year, broken down by...'

src: Nach Artikel 34 Absatz 1 bis kann jede regionale Organisation zur wirtschaftlichen Integration Vertragspartei des Abkommens werden.

src: Dies zeigt erneut, dass für Mitgliedstaaten die Möglichkeit weiterhin gegeben ist, bestimmten Regionen Steuerautonomie zu gewähren, ohne notwendigerweise bestimmten Unternehmen staatliche Beihilfe zu gewähren.
ref: This shows again that it remains possible for a Member State to grant fiscal autonomy to certain regions without necessarily granting State aid to given companies.
draft: This once again shows that for Member States the possibility remains to grant certain regions tax autonomy without necessarily granting specific companies state aid.
hil: This once again demonstrates that, for Member States, it is possible to continue granting tax autonomy to certain regions without necessarily granting state aid to specific companies.
compare: This once again demonstrates that, for Member States, it is possible to continue granting tax autonomy to certain regions without necessarily granting state aid to specific companies.

src: (15) Die Kommission unterrichtet die bekanntermaßen betroffenen Ausführer, Einführer und repräsentativen Verbände von Einführern und Ausführern sowie das Ursprungs- und/oder Ausfuhrland und die Antragsteller über die Einleitung des Verfahrens und übermittelt unter gebührender Wahrung der Vertraulichkeit der Informationen den bekannten Ausführern sowie den Behörden des Ursprungs- und/oder Ausfuhrlands den vollen Wortlaut des schriftlichen Antrags nach Absatz 1 und stellt ihn auf Antrag auch den anderen beteiligten interessierten Parteien zur Verfügung.
ref: 15. The Commission shall advise the exporters, importers and representative associations of importers or exporters known to it to be concerned, as well as the country of origin and/or export and the complainants, of the initiation of the proceedings and, with due regard to the protection of confidential information, provide the full text of the written complaint referred to in paragraph 1 to the known exporters and to the authorities of the country of origin and/or export, and make it available upon request to other interested parties involved.
draft: The Commission informs the exporters, importers and representative associations of importers and exporters who are known to be affected, as well as the originating and/or exporting country and the applicants, about the initiation of the procedure and, while duly preserving the confidentiality of the information, provides the known exporters and the authorities of the originating and/or exporting country with the full text of the written application pursuant to paragraph 1 and, upon request, makes it available to the other interested parties involved.
hil: The Commission shall inform the exporters, importers, and representative associations of importers and exporters who are known to be affected, as well as the originating and/or exporting country and the applicants, about the initiation of the procedure while duly preserving the confidentiality of the information. The Commission shall provide the full text of the written application pursuant to paragraph 1 to the known exporters and the authorities of the originating and/or exporting country, and upon request, make it available to the other interested parties involved.
compare: The Commission informs the exporters, importers and representative associations of importers and exporters who are known to be affected, as well as the originating and/or exporting country and the applicants, about the initiation of the procedure and, while duly preserving the confidentiality of the information, provides the known exporters and the authorities of the originating and/or exporting country with the full text of the written application pursuant to paragraph 1 and, upon request, makes it available to the other interested parties involved.

src: (4) Der Diensteanbieter muss dem Teilnehmer oder Nutzer mitteilen, welche Arten von Verkehrsdaten für die in Absatz 2 genannten Zwecke verarbeitet werden und wie lange das geschieht; bei einer Verarbeitung für die in Absatz 3 genannten Zwecke muss diese Mitteilung erfolgen, bevor um Einwilligung ersucht wird.
ref: 4. The service provider must inform the subscriber or user of the types of traffic data which are processed and of the duration of such processing for the purposes mentioned in paragraph 2 and, prior to obtaining consent, for the purposes mentioned in paragraph 3.
draft: The service provider must inform the subscriber or user which types of traffic data are processed for the purposes mentioned in paragraph 2 and for how long this is done; in the case of processing for the purposes mentioned in paragraph 3, this notification must be given before requesting consent.
hil: The service provider must inform the subscriber or user which types of traffic data are processed for the purposes mentioned in paragraph 2 and for how long this is done; in the case of processing for the purposes mentioned in paragraph 3, this notification must be given before requesting consent.
compare: The service provider must inform the subscriber or user which types of traffic data are processed for the purposes mentioned in paragraph 2 and for how long this is done; in the case of processing for the purposes mentioned in paragraph 3, this notification must be given before requesting consent.

src: Die Vergleichbarkeit von Zahlen aus den Bilanzen und Gewinn- und Verlustrechnungen hängt darüber hinaus wesentlich davon ab, zu welchen Werten Vermögensgegenstände und Verbindlichkeiten in die Bilanz eingestellt werden; um eine zutreffende Vorstellung von der finanziellen Situation eines Versicherungsunternehmens zu vermitteln, muß sowohl der Zeit- als auch der Anschaffungswert der Kapitalanlagen offengelegt werden. Allerdings dient die Auflage, zumindest im Anhang zum Jahresabschluß den Zeitwert der Kapitalanlagen anzugeben, ausschließlich der Vergleichbarkeit und der Transparenz und soll nicht zu einer Änderung der steuerlichen Behandlung von Versicherungsunternehmen führen.
ref: Whereas the comparability of figures in the balance sheet and profit and loss account also depends basically on the values at which assets and liabilities are shown in the balance sheet; whereas for a proper understanding of the financial situation of an insurance undertaking the current value of investments as well as their value based upon the principle of purchase price or production cost must be disclosed; whereas, however, the compulsory disclosure of the current value of investments, at least in the notes on the accounts, is prescribed solely for purposes of comparability and transparency and is not intended to lead to changes in the tax treatment of insurance undertakings;
draft: The comparability of figures from balance sheets and profit and loss statements also depends significantly on the values at which assets and liabilities are recorded in the balance sheet; in order to provide an accurate impression of the financial situation of an insurance company, both the time and acquisition value of invested capital must be disclosed. However, the provision to disclose the market value of investments at least in the notes to the financial statements solely serves comparability and transparency and should not result in a change in the tax treatment of insurance companies.
hil: The comparability of figures from balance sheets and profit and loss statements significantly depends on the values at which assets and liabilities are recorded in the balance sheet. To provide an accurate impression of the financial situation of an insurance company, both the time and acquisition value of invested capital must be disclosed. However, the requirement to disclose the market value of investments at least in the notes to the financial statements only serves comparability and transparency and should not result in a change in the tax treatment of insurance companies.
compare: The comparability of figures from balance sheets and profit and loss statements also depends significantly on the values at which assets and liabilities are recorded in the balance sheet; in order to provide an accurate impression of the financial situation of an insurance company, both the time and acquisition value of invested capital must be disclosed. However, the provision to disclose the market value of investments at least in the notes to the financial statements solely serves comparability and transparency and should not result in a change in the tax treatment of insurance companies.

src: "(1) Die nach den Artikeln 4, 5 oder 5a zur Verabreichung an Nutztiere zugelassenen Erzeugnisse mit hormonaler Wirkung und ß-Agonisten müssen den Anforderungen der Richtlinie 2001/82/EG genügen."
ref: "1. Hormonal products and beta-agonists the administration of which to farm animals is authorised in accordance with Articles 4, 5 or 5a must meet the requirements of Directive 2001/82/EC."
draft: (1) The products with hormonal effect and ß-agonists authorized for administration to farm animals under Articles 4, 5 or 5a must comply with the requirements of Directive 2001/82/EC.
hil: Products with hormonal effect and ß-agonists authorized for administration to farm animals under Articles 4, 5 or 5a must comply with the requirements of Directive 2001/82/EC.
compare: (1) The products with hormonal effect and ß-agonists authorized for administration to farm animals under Articles 4, 5 or 5a must comply with the requirements of Directive 2001/82/EC.

src: Eine Ausfertigung der Beurteilung zusammen mit einer Empfehlung für die Aufnahme oder Nichtaufnahme des Wirkstoffs in Anhang I, IA oder IB wird von der zuständigen Behörde der Kommission, den übrigen Mitgliedstaaten und dem Antragsteller zugeleitet.
ref: A copy of the evaluation shall be sent by the competent authority to the Commission, the other Member States and to the applicant, together with a recommendation for the inclusion, or otherwise, of the active substance in Annex I, IA or IB.
draft: One copy of the assessment together with a recommendation for the inclusion or non-inclusion of the active substance in Annex I, IA or IB will be forwarded by the competent authority to the Commission, the other Member States and the applicant.
hil: One copy of the assessment together with a recommendation for the inclusion or non-inclusion of the active substance in Annex I, IA or IB will be forwarded by the competent authority to the Commission, the other Member States and the applicant.
compare: One copy of the assessment together with a recommendation for the inclusion or non-inclusion of the active substance in Annex I, IA or IB will be forwarded by the competent authority to the Commission, the other Member States and the applicant.

src: (14) Die Gesamtheit der politischen, wirtschaftlichen, sozialen und rechtlichen Entwicklungen macht eine Anpassung des bestehenden Rechtsrahmens erforderlich, der das rechtliche und praktische Instrumentarium zur Wahrnehmung des Rechtes auf Unterrichtung und Anhörung vorsieht.
ref: (14) All of these political, economic, social and legal developments call for changes to the existing legal framework providing for the legal and practical instruments enabling the right to be informed and consulted to be exercised.
draft: "The entirety of the political, economic, social, and legal developments necessitates an adaptation of the existing legal framework that provides the legal and practical tools for exercising the right to information and consultation."
hil: The entirety of political, economic, social, and legal developments makes it necessary to adapt the existing legal framework that provides the legal and practical tools for exercising the right to information and consultation.
compare: "The entirety of the political, economic, social, and legal developments necessitates an adaptation of the existing legal framework that provides the legal and practical tools for exercising the right to information and consultation."

src: (23) Bei der betroffenen Ware handelt es sich um Stabstahl aus Eisen oder nicht legiertem Stahl, nur geschmiedet, nur warmgewalzt, nur warmgezogen oder nur warmstranggepresst, auch nach dem Walzen verwunden, mit vom Walzen herrührenden Einschnitten, Rippen (Wülsten), Vertiefungen oder Erhöhungen oder nach dem Walzen verwunden.
ref: (23) The product concerned is bars and rods of iron or non-alloy steel, not further worked than forged, hot rolled, hot drawn or hot extruded, but including those twisted after rolling and containing indentations, ribs, grooves or other deformations produced during the rolling process or twisted after rolling.
draft: The affected goods are bar steel made of iron or non-alloy steel, only forged, only hot-rolled, only hot-drawn or only hot extruded, also twisted after rolling, with incisions, ribs (convexities), depressions or elevations caused by rolling, or twisted after rolling.
hil: (23) The affected goods are bar steel made of iron or non-alloy steel, only forged, only hot-rolled, only hot-drawn or only hot extruded, also twisted after rolling, with incisions, ribs (convexities), depressions or elevations caused by rolling or twisted after rolling.
compare: The affected goods are bar steel made of iron or non-alloy steel, only forged, only hot-rolled, only hot-drawn or only hot extruded, also twisted after rolling, with incisions, ribs (convexities), depressions or elevations caused by rolling, or twisted after rolling.

src: (1) In Bezug auf die in Artikel 4 Absatz 1 genannten Erzeugnisse, Teile und Ausrüstungen nimmt die Agentur gegebenfalls und nach den Vorgaben des Abkommens von Chicago oder seiner Anhänge im Namen der Mitgliedstaaten die Funktionen und Aufgaben des Entwurfs-, Herstellungs- oder Eintragungsstaats wahr, soweit diese die Entwurfsgenehmigung betreffen.
ref: 1. With regard to products, parts and appliances referred to in Article 4(1), the Agency shall, where applicable and as specified in the Chicago Convention or its Annexes, carry out on behalf of Member States the functions and tasks of the State of design, manufacture or registry when related to design approval.
draft: In relation to the products, parts and equipment mentioned in Article 4(1), the Agency, where appropriate and in accordance with the provisions of the Chicago Convention or its Annexes, shall perform the functions and tasks of the design, production or registration State on behalf of the Member States, insofar as they concern the design approval.
hil: The Agency shall, where appropriate and in accordance with the provisions of the Chicago Convention or its Annexes, perform on behalf of the Member States the functions and tasks of the design, manufacturing or registration state with respect to the products, parts and equipment referred to in Article 4(1) insofar as they relate to the design approval.
compare: In relation to the products, parts and equipment mentioned in Article 4(1), the Agency, where appropriate and in accordance with the provisions of the Chicago Convention or its Annexes, shall perform the functions and tasks of the design, production or registration State on behalf of the Member States, insofar as they concern the design approval.

src: (1) Das mit der Richtlinie 1993/15/EWG eingeführte Verfahren für die Verbringung von Explosivstoffen innerhalb des Gemeinschaftsgebiets sieht eine Genehmigung durch die zuständigen Behörden des Herkunftsorts, der Durchfuhrgebiete und des Bestimmungsorts vor.

src: in Erwägung nachstehender Gründe: Es kann notwendig werden, sämtliche Tiere einer Sendung bei Ankunft auf dem Gebiet der Gemeinschaft töten und vernichten zu lassen, falls sich Anzeichen einer Seuche zeigen oder Verdacht auf das Vorliegen einer Seuche besteht - vor allem, wenn es sich um eine für die Gemeinschaft exotische handelt -, handelt-, um die Gesundheit von Mensch und Tier zu schützen und schwerwiegenden Konsequenzen vorzubeugen, die sich aus dem Ausbruch oder der Ausbreitung solcher Krankheiten in der Gemeinschaft ergeben könnten.
ref: Whereas it may be necessary to proceed with the slaughter and destruction of all animals of a consignment which on arrival in the territory of the Community shows evidence or suspicion of an epizootic disease, in particular those which are exotic for the Community, in order to safeguard the health of man and animals and to avoid the very serious consequences which may result from the appearance or development of such diseases within the Community;
draft: Considering the following reasons: it may become necessary to kill and destroy all animals of a consignment upon arrival in the territory of the Community if signs of a disease occur or if there is suspicion of the existence of a disease - especially if it is exotic for the Community - in order to protect the health of humans and animals and to prevent serious consequences that could arise from the outbreak or spread of such diseases in the Community.
hil: The Council may consider it necessary to kill and destroy all animals of a consignment upon arrival in the territory of the Community if there are signs of a disease or suspicion of the existence of a disease - especially if it is exotic for the Community - in order to protect the health of humans and animals and to prevent serious consequences that could arise from the outbreak or spread of such diseases in the Community.
compare: Considering the following reasons: it may become necessary to kill and destroy all animals of a consignment upon arrival in the territory of the Community if signs of a disease occur or if there is suspicion of the existence of a disease - especially if it is exotic for the Community - in order to protect the health of humans and animals and to prevent serious consequences that could arise from the outbreak or spread of such diseases in the Community.

src: Die Vermarktung von Erzeugnissen, die der vorliegenden Richtlinie nicht entsprechen, aber bis zum 17. Juli 2004 in Übereinstimmung mit der Richtlinie 76/118/EWG etikettiert wurden, ist jedoch bis zur Erschöpfung der Vorräte gestattet.
ref: However, the marketing of products which fail to conform to this Directive but which were labelled before 17 July 2004 in accordance with Directive 76/118/EEC shall be permitted until stocks run out.
draft: The marketing of products that do not comply with this Directive but were labelled in accordance with Directive 76/118/EEC until 17 July 2004 may be allowed until stocks are exhausted.
hil: Whereas the marketing of products that do not comply with the present Directive but have been labelled in accordance with Directive 76/118/EEC until 17 July 2004 may be allowed until stocks are exhausted.
compare: The marketing of products that do not comply with this Directive but were labelled in accordance with Directive 76/118/EEC until 17 July 2004 may be allowed until stocks are exhausted.

src: (1) Anhang V enthält eine Aufstellung der Sektoren oder Teilsektoren, für die zum Zeitpunkt des Inkrafttretens dieses Abkommens die betreffenden veterinärhygienischen Maßnahmen für die Zwecke des Handels als gleichwertig anerkannt sind/gleichgestellt sind.
ref: 1. Annex V lists those sectors, or parts of sectors, for which, at the date of entry into force of this Agreement, the respective sanitary measures are recognized as equivalent for trade purposes.
draft: (1) Annex V contains a list of sectors or subsectors for which the corresponding veterinary hygiene measures are recognized or deemed equivalent for the purposes of trade at the time of entry into force of this Agreement.
hil: Annex V contains a list of sectors or subsectors for which the respective veterinary hygiene measures are recognized or considered equivalent for the purpose of trade at the time of entry into force of this Agreement.
compare: (1) Annex V contains a list of sectors or subsectors for which the corresponding veterinary hygiene measures are recognized or deemed equivalent for the purposes of trade at the time of entry into force of this Agreement.

src: Für das Jahr 1997 werden die Erzeugerorganisationen, die einen Entwurf eines operationellen Programms gemäß Artikel 3 oder 15 der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 411/97 zur Genehmigung vorgelegt haben, ermächtigt, auf eigene Gefahr Ergänzungsbeträge zu den gemeinschaftlichen Rücknahmevergütungen gemäß Artikel 15 Absatz 3 Buchstabe b) der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 2200/96 zu gewähren.
ref: For 1997, producer organizations which have submitted a draft operational programme for approval in accordance with Articles 3 or 15 of Regulation (EC) No 411/97 are hereby authorized to grant, at their own risk, supplements to the Community withdrawal compensation, in accordance with Article 15 (3) (b) of Regulation (EC) No 2200/96.
draft: For the year 1997, producer organizations that have submitted a draft operational program for approval in accordance with Articles 3 or 15 of Regulation (EC) No. 411/97 are authorized to grant additional amounts to the community withdrawal refunds in accordance with Article 15 (3) letter b) of Regulation (EC) No. 2200/96 at their own risk.
hil: For the year 1997, producer organizations that have submitted a draft operational program for approval in accordance with Articles 3 or 15 of Regulation (EC) No. 411/97 are authorized to grant additional amounts to the community withdrawal refunds in accordance with Article 15 (3) letter b) of Regulation (EC) No. 2200/96 at their own risk.
compare: For the year 1997, producer organizations that have submitted a draft operational program for approval in accordance with Articles 3 or 15 of Regulation (EC) No. 411/97 are authorized to grant additional amounts to the community withdrawal refunds in accordance with Article 15 (3) letter b) of Regulation (EC) No. 2200/96 at their own risk.

src: (29) Im Rahmen der Pharmakovigilanz sollten die verfügbaren Daten über eine mangelhafte Wirksamkeit von Arzneimitteln geprüft werden.
ref: (29) The pharmacovigilance systems should consider the available data on lack of efficacy.
draft: As part of pharmacovigilance, the available data on the insufficient effectiveness of medicinal products should be examined.
hil: Whereas in the context of pharmacovigilance, the available data regarding the insufficient effectiveness of medicinal products should be scrutinized.
compare: As part of pharmacovigilance, the available data on the insufficient effectiveness of medicinal products should be examined.

src: (2) Die Bestimmungen der Absätze 3 und 4 des vorliegenden Artikels haben Vorrang vor den entsprechenden Bestimmungen der in Anhang II Buchstaben a und b genannten Artikel in Bezug auf die Bezeichnung von Luftfahrtunternehmen durch Singapur, die ihnen von dem betreffenden Mitgliedstaat erteilten Genehmigungen und Erlaubnisse sowie die Verweigerung, den Widerruf, die Aufhebung oder Einschränkung der Genehmigungen und Erlaubnisse der Luftfahrtunternehmen, wenn der betreffende Mitgliedstaat die Anwendung der Absätze 3 und 4 des vorliegenden Artikels bekräftigt.
ref: 2. The provisions in paragraphs 3 and 4 of this Article shall prevail over the corresponding provisions in the Articles listed in Annex II(a) and (b) respectively, in relation to the designation of air carriers by Singapore, its authorisations and permissions granted by the Member State concerned, and the refusal, revocation, suspension or limitation of the authorisations or permissions of the air carrier, respectively, if the relevant Member State affirms the application of the provisions in paragraphs 3 and 4 of this Article.
draft: (2) The provisions of paragraphs 3 and 4 of this Article shall take precedence over the corresponding provisions of Articles referred to in Annex II, points (a) and (b), with regard to the designation of air carriers by Singapore, the permissions and approvals granted to them by the Member State concerned, as well as the refusal, revocation, suspension or restriction of the permissions and approvals of air carriers, where the Member State concerned confirms the application of paragraphs 3 and 4 of this Article.
hil: The provisions of paragraphs 3 and 4 of this Article shall take precedence over the corresponding provisions of Articles referred to in Annex II, points (a) and (b), with regard to the designation of air carriers by Singapore, the permissions and approvals granted to them by the Member State concerned, as well as the refusal, revocation, suspension or restriction of the permissions and approvals of air carriers, where the Member State concerned confirms the application of paragraphs 3 and 4 of this Article.
compare: (2) The provisions of paragraphs 3 and 4 of this Article shall take precedence over the corresponding provisions of Articles referred to in Annex II, points (a) and (b), with regard to the designation of air carriers by Singapore, the permissions and approvals granted to them by the Member State concerned, as well as the refusal, revocation, suspension or restriction of the permissions and approvals of air carriers, where the Member State concerned confirms the application of paragraphs 3 and 4 of this Article.

src: ii) um ihnen die Diversifizierung ihrer Tätigkeiten außerhalb der Seefischerei im Rahmen eines individuellen oder kollektiven Diversifizierungsvorhabens zu ermöglichen, auf der Grundlage von höchstens 20000 EUR pro Begünstigten. Die Verwaltungsbehörde setzt den Betrag dieser Prämie je nach Größenordnung des Diversifizierungsvorhabens und der finanziellen Eigenleistung des Begünstigten fest;"
ref: (ii) to diversify their activities outside marine fisheries under an individual or collective diversification project, on the basis of an eligible cost limited to EUR 20000 per individual beneficiary; the managing authority shall determine the individual amount according to the scale of the diversification project and the investment made by the beneficiary;"
draft: ii) in order to enable them to diversify their activities outside of sea fishing through an individual or collective diversification project, based on a maximum of 20000 EUR per beneficiary. The managing authority sets the amount of this premium depending on the scale of the diversification project and the financial contribution of the beneficiary.
hil: ii) to enable them to diversify their activities outside of sea fishing through an individual or collective diversification project, based on a maximum amount of 20000 EUR per beneficiary. The managing authority determines the amount of this premium depending on the scale of the diversification project and the financial contribution of the beneficiary.
compare: ii) in order to enable them to diversify their activities outside of sea fishing through an individual or collective diversification project, based on a maximum of 20000 EUR per beneficiary. The managing authority sets the amount of this premium depending on the scale of the diversification project and the financial contribution of the beneficiary.

src: (5) Nach Prüfung der vorgelegten Nachweise zu den Anträgen gemäß Artikel 2 Absatz 4 übermitteln die Mitgliedstaaten der Kommission bis spätestens 2. Juli 2003 eine Liste der Antragsteller und der beantragten Mengen unter Verwendung des Formulars in Anhang III.
ref: 5. As regards applications under Article 2(4), after verification of the documents presented, Member States shall forward to the Commission by 2 July 2003 at the latest a list of applicants and quantities applied for using the form set out in Annex III.
draft: After checking the evidence presented for the requests according to Article 2 paragraph 4, the Member States shall submit to the Commission by 2 July 2003 a list of the applicants and the quantities requested using the form in Annex III.

src: Der Richtlinie zufolge müssen die Mitgliedstaaten darüber hinaus vorschreiben, dass Wirkstoffe nur in den Verkehr gebracht werden dürfen, wenn sie gemäß der Richtlinie 67/548/EWG eingestuft, verpackt und gekennzeichnet sind.
ref: That Directive also provides that Member States are to prescribe that active substances are not to be placed on the market unless they are classified, packaged and labelled in accordance with Directive 67/548/EEC.
draft: According to the directive, Member States must also prescribe that active substances may only be marketed if they are classified, packaged and labelled in accordance with Directive 67/548/EEC.
hil: According to the directive, Member States must also prescribe that active substances may only be marketed if they are classified, packaged and labelled in accordance with Directive 67/548/EEC.
compare: According to the directive, Member States must also prescribe that active substances may only be marketed if they are classified, packaged and labelled in accordance with Directive 67/548/EEC.

src: "Wenn die Bedingungen nach Absatz 2 erfuellt sind, kann der Ankauf einer oder mehrerer noch festzulegender Kategorien, Qualitäten oder Qualitätsklassen von frischem oder gekühltem Fleisch der KN-Codes 0201 10 00 und 0201 20 20 bis 0201 20 50 mit Ursprung in der Gemeinschaft durch die Interventionsstellen in einem oder mehrerer Mitgliedstaaten oder in einem Teilgebiet eines Mitgliedstaats im Rahmen von Ausschreibungen beschlossen werden, die im Hinblick auf eine angemessene Marktstützung unter Berücksichtigung der saisonalen Entwicklung der Schlachtungen eröffnet werden."
ref: 'Where the conditions laid down in paragraph 2 are met, buying-in by intervention agencies in one or more Member States or in a region of a Member State of one or more categories, qualities or quality groups, to be determined, of fresh or chilled meat falling within CN codes 0201 10 00 and 0201 20 20 to 0201 20 50 originating in the Community may be organized under tender procedures arranged with a view to ensuring reasonable support of the market, having regard to seasonal developments as regards slaughterings.'
draft: "If the conditions laid down in paragraph 2 are met, the purchase of one or more categories, qualities or grade of fresh or chilled meat falling within CN codes 0201 10 00 and 0201 20 20 to 0201 20 50 originating in the Community may be decided upon by the intervention agencies in one or more Member States or in a part of a Member State by means of tendering procedures opened with a view to ensuring appropriate market support, taking into account the seasonal trends in slaughterings."
hil: Where the conditions set out in paragraph 2 are met, the intervention agencies in one or more Member States or in a part of a Member State may decide, by means of tendering procedures opened to ensure appropriate market support taking into account the seasonal trends in slaughterings, to purchase one or more categories, qualities or grade of fresh or chilled meat corresponding to the CN codes 0201 10 00 and 0201 20 20 to 0201 20 50, and originating in the Community, after such categories, qualities or grade have been determined.
compare: "If the conditions laid down in paragraph 2 are met, the purchase of one or more categories, qualities or grade of fresh or chilled meat falling within CN codes 0201 10 00 and 0201 20 20 to 0201 20 50 originating in the Community may be decided upon by the intervention agencies in one or more Member States or in a part of a Member State by means of tendering procedures opened with a view to ensuring appropriate market support, taking into account the seasonal trends in slaughterings."

src: Es dient hauptsächlich als Aromat und als Fixiermittel bei der Herstellung von Duftstoffen, die ihrerseits bei der Herstellung von Waschmitteln, Kosmetika und Parfums verwendet werden.
ref: Its main uses are as an aroma chemical and as a fixative in the preparation of fragrance compounds, such compounds being used in the production of detergents, cosmetics and fine fragrances.
draft: It mainly serves as flavoring agent and fixative in the production of fragrances, which in turn are used in the production of detergents, cosmetics, and perfumes.
hil: It serves mainly as a flavoring agent and fixative in the production of fragrances, which in turn are used in the production of detergents, cosmetics, and perfumes.
compare: It serves mainly as a flavoring agent and fixative in the production of fragrances, which in turn are used in the production of detergents, cosmetics, and perfumes.

src: Technologisch ist auf Gemeinschaftsebene die Nützlichkeit von Titandioxid ( E 171 ) sowie von Eisenoxiden und -hydroxiden ( E 172 ) nich nur zur Oberflächenfärbung , sondern auch zur Färbung in der Masse nachgewiesen .
ref: Whereas from a technological point of view the usefulness of titanium dioxide (E 171), iron oxides and iron hydroxides (E 172) not only for surface but also mass colouring has been demonstrated at Community level;
draft: Technologically, the usefulness of titanium dioxide (E 171) as well as iron oxides and hydroxides (E 172) has been demonstrated not only for surface coloring, but also for mass coloring at the community level.
hil: Technologically, the usefulness of titanium dioxide (E171) as well as iron oxides and hydroxides (E172) has been shown not only for surface coloring, but also for coloring in the mass at the community level.
compare: Technologically, the usefulness of titanium dioxide (E 171) as well as iron oxides and hydroxides (E 172) has been demonstrated not only for surface coloring, but also for mass coloring at the community level.

src: Diese Entlastung darf nur insofern eingeschränkt werden, als die Statistik bestimmten qualitativen Anforderungen genügen muss, die folglich festzulegen sind.
ref: This lightening of the burden must be limited only by the demands of statistics of a satisfactory quality, which must consequently be defined.
draft: This relief may only be restricted to the extent that the statistics must meet certain qualitative requirements, which must therefore be defined.
hil: This relief may only be restricted to the extent that the statistics must meet certain qualitative requirements, which must therefore be defined.
compare: This relief may only be restricted to the extent that the statistics must meet certain qualitative requirements, which must therefore be defined.

src: Die Errichtung gemischter Gesellschaften in den Seychellen und die Übertragung von Gemeinschaftsschiffen auf solche Gesellschaften erfolgen unter strikter Einhaltung der seychellischen und gemeinschaftlichen Rechtsvorschriften.
ref: The creation of joint enterprises in Seychelles and the transfer of Community vessels to joint enterprises shall systematically comply with the Seychelles and the Community legislation.
draft: The establishment of mixed companies in Seychelles and the transfer of joint ships to such companies takes place in strict compliance with Seychellois and community regulations.
hil: "The establishment of mixed companies in Seychelles and the transfer of joint ships to such companies takes place in strict compliance with Seychellois and community regulations."
compare: The establishment of mixed companies in Seychelles and the transfer of joint ships to such companies takes place in strict compliance with Seychellois and community regulations.

src: 8. die Aufgliederung der konsolidierten Nettoumsatzerlöse im Sinne von Artikel 28 der Richtlinie 78/660/EWG nach Tätigkeitsbereichen sowie nach geographisch bestimmten Märkten, soweit sich hinsichtlich der Organisation des Verkaufs von Erzeugnissen und der Erbringung von Dienstleistungen, die der normalen Geschäftstätigkeit sämtlicher in die Konsolidierung einbezogener Unternehmen entsprechen, die Tätigkeitsbereiche und geographisch bestimmten Märkte untereinander erheblich unterscheiden;
ref: 8 . THE CONSOLIDATED NET TURNOVER AS DEFINED IN ARTICLE 28 OF DIRECTIVE 78/660/EEC , BROKEN DOWN BY CATEGORIES OF ACTIVITY AND INTO GEOGRAPHICAL MARKETS IN SO FAR AS , TAKING ACCOUNT OF THE MANNER IN WHICH THE SALE OF PRODUCTS AND THE PROVISION OF SERVICES FALLING WITHIN THE ORDINARY ACTIVITIES OF THE UNDERTAKINGS INCLUDED IN THE CONSOLIDATION TAKEN AS A WHOLE ARE ORGANIZED , THESE CATEGORIES AND MARKETS DIFFER SUBSTANTIALLY FROM ONE ANOTHER .
draft: 8. the breakdown of the consolidated net turnover in accordance with Article 28 of Directive 78/660/EEC by areas of activity and by geographically defined markets, insofar as the areas of activity and geographically defined markets differ significantly from each other with regard to the organization of the sale of products and the provision of services which correspond to the normal business activities of all the companies included in the consolidation.
hil: The consolidated net revenues shall be broken down according to Article 28 of Directive 78/660/EEC by activity sector and geographical market wherever the activity sectors and geographically defined markets significantly differ from each other with respect to the organization of the sale of goods and services that correspond to the normal business activities of all companies included in the consolidation.
compare: 8. the breakdown of the consolidated net turnover in accordance with Article 28 of Directive 78/660/EEC by areas of activity and by geographically defined markets, insofar as the areas of activity and geographically defined markets differ significantly from each other with regard to the organization of the sale of products and the provision of services which correspond to the normal business activities of all the companies included in the consolidation.

src: Der Bescheid gilt als am Tag der Vorlage des Antrags bei der zuständigen Stelle des Mitgliedstaats erteilt.
ref: The certificate shall be considered as having been issued on the day on which the application was lodged with the competent authority of the Member State in question.
draft: The decision shall be deemed to have been issued on the day the application was submitted to the competent authority of the Member State.
hil: The decision shall be deemed to have been granted on the day of submission of the application to the competent authority of the Member State.
compare: The decision shall be deemed to have been granted on the day of submission of the application to the competent authority of the Member State.

src: Der Wortlaut der Schreiben ist dieser Verordnung beigefügt.
ref: The text of the letters is annexed to this Regulation.
draft: The wording of the letters is attached to this regulation.

src: In den Auftragsunterlagen kann der Auftraggeber den Bieter auffordern oder von einem Mitgliedstatt verpflichtet werden, den Bieter aufzufordern, ihm in seinem Angebot den Teil des Auftrags, den der Bieter gegebenenfalls im Wege von Unteraufträgen an Dritte zu vergeben gedenkt, sowie die bereits vorgeschlagenen Unterauftragnehmer bekannt zu geben.
ref: In the contract documents, the contracting entity may ask, or may be required by a Member State to ask, the tenderer to indicate in his tender any share of the contract he intends to subcontract to third parties and any proposed subcontractors.
draft: In the tender documents, the client may request the bidder or be obliged by a member to request the bidder to indicate in his offer the part of the contract that the bidder intends, if applicable, to award to third parties by means of subcontracting, as well as to disclose the proposed subcontractors already suggested.
hil: In the tender documents, the contracting authority may request the bidder or be obliged by a member to request the bidder to indicate in his offer the part of the contract that the bidder intends, if applicable, to award to third parties by means of subcontracting, as well as to disclose the proposed subcontractors already suggested.
compare: In the tender documents, the client may request the bidder or be obliged by a member to request the bidder to indicate in his offer the part of the contract that the bidder intends, if applicable, to award to third parties by means of subcontracting, as well as to disclose the proposed subcontractors already suggested.

src: i) definieren sie unter Berücksichtigung der Maßstäbe des Anhangs 1 im Hinblick auf die Programme und Maßnahmen die Anwendung unter anderem
ref: (i) taking into account the criteria set forth in Appendix 1, define with respect to programmes and measures the application of, inter alia:

hil: Define the application, among other things, with regard to the programs and measures, taking into account the standards of Appendix 1.

src: Die zuständige Behörde des Mitgliedstaats, in dem die Verarbeitung und Neuzusammensetzung gemäß Artikel 10 stattfinden, überwacht die betreffenden Maßnahmen.
ref: The competent authorities of the Member States on whose territory the processing and repackaging operations referred to in Article 10 are carried out shall supervise those operations.
draft: The competent authority of the Member State in which the processing and reassembly referred to in Article 10 take place monitors the relevant measures.
hil: "The competent authority of the Member State in which the processing and reassembly referred to in Article 10 take place monitors the relevant measures."
compare: The competent authority of the Member State in which the processing and reassembly referred to in Article 10 take place monitors the relevant measures.

src: Ein solcher Kodex ist sowohl für die Bediensteten nützlich, da sie ausführlich über die im Kontakt mit der Öffentlichkeit zu beachtenden Regeln in Kenntnis gesetzt werden, als auch für die Bürger, da sie über die Verhaltensnormen informiert werden, von denen sie bei ihren Kontakten mit der Verwaltung der Europäischen Gemeinschaft ausgehen dürfen.
ref: Whereas such a code is useful for both the officials, as it will inform them in a detailed manner of the rules they have to follow when dealing with the public, and the citizens, as it will provide them with information on the standard of conduct they are entitled to expect in dealings with the Community administrations;
draft: Such a code is useful for both employees, as they are informed in detail about the rules to be observed when dealing with the public, and for citizens, as they are informed about the behavioral norms they may expect when interacting with the administration of the European Community.
hil: Such a code is useful for both employees, as they are informed in detail about the rules to be observed when dealing with the public, and for citizens, as they are informed about the behavioral norms they may expect when interacting with the administration of the European Community.
compare: Such a code is useful for both employees, as they are informed in detail about the rules to be observed when dealing with the public, and for citizens, as they are informed about the behavioral norms they may expect when interacting with the administration of the European Community.

src: (2) Ungeachtet des Absatzes 1 ist der Einfuhrzoll auf Erzeugnisse der KN-Codes 1001 10 00, 1001 90 91, ex 1001 90 99 (Weichweizen der oberen Qualität), 1002, ex 1005, ausgenommen Hybrid zur Aussaat, und ex 1007, ausgenommen Hybrid zur Aussaat, gleich dem für diese Erzeugnisse bei der Einfuhr geltenden Interventionspreis zuzüglich 55 % und abzüglich des cif-Einfuhrpreises für die betreffende Sendung.
ref: 2. Notwithstanding paragraph 1, the import duty on products covered by CN codes 1001 10 00, 1001 90 91, ex 1001 90 99 (high quality common wheat), 1002, ex 1005, other than hybrid seed, and ex 1007 other than hybrid for sowing, shall be equal to the intervention price valid for such products on importation and increased by 55 %, minus the cif import price applicable to the consignment in question.
draft: (2) Notwithstanding paragraph 1, the import duty on products falling within the CN codes 1001 10 00, 1001 90 91, ex 1001 90 99 (soft wheat of superior quality), 1002, ex 1005, other than hybrid for sowing, and ex 1007, other than hybrid for sowing, shall be equal to the intervention price applicable on importation to these products plus 55 % and minus the cif import price for the shipment in question.
hil: Notwithstanding paragraph 1, the import duty on products falling within the CN codes 1001 10 00, 1001 90 91, ex 1001 90 99 (soft wheat of superior quality), 1002, ex 1005, other than hybrid for sowing, and ex 1007, other than hybrid for sowing, shall be equal to the intervention price applicable on importation to these products plus 55 % and minus the cif import price for the shipment in question.
compare: (2) Notwithstanding paragraph 1, the import duty on products falling within the CN codes 1001 10 00, 1001 90 91, ex 1001 90 99 (soft wheat of superior quality), 1002, ex 1005, other than hybrid for sowing, and ex 1007, other than hybrid for sowing, shall be equal to the intervention price applicable on importation to these products plus 55 % and minus the cif import price for the shipment in question.

src: Der Normalwert würde sich folglich auf die Inlandspreise im Ursprungsland stützen müssen.
ref: The normal value would thus have to be based on the prices on the domestic market of the country of origin.

hil: The normal value would thus have to be based on domestic prices in the country of origin.

src: (6) Die in dieser Richtlinie vorgesehenen Maßnahmen entsprechen der Stellungnahme des Ständigen Ausschusses für die Lebensmittelkette und Tiergesundheit -
ref: (6) The measures provided for in this Directive are in accordance with the opinion of the Standing Committee on the Food Chain and Animal Health,

src: (3) Die Erzeugnisse müssen aus zugelassenen Betrieben oder Kühlhäusern bzw. von zugelassenen Fabrikschiffen oder Gefrierschiffen stammen, die in dem Verzeichnis in Anhang II aufgeführt sind.
ref: 3. The products shall come from approved establishments, factory vessels or cold stores or from registered freezer vessels listed in Annex II.
draft: The products must originate from approved facilities or cold storages, or from approved factory ships or freezer ships, which are listed in the directory in Annex II.

src: Entsprechend den Schlußfolgerungen dieses Berichts empfiehlt es sich, einige Bestimmungen der Richtlinie 91/629/EWG zu ändern, um sicherzustellen, daß die Bestimmungen auf wissenschaftlicher Grundlage basieren und nicht über das Maß hinausgehen, das für ein effektives Funktionieren der gemeinsamen Marktorganisationen notwendig ist.
ref: Whereas, on the basis of the conclusions of that report, it is appropriate to amend certain provisions of Directive 91/629/EEC in order to ensure that the rules are based on scientific evidence and do not go beyond what is necessary to enable the common organization of markets to function effectively;
draft: According to the conclusions of this report, it is recommended to change some provisions of Directive 91/629/EEC to ensure that the provisions are based on a scientific foundation and do not go beyond what is necessary for the effective functioning of the common market organizations.
hil: According to the conclusions of this report, it is recommended to amend some of the provisions of Directive 91/629/EEC to ensure that the provisions are based on a scientific foundation and do not go beyond what is necessary for effective functioning of the common market organizations.
compare: According to the conclusions of this report, it is recommended to amend some of the provisions of Directive 91/629/EEC to ensure that the provisions are based on a scientific foundation and do not go beyond what is necessary for effective functioning of the common market organizations.

src: (31) Analysen und Bewertungen, die aufgrund öffentlicher Angaben erstellt wurden, sollten nicht als Insider-Informationen angesehen werden; somit sollten auch Geschäfte, die auf der Grundlage dieser Analysen und Bewertungen getätigt werden, als solche nicht als Insider-Geschäfte im Sinne dieser Richtlinie gelten.

src: (69) Zweitens nehmen die vier Unternehmen, die in der Gemeinschaft FeMo herstellen, auf dem Markt unterschiedliche Positionen ein: Die beiden Unternehmen, die den Wirtschaftszweig der Gemeinschaft bilden, stellen FeMo in erster Linie selbst her, um es an Abnehmer zu verkaufen, während die beiden anderen Unternehmen MoO3 für Dritte (Einführer/Händler) gegen Entgelt zu FeMo verarbeiten.
ref: (69) Secondly, the four companies producing FeMo in the Community have a different position in the market: the two companies making up the Community industry primarily produce FeMo on their own account to be sold to users, whereas the other two companies convert MoO3 into FeMo on account of third parties (importers/traders) against payment of a fee.
draft: Secondly, the four companies that manufacture FeMo in the community occupy different positions in the market: the two companies that form the economic sector of the community primarily produce FeMo themselves to sell to customers, while the other two companies process MoO3 into FeMo for third parties (importers/traders) for a fee.
hil: Secondly, the four companies that produce FeMo in the Community occupy different positions in the market: the two companies that form the Community's economic sector primarily produce FeMo themselves to sell to customers, while the other two companies process MoO3 into FeMo for third parties (importers/traders) for a fee.
compare: Secondly, the four companies that manufacture FeMo in the community occupy different positions in the market: the two companies that form the economic sector of the community primarily produce FeMo themselves to sell to customers, while the other two companies process MoO3 into FeMo for third parties (importers/traders) for a fee.

Mai 1999 über die Förderung der Entwicklung des ländlichen Raums durch den Europäischen Ausrichtungs- und Garantiefonds für die Landwirtschaft (EAGFL) [5] festgelegten Beschränkungen.

src: Erfolgt die Mischung vor oder während der Trocknung, so wird nach der Trocknung eine Probe genommen; dazu wird ein Vermerk erstellt, aus dem hervorgeht, daß es sich um eine Mischung handelt, und in dem die Art des Zusatzstoffes, seine Bezeichnung, sein Gesamtstickstoffgehalt, bezogen auf die Trockenmasse, und sein prozentualer Anteil im Enderzeugnis angegeben sind."
ref: Where mixing is carried out before or during drying, a sample shall be taken after drying; it shall be accompanied by a statement to the effect that it relates to a mixture and specifying the type and name of the additive, its total nitrogenous content in the dry matter and the rate of incorporation in the finished product.`;
draft: If the mixing takes place before or during drying, a sample is taken after drying; for this purpose, a note is created indicating that it is a mixture and specifying the type of additive, its designation, its total nitrogen content, based on the dry matter, and its percentage share in the final product.
hil: If the mixing takes place before or during drying, a sample is taken after drying; for this purpose, a note is created indicating that it is a mixture and specifying the type of additive, its designation, its total nitrogen content, based on the dry matter, and its percentage share in the final product.
compare: If the mixing takes place before or during drying, a sample is taken after drying; for this purpose, a note is created indicating that it is a mixture and specifying the type of additive, its designation, its total nitrogen content, based on the dry matter, and its percentage share in the final product.

src: Die in dieser Richtlinie festgelegten Einschränkungen des Inverkehrbringens sollten dem derzeitigen Stand der Kenntnisse und Technik über sicherere Alternativen Rechnung tragen.
ref: Whereas the restrictions laid down by this Directive take into account the current state of knowledge and techniques regarding safer alternatives;
draft: The restrictions on placing on the market set out in this directive should take into account the current state of knowledge and technology regarding safer alternatives.
hil: The restrictions on placing on the market set out in this directive should take into account the current state of knowledge and technology regarding safer alternatives, in accordance with the procedures laid out in Article 13. Criteria for defining the products listed in this directive, including their composition and purity, as well as their physico-chemical and biological properties, may be established taking into account scientific and technical knowledge.
compare: The restrictions on placing on the market set out in this directive should take into account the current state of knowledge and technology regarding safer alternatives.

src: b) Der Ausgleich darf einen Betrag nicht überschreiten, der einem jährlichen Ausgleich entspricht, der aus dem Jahresdurchschnittsbetrag der Vergütungen, die der Handelsvertreter während der letzten fünf Jahre erhalten hat, errechnet wird; ist der Vertrag vor weniger als fünf Jahren geschlossen worden, wird der Ausgleich nach dem Durchschnittsbetrag des entsprechenden Zeitraums ermittelt.
ref: (b) The amount of the indemnity may not exceed a figure equivalent to an indemnity for one year calculated from the commercial agent's average annual remuneration over the preceding five years and if the contract goes back less than five years the indemnity shall be calculated on the average for the period in question;
draft: b) The compensation may not exceed an amount corresponding to an annual compensation calculated from the average annual amount of the remuneration received by the commercial agent during the last five years; if the contract has been concluded for less than five years, the compensation shall be determined on the basis of the average amount for the corresponding period.
hil: b) The compensation may not exceed an amount corresponding to an annually compensation calculated from the yearly average amount of the remuneration received by the commercial agent in the last five years. If the contract has been concluded for less than five years, the compensation shall be determined on the basis of the average amount for the corresponding period.
compare: b) The compensation may not exceed an amount corresponding to an annual compensation calculated from the average annual amount of the remuneration received by the commercial agent during the last five years; if the contract has been concluded for less than five years, the compensation shall be determined on the basis of the average amount for the corresponding period.

src: Frankreich hat deshalb gemäß Artikel 7 der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 3813/92 für die Jahre 1993, 1994 und 1995 eine Erhöhung der auf 60, 70 bzw. 75 ECU/t festgesetzten Beträge beantragt. Diesem Antrag sollte stattgegeben werden. Zur Sicherung einer guten Verwaltung des Sektors muß jedoch, unter Berücksichtigung des für diese Erhöhung in Frage kommenden Zeitraums, den beteiligten Mitgliedstaaten die Möglichkeit gegeben werden, diese Erhöhung tatsächlich vorzunehmen.
ref: Whereas, pursuant to Article 7 of Regulation (EEC) No 3813/92, France requested an increase for the years 1993, 1994 and 1995, in the amounts of ECU 60, 70 and 75 per tonne referred to above; whereas this request should be granted; whereas, however, for reasons of good economic management of the sector and in view of the period concerned by this increase, the Member States concerned should be given the option of applying it;
draft: France has therefore requested an increase in the amounts set at 60, 70 and 75 ECU/t for the years 1993, 1994 and 1995 in accordance with Article 7 of Regulation (EEC) No. 3813/92. This request should be granted. However, in order to ensure good management of the sector, and taking into account the period for which this increase is applicable, the Member States concerned must be given the opportunity to actually carry out this increase.
hil: France has therefore requested an increase in the amounts set at 60, 70 and 75 ECU/t for the years 1993, 1994 and 1995 in accordance with Article 7 of Regulation (EEC) No. 3813/92. This request should be granted. However, in order to ensure good management of the sector, and taking into account the period for which this increase is applicable, the Member States concerned must be given the opportunity to actually carry out this increase.
compare: France has therefore requested an increase in the amounts set at 60, 70 and 75 ECU/t for the years 1993, 1994 and 1995 in accordance with Article 7 of Regulation (EEC) No. 3813/92. This request should be granted. However, in order to ensure good management of the sector, and taking into account the period for which this increase is applicable, the Member States concerned must be given the opportunity to actually carry out this increase.

src: (1) Die von den Stellen nach Artikel 92 Absatz 4 auf der Grundlage des Informationsaustauschs nach jenem Absatz gespeicherten personenbezogenen Daten werden nicht länger als für den verfolgten Zweck erforderlich gespeichert.
ref: 1. Personal data held in files by the authorities referred to in Article 92(4) as a result of information exchange pursuant to that paragraph, shall be kept only for such time as may be required to achieve the purposes for which they were supplied.
draft: "The personal data stored by the authorities pursuant to Article 92(4) on the basis of the exchange of information referred to in that paragraph shall not be stored for longer than is necessary for the purposes pursued."

compare: "The personal data stored by the authorities pursuant to Article 92(4) on the basis of the exchange of information referred to in that paragraph shall not be stored for longer than is necessary for the purposes pursued."

src: (11) An der Entwicklung des Handels zwischen den Mitgliedstaaten, insbesondere der ständig zunehmenden Tätigkeit multinationaler Unternehmen in diesem Bereich, und den in der Marktverwaltung vorgesehenen Möglichkeiten, Maßnahmen mit oder ohne Beihilfe an einem anderen Ort als dem Ursprungsort der Erzeugnisse durchzuführen, wird die wechselseitige Abhängigkeit auf dem Weinmarkt deutlich.
ref: (11) The interdependence of wine-sector markets is reflected in the evolution of trade between Member States, in particular the constant increase in the number of international companies active in the sector, and the possibilities offered by the sector's management rules to have operations, whether aided or not, carried out in or transferred to, a location other than that from which the product originates.
draft: (11) The interdependence in the wine market is evident in the development of trade between the member states, particularly the constantly increasing activity of multinational companies in this area, and the possibilities provided by market management to implement measures with or without aid at a location other than the place of origin of the products.
hil: The mutual dependence in the wine market is evident in the development of trade between member states, in particular the constantly increasing activity of multinational companies in this area, and the possibilities provided by market management to carry out measures with or without aid at a location other than the place of origin of the products.
compare: (11) The interdependence in the wine market is evident in the development of trade between the member states, particularly the constantly increasing activity of multinational companies in this area, and the possibilities provided by market management to implement measures with or without aid at a location other than the place of origin of the products.

src: Außerdem können die Ausführer von Waren, für die Antidumpingmaßnahmen gelten, ohne Weiteres künstlich erhöhte Preise (d. h. über dem MEP) in Rechnung stellen, wenn sie die Ware an Unternehmen in der Gemeinschaft ausführen, und diese Preise später nach der Zollanmeldung ausgleichen.
ref: In addition, as pointed out above, exporters of products for which anti-dumping measures are in place could easily invoice at an artificially high price (i.e. above the MIP) when they export to related companies in the Community, and subsequently compensate such a price after customs declaration.
draft: In addition, exporters of goods subject to anti-dumping measures can easily charge artificially increased prices (i.e. above the MEP) when exporting the goods to companies in the Community, and later compensate these prices after customs declaration.
hil: Furthermore, exporters of goods subject to anti-dumping measures can easily charge artificially increased prices (i.e. above the MEP) when shipping the goods to companies in the Community and then compensate for these prices later after customs declaration.
compare: Furthermore, exporters of goods subject to anti-dumping measures can easily charge artificially increased prices (i.e. above the MEP) when shipping the goods to companies in the Community and then compensate for these prices later after customs declaration.

src: (126) Um die effektive Einhaltung und Übwachung der Verpflichtungen sicherzustellen, ist die Zollbefreiung bei der Anmeldung zur Überführung in den freien Verkehr gemäß einer Verpflichtung davon abhängig, dass den Zollstellen des zuständigen Mitgliedstaats eine gültige Verpflichtungsrechnung vorgelegt wird, die von den ausführenden Herstellern ausgestellt wurde, deren Verpflichtungsangebote angenommen wurden, und die ferner die im Anhang aufgeführten Informationen enthält.
ref: (126) In order to ensure the effective respect and monitoring of the undertakings, when the request for release for free circulation pursuant to the undertakings is presented, exemption from the duty is conditional upon presentation to the relevant Member States' customs' services of a valid undertaking invoice issued by the exporting producers from whom the undertakings are accepted and containing the information listed in the Annex.
draft: To ensure effective compliance and monitoring of the obligations, the customs duty exemption for the declaration for release for free circulation is dependent on a commitment that a valid commitment invoice issued by the participating manufacturers whose commitments have been accepted must be presented to the customs offices of the relevant Member State, which also contains the information listed in the appendix.
hil: To ensure effective compliance and monitoring of the obligations, the exemption from customs duties when registering for release into free circulation in accordance with an undertaking is dependent on the presentation of a valid commitment invoice to the customs offices of the competent Member State, which has been issued by the participating manufacturers whose commitments have been accepted and furthermore contains the information listed in the annex.
compare: To ensure effective compliance and monitoring of the obligations, the exemption from customs duties when registering for release into free circulation in accordance with an undertaking is dependent on the presentation of a valid commitment invoice to the customs offices of the competent Member State, which has been issued by the participating manufacturers whose commitments have been accepted and furthermore contains the information listed in the annex.

src: (3) Im Fall des Wiederverkaufs in den ersten drei Monaten des Wirtschaftsjahres bei Mais und Sorghum und in den ersten zwei Monaten des Wirtschaftsjahres bei Weichweizen, Hartweizen, Roggen und Gerste muß das berücksichtigte Angebot mindestens dem im elften Monat des vorangegangenen Wirtschaftsjahres gültigen, um einen monatlichen Zuschlag desselben Wirtschaftsjahres erhöhten Interventionspreis entsprechen.
ref: 3. In the case of resale of maize and grain sorghum during the first three months of the marketing year and of common wheat, durum wheat, rye and barley during the first two months on the marketing year, successful tenders must quote a price at least equal to the intervention price applicable for the 11th month of the preceding marketing year, plus one monthly increase fixed for that year.
draft: In case of resale within the first three months of the fiscal year for corn and sorghum, and within the first two months of the fiscal year for soft wheat, durum wheat, rye and barley, the considered offer must correspond at least to the intervention price increased by a monthly surcharge of the same fiscal year valid in the eleventh month of the previous fiscal year.

compare: In case of resale within the first three months of the fiscal year for corn and sorghum, and within the first two months of the fiscal year for soft wheat, durum wheat, rye and barley, the considered offer must correspond at least to the intervention price increased by a monthly surcharge of the same fiscal year valid in the eleventh month of the previous fiscal year.

src: Der Anhang der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 2400/96 wird um die im Anhang der vorliegenden Verordnung genannten Bezeichnungen ergänzt, und diese Bezeichnungen werden außerdem in das "Verzeichnis der geschützten Ursprungsangaben und der geschützten geografischen Angaben" als geschützte geografische Angabe (g.g.A.) bzw. geschützte Ursprungsangabe (g.U.) gemäß Artikel 6 Absatz 3 der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 2081/92 eingetragen.
ref: The names listed in the Annex to this Regulation are hereby added to the Annex to Regulation (EC) No 2400/96 and entered as a protected geographical indication (PGI) and as a protected designation of origin (PDO) in the "Register of protected designations of origin and protected geographical indications" provided for in Article 6(3) of Regulation (EEC) No 2081/92.
draft: The Annex to Regulation (EC) No 2400/96 is supplemented by the names referred to in the Annex to this Regulation, and these names are also entered in the "Register of Protected Designations of Origin and Protected Geographical Indications" as a protected geographical indication (PGI) or protected designation of origin (PDO) in accordance with Article 6(3) of Regulation (EEC) No 2081/92.
hil: The Annex to Regulation (EC) No 2400/96 is supplemented by the names referred to in the Annex to this Regulation, and these names are also entered in the "Register of Protected Designations of Origin and Protected Geographical Indications" as a protected geographical indication (PGI) or protected designation of origin (PDO) in accordance with Article 6(3) of Regulation (EEC) No 2081/92.
compare: The Annex to Regulation (EC) No 2400/96 is supplemented by the names referred to in the Annex to this Regulation, and these names are also entered in the "Register of Protected Designations of Origin and Protected Geographical Indications" as a protected geographical indication (PGI) or protected designation of origin (PDO) in accordance with Article 6(3) of Regulation (EEC) No 2081/92.

src: (2) Lässt sich eine Streitigkeit über solche Konsultationen nicht in angemessener Zeit beilegen, so konsultieren sich die fraglichen Parteien so bald wie möglich untereinander, um die Streitigkeit in Übereinstimmung mit dem Völkerrecht auf friedliche Art und Weise beizulegen.
ref: 2. If a dispute is not settled through such consultation within a reasonable period, the Parties in question shall consult among themselves as soon as possible in order to settle the dispute through any peaceful means they may decide upon in accordance with international law.
draft: (2) If a dispute over such consultations cannot be settled within a reasonable period of time, the parties concerned shall consult with each other as soon as possible in order to settle the dispute in accordance with international law in a peaceful manner.

src: Die vertraglichen Bedingungen können für den Verbraucher nachteilig sein. Ein besserer Schutz des Verbrauchers kann dadurch erreicht werden, daß bestimmte Vorschriften erlassen werden, die für alle Formen des Kredits gelten.
ref: Whereas the terms of credit may be disadvantageous to the consumer; whereas better protection of consumers can be achieved by adopting certain requirements which are to apply to all forms of credit;

src: Damit die von den Mitgliedstaaten abzuführenden Mittel besser ihrer jeweiligen Beitragskapazität entsprechen, ist die Zusammensetzung der Eigenmittel der Gemeinschaft zu ändern und zu erweitern; zu diesem Zweck
ref: Whereas, with a view to matching the resources paid by each Member State more closely with its ability to contribute, the compositon of Community own resources should be amended and enlarged; whereas it is necessary for this purpose:

src: (1) Eine Unterzeichnerregierung, die dieses Übereinkommen ratifizieren, annehmen oder genehmigen will, oder eine Regierung, für die der Rat Beitrittsbedingungen festgelegt hat, die jedoch ihre Urkunde noch nicht hinterlegen konnte, kann dem Verwahrer jederzeit notifizieren, daß sie dieses Übereinkommen von seinem Inkrafttreten nach Artikel 40 an oder, wenn es bereits in Kraft ist, von einem bestimmten Tag an vorläufig anwenden wird.
ref: 1. A signatory government which intends to ratify, accept or approve this Agreement, or a government for which the Council has established conditions for accession but which has not yet been able to deposit its instrument, may, at any time, notify the depositary that it will apply this Agreement provisionally either when it enters into force in accordance with Article 40 or, if it is already in force, at a specified date.
draft: A signatory government that wants to ratify, adopt or approve this Convention, or a government for which the Council has established conditions for accession but which has not yet been able to deposit its instrument, may notify the Depository at any time that it intends to apply this Convention provisionally from the date of its entry into force under Article 40 or, if it is already in force, from a specific date.
hil: According to Article 30.1 in conjunction with Articles 43.1 and 43.4 of the Statute, the European Central Bank (ECB) is endowed by the national central banks (NCBs) of the Member States which have introduced the single currency in accordance with the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union (participating NCBs) with foreign reserve assets, not consisting of currencies of Member States, euro, IMF reserve positions and special drawing rights (SDRs), up to a limit of 50 billion euros.
compare: A signatory government that wants to ratify, adopt or approve this Convention, or a government for which the Council has established conditions for accession but which has not yet been able to deposit its instrument, may notify the Depository at any time that it intends to apply this Convention provisionally from the date of its entry into force under Article 40 or, if it is already in force, from a specific date.

src: - Mitglieder, die keinen wirksamen Beitrag mehr zur Arbeit der Gruppe zu leisten vermögen, ihr Amt niederlegen oder gegen die im ersten oder im zweiten Spiegelstrich dieses Artikels festgelegten Bestimmungen oder gegen die Bestimmungen des Artikels 287 EG-Vertrag verstoßen, können für die Dauer ihrer verbleibenden Amtszeit ersetzt werden.
ref: - members who are no longer able to make an effective contribution to the work of the group, who resign or who breach the requirements set out in the first or second indent of the present Article or in Article 287 of the Treaty establishing the European Community, may be replaced for the remainder of their term,
draft: Members who can no longer make an effective contribution to the work of the group may resign from their office or, in the case of a breach of the provisions laid down in the first or second indent of this Article or in Article 287 of the EC Treaty, be replaced for the remainder of their term of office.
hil: Members who are no longer able to make an effective contribution to the work of the group may resign from their position or be replaced for the remainder of their term of office if they violate the provisions set out in the first or second indent of this article, or the provisions of Article 287 of the EC Treaty.
compare: Members who are no longer able to make an effective contribution to the work of the group may resign from their position or be replaced for the remainder of their term of office if they violate the provisions set out in the first or second indent of this article, or the provisions of Article 287 of the EC Treaty.

src: (5) Ein Mitgliedstaat kann einzelstaatliche Rechtsvorschriften erlassen oder beibehalten, in denen für die Ausfuhr von Gütern mit doppeltem Verwendungszweck, die nicht in Anhang I aufgeführt sind, eine Genehmigungspflicht vorgeschrieben wird, wenn der Ausführer Grund zu der Annahme hat, daß diese Güter ganz oder teilweise für einen der in Absatz 1 genannten Verwendungszwecke bestimmt sind oder bestimmt sein können.
ref: 5. A Member State may adopt or maintain national legislation imposing an authorisation requirement on the export of dual-use items not listed in Annex I if the exporter has grounds for suspecting that those items are or may be intended, in their entirety or in part, for any of the uses referred to in paragraph 1.
draft: "A member state may enact or maintain national legislation requiring an authorization for the export of dual-use goods that are not listed in Annex I if the exporter has reason to believe that these goods are intended or may be intended, in whole or in part, for one of the uses referred to in paragraph 1."
hil: A member state may enact or maintain national legislation requiring an authorization for the export of dual-use goods that are not listed in Annex I if the exporter has reason to believe that these goods are intended or may be intended, in whole or in part, for one of the uses referred to in paragraph 1.

src: in Erwägung nachstehender Gründe: Infolge der Entwicklung der wissenschaftlichen und technischen Erkenntnisse sind aus den nachstehend dargelegten Gründen die Anlage I und II der Richtlinie 66/401/EWG, die Anlage III der Richtlinie 66/402/EWG und die Anlage II der Richtlinie 69/208/EWG zu ändern.
ref: Whereas, in the light of the development of scientific and technical knowledge, Annexes I and II to Directive 66/401/EEC, Annex III to Directive 66/402/EEC and Annex II to Directive 69/208/EEC should be amended for the reasons set out below;

hil: Having regard to the following reasons: As a result of the development of scientific and technical knowledge, the Annexes I and II of Directive 66/401/EEC, Annex III of Directive 66/402/EEC and Annex II of Directive 69/208/EEC should be amended for the reasons set out below.

src: (1) Der Generalsekretär/Hohe Vertreter ist befugt, gegebenenfalls entsprechend den operativen Erfordernissen der Mission EU-Verschlusssachen und für die Zwecke der Mission erstellte EU-Dokumente bis zur Vertraulichkeitsstufe "RESTREINT UE" unter Einhaltung der Sicherheitsvorschriften des Rates an Drittstaaten, die sich an dieser Gemeinsamen Aktion beteiligen, weiterzugeben.
ref: 1. The SG/HR is authorised to release to Third States associated with this Joint Action, as appropriate and in accordance with the operational needs of the mission, EU classified information and documents up to the level "RESTREINT UE" generated for the purposes of the mission, in accordance with the Council's security regulations.
draft: The Secretary-General/High Representative is authorized, if necessary in accordance with the operational requirements of the Mission, to communicate EU classified information and EU documents produced for the purposes of the Mission up to the level of RESTREINT UE, while complying with the security regulations of the Council, to third states participating in this Joint Action.
hil: The Secretary-General/High Representative is authorized, if necessary in accordance with the operational requirements of the Mission, to communicate EU classified information and EU documents produced for the purposes of the Mission up to the level of RESTREINT UE, while complying with the security regulations of the Council, to third states participating in this Joint Action.
