src: Die Berichte werden der Kommission alle zwei Jahre spätestens am letzten Arbeitstag im April und erstmals spätestens am 30. April 2002 vorgelegt.
ref: The report will have to be presented to the Commission every two years, by the last working day in April and for the first time by 30 April 2002.
draft: The reports shall be submitted to the Commission every two years, at the latest on the last working day of April, and for the first time at the latest on 30 April 2002.
hil: The reports shall be submitted to the Commission every two years, at the latest on the last working day of April, and for the first time no later than April 30, 2002.
compare: The reports shall be submitted to the Commission every two years, at the latest on the last working day of April, and for the first time at the latest on 30 April 2002.

src: a) Inhalt und Programmplatz einer gesponserten Sendung dürfen vom Sponsor auf keinen Fall in der Weise beeinflusst werden, daß die Verantwortung und die redaktionelle Unabhängigkeit des Fernsehveranstalters in bezug auf die Sendungen angetastet werden.
ref: (a) the content and scheduling of sponsored programmes may in no circumstances be influenced by the sponsor in such a way as to affect the responsibility and editorial independence of the broadcaster in respect of programmes;
draft: a) The content and program slot of a sponsored program must not be influenced by the sponsor in such a way that the responsibility and editorial independence of the television broadcaster regarding the programs are touched.
hil: The content and program slot of a sponsored program must not be influenced by the sponsor in such a way that the responsibility and editorial independence of the television broadcaster regarding the programs are touched.
compare: a) The content and program slot of a sponsored program must not be influenced by the sponsor in such a way that the responsibility and editorial independence of the television broadcaster regarding the programs are touched.

src: (48) Aus den vorstehenden Erwägungen und da keine anderen stichhaltigen Argumente zur möglichen Ursache der Schädigung des Wirtschaftszweigs der Gemeinschaft vorgebracht wurden, wird bestätigt, dass die gedumpten Zinkoxideinfuhren mit Ursprung in der VR China Ursache der Schädigung des Wirtschaftszweigs der Gemeinschaft waren.
ref: (48) In view of the above considerations and given that no other valid arguments were received regarding the possible cause of the injury suffered by the Community industry, it is hereby confirmed that the dumped imports of zinc oxide originating in the PRC caused injury to the Community industry.
draft: From the foregoing considerations and since no other compelling arguments have been put forward as to the possible cause of damage to the economic sector of the Community, it is confirmed that the dumped imports of zinc oxide originating in the People's Republic of China were the cause of the damage to the economic sector of the Community.
hil: Based on the foregoing considerations, and since no other compelling arguments were put forward as to the possible cause of injury to the economic sector of the Community, it is confirmed that the dumped imports of zinc oxide originating in the People’s Republic of China were the cause of injury to the economic sector of the Community.
compare: From the foregoing considerations and since no other compelling arguments have been put forward as to the possible cause of damage to the economic sector of the Community, it is confirmed that the dumped imports of zinc oxide originating in the People's Republic of China were the cause of the damage to the economic sector of the Community.

src: e)Nach erfolgtem Vergleich zahlt der zuständige Träger gegebenenfalls eine Zulage zu den in den Rechtsvorschriften des Wohnstaats der Familienangehörigen vorgesehenen Leistungen in Höhe des Unterschieds zwischen dem Betrag der in diesen Rechtsvorschriften vorgesehenen Leistungen und dem Betrag der nach den Rechtsvorschriften des zuständigen Staates geschuldeten Leistungen.
ref: (e)After having made the comparison, the competent institution shall, where appropriate, provide a supplement to the benefits provided for by the legislation of the Member State of residence of the members of the family, equal to the difference between the amount of benefit provided for by the said legislation an the amount of benefit due under the legislation of the competent State.
draft: e) After the comparison has been made, the responsible body may pay a supplement to the benefits provided for in the legal provisions of the family members' state of residence, equal to the difference between the amount of the benefits provided for in these legal provisions and the amount of the benefits owed under the legal provisions of the responsible state.
hil: "After the comparison has been made, the competent authority may, if necessary, pay a supplement to the benefits provided for in the legal provisions of the state of residence of the family members in the amount of the difference between the amount of the benefits provided for in these legal provisions and the amount of the benefits owed under the legal provisions of the responsible state."
compare: e) After the comparison has been made, the responsible body may pay a supplement to the benefits provided for in the legal provisions of the family members' state of residence, equal to the difference between the amount of the benefits provided for in these legal provisions and the amount of the benefits owed under the legal provisions of the responsible state.

src: (1) Die Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 3600/92 der Kommission vom 11. Dezember 1992 mit Durchführungsbestimmungen für die erste Stufe des Arbeitsprogramms gemäß Artikel 8 Absatz 2 der Richtlinie 91/414/EWG des Rates über das Inverkehrbringen von Pflanzenschutzmitteln(3), zuletzt geändert durch die Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1972/1999(4), enthält Regeln für die Prüfung von 90 Wirkstoffen, die zwei Jahre nach der Notifizierung der Richtlinie 91/414/EWG bereits im Handel waren und deren Neubewertung als vorrangig angesehen wurde.
ref: (1) Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3600/92 of 11 December 1992 laying down the detailed rules for the implementation of the first stage of the programme of work referred to in Article 8(2) of Council Directive 91/414/EEC concerning the placing of plant protection products on the market(3), as last amended by Commission Regulation (EC) No 1972/1999(4), established rules for the re-evaluation of 90 active substances already on the market two years after notification of Directive 91/414/EEC whose re-evaluation was considered a first priority.
draft: The Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3600/92 of 11 December 1992 on the implementation of the first stage of the work programme pursuant to Article 8(2) of Council Directive 91/414/EEC concerning the placing of plant protection products on the market(3), as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 1972/1999(4), lays down the rules for the testing of 90 active substances which were on the market two years after the notification of Directive 91/414/EEC and whose re-evaluation was considered to be a priority.
hil: Whereas Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3600/92 of 11 December 1992 lays down rules for the testing of 90 active substances which were already on the market two years after the notification of Directive 91/414/EEC and whose re-evaluation was considered to be a priority pursuant to Article 8(2) of Council Directive 91/414/EEC concerning the placing of plant protection products on the market(3), as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 1972/1999(4).
compare: The Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3600/92 of 11 December 1992 on the implementation of the first stage of the work programme pursuant to Article 8(2) of Council Directive 91/414/EEC concerning the placing of plant protection products on the market(3), as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 1972/1999(4), lays down the rules for the testing of 90 active substances which were on the market two years after the notification of Directive 91/414/EEC and whose re-evaluation was considered to be a priority.

src: (4) Die Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 2454/93 der Kommission vom 2. Juli 1993 mit Durchführungsvorschriften zu der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 2913/92 des Rates zur Festlegung des Zollkodex der Gemeinschaft(8), zuletzt geändert durch die Verordnung (EG) Nr. 993/2001(9), enthält die kodifizierten Vorschriften über die Verwaltung der Zollkontingente, die in der Reihenfolge zugeteilt werden, in der die Anmeldungen angenommen wurden.
ref: (4) Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2454/93 of 2 July 1993 laying down provisions for the implementation of Council Regulation (EEC) No 2913/92 establishing the Community Customs Code(8), as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 993/2001(9), has codified the management rules for tariff quotas designed to be used following the chronological order of dates of customs declarations.

hil: Regulation (EEC) No 2454/93 of the Commission of 2 July 1993 laying down provisions for the implementation of Council Regulation (EEC) No 2913/92 establishing the Community Customs Code (8), last amended by Regulation (EC) No 993/2001 (9), contains the codified rules on the management of tariff quotas which are allocated in the order in which the applications are accepted.
compare: The regulation (EEC) No 2454/93 of the Commission of 2 July 1993 laying down provisions for the implementation of Council Regulation (EEC) No 2913/92 establishing the Community Customs Code (8), last amended by Regulation (EC) No 993/2001 (9), contains the codified rules on the management of tariff quotas which are allocated in the order in which the applications are accepted.

src: (2) Kann nach Auffassung eines Mitgliedstaats die vollständige Wiedereinziehung eines Betrages nicht vorgenommen oder nicht erwartet werden, so teilt er der Kommission in einer besonderen Mitteilung den nicht wiedereingezogenen Betrag und die Gründe mit, aus denen nach seiner Auffassung dieser Betrag zu Lasten der Gemeinschaft oder des Mitgliedstaats geht.
ref: 2. Where a Member State considers that an amount cannot be totally recovered, or cannot be expected to be totally recovered, it shall inform the Commission, in a special report, of the amount not recovered and the reasons why the amount should, in its view, be borne by the Community or by the Member State.
draft: (2) If, in the opinion of a Member State, it is not possible or expected to fully recover an amount, it shall notify the Commission in a specific communication of the amount not recovered and the reasons why it considers that it is to be borne by the Community or the Member State.
hil: If a Member State deems that the complete recovery of an amount cannot be made or is not expected, it shall inform the Commission of the amount not recovered and the reasons why, in its view, this amount is to be borne by the Community or the Member State through a specific communication.
compare: (2) If, in the opinion of a Member State, it is not possible or expected to fully recover an amount, it shall notify the Commission in a specific communication of the amount not recovered and the reasons why it considers that it is to be borne by the Community or the Member State.

src: (17) Bei schwarzen Farbbildnern handelt es sich um eine spezifische Gruppe von Fluoran-Farbbildnern, die, wenn sie zur Beschichtung von Selbstdurchschreibepapier oder Thermopapier verwendet werden, von sich aus, ohne dass andere Farbbildner hinzugefügt werden müssen, ein schwarzes Bild auf dem Papier erzeugen.
ref: (17) Black colorformers constitute a specific group of fluoran colorformers which, when used to coat paper for the production of carbonless paper or thermal paper generate by their own properties a black image on the paper without having to be mixed with other colorformers.

src: Die Erstattung für Ausfuhren von Erzeugnissen des KN-Codes 0406 nach Kroatien im Rahmen von Lizenzen, die vor dem 1. Juni 2003 beantragt wurden und in Feld 7 ein anderes Bestimmungsland als Kroatien tragen, das der Bestimmungszone I gemäß der jeweils geltenden Definition in Artikel 15 Absatz 3 der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 174/1999 der Kommission [3] angehört, wird gezahlt.
ref: The refund on exports to Croatia of products falling in CN code 0406 covered by licences applied for before 1 June 2003 and showing in box 7 a destination other than Croatia falling under destination zone I, as then defined in Article 15(3) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 174/1999 [3], shall be paid.
draft: The reimbursement for exports of products with the KN code 0406 to Croatia under licenses that were applied for before June 1, 2003 and bear a different destination country than Croatia in field 7, which belongs to destination zone I in accordance with the definition in force in Article 15(3) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 174/1999 [3], shall be paid.
hil: Reimbursement for exports of products with KN code 0406 to Croatia will be paid as part of licenses applied for before June 1, 2003 bearing a destination country other than Croatia in field 7, which belongs to destination zone I in accordance with the currently applicable definition in Article 15(3) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 174/1999 [3]
compare: The reimbursement for exports of products with the KN code 0406 to Croatia under licenses that were applied for before June 1, 2003 and bear a different destination country than Croatia in field 7, which belongs to destination zone I in accordance with the definition in force in Article 15(3) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 174/1999 [3], shall be paid.

src: (13) Die Emissionen der Motoren von mobilen Maschinen und Geräten sowie land- und forstwirtschaftlichen Zugmaschinen müssen den Grenzwerten genügen, wie sie festgelegt sind in der Richtlinie 97/68/EG des Europäischen Parlaments und des Rates vom 16. Dezember 1997 zur Angleichung der Rechtsvorschriften der Mitgliedstaaten über Maßnahmen zur Bekämpfung der Emission von gasförmigen Schadstoffen und luftverunreinigenden Partikeln aus Verbrennungsmotoren für mobile Maschinen und Geräte(8) und in der Richtlinie 2000/25/EG des Europäischen Parlaments und des Rates vom 22. Mai 2000 über Maßnahmen zur Bekämpfung der Emissionen gasförmiger Schadstoffe und luftverunreinigender Partikel aus Motoren, die für den Antrieb von land- und forstwirtschaftlichen Zugmaschinen bestimmt sind(9).
ref: (13) The emissions from engines installed in non-road mobile machinery and agricultural and forestry tractors have to comply with the limits stipulated in Directive 97/68/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 16 December 1997 on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to measures against the emission of gaseous and particulate pollutants from internal combustion engines to be installed in non-road mobile machinery(8) and in Directive 2000/25/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 22 May 2000 on action to be taken against the emission of gaseous and particulate pollutants by engines intended to power agricultural or forestry tractors(9).
draft: The emissions of engines of mobile machines and devices as well as of agricultural and forestry tractors must comply with the limit values as defined in Directive 97/68/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 16 December 1997 on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to measures against the emission of gaseous pollutants and particulate matter from combustion engines for mobile machinery and equipment (8) and in Directive 2000/25/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 22 May 2000 on action to be taken against the emission of gaseous and particulate pollutants by engines intended to power agricultural or forestry tractors(9).
hil: The emissions from engines of mobile machines and equipment, as well as of agricultural and forestry tractors, must comply with the limit values as defined in Directive 97/68/EC of the European Parliament and the Council of 16 December 1997 on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to measures against the emission of gaseous pollutants and particulate matter from combustion engines for mobile machinery and equipment (8) and Directive 2000/25/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 22 May 2000 on action to be taken against the emission of gaseous and particulate pollutants by engines intended to power agricultural or forestry tractors (9).
compare: The emissions of engines of mobile machines and devices as well as of agricultural and forestry tractors must comply with the limit values as defined in Directive 97/68/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 16 December 1997 on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to measures against the emission of gaseous pollutants and particulate matter from combustion engines for mobile machinery and equipment (8) and in Directive 2000/25/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 22 May 2000 on action to be taken against the emission of gaseous and particulate pollutants by engines intended to power agricultural or forestry tractors(9).

src: Die Bestimmungen zur Organisation der Kontrollen durch den Bestimmungsmitgliedstaat und die daraus zu ziehenden Folgerungen sowie die zu treffenden Schutzmaßnahmen sind im Rahmen der zu erlassenden Regelung über Veterinärkontrollen im innergemeinschaftlichen Handel mit lebenden Tieren im Hinblick auf die Verwirklichung des Binnenmarktes festzulegen.
ref: Whereas the organization of and the follow-up to the checks to be carried out by the Member State of destination and the safeguard measures to be implemented should be fixed within the framework of rules to be laid down for veterinary checks in intra-Community trade in live animals in view of the completion of the internal market;
draft: The provisions for organizing controls by the destination Member State and the conclusions to be drawn from them, as well as the protective measures to be taken, are to be defined within the framework of the regulation to be issued on veterinary checks in trade in live animals within the internal market for the purpose of realizing the internal market.

src: (1) Ein Mitgliedstaat kann die Schlichtungsstelle nur innerhalb von dreissig Arbeitstagen nach Eingang der Mitteilung gemäß Artikel 1 Absatz 1 Buchstabe a) anrufen, indem er einen mit Gründen versehenen Antrag auf Schlichtung an das Sekretariat der Schlichtungsstelle richtet, dessen Anschrift den Mitgliedstaaten im Rahmen des EAGFL-Ausschusses mitgeteilt wird.

ref: (2) By Commission Decision 92/160/EEC of 5 March 1992 establishing the regionalisation of certain third countries for imports of equidae(5), as last amended by Decision 2001/611/EC(6), Peru is regionalised to restrict the re-entry after temporary export of registered horses to the metropolitan area of Lima only.
draft: (2) With the Commission Decision 92/160/EEC of 5 March 1992 laying down the regionalization of certain third countries for the importation of solipeds(5), last amended by Decision 2001/611/EC(6), Peru has been regionalised so that registered horses may only be re-imported if they have been temporarily exported to the "territory of the city of Lima".

src: Nach Artikel 8 Absatz 1 der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 729/70 des Rates vom 21. April 1970 über die Finanzierung der gemeinsamen Agrarpolitik (5), zuletzt geändert durch die Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1287/95 (6), treffen die Mitgliedstaaten die Maßnahmen, die gemäß den einzelstaatlichen Rechts- und Verwaltungsvorschriften zur Wiedereinziehung von Beträgen, deren Verlust auf Unregelmäßigkeiten beruht, notwendig sind.
ref: Whereas Article 8 (1) of Council Regulation (EEC) No 729/70 (5) of 21 April 1970 on the financing of the common agricultural policy, as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 1287/95 (6), requires Member States to take the measures necessary to recover sums lost as a result of irregularities in accordance with national provisions laid down by law, regulation or administrative action;

hil: Whereas according to Article 8(1) of Regulation (EEC) No 729/70 of the Council of 21 April 1970 on the financing of the common agricultural policy (5), last amended by Regulation (EC) No 1287/95 (6), Member States shall take the measures necessary under their national legal and administrative provisions to recover amounts lost as a result of irregularities.
compare: According to Article 8(1) of Regulation (EEC) No 729/70 of the Council of 21 April 1970 on the financing of the common agricultural policy (5), last amended by Regulation (EC) No 1287/95 (6), Member States shall take the measures necessary under their national legal and administrative provisions to recover amounts lost as a result of irregularities.

src: (13) Um eine effiziente Auslagerung sicherzustellen und um die Fachkompetenzen der Exekutivagentur voll nutzen zu können, sollte die Kommission ermächtigt werden, dieser Agentur einige oder alle Aufgaben zur Durchführung eines oder mehrerer Gemeinschaftsprogramme zu übertragen, ausgenommen die Aufgaben, die einen Ermessensspielraum zur Umsetzung politischer Entscheidungen voraussetzen.
ref: (13) To ensure that outsourcing is effective and that full benefit is drawn from the expertise of an executive agency, the Commission must be allowed to delegate to it all or some of the implementing tasks for one or more Community programmes, except for those requiring discretionary powers in translating political choices into action.
draft: To ensure efficient outsourcing and to fully utilize the expertise of the executive agency, the Commission should be empowered to delegate some or all tasks related to the implementation of one or more Community programmes to this agency, with the exception of tasks which require discretion in implementing political decisions.

src: Der Mitgliedstaat kann jedoch erlauben, das betreffende Erzeugnis in der Gemeinschaft zum Verkauf vorrätig zu halten oder in den Verkehr zu bringen oder es auszuführen, sofern die Bezeichnung oder Aufmachung dieses Erzeugnisses so geändert wird, daß sie den Bestimmungen des Absatzes 1 entspricht.
ref: The Member State may, however, grant an authorisation for the product to be held for sale, put on the market in the Community or exported, provided that its description or presentation is changed to conform to the provisions referred to in paragraph 1.
draft: However, the Member State may permit the product concerned to be stored for sale, sold or exported in the Community provided that the designation or presentation of that product is amended to comply with the provisions of paragraph 1.

ref: 6. The Member State shall inform the successful tenderer for each lot, as withdrawals are made, of producer organisations where he may obtain supplies of fresh products withdrawn from the market with priority over other beneficiaries as referred to in Articles 11 and 12 of this Regulation.

src: ( 1 ) BEI DER ANWENDUNG DES ARTIKELS 1 WIRD DER NACHWEIS DER URSPRUNGSEIGENSCHAFT IM SINNE DES ARTIKELS 1 DER GRUNDVERORDNUNG DER IM ERSTEN CACM-LAND HERGESTELLTEN UND NACH EINEM ANDEREN CACM-LAND AUSGEFÜHRTEN WAREN DURCH EIN URSPRUNGSZEUGNIS NACH FORMBLATT A GEMÄSS DEM MUSTER IM ANHANG ZU DER GRUNDVERORDNUNG ERBRACHT .

draft: When applying Article 1, proof of origin in accordance with Article 1 of the basic regulation of goods produced in the first ACM country and exported to another ACM country shall be provided by a certificate of origin according to Form A, in accordance with the sample set out in the Annex to the basic regulation.
hil: "When applying Article 1, the proof of origin, in the sense of Article 1 of the basic regulation, of goods produced in the first CACM country and exported to another CACM country shall be provided by a certificate of origin according to Form A, in accordance with the sample set out in the Annex to the basic regulation."

src: (15) Das Ziel dieser Richtlinie sollte darin bestehen, eine einheitliche Methode der Berechnung des in KWK erzeugten Stroms sowie die erforderlichen Leitlinien für ihre Anwendung festzulegen, wobei Methoden zu berücksichtigen sind, wie sie derzeit von europäischen Normungsgremien entwickelt werden.
ref: (15) The general objective of this Directive should be to establish a harmonised method for calculation of electricity from cogeneration and necessary guidelines for its implementation, taking into account methodologies such as those currently under development by European standardisation organisations.
draft: (15) The aim of this directive should be to establish a uniform method for calculating the electricity produced in CHP and the necessary guidelines for their application, taking into account methods currently being developed by European standardization bodies.

src: Bei Klagen gegen Entscheidungen der Kommission, in denen eine Geldbusse oder ein Zwangsgeld festgesetzt ist, hat der Gerichtshof die Befugnis zu unbeschränkter Nachprüfung der Entscheidung im Sinne von Artikel 172 des Vertrages ; er kann die festgesetzte Geldbusse oder das festgesetzte Zwangsgeld aufheben, herabsetzen oder erhöhen.
ref: The Court of Justice shall have unlimited jurisdiction within the meaning of Article 172 of the Treaty to review decisions whereby the Commission has fixed a fine or periodic penalty payment ; it may cancel, reduce or increase the fine or periodic penalty payment imposed.
draft: In cases of complaints against decisions of the Commission in which a fine or a coercive payment has been imposed, the Court of Justice has the power of unlimited review of the decision in accordance with Article 172 of the Treaty; it may set aside, reduce or increase the fine or the coercive payment imposed.
hil: In cases of complaints against decisions of the Commission in which a fine or a coercive payment has been imposed, the Court of Justice has the power of unlimited review of the decision in accordance with Article 172 of the Treaty; it may set aside, reduce or increase the fine or the coercive payment imposed.
compare: In cases of complaints against decisions of the Commission in which a fine or a coercive payment has been imposed, the Court of Justice has the power of unlimited review of the decision in accordance with Article 172 of the Treaty; it may set aside, reduce or increase the fine or the coercive payment imposed.

src: (4) Zur Gewährleistung einer angemessenen Vertretung der Generaldirektoren für Industrie und der für kleine und mittlere Unternehmen (KMU) zuständigen einzelstaatlichen Behörden können die Mitgliedstaaten bis zu zwei Vertreter für den ersten Vertretungskörper benennen.

src: (16) Was die Basisansprüche betrifft [7], so sieht die Reform die Anlehnung des Sondersystems der IEG an das allgemeine System (die Caisse Nationale d’Assurance Vieillesse des Travailleurs Salariés — CNAV) und an die zusätzlichen obligatorischen Systeme (Association Générale des Institutions de Retraite des Cadres — AGIRC und Association des Régimes de Retraite Complémentaires — ARRCO) vor.
ref: (16) As far as basic rights [7] are concerned, the reform involves affiliation of the special scheme for the electricity and gas industries to the general scheme (the National Pension Fund for Employees — CNAV) and the compulsory supplementary schemes (General Association of Pension Institutions for Managerial Staff — AGIRC and Association of Supplementary Pension Schemes — ARRCO).
draft: As for the basic requirements [7], the reform envisages aligning the special system of the IEG with the general system (the Caisse Nationale d'Assurance Vieillesse des Travailleurs Salariés - CNAV) and with the additional mandatory systems (Association Générale des Institutions de Retraite des Cadres - AGIRC and Association des Régimes de Retraite Complémentaires - ARRCO).
hil: Regarding basic requirements [7], the reform envisions aligning the special system of the IEG with the general system (the Caisse Nationale d'Assurance Vieillesse des Travailleurs Salariés - CNAV) and the additional mandatory systems (Association Générale des Institutions de Retraite des Cadres - AGIRC and Association des Régimes de Retraite Complémentaires - ARRCO).
compare: As for the basic requirements [7], the reform envisages aligning the special system of the IEG with the general system (the Caisse Nationale d'Assurance Vieillesse des Travailleurs Salariés - CNAV) and with the additional mandatory systems (Association Générale des Institutions de Retraite des Cadres - AGIRC and Association des Régimes de Retraite Complémentaires - ARRCO).

src: Diese Anträge wurden nicht rechtzeitig gestellt, d. h. weder bei der Beantwortung des Fragebogens noch beim Kontrollbesuch im Betrieb, noch in einem späteren Stadium des Verfahrens, in dem das Unternehmen zur Stellungnahme aufgefordert worden war.
ref: These claims were not made in an opportune manner, having been made neither in the response to the questionnaire, nor on-the-spot, nor at any subsequent stage of the proceeding when the company was invited to make comments.
draft: These applications were not submitted on time, i.e. neither when answering the questionnaire nor during the inspection visit to the company, nor at a later stage of the procedure, in which the company had been asked to comment.

src: Diese Konsultationen beruhen auf dem Grundsatz, daß jede wesentliche Einschränkung der im Protokoll genannten Fangmöglichkeiten entweder zu einer Kürzung der finanziellen Gegenleistung der Gemeinschaft führen oder eine Erweiterung bestimmter, von Côte d'Ivoire eingeräumter Fangmöglichkeiten zur Folge haben kann.
ref: These consultations shall be based on the principle that any reduction of the fishing rights laid down in the said Protocol may entail either a reduction in the financial compensation payable by the Community or an improvement in certain fishing rights offered by Côte d'Ivoire.
draft: These consultations are based on the principle that any significant restriction of the fishing opportunities mentioned in the protocol may either lead to a reduction of the financial compensation provided by the Community or result in an extension of certain fishing opportunities granted by Côte d'Ivoire.
hil: These consultations are based on the principle that any significant restriction of the fishing opportunities mentioned in the protocol may either lead to a reduction of the financial compensation provided by the Community or result in an extension of certain fishing opportunities granted by Côte d'Ivoire.
compare: These consultations are based on the principle that any significant restriction of the fishing opportunities mentioned in the protocol may either lead to a reduction of the financial compensation provided by the Community or result in an extension of certain fishing opportunities granted by Côte d'Ivoire.

src: (7) Die Kommission unterbreitet dem Rat fünf Jahre nach dem Zeitpunkt, von dem an beim Amt Anmeldungen eingereicht werden können, einen Bericht über das Funktionieren des Recherchensystems im Sinne dieses Artikels, einschließlich des Systems der Zahlungen an die Mitgliedstaaten gemäß Absatz 4, sowie erforderlichenfalls geeignete Vorschläge zur Änderung dieser Verordnung, um das Recherchensystem unter Berücksichtigung der gemachten Erfahrungen und der Entwicklungen auf dem Gebiet der Recherche anzupassen.
ref: 7. The Commission shall, five years after the opening of the Office for the filing of applications, submit to the Council a report on the operation of the system of searching resulting from this Article, including the payments made to Member States under paragraph 4, and, if necessary, appropriate proposals for amending this Regulation with a view to adapting the system of searching on the basis of the experience gained and bearing in mind developments in searching techniques.
draft: The commission shall submit to the Council, five years after the date from which applications can be submitted to the Office, a report on the functioning of the search system as referred to in this Article, including the system of payments to the Member States referred to in paragraph 4, and, if necessary, appropriate proposals to amend this Regulation, to adapt the search system, taking into account the experience gained and the developments in the field of search.
hil: The Commission shall submit to the Council, five years after the date from which applications can be submitted to the Office, a report on the functioning of the search system as referred to in this Article, including the system of payments to the Member States referred to in paragraph 4, and, where necessary, appropriate proposals to amend this Regulation to adapt the search system, taking into account the experience gained and the developments in the field of search.
compare: The Commission shall submit to the Council, five years after the date from which applications can be submitted to the Office, a report on the functioning of the search system as referred to in this Article, including the system of payments to the Member States referred to in paragraph 4, and, where necessary, appropriate proposals to amend this Regulation to adapt the search system, taking into account the experience gained and the developments in the field of search.

src: (3) Gemäß dem Beschluss Nr 1145/2002/EG des Europäischen Parlaments und des Rates vom 10. Juni 2002 über gemeinschaftliche Maßnahmen zum Anreiz im Bereich der Beschäftigung [4] sind vom 1. Januar 2002 bis 31. Dezember 2006 Gemeinschaftstätigkeiten in Bezug auf Analyse, Forschung und Zusammenarbeit der Mitgliedstaaten im Bereich Beschäftigung und Arbeitsmarkt durchzuführen, wobei es ein Ziel dieser Aktivitäten ist, die europäische Beschäftigungsstrategie mit deutlicher Ausrichtung auf die Zukunft zu entwickeln, zu verfolgen und zu evaluieren.
ref: (3) In accordance with Decision No 1145/2002/EC [4] of the European Parliament and of the Council of 10 June 2002 on Community incentive measures in the field of employment, Community activities concerning analysis, research and cooperation among the Member States in the field of employment and the labour market shall be carried out in the period from 1 January 2002 to 31 December 2006 and one of the objectives of these activities is to develop, follow up and evaluate the European Employment Strategy with a strong forward-looking emphasis.
draft: According to decision No 1145/2002/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 10 June 2002 on Community incentives for employment [4], Community measures relating to analysis, research and cooperation by the Member States in the field of employment and the labour market must be carried out from 1 January 2002 to 31 December 2006, with the aim of developing, pursuing and evaluating the European employment strategy with a clear focus on the future.
hil: In accordance with Decision No 1145/2002/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 10 June 2002 on community measures for employment incentives [4], Community activities in the areas of employment and the labour market concerning analysis, research and cooperation among Member States should be carried out from 1 January 2002 to 31 December 2006, with the aim of developing, pursuing and evaluating the European employment strategy with a clear orientation towards the future.
compare: According to decision No 1145/2002/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 10 June 2002 on Community incentives for employment [4], Community measures relating to analysis, research and cooperation by the Member States in the field of employment and the labour market must be carried out from 1 January 2002 to 31 December 2006, with the aim of developing, pursuing and evaluating the European employment strategy with a clear focus on the future.

src: Ein solcher Rücktritt wird ein Jahr nach dem Zeitpunkt wirksam, zu dem die Notifikation beim Depositar eingegangen ist.
ref: Any such withdrawal shall take effect one year after the date of the receipt of the notification by the depositary.
draft: Such resignation will become effective one year after the notification has been received by the depositary.
hil: Such a resignation will become effective one year after the point in time at which the notification has been received by the depositary.
compare: Such resignation will become effective one year after the notification has been received by the depositary.

src: (5) Innerhalb des Verwaltungsrats bilden die Regierungsvertreter, die Vertreter der Arbeitnehmerorganisationen und die Vertreter der Arbeitgeberverbände jeweils eine Gruppe.
ref: 5. Within the Governing Board, the representatives of governments, employees’ organisations and employers’ organisations shall each form a group.
draft: Within the board of directors, the government representatives, the representatives of the workers' organizations and the representatives of the employers' associations each form a group.
hil: The government representatives, representatives of workers' organizations, and representatives of employers' associations each form a group within the Board of Directors.
compare: The government representatives, representatives of workers' organizations, and representatives of employers' associations each form a group within the Board of Directors.

compare: Cancellation of guideline ECB/2001/9.

src: Angesichts der umfassenden Risikobewertung von Sexualhormonen im Hinblick auf eine mögliche übermäßige Aufnahme von Hormonrückständen und ihren Metaboliten muss jedoch die potenzielle Gefährdung der Verbraucher regelmäßig auf der Grundlage neuer wissenschaftlicher Beweise überprüft werden.
ref: However, given the overall evaluation on the risk assessments of sexual hormones, as concerns possible excess intake of hormone residues and their metabolites, a possible risk to the consumer needs to be regularly reviewed on the basis of any new scientific evidence.
draft: Given the comprehensive risk assessment of sex hormones in terms of possible excessive intake of hormone residues and their metabolites, however, the potential risk to consumers must be regularly checked based on new scientific evidence.
hil: Whereas the potential risk to consumers must be regularly checked based on new scientific evidence given the comprehensive risk assessment of sex hormones in terms of possible excessive intake of hormone residues and their metabolites.
compare: Given the comprehensive risk assessment of sex hormones in terms of possible excessive intake of hormone residues and their metabolites, however, the potential risk to consumers must be regularly checked based on new scientific evidence.

src: (5) Der Europäische Datenschutzbeauftragte führt ein Register aller ihm aufgrund von Absatz 2 gemeldeten Verarbeitungen.
ref: 5. The European Data Protection Supervisor shall keep a register of all processing operations that have been notified to him or her pursuant to paragraph 2.
draft: "The European Data Protection Supervisor maintains a register of all processing activities reported to him under paragraph 2."
hil: The European Data Protection Supervisor maintains a register of all processing activities reported to him under paragraph 2.
compare: "The European Data Protection Supervisor maintains a register of all processing activities reported to him under paragraph 2."

src: Das Verfahren nach Artikel 13 Absatz 3 Buchstabe a) entspricht den Systemen, die in Anhang III Abschnitt 2 Ziffer ii) Möglichkeit 1 ohne laufende Überwachung und in den Möglichkeiten 2 und 3 festgelegt sind, und das Verfahren nach Artikel 13 Absatz 3 Buchstabe b) entspricht den Systemen, die in Anhang III Abschnitt 2 Ziffer i) und in Anhang III Abschnitt 2 Ziffer ii) Möglichkeit 1 mit laufender Überwachung festgelegt sind.
ref: Whereas the procedure referred to in Article 13(3)(a) corresponds to the systems set out in the first possibility, without continuous surveillance, and the second and third possibilities of point (ii) of section 2 of Annex III, and the procedure referred to in Article 13(3)(b) corresponds to the systems set out in point (i) of section 2 of Annex III, and in the first possibility, with continuous surveillance, of point (ii) of section 2 of Annex III;
draft: The procedure referred to in Article 13(3)(a) corresponds to the systems set out in Annex III, Section 2, point (ii), option 1, without continuous monitoring, and in options 2 and 3, and the procedure referred to in Article 13(3)(b) corresponds to the systems set out in Annex III, Section 2, point (i) and in Annex III, Section 2, point (ii), option 1, with continuous monitoring.
hil: The procedure referred to in Article 13(3)(a) corresponds to the systems set out in Annex III, Section 2, point (ii), option 1, without continuous monitoring, and in options 2 and 3, and the procedure referred to in Article 13(3)(b) corresponds to the systems set out in Annex III, Section 2, point (i) and in Annex III, Section 2, point (ii), option 1, with continuous monitoring.
compare: The procedure referred to in Article 13(3)(a) corresponds to the systems set out in Annex III, Section 2, point (ii), option 1, without continuous monitoring, and in options 2 and 3, and the procedure referred to in Article 13(3)(b) corresponds to the systems set out in Annex III, Section 2, point (i) and in Annex III, Section 2, point (ii), option 1, with continuous monitoring.

src: Die Resolution Nr. 49 sieht Maßnahmen vor, die zum einen die vorschriftsmäßige Anwendung des TIR-Übereinkommens von 1975 sicherstellen und zum anderen etwaige betrügerische Praktiken beim Gütertransport im Verfahren mit Carnets TIR verhindern und aufdecken helfen sollen.
ref: Whereas Resolution No 49 contains measures both to ensure the correct implementation of the 1975 TIR Convention and to prevent and detect fraud in goods transported under the TIR regime;
draft: Resolution No. 49 provides measures to ensure the proper application of the 1975 TIR Convention and to prevent and detect any fraudulent practices in the transport of goods using TIR Carnets.
hil: Resolution No. 49 provides measures to ensure the proper application of the 1975 TIR Convention and to prevent and detect any fraudulent practices in the transport of goods using TIR Carnets.
compare: Resolution No. 49 provides measures to ensure the proper application of the 1975 TIR Convention and to prevent and detect any fraudulent practices in the transport of goods using TIR Carnets.

src: Die verschiedenen Bewertungsmethoden müssen, soweit erforderlich, vereinheitlicht werden, um die Vergleichbarkeit und die Gleichwertigkeit der in den Jahresabschlüssen gemachten Angaben zu gewährleisten.
ref: Whereas the different methods for the valuation of assets and liabilities must be coordinated to the extent necessary to ensure that annual accounts disclose comparable and equivalent information;
draft: The different valuation methods must be standardized, if necessary, to ensure comparability and equivalence of the information provided in the financial statements.
hil: The various valuation methods must be standardized, where necessary, to ensure the comparability and equivalence of the information provided in the financial statements.
compare: The different valuation methods must be standardized, if necessary, to ensure comparability and equivalence of the information provided in the financial statements.

draft: "Contrary to Article 7, paragraphs 2, 3 and 4 of this article shall apply to the first calendar year of application of this regulation."

src: (8) In Anbetracht der Annahme dieser neuen Bestimmungen ist es erforderlich, die Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1489/97 der Kommission vom 29. Juli 1997 zur Durchführung der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 2847/93 des Rates hinsichtlich satellitengestützter Schiffsüberwachungssysteme(2) aufzuheben.
ref: (8) In view of the adoption of these new provisions, it is necessary to repeal Commission Regulation (EC) No 1489/97 of 29 July 1997 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 2847/93 as regards satellite-based vessel monitoring systems(2).

src: (3) Die beteiligten Organisationen tragen mindestens 20 % der tatsächlichen Kosten der Programme gemäß Artikel 7; der Rest der Finanzierung wird unter Berücksichtigung des Beitrags der Gemeinschaft gemäß Absatz 2 von den betreffenden Mitgliedstaaten übernommen.
ref: 3. The proposing organisation(s) shall fund at least 20 % of the real cost of the programmes referred to in Article 7, the rest of the financing being borne by the Member State(s) concerned, taking into account the Community's contribution referred to in paragraph 2.
draft: The participating organizations bear at least 20% of the actual costs of the programs according to Article 7; the rest of the financing is assumed by the respective Member States, taking into account the contribution of the Community in accordance with paragraph 2.
hil: The participating organizations shall bear at least 20% of the actual costs of the programs according to Article 7; the remaining financing shall be assumed by the respective Member States, taking into account the contribution of the Community in accordance with paragraph 2.
compare: The participating organizations bear at least 20% of the actual costs of the programs according to Article 7; the rest of the financing is assumed by the respective Member States, taking into account the contribution of the Community in accordance with paragraph 2.

src: (15) Damit die Beweisaufnahme erleichtert wird, sollte es einem Gericht in einem Mitgliedstaat möglich sein, nach seinem Recht in einem anderen Mitgliedstaat mit dessen Zustimmung unmittelbar Beweis zu erheben, wobei die von der Zentralstelle oder der zuständigen Behörde des ersuchten Mitgliedstaats festgelegten Bedingungen zu beachten sind.
ref: (15) In order to facilitate the taking of evidence it should be possible for a court in a Member State, in accordance with the law of its Member State, to take evidence directly in another Member State, if accepted by the latter, and under the conditions determined by the central body or competent authority of the requested Member State.
draft: To facilitate the taking of evidence, a court in a Member State should be able to request directly, with the consent of the requested Member State, evidence in another Member State under its law, taking into account the conditions set by the central authority or competent authority of the requested Member State.
hil: The taking of evidence should be facilitated, and a court in a Member State should be able to directly collect evidence without delay in another Member State according to its law with the latter's consent and taking into account the conditions set by the central authority or competent authority of the requested Member State.
compare: To facilitate the taking of evidence, a court in a Member State should be able to request directly, with the consent of the requested Member State, evidence in another Member State under its law, taking into account the conditions set by the central authority or competent authority of the requested Member State.

src: d) "Öffentliche Dienstleistungsaufträge" sind öffentliche Aufträge über die Erbringung von Dienstleistungen im Sinne von Anhang II, die keine öffentlichen Bau- oder Lieferaufträge sind.
ref: (d) "Public service contracts" are public contracts other than public works or supply contracts having as their object the provision of services referred to in Annex II.
draft: d) "Public service contracts" are public contracts for the provision of services within the meaning of Annex II which are not public works or supply contracts.
hil: ""Public service contracts" mean public contracts for the provision of services as defined in Annex II which are not public works or supply contracts. "
compare: d) "Public service contracts" are public contracts for the provision of services within the meaning of Annex II which are not public works or supply contracts.

src: (1) Anhang II der Entscheidung 2000/585/EG wird durch den Anhang I der vorliegenden Entscheidung ersetzt.
ref: 1. Annex II to Decision 2000/585/EC is replaced by the text in Annex I to this Decision.
draft: (1) Annex II of Decision 2000/585/EC is replaced by Annex I of the present Decision.
hil: Annex II of Decision 2000/585/EC is replaced by Annex I of this Decision. (1)
compare: Annex II of Decision 2000/585/EC is replaced by Annex I of this Decision. (1)

src: Der Klarheit und Verständlichkeit halber sollte daher eine Neufassung vorgenommen und die Verordnung (EG) Nr. 2190/96 aufgehoben werden.
ref: In the interests of clarity and rationalisation, therefore, the text should be recast and Regulation (EC) No 2190/96 repealed.
draft: For the sake of clarity and understanding, a new version should therefore be drafted and Regulation (EC) No. 2190/96 should be repealed.
hil: For the sake of clarity and comprehensibility, a new version should be drafted and Regulation (EC) No. 2190/96 should be repealed.
compare: For the sake of clarity and understanding, a new version should therefore be drafted and Regulation (EC) No. 2190/96 should be repealed.

src: (2) Bei Vorliegen aller Voraussetzungen für die Inanspruchnahme des Verfahrens des Standardaustauschs ohne vorzeitige Einfuhr können die Zollbehörden dem Inhaber der Bewilligung einer passiven Veredelung, die dieses Verfahren nicht vorsieht, erforderlichenfalls gestatten, Ersatzwaren einzuführen.Der Beteiligte hat einen entsprechenden Antrag spätestens im Zeitpunkt der Einfuhr der Ersatzwaren zu stellen.
ref: 2. Where circumstances so warrant and all the conditions for authorizing use of the standard exchange system without prior importation are fulfilled, the customs authorities may allow the holder of an outward processing authorization which does not provide for use of this system to import replacement products. The persons concerned shall submit a request to this effect no later than the time the products are imported.
draft: (2) When all the conditions for using the standard exchange procedure without premature import are met, the customs authorities may, if necessary, allow the holder of the approval for passive refinement, which does not provide for this procedure, to import replacement goods. The party concerned must submit a corresponding application at the latest at the time of import of the replacement goods.
hil: (2) If all the conditions for claiming the standard exchange procedure without premature import are met, the customs authorities may permit the holder of the authorization for passive refinement, which does not provide for this procedure, if necessary, to import substitute goods. The party concerned must submit an appropriate application at the latest at the time of importing the substitute goods.
compare: (2) When all the conditions for using the standard exchange procedure without premature import are met, the customs authorities may, if necessary, allow the holder of the approval for passive refinement, which does not provide for this procedure, to import replacement goods. The party concerned must submit a corresponding application at the latest at the time of import of the replacement goods.

src: Verordnung (EG) Nr. 331/2005 der Kommission
ref: Commission Regulation (EC) No 331/2005
draft: Regulation (EC) No 331/2005 of the Commission.
hil: Regulation (EC) No 331/2005 of the Commission.
compare: Regulation (EC) No 331/2005 of the Commission.

src: 24. "entstehender Markt" einen Mitgliedstaat, in dem die erste kommerzielle Lieferung aufgrund seines ersten langfristigen Erdgasliefervertrags nicht mehr als zehn Jahre zurückliegt;
ref: 24. 'emergent market` means a Member State in which the first commercial supply of its first long-term natural gas supply contract was made not more than 10 years earlier;
draft: 24. "emerging market" means a Member State where the first commercial delivery occurred no more than ten years ago, following its first long-term gas supply contract.
hil: 24. 'emerging market' means a Member State where the first commercial delivery occurred no more than ten years ago, following its first long-term natural gas supply agreement.
compare: 24. "emerging market" means a Member State where the first commercial delivery occurred no more than ten years ago, following its first long-term gas supply contract.

src: Mit den Verordnungen (EG) Nr. 2146/95 (6) und (EG) Nr. 1214/96 (7) hat die Kommission vorübergehende autonome Sonderregelungen eingeführt, deren Geltungsdauer am 30. Juni 1997 endete. Aus diesem Grund sollte die vorliegende Verordnung mit Wirkung vom 1. Juli 1997 gelten -
ref: Whereas, in Regulation (EC) No 2146/95 (6) and Regulation (EC) No 1214/96 (7), the Commission introduced autonomous systems as a transitional measure expiring on 30 June 1997; whereas this Regulation should therefore apply from 1 July 1997,
draft: "With Regulations (EC) No 2146/95 (6) and (EC) No 1214/96 (7), the Commission introduced temporary autonomous special provisions, the validity of which expired on 30 June 1997. For this reason, the present regulation should apply as of 1 July 1997."
hil: The Commission introduced temporary autonomous special provisions with Regulations (EC) No 2146/95 (6) and (EC) No 1214/96 (7), whose validity ended on 30 June 1997. Therefore, the present regulation should apply as of 1 July 1997.
compare: "With Regulations (EC) No 2146/95 (6) and (EC) No 1214/96 (7), the Commission introduced temporary autonomous special provisions, the validity of which expired on 30 June 1997. For this reason, the present regulation should apply as of 1 July 1997."

src: (2) Die Republik Bulgarien unterrichtet den Missionsleiter der zivilen Krisenbewältigungsoperation der EU und das Generalsekretariat des Rates der Europäischen Union rechtzeitig über jede Änderung ihres Beitrags zur zivilen Krisenbewältigungsoperation der EU.
ref: The Republic of Bulgaria shall inform in due time the EU civilian crisis management operation Head of Mission and the General-Secretariat of the Council of the European Union of any change to its contribution to the EU civilian crisis management operation.
draft: (2) The Republic of Bulgaria informs the Mission Chief of the EU's Civilian Crisis Management Operation and the General Secretariat of the Council of the European Union in a timely manner of any changes to its contribution to the EU's civilian crisis management operation.
hil: The Republic of Bulgaria shall inform the Mission Chief of the EU's Civilian Crisis Management Operation and the General Secretariat of the Council of the European Union in due course of any change to its contribution to the EU's civilian crisis management operation.
compare: (2) The Republic of Bulgaria informs the Mission Chief of the EU's Civilian Crisis Management Operation and the General Secretariat of the Council of the European Union in a timely manner of any changes to its contribution to the EU's civilian crisis management operation.

src: (12) Der mittelfristig prognostizierte Anstieg der Nachfrage im Postsektor insgesamt könnte dazu beitragen, einen etwaigen Verlust an Marktanteilen aufzufangen, der den Anbietern von Universaldienstleistungen gegebenenfalls durch eine weitere Liberalisierung des Marktes entsteht; dadurch wäre der Universaldienst auch in Zukunft sichergestellt.
ref: (12) The increase in demand within the postal sector as a whole, predicted for the medium term, could help to offset the loss of market share that the universal service providers may incur as a result of further market-opening and would thereby further safeguard the universal service.
draft: The medium-term forecasted increase in demand in the postal sector as a whole could help to compensate for any loss of market share that may arise for providers of universal service in the event of further market liberalization; this would ensure the universal service in the future as well.
hil: Whereas the medium-term forecasted increase in demand in the postal sector as a whole may assist in compensating for any loss of market share that may arise for providers of universal services through further market liberalization measures; thus ensuring universal service in the future.
compare: The medium-term forecasted increase in demand in the postal sector as a whole could help to compensate for any loss of market share that may arise for providers of universal service in the event of further market liberalization; this would ensure the universal service in the future as well.

src: Den Feststellungen zufolge lag der gewogene durchschnittliche Verkaufspreis bei allen Verkäufen im Untersuchungszeitraum über den gewogenen durchschnittlichen Produktionsstückkosten, und auf die Einzelverkäufe zu einem Preis, der unter den Produktionsstückkosten lag, entfielen mengenmäßig mehr als 20 % aber weniger als 90 % der Verkäufe, die bei der Ermittlung des Normalwerts zugrunde gelegt wurden; daher wurden nur alle Gewinn bringenden Inlandsverkäufe als Geschäfte im normalen Handelsverkehr angesehen und für den Vergleich herangezogen.
ref: It was found that the weighted average selling price of all sales during the investigation period was above the weighted average unit cost of production, and that the volume of individual sales transactions below unit cost of production was more than 20 % but less that 90 % of the sales being used to determine normal value; therefore only all the profitable domestic sales were regarded as having been made in the ordinary course of trade, and used for comparison.
draft: According to the findings, the weighted average sales price for all sales during the investigation period was above the weighted average production costs per unit, and in terms of individual sales at a price below the cost of production, more than 20% but less than 90% of sales were made, which were used to determine the normal value. Therefore, only all profitable domestic sales were considered as transactions in the ordinary course of trade and were used for comparison.
hil: According to the findings, the weighted average sales price for all sales during the investigation period was higher than the weighted average production costs per unit, and in terms of individual sales at a price below the production costs, more than 20% but less than 90% of sales were made, which were used to determine the normal value. Therefore, only all profitable domestic sales were considered as transactions in the ordinary course of trade and were taken into account for comparison.
compare: According to the findings, the weighted average sales price for all sales during the investigation period was higher than the weighted average production costs per unit, and in terms of individual sales at a price below the production costs, more than 20% but less than 90% of sales were made, which were used to determine the normal value. Therefore, only all profitable domestic sales were considered as transactions in the ordinary course of trade and were taken into account for comparison.

src: (1) 1991 führte der Rat mit der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 3433/91(2) unter anderem einen endgültigen Antidumpingzoll von 16,9 % auf die Einfuhren nicht nachfuellbarer Taschenfeuerzeuge mit Feuerstein für Gas (nachstehend "nicht nachfuellbare Feuerzeuge" genannt) mit Ursprung in der Volksrepublik China (nachstehend "China" genannt) ein.
ref: (1) In 1991, the Council, by Regulation (EEC) No 3433/91(2), imposed, inter alia, a definitive anti-dumping duty of 16,9 % on imports of gas-fuelled, non-refillable pocket flint lighters ("non-refillable lighters") originating in the People's Republic of China ("China").
draft: (1) In 1991, the Council introduced Regulation (EEC) No 3433/91, (2) which, inter alia, imposed a definitive anti-dumping duty of 16.9 % on imports of non-refillable pocket flint lighters for gas (hereinafter referred to as "non-refillable lighters") originating in the People's Republic of China (hereinafter referred to as "China").
hil: In 1991, the Council introduced Regulation (EEC) No 3433/91, (2) which, inter alia, imposed a definitive anti-dumping duty of 16.9 % on imports of non-refillable pocket flint lighters for gas (hereinafter referred to as 'non-refillable lighters') originating in the People's Republic of China (hereinafter referred to as 'China').
compare: (1) In 1991, the Council introduced Regulation (EEC) No 3433/91, (2) which, inter alia, imposed a definitive anti-dumping duty of 16.9 % on imports of non-refillable pocket flint lighters for gas (hereinafter referred to as "non-refillable lighters") originating in the People's Republic of China (hereinafter referred to as "China").

src: Die Menge an zugesetzten Phytosterinen/Phytostanolen je Behälter mit Getränken beträgt höchstens 3 g.
ref: The amount of phytosterols/phytostanols added to a container of beverages shall not exceed 3 g.
draft: The amount of added phytosterols/phytostanols per container of beverages is a maximum of 3 g.
hil: Whereas the amount of added phytosterols/phytostanols per container of beverages is a maximum of 3 g as notified by the Member States pursuant to Article 17 of Regulation (EC) No 2081/92, additional information was requested to ensure compliance with Articles 2 and 4 of that Regulation; whereas the examination of this information has shown compliance with the aforementioned articles; therefore, it is necessary to register the product now and add it to the Annex of Commission Regulation (EC) No 1107/96 (3), last amended by Regulation (EC) No 123/97 (4).
compare: The amount of added phytosterols/phytostanols per container of beverages is a maximum of 3 g.

src: Die Gemeinschaft hat mit einigen Lieferländern Abkommen über den Handel mit Textilwaren in Form von Zusatzprotokollen zu den Europa-Abkommen und/oder den Interimsabkommen ausgehandelt.
ref: Whereas the Community has negotiated agreements in the form of Additional Protocols on trade in textile products to the Europe Agreements and/or the Interim Agreements, with a number of supplier countries;
draft: The community has negotiated agreements with some supplier countries on the trade of textile products in the form of additional protocols to the European agreements and/or the interim agreements.
hil: The Community has negotiated agreements with several supplying countries on the trade of textile products in the form of additional protocols to the Europe agreements and/or the interim agreements.
compare: The community has negotiated agreements with some supplier countries on the trade of textile products in the form of additional protocols to the European agreements and/or the interim agreements.

src: Der Zeitpunkt, zu dem eine verbindliche Auskunft ungültig wird, ist in den unter den Ziffern i) und ii) vorgesehenen Fällen das bei der Veröffentlichung der genannten Maßnahmen angegebene Datum bzw. bei auf internationaler Ebene erlassenen Maßnahmen das Datum, das in der im Amtsblatt der Europäischen Gemeinschaften, Reihe C, veröffentlichten Kommissionsmitteilung angegeben ist.
ref: The date on which binding information ceases to be valid for the cases referred to in (i) and (ii) shall be the date indicated when the abovementioned measures are published or, in the case of international measures, the date shown in the Commission communication in the 'C` series of the Official Journal of the European Communities.
draft: The point in time at which a binding ruling becomes invalid is, in the cases provided for under (i) and (ii), the date indicated at the time of publication of the said measures, or, in the case of measures adopted at international level, the date indicated in the Commission communication published in the Official Journal of the European Communities, series C.
hil: The point in time at which a binding ruling becomes invalid is, in the cases provided for under (i) and (ii), the date indicated at the time of publication of the said measures, or, in the case of measures adopted at international level, the date indicated in the Commission communication published in the Official Journal of the European Communities, series C.
compare: The point in time at which a binding ruling becomes invalid is, in the cases provided for under (i) and (ii), the date indicated at the time of publication of the said measures, or, in the case of measures adopted at international level, the date indicated in the Commission communication published in the Official Journal of the European Communities, series C.

src: Eine Verordnung ist die beste Gewähr für ein abgestimmtes Vorgehen zur einheitlichen Durchführung der internationalen Regeln unter Wahrung des Subsidiaritätsprinzips mit dem Ziel, Wettbewerbsverzerrungen innerhalb der Gemeinschaft zu vermeiden und effiziente und kostenwirksame Lösungen zu finden.
ref: Whereas, in order to avoid distortion of competition within the Community and to reach efficient and cost-effective solutions, concerted action for unified implementation of the internationally agreed rules, in accordance with the principle of subsidiarity, can best be established by means of a Regulation;
draft: A regulation is the best guarantee for a coordinated approach to the uniform implementation of international rules while maintaining the principle of subsidiarity with the aim of avoiding distortions of competition within the Community and finding efficient and cost-effective solutions.
hil: A regulation is the best guarantee for a coordinated approach to the uniform implementation of international rules while maintaining the principle of subsidiarity with the aim of avoiding distortions of competition within the Community and finding efficient and cost-effective solutions.
compare: A regulation is the best guarantee for a coordinated approach to the uniform implementation of international rules while maintaining the principle of subsidiarity with the aim of avoiding distortions of competition within the Community and finding efficient and cost-effective solutions.

src: Die Mitgliedstaaten treffen die erforderlichen Maßnahmen, um in nichtindustriellen Neubauten eine wirtschaftlich vertretbare Wärmeisolierung des Verteiler- und Speichersystems sowohl für den Wärmeträger als auch für das Warmwasser zur Auflage zu machen.
ref: Member States shall take all necessary measures to ensure that economically justifiable insulation of the distribution and storage system is made compulsory in new non-industrial buildings, both as regards heating fluid and domestic hot water.
draft: The Member States shall take the necessary measures to require economically reasonable thermal insulation of the distribution and storage system for both the heat transfer medium and the hot water in non-industrial new buildings.
hil: The Member States shall take the necessary measures to require economically reasonable thermal insulation of the distribution and storage system for both the heat transfer medium and the hot water in non-industrial new buildings.
compare: The Member States shall take the necessary measures to require economically reasonable thermal insulation of the distribution and storage system for both the heat transfer medium and the hot water in non-industrial new buildings.

src: Außerdem erbringt Dänemark weder den Nachweis, dass die Bezeichnung "Feta" zu dem Zeitpunkt, als Dänemark ihre Verwendung zugelassen hat (1963), zu einem gemeinhin üblichen Namen geworden war, der zusammen mit der Bezeichnung des Erzeugerlandes verwendet werden durfte ("Danish Feta"), noch den Nachweis für den darauf folgenden Zeitraum, dass es sich nunmehr um eine Gattungsbezeichnung handelte.
ref: In addition, Denmark has provided no proof that the designation "Feta" had become a common name that could be used with the name of the producing country ("Danish Feta") at the time when that Member State permitted its use (1963). Similarly, no proof of its generic nature has been provided for the subsequent period.
draft: In addition, Denmark does not provide evidence that the name "Feta" had become a common name that could be used together with the name of the country of origin ("Danish Feta") at the time when Denmark allowed its use (1963), nor evidence for the subsequent period that it had become a generic term.
hil: In addition, Denmark does not provide evidence that the name "Feta" had become a common name that could be used together with the name of the country of origin ("Danish Feta") at the time when Denmark allowed its use (1963), nor evidence for the subsequent period that it had become a generic term.
compare: In addition, Denmark does not provide evidence that the name "Feta" had become a common name that could be used together with the name of the country of origin ("Danish Feta") at the time when Denmark allowed its use (1963), nor evidence for the subsequent period that it had become a generic term.

src: (1) Die Schweiz sieht ein Verfahren vor, das es dem Nutzungsberechtigten im Sinne von Artikel 4 ermöglicht, den Steuerrückbehalt gemäß Artikel 1 zu vermeiden, indem er seine Zahlstelle in der Schweiz ausdrücklich ermächtigt, die Zinszahlungen an die zuständige Behörde dieses Staates zu melden.

src: 8. "Sicherheitsaudit" ist eine gründliche Prüfung aller Aspekte von Sicherheitsmaßnahmen und -verfahren, bei der ermittelt wird, ob diese kontinuierlich und auf einem konstanten Niveau durchgeführt werden.
ref: 8. "security audit" shall mean an in-depth examination of all aspects of security measures and procedures in order to determine if they are being implemented on a continual basis and to a constant standard;
draft: 8. "Security audit" is a thorough examination of all aspects of security measures and procedures to determine whether they are being continuously and consistently carried out at a constant level.
hil: 8. 'Security audit' means a thorough examination of all aspects of security measures and procedures to determine whether these are continuously and consistently carried out at a constant level.
compare: 8. "Security audit" is a thorough examination of all aspects of security measures and procedures to determine whether they are being continuously and consistently carried out at a constant level.

src: a) der Lizenznehmer zum Zeitpunkt des Vertragsabschlusses verpflichtet ist, Qualitätsvorschriften oder andere Lizenzen zu akzeptieren oder aber Waren oder Dienstleistungen zu beziehen, die nicht notwendig sind, um eine technisch einwandfreie Nutzung der mitgeteilten Technologie zu gewährleisten, oder um sicherzustellen, daß die Produktion des Lizenznehmers den Qualitätsvorschriften entspricht, die von dem Lizenzgeber und anderen Lizenznehmern eingehalten werden;
ref: (a) the licensee is obliged at the time the agreement is entered into to accept quality specifications or further licences or to procure goods or services which are not necessary for a technically satisfactory exploitation of the licensed technology or for ensuring that the production of the licensee conforms to the quality standards that are respected by the licensor and other licensees;
draft: At the time of contract conclusion, the licensee is obliged to accept quality specifications or other licenses or to obtain goods or services that are not necessary to ensure technically flawless use of the communicated technology or to ensure that the licensee's production complies with the quality specifications observed by the licensor and other licensees.
hil: At the time of contract conclusion, the licensee is required to accept quality specifications or other licenses, or to obtain goods or services that are not necessary to ensure technically flawless use of the communicated technology, or to ensure that the licensee's production complies with the quality specifications observed by the licensor and other licensees.
compare: At the time of contract conclusion, the licensee is required to accept quality specifications or other licenses, or to obtain goods or services that are not necessary to ensure technically flawless use of the communicated technology, or to ensure that the licensee's production complies with the quality specifications observed by the licensor and other licensees.

ref: 6. Member States shall record each case where they grant new planting rights in respect of areas whose wine or vine products are intended solely for the consumption of the vine grower's family.

src: (3) Bei der Erarbeitung, Durchführung und Begleitung der Tätigkeiten im Rahmen des Programms werden die Erfahrungen der Mitgliedstaaten auf allen einschlägigen Ebenen, der von sozialer Ausgrenzung und Armut Betroffenen ebenso wie die Erfahrungen der Sozialpartner, Nichtregierungsorganisationen, gemeinnützigen Vereine, Einrichtungen, die soziale Dienstleistungen erbringen, und aller anderen Akteure im Kampf gegen soziale Ausgrenzung und Armut berücksichtigt.
ref: 3. In designing, implementing and following up the activities under the programme, account shall be taken of the experience of Member States at all levels involved and of people exposed to social exclusion and poverty, as well as social partners, non-governmental and voluntary organisations, bodies providing social services and other actors involved in the fight against social exclusion and poverty.
draft: (3) In the development, implementation and follow-up of the activities within the program, the experience of the member states at all relevant levels, as well as the experience of social partners, non-governmental organizations, non-profit associations, institutions providing social services and all other actors in the fight against social exclusion and poverty will be taken into account.
hil: In the development, implementation and follow-up of the activities within the program, the experience of the member states at all relevant levels, as well as the experience of social partners, non-governmental organizations, non-profit associations, institutions providing social services and all other actors in the fight against social exclusion and poverty will be taken into account.
compare: (3) In the development, implementation and follow-up of the activities within the program, the experience of the member states at all relevant levels, as well as the experience of social partners, non-governmental organizations, non-profit associations, institutions providing social services and all other actors in the fight against social exclusion and poverty will be taken into account.
