src: Umsetzung (1) Die Mitgliedstaaten setzen die Rechts- und Verwaltungsvorschriften in Kraft, die erforderlich sind, um dieser Richtlinie spätestens ab dem 31. Juli 2005 nachzukommen. Sie setzen die Kommission unverzüglich davon in Kenntnis. Wenn die Mitgliedstaaten diese Vorschriften erlassen, nehmen sie in diesen Vorschriften selbst oder durch einen Hinweis bei der amtlichen Veröffentlichung auf diese Richtlinie Bezug. Die Mitgliedstaaten regeln die Einzelheiten dieser Bezugnahme.
ref: (10) Member States should take adequate and effective steps to ensure control of the implementation of measures adopted pursuant to this Directive in compliance with their national legislation, as provided for in Commission Communication to the European Parliament and the Council on the role of penalties in implementing Community Internal Market legislation and in the Council Resolution of 29 June 1995 on the effective uniform application of Community law and on the penalties applicable for breaches of Community law in the Internal Market(4). Such means should include provision for intervention of persons or organisations with legitimate interest in the suppression of activities that are not in conformity with this Directive.
draft: (1) Implementation: Member States shall bring into force the laws, regulations and administrative provisions necessary to comply with this Directive by 31 July 2005 at the latest. They shall forthwith communicate to the Commission the text of those provisions and a correlation table between those provisions and this Directive. When Member States adopt those provisions, they shall contain a reference to this Directive or be accompanied by such a reference on the occasion of their official publication. Member States shall determine how such reference is to be made.
hil: Member States shall bring into force the laws, regulations and administrative provisions necessary to comply with this Directive by 31 July 2005 at the latest and shall forthwith inform the Commission thereof. When Member States adopt those provisions, they shall contain a reference to this Directive in the provisions themselves or by an reference when the provisions are officially published. The Member States shall determine the details of such reference.
compare: (1) Implementation: Member States shall bring into force the laws, regulations and administrative provisions necessary to comply with this Directive by 31 July 2005 at the latest. They shall forthwith communicate to the Commission the text of those provisions and a correlation table between those provisions and this Directive. When Member States adopt those provisions, they shall contain a reference to this Directive or be accompanied by such a reference on the occasion of their official publication. Member States shall determine how such reference is to be made.

src: Es ist angezeigt, ergänzende Abschläge für die Fälle zu bestimmen, in denen sich diese Definition auf einen Zuckergehalt bezieht, der niedriger als der geringste in der Gemeinschaftsskala angeführte Zuckergehalt ist.
ref: Further reductions should be specified where this definition refers to a sugar content below the lowest sugar content on the Community scale.
draft: It is appropriate to determine additional deductions for cases where this definition refers to a sugar content that is lower than the lowest sugar content specified in the Community scale.
hil: It is appropriate to determine additional deductions for cases where this definition refers to a sugar content that is lower than the lowest sugar content specified in the Community scale.
compare: It is appropriate to determine additional deductions for cases where this definition refers to a sugar content that is lower than the lowest sugar content specified in the Community scale.

src: In bestimmten Mitgliedstaaten legen zwingende Bestimmungen insbesondere das erforderliche Sicherheitsniveau für Gasverbrauchseinrichtungen fest. Dies geschieht durch Spezifizierung der Konstruktion, der Betriebseigenschaften und der Inspektionsverfahren. Diese zwingenden Bestimmungen führen nicht notwendigerweise zu unterschiedlichen Sicherheitsniveaus von einem Mitgliedstaat zum anderen, behindern jedoch aufgrund ihrer Unterschiedlichkeit den Handel innerhalb der Gemeinschaft.
ref: Whereas, in certain Member States, mandatory provisions define in particular the safety level required of appliances burning gaseous fuels by specifying design, operating characteristics and inspection procedures; whereas these mandatory provisions do not necessarily lead to different safety levels from one Member State to another but do, by their disparity, hinder trade within the Community;
draft: In certain member states, mandatory provisions determine the required level of safety for gas consumption equipment in particular. This is done by specifying the design, operating characteristics, and inspection procedures. These mandatory provisions do not necessarily lead to different levels of safety from one member state to another, but due to their differences, they impede trade within the community.
hil: In certain member states, mandatory provisions determine the required level of safety for gas consumption equipment in particular. This is done by specifying the design, operating characteristics, and inspection procedures. These mandatory provisions do not necessarily lead to different levels of safety from one member state to another, but due to their differences, they impede trade within the community.
compare: In certain member states, mandatory provisions determine the required level of safety for gas consumption equipment in particular. This is done by specifying the design, operating characteristics, and inspection procedures. These mandatory provisions do not necessarily lead to different levels of safety from one member state to another, but due to their differences, they impede trade within the community.

src: Einfuhrlizenzen, die bis spätestens am dritten Arbeitstag nach dem Tag beantragt werden, an dem diese Verordnung in Kraft tritt, werden jedoch unverzueglich erteilt.
ref: However, import licences applied for by or on the third working day following the date of entry into force of this Regulation shall be issued forthwith.
draft: Import licenses requested by no later than the third working day after the day on which this Regulation enters into force shall, however, be issued without delay.
hil: Import licenses requested no later than the third working day after the day on which this Regulation enters into force shall, however, be issued without delay.
compare: Import licenses requested by no later than the third working day after the day on which this Regulation enters into force shall, however, be issued without delay.

src: Das Verbot der Aufbringung von TBT-Anstrichen auf Schiffe, die die Flagge eines Drittstaats führen, sollte daher für einen Übergangszeitraum, der am 1. Juli 2003 beginnt und mit Inkrafttreten des AFS-Übereinkommens endet, ausgesetzt werden.
ref: The application of the prohibition in this Regulation on applying TBT coatings should therefore be suspended as regards ships sailing under the flag of a third State for an interim period beginning on 1 July 2003 and ending on the date of entry into force of the AFS-Convention.
draft: The ban on the application of TBT coatings on ships flying the flag of a third country, should therefore be suspended for a transitional period starting on July 1, 2003, and ending with the entry into force of the AFS Convention.
hil: The ban on the application of TBT coatings on ships flying the flag of a third country should therefore be suspended for a transitional period starting on July 1, 2003, and ending with the entry into force of the AFS Convention.
compare: The ban on the application of TBT coatings on ships flying the flag of a third country, should therefore be suspended for a transitional period starting on July 1, 2003, and ending with the entry into force of the AFS Convention.

src: Der Wortlaut der Entscheidung 98/377/EG in isländischer und norwegischer Sprache, der in der EWR-Beilage des Amtsblatts der Europäischen Gemeinschaften veröffentlicht wird, ist verbindlich.

src: (1) Gemäß ihrem in der Handels- und Entwicklungskonferenz der Vereinten Nationen (UNCTAD) vorgelegten Angebot und im Einklang mit ihrem Schema der Allgemeinen Präferenzen (APS) hat die Gemeinschaft für Jute- und Kokoserzeugnisse mit Ursprung in bestimmten Entwicklungsländern Zollpräferenzen gewährt, die seit 1971 in einer schrittweisen Herabsetzung der Zollsätze des Gemeinsamen Zolltarifs und in der Zeit von 1978 bis zum 31. Dezember 1994 in einer völligen Aussetzung dieser Zölle bestanden.
ref: (1) In accordance with the offer it made within the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (Unctad) and alongside its scheme of generalised preferences (GSP), the Community introduced tariff preferences in 1971 for jute and coconut-fibre products originating in certain developing countries; these preferences took the form of a gradual reduction of Common Customs Tariff duties and, from 1978 to 31 December 1994, the complete suspension of these duties.
draft: According to their offer presented to the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD) and in accordance with their Generalized System of Preferences (GSP), the Community has granted customs preferences for jute and coconut products originating in certain developing countries, which have gradually reduced the tariff rates of the Common Customs Tariff since 1971 and for the period from 1978 until December 31, 1994, completely suspended these tariffs.
hil: In accordance with its Generalized System of Preferences (GSP) presented to the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD), the community has granted customs preferences for jute and coconut products originating in certain developing countries. These preferences have been in a gradual reduction of the tariff rates of the Common Customs Tariff since 1971, and between 1978 and December 31, 1994, they entirely suspended these tariffs.
compare: According to their offer presented to the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD) and in accordance with their Generalized System of Preferences (GSP), the Community has granted customs preferences for jute and coconut products originating in certain developing countries, which have gradually reduced the tariff rates of the Common Customs Tariff since 1971 and for the period from 1978 until December 31, 1994, completely suspended these tariffs.

src: In dritten Ländern geerntetes Saatgut von Futterpflanzen kann in die Vergleichsprüfungen einbezogen werden.

src: (1) Textilerzeugnisse dürfen nur dann mit dem Zusatz "100 &;quot% oder "rein" oder gegebenenfalls "ganz" bezeichnet werden, wenn sie insgesamt aus der gleichen Faser bestehen; die Verwendung ähnlicher Zusätze ist ausgeschlossen.
ref: 1. No textile product may be described as '100 %`, 'pure` or 'all` unless it is exclusively composed of the same fibre; no similar term may be used.
draft: Textile products may only be labeled as "100%," "pure," or "entirely" if they consist entirely of the same fiber; the use of similar additives is excluded.
hil: Textile products may only be labeled as '100%' or 'pure', or optionally 'entirely', if they consist entirely of the same fiber; the use of similar additives is excluded.
compare: Textile products may only be labeled as '100%' or 'pure', or optionally 'entirely', if they consist entirely of the same fiber; the use of similar additives is excluded.

ref: 2. hil: 2. src: IN DER ÜBERZEUGUNG, dass bestimmte Probleme nur grenzübergreifend gelöst werden können und gemeinsame Maßnahmen der Alpenstaaten erforderlich machen und dass insbesondere wirtschaftliche und soziale Anpassungs- und Begleitmaßnahmen sowohl auf nationaler als auch auf europäischer Ebene notwendig sind, damit die Existenz der Landwirte und ihrer Betriebe in den Berggebieten nicht durch ausschließliche Anwendung ökonomischer Maßstäbe in Frage gestellt wird —
ref: CONVINCED that certain problems can only be resolved in a cross-border framework and require joint measures on the part of the Alpine States and, in particular, that economic and social adjustment and accompanying measures should be put in place, at national and European level, so that the future of farmers and their farms in mountain regions is not called into question by the application of exclusively economic parameters,
draft: IN THE CONVICTION that certain problems can only be solved across borders and that joint measures of the Alpine states are required and that in particular economic and social adjustment and accompanying measures are necessary both at national and European level to ensure that the existence of farmers and their businesses in mountainous areas is not called into question by the exclusive application of economic criteria.
hil: IN THE CONVICTION that certain problems can only be solved across borders and that joint measures of the Alpine states are required and that in particular economic and social adjustment and accompanying measures are necessary both at national and European level to ensure that the existence of farmers and their businesses in mountainous areas is not called into question by the exclusive application of economic criteria.
compare: IN THE CONVICTION that certain problems can only be solved across borders and that joint measures of the Alpine states are required and that in particular economic and social adjustment and accompanying measures are necessary both at national and European level to ensure that the existence of farmers and their businesses in mountainous areas is not called into question by the exclusive application of economic criteria.

src: Danach gingen die Einfuhren aus der VR China drastisch zurück, während die Einfuhren aus Indonesien bis zum UZ in sehr viel geringerem Maße sanken, so dass sie im UZ immer noch mehr als dreimal so hoch waren wie die Einfuhren aus der VR China.
ref: Since then, imports from the PRC dramatically decreased while Indonesian imports decreased by a much lesser extent until the IP when these latter imports were still more than three times higher than imports from the PRC.

src: Die für Sicherheitsvorhaben bestimmten Beihilfen sind mit allen anderen staatlichen Beihilfen mit identischem Gegenstand und Zweck kumulierbar, sofern die Beihilfesumme die Höchstgrenzen nach Artikel 6 Absatz 1 Buchstabe b) des spanischen Ministerialerlasses nicht übersteigt, d. h. 100 % der beihilfefähigen Kosten.
ref: aid for projects in this field could be combined with any other public aid for the same purpose, provided the combined total did not exceed the limits laid down in paragraph 6.1(b) of the regulatory bases in the Order, i.e. 100 % of eligible costs.
draft: The aid intended for security measures can be cumulated with all other state aid with the same subject and purpose, provided that the amount of aid does not exceed the ceilings set out in Article 6(1)(b) of the Spanish ministerial order, i.e. 100% of eligible costs.
hil: The aid intended for security measures can be cumulated with all other state aid with the same subject and purpose, provided that the amount of aid does not exceed the ceilings set out in Article 6(1)(b) of the Spanish ministerial order, i.e. 100% of eligible costs.
compare: The aid intended for security measures can be cumulated with all other state aid with the same subject and purpose, provided that the amount of aid does not exceed the ceilings set out in Article 6(1)(b) of the Spanish ministerial order, i.e. 100% of eligible costs.

src: Eine weitere, über die gemeinsame Liste hinausgehende Abstimmung zwischen einzelnen Mitgliedstaaten bei der Bestimmung der Drittländer, deren Staatsangehörige beim Überschreiten der Außengrenzen im Besitz eines Visums sein müssen, bleibt von dieser Verordnung unberührt.

src: in Erwägung nachstehender Gründe: Artikel 13 der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 4136/86 sieht vor, daß im Fall von Betrug oder Umgehung der Bestimmungen von Textilabkommen zwischen der Europäischen Wirtschaftsgemeinschaft und den Lieferländern Konsultationen eingeleitet werden können.

draft: Change of Directive 97/70/EC.
hil: Change of Directive 97/70/EC.
compare: Change of Directive 97/70/EC.

src: 1. In Anhang II werden die in Anhang V der vorliegenden Richtlinie für Mesotrion, Silthiofam, Picoxystrobin, Flufenacet, Iodosulfuron-Methyl-Natrium, Fosthiazat und Molinat aufgeführten Rückstandshöchstgehalte eingefügt.
ref: 1. In Annex II, maximum residue levels are added for mesotrione, silthiofam, picoxystrobin, flufenacet, iodosulfuron-methyl-sodium, fosthiazate and molinate, as set out in Annex V to this Directive.
draft: 1. The residue maximum levels listed in Annex V of this Directive for Mesotrione, Silthiofam, Picoxystrobin, Flufenacet, Iodosulfuron-Methyl-Sodium, Fosthiazate and Molinate are inserted in Annex II.
hil: In Annex II, the maximum residue levels listed for Mesotrione, Silthiofam, Picoxystrobin, Flufenacet, Iodosulfuron-Methyl-Sodium, Fosthiazate and Molinate in Annex V of this Directive are inserted.
compare: In Annex II, the maximum residue levels listed for Mesotrione, Silthiofam, Picoxystrobin, Flufenacet, Iodosulfuron-Methyl-Sodium, Fosthiazate and Molinate in Annex V of this Directive are inserted.

src: Mit dieser Verordnung werden die Durchführungsbestimmungen zu der mit der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1673/2000 eingeführten Marktorganisation für Faserflachs und -hanf festgelegt.
ref: The detailed rules for the application of the common organisation of the markets in flax and hemp grown for fibre established by Regulation (EC) No 1673/2000 shall be as laid down herein.
draft: With this regulation, the implementing provisions for the market organization introduced by Regulation (EC) No. 1673/2000 for fiber flax and hemp are established.
hil: With this regulation, implementing provisions for the market organization introduced by Regulation (EC) No. 1673/2000 for fiber flax and hemp are established.
compare: With this regulation, the implementing provisions for the market organization introduced by Regulation (EC) No. 1673/2000 for fiber flax and hemp are established.

src: (7) Können die Mitgliedstaaten nicht feststellen, dass die in dieser Verordnung festgelegten Bedingungen erfüllt sind, so untersagen sie den Start eines Luftfahrzeugs so lange, bis das betreffende Luftfahrtunternehmen oder der betreffende Luftfahrzeugbetreiber den Nachweis eines angemessenen Versicherungsschutzes entsprechend dieser Verordnung erbracht hat.
ref: 7. Where Member States are not satisfied that the conditions of this Regulation are met, they shall not allow an aircraft to take off, before the air carrier or aircraft operator concerned has produced evidence of adequate insurance cover in accordance with this Regulation.
draft: (7) If Member States cannot determine that the conditions set out in this Regulation are met, they shall prohibit the operation of an aircraft until the relevant air carrier or aircraft operator has provided evidence of adequate insurance cover in accordance with this Regulation.
hil: If the Member States cannot establish that the conditions set out in this Regulation are met, they shall prohibit the take-off of the aircraft until the relevant air carrier or operator of the aircraft concerned has provided evidence of adequate insurance cover in accordance with this Regulation.
compare: If the Member States cannot establish that the conditions set out in this Regulation are met, they shall prohibit the take-off of the aircraft until the relevant air carrier or operator of the aircraft concerned has provided evidence of adequate insurance cover in accordance with this Regulation.

src: c) wird überwacht und verfolgt, um ihre Wirksamkeit zu gewährleisten;
ref: (c) be monitored and followed up to guarantee effectiveness;
draft: c) is monitored and pursued to ensure its effectiveness.
hil: c) is monitored and pursued to ensure its effectiveness.
compare: c) is monitored and pursued to ensure its effectiveness.

src: (1) Die Zollbehörde einer Vertragspartei kann ihren Bediensteten auf Ersuchen der Zollbehörde der anderen Vertragspartei gestatten, in Gerichts- oder Verwaltungsverfahren im Gebiet der anderen Vertragspartei als Sachverständige oder Zeugen aufzutreten und Akten, Schriftstücke oder sonstige Unterlagen oder beglaubigte Kopien davon vorzulegen, sofern diese für das Verfahren als wesentlich angesehen werden.
ref: 1. The customs authority of one Contracting Party may authorize its employees, upon the request of the customs authority of the other Contracting Party, to appear as witnesses or experts in judicial or administrative proceedings in the territory of the other Contracting Party and to produce such files, documents or other materials, or authenticated copies thereof, as may be considered essential for the proceedings.
draft: The customs authority of a contracting party may, at the request of the customs authority of the other contracting party, allow its officials to appear in judicial or administrative proceedings in the territory of the other contracting party as experts or witnesses and to present files, documents or other materials or certified copies thereof, provided that they are considered essential for the proceedings.
hil: At the request of the customs authority of the other contracting party, the customs authority of a contracting party may allow its officials to appear as experts or witnesses in judicial or administrative proceedings in the territory of the other contracting party, and to present files, documents or other materials or certified copies thereof, provided that they are deemed essential for the proceedings.
compare: The customs authority of a contracting party may, at the request of the customs authority of the other contracting party, allow its officials to appear in judicial or administrative proceedings in the territory of the other contracting party as experts or witnesses and to present files, documents or other materials or certified copies thereof, provided that they are considered essential for the proceedings.

src: Die Richtlinie 78/170/EWG sollte deshalb aufgehoben werden.
ref: Directive 78/170/EEC should therefore be repealed.
draft: The directive 78/170/EEC should therefore be repealed.
hil: Directive 78/170/EEC should therefore be repealed.
compare: The directive 78/170/EEC should therefore be repealed.

src: (6) In seiner Entschließung zu dem Grünbuch "Hin zu einer europäischen Strategie für Energieversorgungssicherheit"(5) bezeichnete das Europäische Parlament Energieeffizienz und Energieeinsparung als vorrangige Prioritäten.
ref: (6) In its Resolution on the Green Paper "Towards a European Strategy for the Security of Energy Supply"(5), the European Parliament identified energy efficiency and savings as first priority.
draft: "In its resolution on the Green Paper "Towards a European strategy for energy security" (5), the European Parliament identified energy efficiency and energy savings as top priorities."
hil: In its resolution on the Green Paper 'Towards a European strategy for energy security' (5), the European Parliament identified energy efficiency and energy savings as top priorities.
compare: "In its resolution on the Green Paper "Towards a European strategy for energy security" (5), the European Parliament identified energy efficiency and energy savings as top priorities."

src: (1) Die Überführung der Beförderungsmittel in das Verfahren der vorübergehenden Verwendung erfolgt unter den Voraussetzungen des Artikels 232 Absatz 1.
ref: 1. Means of transport shall be entered for the temporary importation procedure as provided for in Article 232 (1).
draft: The transfer of means of transport into the procedure of temporary use takes place under the conditions of Article 232 paragraph 1.
hil: Means of transport are transferred into the temporary use procedure subject to the conditions of Article 232(1).
compare: Means of transport are transferred into the temporary use procedure subject to the conditions of Article 232(1).

src: d) die Ursprungsgarantien, die die verschiedenen Republiken vor der Beantragung der in Artikel 2 Absatz 2 genannten Einfuhrlizenzen zu geben haben;
ref: (d) the guarantees of origin to be given by the various Republics before application for import licences, referred to in Article 2 (2), can be made;
draft: d) the guarantees of origin that the various republics must provide before applying for the import licenses mentioned in Article 2(2).
hil: d) the guarantees of origin that the various republics must provide before applying for the import licenses mentioned in Article 2(2).
compare: d) the guarantees of origin that the various republics must provide before applying for the import licenses mentioned in Article 2(2).

src: (1) Die Mitgliedstaaten tragen dafür Sorge, daß in jedem Mitgliedstaat ein nationales Referenzlaboratorium benannt wird, das technisch und personell so ausgestattet ist, daß jederzeit - insbesondere bei den ersten Anzeichen einer Seuche - Serotyp, Subtyp und Variante des betreffenden Krankheitserregers nachgewiesen und die Ergebnisse der regionalen Diagnoselaboratorien bestätigt werden können.
ref: 1. Member States shall ensure that in each Member State a national reference laboratory is designated, with facilities and expert personnel enabling it to show at all times, and especially when the disease in question first appears, the type, sub-type and variant of the relevant pathogen and to confirm results obtained by regional diagnostic laboratories.
draft: The member states ensure that in each member state a national reference laboratory is designated that is technically and personally equipped in such a way that at any time - especially at the first signs of an epidemic - the serotype, subtype, and variant of the relevant pathogen can be detected, and the results of the regional diagnosis laboratories can be confirmed.
hil: The Member States shall ensure that in each Member State a national reference laboratory is designated, which is technically and personally equipped in such a way that at any time - especially at the first signs of an epidemic - the serotype, subtype and variant of the respective pathogen can be detected and the results of the regional diagnostic laboratories can be confirmed.
compare: The member states ensure that in each member state a national reference laboratory is designated that is technically and personally equipped in such a way that at any time - especially at the first signs of an epidemic - the serotype, subtype, and variant of the relevant pathogen can be detected, and the results of the regional diagnosis laboratories can be confirmed.

src: Parallel zu dem deutlichen Rückgang der Produktionskapazität stieg die Kapazitätsauslastung in dieser Zeit zunächst von 63,5 % auf 75,9 %, ging dann aber auf 71,3 % zurück.
ref: In line with the substantial reduction of capacity, the corresponding rates of capacity utilization rose from 63,5 % to 75,9 %, and fell back to 71,3 % over the same period.
draft: Parallel to the significant decline in production capacity, capacity utilization initially increased from 63.5% to 75.9% during this time, but then decreased to 71.3%.
hil: "According to the significant decline in production capacity, capacity utilization increased initially from 63.5% to 75.9%. However, it then decreased to 71.3% during this time."
compare: Parallel to the significant decline in production capacity, capacity utilization initially increased from 63.5% to 75.9% during this time, but then decreased to 71.3%.

src: b) auf der Grundlage einer Risikobewertung, die regelmäßig auf den neuesten Stand gebracht wird, neue Erkenntnisse über die Gefährdung durch Influenzaviren aviären Ursprungs in Vögeln, die durch Wildvögel übertragen werden, zu gewinnen.
ref: (b) contribute, on the basis of a regularly updated risk assessment, to the knowledge on the threats posed by wild birds in relation to any influenza virus of avian origin in birds.
draft: b) On the basis of a risk assessment, which is regularly updated, to gain new insights into the danger posed by avian influenza viruses in birds that are transmitted by wild birds.
hil: On the basis of a risk assessment which is regularly updated, to gain new insights into the danger posed by avian influenza viruses in birds that are transmitted by wild birds.
compare: b) On the basis of a risk assessment, which is regularly updated, to gain new insights into the danger posed by avian influenza viruses in birds that are transmitted by wild birds.

src: (3) Die erhebliche Überschreitung des Preisniveaus durch den Preis frei Grenze kann andauern, wenn ein Ungleichgewicht zwischen Angebot und Nachfrage besteht und dieses Ungleichgewicht unter Berücksichtigung der voraussichtlichen Entwicklung der Erzeugung und der Marktpreise anzuhalten droht.
ref: 3. The situation in which the free-at-frontier price significantly exceeds the level of prices is likely to continue when an imbalance exists between supply and demand and that imbalance is likely to continue, in view of foreseeable trends in production and market prices.
draft: The significant exceedance of the price level by the price free border can continue if there is an imbalance between supply and demand, and this imbalance threatens to persist considering the anticipated development of production and market prices.
hil: The main purpose of limiting the free price border is to reduce the imbalance between supply and demand and the resulting structural surpluses for specific products such as milk and dairy products and to achieve a better market balance. This imbalance can still persist in the event of an excessive price level and considering the expected development of production and market prices.
compare: The significant exceedance of the price level by the price free border can continue if there is an imbalance between supply and demand, and this imbalance threatens to persist considering the anticipated development of production and market prices.

src: (1) Die Mitgliedstaaten müssen einen allgemeinen Kontrollplan für jeden Zwölfmonatszeitraum auf der Grundlage einer Risikoanalyse ausarbeiten.
ref: 1. Member States shall draw up a general control plan for each 12-month period on the basis of risk analysis.
draft: The Member States must prepare a general control plan for each twelve-month period on the basis of a risk analysis.
hil: Member States shall prepare a general control plan for each period of twelve months based on a risk analysis.
compare: The Member States must prepare a general control plan for each twelve-month period on the basis of a risk analysis.

src: c) andere Mitgliedstaaten können sich dem gemeinsamen System anschließen;
ref: (c) other Member States may join the common system;
draft: c) other member states can join the common system;
hil: c) Other member states may join the common system;
compare: c) other member states can join the common system;

src: Diese Delegation kann für die Dauer der Wahrnehmung des Vorsitzes einen weiteren Delegierten benennen.
ref: The delegation may appoint a further delegate for the duration of its chairmanship.
draft: This delegation can appoint an additional delegate for the duration of the chairmanship.
hil: This delegation can appoint an additional delegate for the duration of the chairmanship.
compare: This delegation can appoint an additional delegate for the duration of the chairmanship.

src: (6) Die Mitgliedstaaten berichten der Kommission monatlich über den Einfuhrhandel bei Waren, die Gegenstand von Untersuchungen und von Maßnahmen sind, sowie über die gemäß dieser Verordnung erhobenen Zollbeträge.
ref: 6. Member States shall report to the Commission every month on the import trade of products subject to investigation and to measures, and on the amount of duties collected pursuant to this Regulation.
draft: The member states report to the Commission on a monthly basis on the import trade in goods that are the subject of investigations and measures, as well as on the customs duties collected under this regulation.
hil: The Member States report to the Commission on a monthly basis on the import trade of goods which are the subject of investigations and measures, as well as on the customs duties collected pursuant to this regulation.
compare: The member states report to the Commission on a monthly basis on the import trade in goods that are the subject of investigations and measures, as well as on the customs duties collected under this regulation.

src: Die Angleichung der einzelstaatlichen Rechtsvorschriften erfordert in einem ersten Stadium die Ausarbeitung einer gemeinsamen Definition , die Festlegung von Maßnahmen zum Schutz des Verbrauchers gegen Täuschungen über die Art der betreffenden Erzeugnisse sowie die Festlegung von Regeln für die Kennzeichnung dieser Erzeugnisse .
ref: Whereas the approximation of national laws presupposed, in an initial stage, the drawing-up of a common definition, the determination of measures enabling the consumer to be protected against fraud concerning the nature of these products and the adoption of rules to be complied with in labelling the products in question;
draft: The alignment of the state-specific legal provisions requires in a first stage the development of a common definition, the establishment of measures to protect consumers against deception about the nature of the products in question as well as the establishment of rules for the labeling of these products.
hil: The alignment of state-specific legal provisions requires, in a first stage, the development of a common definition, the establishment of measures to protect consumers against deception about the nature of the products in question, as well as the establishment of rules for labeling these products.
compare: The alignment of the state-specific legal provisions requires in a first stage the development of a common definition, the establishment of measures to protect consumers against deception about the nature of the products in question as well as the establishment of rules for the labeling of these products.

src: Sie können daher einen Antrag auf Einleitung einer Überprüfung für neue Ausführer stellen, sobald sie tatsächlich in die Gemeinschaft exportiert haben oder nachweisen können, dass sie eine unwiderrufliche vertragliche Verpflichtung zur Ausfuhr einer erheblichen Warenmenge in die Gemeinschaft eingegangen sind.
ref: They are therefore entitled to ask for a newcomer review when they have actually exported to the Community, or when they can demonstrate that they have entered into irrevocable contractual obligations to export significant quantities to the Community.
draft: Therefore, you can submit an application to initiate a review for new exporters as soon as you have actually exported to the Community or can prove that you have entered into an irrevocable contractual obligation to export a significant quantity of goods to the Community.
hil: Therefore, you can submit an application to initiate a review for new exporters as soon as you have actually exported to the Community or can prove that you have entered into an irrevocable contractual obligation to export a significant quantity of goods to the Community.
compare: Therefore, you can submit an application to initiate a review for new exporters as soon as you have actually exported to the Community or can prove that you have entered into an irrevocable contractual obligation to export a significant quantity of goods to the Community.

src: Ein Vertreter des Finanzkontrolleurs ist als Beobachter anwesend.
ref: A representative of the financial controller shall be present as observer.
draft: A representative of the financial inspector is present as an observer.
hil: The representative of the financial controller is present as an observer.
compare: The representative of the financial controller is present as an observer.

src: Änderung der Richtlinie 2001/96/EG
ref: Amendment to Directive 2001/96/EC
draft: Change of the Directive 2001/96/EC.
hil: Change of Directive 2001/96/EC.
compare: Change of Directive 2001/96/EC.

src: (1) Die Gemeinschaft erläßt alle erforderlichen Maßnahmen, damit in einem wettbewerbsorientierten Umfeld mit mehreren Anbietern für bereichsspezifische Netze eine geeignete Auswahl an gemeinsamen Basisdiensten bereitgestellt wird, die den Anforderungen der Benutzer bereichsspezifischer Netze entsprechen.
ref: 1. The Community shall adopt all necessary measures in order for a suitable choice of common generic services that meet sectoral user requirements to be made available to sectoral networks on a competitive basis in a multi-vendor environment.
draft: The community shall take all necessary measures to ensure that in a competitive environment with several providers of area-specific networks, a suitable selection of common basic services is provided that meets the requirements of users of area-specific networks.
hil: The Community shall take any measures required to ensure that a suitable selection of common basic services is provided in a competitive environment with several providers of field-specific networks that meet the users' requirements of such networks.
compare: The community shall take all necessary measures to ensure that in a competitive environment with several providers of area-specific networks, a suitable selection of common basic services is provided that meets the requirements of users of area-specific networks.

src: e) Einholung und Analyse von Informationen über den derzeitigen und früheren Zustand und die Entwicklungstendenzen der unter dieses Übereinkommen fallenden Fischpopulationen;
ref: (e) collect and analyse information relating to current and past conditions and trends of the populations of the fish stocks covered by this Convention;
draft: e) Gathering and analysis of information on the current and past status and trends of the fish populations falling under this agreement.
hil: e) Gathering and analyzing information on the current and past status and developmental trends of fish populations falling under this agreement.

src: BESCHLUSS DES RATES vom 29. Januar 1996 über den Abschluß - durch die Europäische Gemeinschaft - des Interimsabkommens über Handel und Handelsfragen zwischen der Europäischen Gemeinschaft, der Europäischen Gemeinschaft für Kohle und Stahl und der Europäischen Atomgemeinschaft einerseits und der Republik Moldau andererseits (96/161/EG)

hil: COUNCIL DECISION of 29 January 1996 concerning the conclusion - by the European Community - of the Interim Agreement on Trade and Trade-Related Matters between the European Community, the European Coal and Steel Community and the European Atomic Energy Community, on the one hand, and the Republic of Moldova, on the other hand (96/161/EC)

src: Sie gilt nicht für Überführungen in den zollrechtlich freien Verkehr, die bis zum 31. Mai 2002 im Rahmen einer gemäß der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1047/2001 ausgestellten Lizenz erfolgen.
ref: It shall not apply to releases into free circulation carried out, until 31 May 2002, under import licences issued in accordance with Regulation (EC) No 1047/2001.
draft: It does not apply to transfers to customs duty-free traffic carried out within the framework of a license issued under Regulation (EC) No. 1047/2001 by May 31, 2002.
hil: It shall not apply to transfers to customs duty-free traffic that take place under a license issued pursuant to Regulation (EC) No 1047/2001 by May 31, 2002.

src: Politische Veränderungen im Herkunftsland können ein Grund für die Furcht vor Verfolgung sein; dies gilt jedoch nur dann, wenn der Asylbewerber darlegen kann, daß er aufgrund dieser Veränderungen persönlich im Fall seiner Rückkehr in das Herkunftsland eine begründete Furcht vor Verfolgung hätte.
ref: Political changes in the country of origin may justify fear of persecution, but only if the asylum-seeker can demonstrate that as a result of those changes he would personally have grounds to fear persecution if he returned.
draft: Political changes in the country of origin can be a reason for fear of persecution; however, this only applies if the asylum seeker can demonstrate that he would have a well-founded fear of persecution if he were to return to his country of origin due to these changes personally.
hil: Political changes in the country of origin can be a reason for fear of persecution; however, this is only the case if the asylum seeker can demonstrate that he would have a well-founded fear of persecution personally if he were to return to his country of origin due to these changes.
compare: Political changes in the country of origin can be a reason for fear of persecution; however, this only applies if the asylum seeker can demonstrate that he would have a well-founded fear of persecution if he were to return to his country of origin due to these changes personally.

src: a) laufende Verhandlungen oder damit verbundene Umstände, wenn das Ergebnis oder der normale Ablauf dieser Verhandlungen von der Veröffentlichung wahrscheinlich beeinträchtigt werden würden.
ref: (a) negotiations in course, or related elements, where the outcome or normal pattern of those negotiations would be likely to be affected by public disclosure.
draft: Current negotiations or related circumstances if the outcome or normal course of these negotiations would likely be affected by publication.
hil: Current negotiations or related circumstances, if the outcome or normal course of these negotiations would likely be affected by publication.

src: (2) Bei der Wahl der Maßnahmen ist den Maßnahmen Vorrang zugeben, die das Funktionieren der Regelungen dieses Abkommens am wenigsten behindern.
ref: 2. In the selection of measures, priority must be given to those which least disturb the functioning of the arrangements in this Agreement.
draft: (2) When choosing measures, priority must be given to those measures that least impede the functioning of the provisions of this Agreement.
hil: When selecting measures, priority should be given to measures that least hinder the functioning of the provisions of this agreement.
compare: (2) When choosing measures, priority must be given to those measures that least impede the functioning of the provisions of this Agreement.

src: Der letzte Termin für die Einreichung von Angeboten ist der 23. Juni 2005.
ref: The final date for submission of tenders shall be 23 June 2005.
draft: The deadline for submitting offers is June 23, 2005.

src: c) "besonders umweltfreundliches Fahrzeug ("EEV")", ein Fahrzeug, das von einem Motor angetrieben wird, der den fakultativen Grenzwerten für die Emission gemäß Zeile C der Tabellen in Abschnitt 6.2.1 von Anhang I entspricht.
ref: (c) "enhanced environment-friendly vehicle (EEV)" means a vehicle propelled by an engine which complies with the permissive emission limit values set out in row C of the tables in Section 6.2.1 of Annex I.
draft: "c) Particularly environmentally friendly vehicle ("EEV"), a vehicle powered by an engine that meets the optional emission limits according to line C of the tables in section 6.2.1 of Annex I."

src: KAPITEL V MASSNAHMEN ZUR ERLEICHTERUNG DER TATSÄCHLICHEN AUSÜBUNG DES NIEDERLASSUNGSRECHTS UND DES RECHTS AUF FREIEN DIENSTLEISTUNGSVERKEHR DURCH DIE KRANKENSCHWESTER UND DEN KRANKENPFLEGER, DIE FÜR DIE ALLGEMEINE PFLEGE VERANTWORTLICH SIND
ref: CHAPTER V PROVISIONS TO FACILITATE THE EFFECTIVE EXERCISE OF THE RIGHT OF ESTABLISHMENT AND FREEDOM TO PROVIDE SERVICES IN RESPECT OF THE ACTIVITIES OF NURSES RESPONSIBLE FOR GENERAL CARE
draft: CHAPTER V MEASURES TO FACILITATE THE ACTUAL EXERCISE OF THE RIGHT OF ESTABLISHMENT AND THE RIGHT TO PROVIDE SERVICES FOR NURSES AND CAREGIVERS RESPONSIBLE FOR GENERAL CARE.
hil: CHAPTER V MEASURES TO FACILITATE THE OPTIMUM EXERCISE OF THE RIGHT OF ESTABLISHMENT AND THE RIGHT TO PROVIDE SERVICES FOR NURSES AND CAREGIVERS RESPONSIBLE FOR GENERAL CARE.

src: (1) Die Gemeinschaft trifft im Rahmen der Prinzipien und der Prioritäten der Partnerschaft Europa-Mittelmeer Maßnahmen zur Unterstützung der in Anhang I genannten Gebiete und Drittländer im Mittelmeerraum (im folgenden Mittelmeerpartner genannt) bei ihren Bemühungen, Reformen ihrer wirtschaftlichen und sozialen Strukturen durchzuführen und die Folgen abzumildern, die sich aus der wirtschaftlichen Entwicklung auf sozialer Ebene und für die Umwelt ergeben können.
ref: 1. The Community shall implement measures in the framework of the principles and priorities of the Euro-Mediterranean partnership to support the efforts that Mediterranean non-member countries and territories listed in Annex I (hereinafter referred to as 'Mediterranean partners`) will undertake to reform their economic and social structures and mitigate any social or environmental consequences which may result from economic development.
draft: The community takes measures within the framework of the principles and priorities of the Euro-Mediterranean Partnership to support the areas and third countries listed in Annex I in the Mediterranean region (hereinafter referred to as Mediterranean partners) in their efforts to carry out reforms of their economic and social structures and mitigate the consequences that may arise from economic development on a social and environmental level.
hil: The Community undertakes measures, within the framework of the principles and priorities of the Euro-Mediterranean Partnership, to support the areas and third countries listed in Annex I in the Mediterranean region (hereinafter referred to as Mediterranean partners) in their efforts to carry out reforms of their economic and social structures and mitigate the consequences that may arise from economic development on a social and environmental level.
compare: The community takes measures within the framework of the principles and priorities of the Euro-Mediterranean Partnership to support the areas and third countries listed in Annex I in the Mediterranean region (hereinafter referred to as Mediterranean partners) in their efforts to carry out reforms of their economic and social structures and mitigate the consequences that may arise from economic development on a social and environmental level.

src: Der Beantwortungszeitraum darf eine Frist von 15 Tagen ab Eingang der schriftlichen Anfrage auf keinen Fall überschreiten.
ref: The time taken to do so may under no circumstances exceed 15 days from receipt of the written enquiry.
draft: The response time must not exceed a period of 15 days from receipt of the written request under any circumstances.
hil: The period for responding must not under any circumstances exceed a deadline of 15 days from receipt of the written inquiry.
compare: The response time must not exceed a period of 15 days from receipt of the written request under any circumstances.

src: (7) Die Prüfung der Einwände im Lichte der Richtlinie 2001/18/EG, der in der Anmeldung gemachten Angaben und der Stellungnahme der Europäischen Behörde für Lebensmittelsicherheit ergibt keinen Grund zu der Annahme, dass sich das Inverkehrbringen von Zea mays L., Linie 1507, schädlich auf die Gesundheit von Mensch und Tier oder auf die Umwelt auswirken wird.
ref: (7) An examination of each of the objections in the light of Directive 2001/18/EC, of the information submitted in the notification and of the opinion of the European Food Safety Authority, discloses no reason to believe that the placing on the market of Zea mays L. line 1507 will adversely affect human or animal health or the environment.
draft: The examination of the objections in light of Directive 2001/18/EC, the information provided in the application, and the opinion of the European Food Safety Authority does not give any reason to believe that the placing on the market of Zea mays L., line 1507, will have harmful effects on human health or animal health or the environment.
hil: The examination of the objections in light of Directive 2001/18/EC, the information provided in the application, and the opinion of the European Food Safety Authority does not give any reason to believe that the placing on the market of Zea mays L., line 1507, will have harmful effects on human health or animal health or the environment.
compare: The examination of the objections in light of Directive 2001/18/EC, the information provided in the application, and the opinion of the European Food Safety Authority does not give any reason to believe that the placing on the market of Zea mays L., line 1507, will have harmful effects on human health or animal health or the environment.

src: Treibgänge müssen so gebaut und angelegt sein, dass Verletzungsrisiken auf ein Mindestmaß beschränkt werden und der Herdentrieb der Tiere ausgenutzt wird.
ref: Passageways must be so constructed as to minimise the risk of injury to animals, and so arranged as to exploit their gregarious tendencies.
draft: Drives must be designed and constructed in such a way that the risk of injury is minimized and the animals' herding behavior is utilized.
hil: Drives must be designed and constructed in a way that minimizes the risk of injury and takes advantage of the herding instinct of the animals.
compare: Drives must be designed and constructed in a way that minimizes the risk of injury and takes advantage of the herding instinct of the animals.

src: q) "Regionalisierung" die Abgrenzung eines Sperrgebiets, in dem die Verbringung von oder der Handel mit bestimmten Tieren oder tierischen Erzeugnissen gemäß Artikel 45 beschränkt wird, um zu verhindern, dass sich die MKS in die Freizone, d.h. die Zone, in der keine Beschränkungen im Sinne diese Richtlinie gelten, ausbreitet.
ref: (q) "regionalisation" means the delimitation of a restricted zone in which restrictions are applied on the movements of or trade in certain animals or animal products as provided for in Article 45 in order to prevent the spread of foot-and-mouth disease into the free zone where no restrictions are applied in accordance with this Directive;
draft: "Regionalization" is the delimitation of a restricted area in which the movement or trade of certain animals or animal products is restricted in accordance with Article 45 in order to prevent the spread of FMD into the free zone, i.e. the zone in which no restrictions apply within the meaning of this directive.
hil: "Regionalization" is the delineation of a restricted area in which the movement or trade of certain animals or animal products is restricted in accordance with Article 45 in order to prevent the spread of Foot-and-Mouth Disease (FMD) into the free zone, i.e. the zone where no restrictions apply within the meaning of this directive.
compare: "Regionalization" is the delineation of a restricted area in which the movement or trade of certain animals or animal products is restricted in accordance with Article 45 in order to prevent the spread of Foot-and-Mouth Disease (FMD) into the free zone, i.e. the zone where no restrictions apply within the meaning of this directive.

src: (434) Es wird der Schluss gezogen, dass der Anstieg in der jüngsten Zeit im Vergleich zu den Vorjahren und insbesondere unter Berücksichtigung der Tatsache, dass der Anstieg der Einfuhren im Jahr 1998 als nicht repräsentativ anzusehen ist, als unerwartet, drastisch und erheblich angesehen werden kann.
ref: (434) It is concluded that the increases in the recent past can be considered sudden, sharp and significant when comparing them to developments in previous years, in particular bearing in mind that the increase in imports in 1998, must be considered non representative.
draft: (434) The conclusion is drawn that the recent increase compared to previous years, and especially considering the fact that the increase in imports in 1998 is not representative, can be regarded as unexpected, drastic, and significant.
hil: The conclusion is drawn that the recent increase compared to previous years, and especially considering the fact that the increase in imports in 1998 is not representative, can be regarded as unexpected, drastic, and significant.
compare: (434) The conclusion is drawn that the recent increase compared to previous years, and especially considering the fact that the increase in imports in 1998 is not representative, can be regarded as unexpected, drastic, and significant.

src: Zum Nachweis der anerkannten Regeln der Technik sollten gezielte Messungen am Aufstellungs- und Betriebsort gehören, die zeigen, dass die Ziele der EMV-Richtlinie in Bezug auf unerwünschte Abstrahlungen insbesondere unter den Umständen, unter denen Störungen wahrscheinlicher sind, eingehalten werden.
ref: The documented good engineering practices should include targeted in-situ measurements, demonstrating that the objectives of the EMC Directive are met in respect of unwanted radiated emissions, especially in situations where interference is more likely to occur.
draft: As proof of recognized rules of technology, targeted measurements at the installation and operation location should be included, which show that the objectives of the EMC Directive regarding unwanted emissions, especially under the circumstances in which interference is more likely, are met.
hil: To demonstrate compliance with recognized rules of technology, targeted measurements at the installation and operation site should be included that demonstrate compliance with the objectives of the EMC Directive regarding undesired emissions, particularly under circumstances where interference is more likely.
compare: To demonstrate compliance with recognized rules of technology, targeted measurements at the installation and operation site should be included that demonstrate compliance with the objectives of the EMC Directive regarding undesired emissions, particularly under circumstances where interference is more likely.

src: (2) Das System muß in der Lage sein, die Forderungen der Anleger möglichst bald, spätestens aber drei Monate nach dem Zeitpunkt, zu dem die Berechtigung und die Höhe der Forderung festgestellt wurden, zu erfuellen.

src: (1) Führt eine Vertragspartei im Rahmen ihrer Agrarpolitik eine besondere Regelung ein oder ändert sie die bestehende Regelung, so kann sie die sich aus diesem Abkommen ergebende Regelung für die betreffenden Erzeugnisse anpassen.
ref: 1. In the event of specific rules being established as a result of the implementation of its agricultural policy or of any alteration of the current rules, the Contracting Party in question may adapt the arrangements resulting from this Agreement in respect of the products which are the subject of those rules or alterations.
draft: (1) If a contracting party introduces a special regulation or changes the existing regulation within the framework of its agricultural policy, it may adjust the regulations resulting from this agreement for the products concerned.
hil: If a contracting party introduces a special regulation or changes the existing regulation within the framework of its agricultural policy, it may adjust the regulations resulting from this agreement for the relevant products.

src: (1) Das nach Artikel 43 oder Artikel 44 mit dem Rechtsbehelf befasste Gericht kann auf Antrag des Schuldners das Verfahren aussetzen, wenn gegen die Entscheidung im Ursprungsmitgliedstaat ein ordentlicher Rechtsbehelf eingelegt oder die Frist für einen solchen Rechtsbehelf noch nicht verstrichen ist; in letzterem Fall kann das Gericht eine Frist bestimmen, innerhalb deren der Rechtsbehelf einzulegen ist.
ref: 1. The court with which an appeal is lodged under Article 43 or Article 44 may, on the application of the party against whom enforcement is sought, stay the proceedings if an ordinary appeal has been lodged against the judgment in the Member State of origin or if the time for such an appeal has not yet expired; in the latter case, the court may specify the time within which such an appeal is to be lodged.
draft: The court hearing the appeal pursuant to Article 43 or Article 44 may, at the request of the debtor, stay the proceedings where an ordinary appeal has been lodged against the decision in the Member State of origin or the time for such an appeal has not yet expired; in the latter case, the court may fix a time-limit for the lodging of the appeal.
hil: The court hearing the appeal pursuant to Article 43 or Article 44 may, at the request of the debtor, stay the proceedings where an ordinary appeal has been lodged against the decision in the Member State of origin or the time for such an appeal has not yet expired; in the latter case, the court may fix a time-limit for the lodging of the appeal.
compare: The court hearing the appeal pursuant to Article 43 or Article 44 may, at the request of the debtor, stay the proceedings where an ordinary appeal has been lodged against the decision in the Member State of origin or the time for such an appeal has not yet expired; in the latter case, the court may fix a time-limit for the lodging of the appeal.

src: zur Änderung der Richtlinie 2000/29/EG des Rates über Maßnahmen zum Schutz der Gemeinschaft gegen die Einschleppung und Ausbreitung von Schadorganismen der Pflanzen und Pflanzenerzeugnisse

src: (39) Im Laufe des Jahres 2003 fiel der Wert der Norwegischen Krone (NOK) im Verhältnis zum Euro um 13 %, im Verhältnis zur Dänischen Krone um 12 % und im Verhältnis zur Schwedischen Krone um 14 %.
ref: (39) During 2003, the value of the Norwegian kroner fell by 13 % relative to the euro, by 12 % relative to the Danish krone and by 14 % relative to the Swedish krone.
draft: During the year 2003, the value of the Norwegian Krone (NOK) fell by 13% with respect to the Euro, by 12% with respect to the Danish Krone, and by 14% with respect to the Swedish Krone.
hil: During the year 2003, the value of the Norwegian Krone (NOK) fell by 13% with respect to the Euro, by 12% with respect to the Danish Krone and by 14% with respect to the Swedish Krone, respectively.
compare: During the year 2003, the value of the Norwegian Krone (NOK) fell by 13% with respect to the Euro, by 12% with respect to the Danish Krone, and by 14% with respect to the Swedish Krone.

src: (1) Die Kommission hat Maßnahmen für die Durchführung gemeinsamer grundlegender Normen für die Luftsicherheit in der gesamten Europäischen Union zu erlassen.
ref: (1) The Commission is required to adopt measures for the implementation of common basic standards for aviation security throughout the European Union.
draft: The commission is to adopt measures for the implementation of common basic norms for air security throughout the European Union.
hil: The Commission is to adopt measures for implementing common basic standards for air safety throughout the European Union.
compare: The commission is to adopt measures for the implementation of common basic norms for air security throughout the European Union.

src: Über die in diesem Absatz bezeichneten Angelegenheiten können Entscheidungen, die in den Zuständigkeitsbereich des Generaldirektors fallen, nicht vor Ablauf des fünfzehnten Tages nach Abgabe der Stellungnahme des Beirates getroffen werden, sofern sie dieser Stellungnahme zuwiderlaufen.
ref: DECISIONS WHICH ARE WITHIN THE COMPETENCE OF THE DIRECTOR-GENERAL AND RELATE TO MATTERS SPECIFIED IN THIS ARTICLE SHALL NOT BE TAKEN UNTIL FIFTEEN DAYS HAVE ELAPSED SINCE THE OPINION OF THE ADVISORY COMMITTEE WAS GIVEN , IF THOSE DECISIONS ARE AT VARIANCE WITH THAT OPINION .
draft: Decisions on the matters referred to in this paragraph, which fall within the competence of the Director-General, may not be taken before the fifteenth day following the opinion of the Council, provided that such opinion runs counter to it.
hil: Decisions on the matters referred to in this paragraph, which fall within the competence of the Director-General, may not be taken before the fifteenth day following the opinion of the Council, provided that such opinion runs counter to it.
compare: Decisions on the matters referred to in this paragraph, which fall within the competence of the Director-General, may not be taken before the fifteenth day following the opinion of the Council, provided that such opinion runs counter to it.

src: - die Abwicklung des gewerblichen Güterkraftverkehrs sowie des Güterkraftverkehrs im Werkverkehr, insbesondere hinsichtlich des Zugangs zum Markt und der Kontingentierung der Kapazitäten im Güterkraftverkehr;
ref: - the organization of the market for the carriage of goods by road for hire or reward and own account and in particular access to the market and, in particular, concerning quota restrictions on road capacities,
draft: the handling of commercial goods transport as well as goods transport in works transport, particularly with regard to access to the market and the allocation of capacities in goods transport;
hil: With regard to the handling of commercial goods transport as well as goods transport in works transport, particularly in terms of access to the market and the allocation of capacity in goods transport.
compare: the handling of commercial goods transport as well as goods transport in works transport, particularly with regard to access to the market and the allocation of capacities in goods transport;

src: Es ist daher erforderlich, Sonderbestimmungen für den Fall festzulegen, in dem ein gemeinschaftliches Verfahren für Zwecke einer durch einen Steuerpflichtigen als solchen vor dem 1. Januar 1993 bewirkten Lieferung von Gegenständen, die in einen anderen Mitgliedstaat zu versenden oder zu befördern waren, vor dem 1. Januar 1993 begonnen wurde und am 31. Dezember 1992 nicht abgeschlossen war.
ref: Whereas it is therefore necessary to lay down special provisions for cases where a Community procedure, started before 1 January 1993 for the purposes of a supply effected before that date by a taxable person acting as such in respect of goods dispatched or transported to another Member State, is not completed until after 31 December 1992;
draft: It is therefore necessary to establish special provisions for the case in which a joint procedure for the purpose of a delivery of items effected by a taxable person as such before 1 January 1993, which were to be sent or transported to another Member State, was started before 1 January 1993 and was not completed by 31 December 1992.
hil: It is therefore necessary to establish special provisions for the case in which a joint procedure was started before 1 January 1993 and was not completed by 31 December 1992 for the purpose of a delivery of items, effected by a taxable person as such before 1 January 1993, which were to be sent or transported to another Member State.
compare: It is therefore necessary to establish special provisions for the case in which a joint procedure for the purpose of a delivery of items effected by a taxable person as such before 1 January 1993, which were to be sent or transported to another Member State, was started before 1 January 1993 and was not completed by 31 December 1992.

src: Im Sinne dieser Richtlinie und ihrer Anhänge bezeichnet der Ausdruck
ref: For the purpose of this Directive and its Annexes,
draft: "In the context of this directive and its annexes, the expression" refers to the term.
hil: For the purpose of this directive and its annexes, the term "expression" refers to the term.
compare: For the purpose of this directive and its annexes, the term "expression" refers to the term.

src: (1) Auftraggeber, die die Eignungskriterien in einem offenen Verfahren festlegen, müssen dies entsprechend den objektiven Kriterien und Regeln tun, die den interessierten Wirtschaftsteilnehmern zugänglich sind.
ref: 1. Contracting entities which establish selection criteria in an open procedure shall do so in accordance with objective rules and criteria which are available to interested economic operators.
draft: (1) Clients who establish the eligibility criteria in an open procedure must do so in accordance with the objective criteria and rules that are accessible to interested economic operators.
hil: "Contracting authorities that establish the eligibility criteria in an open procedure must do so in accordance with the objective criteria and rules that are accessible to the interested economic operators."
compare: (1) Clients who establish the eligibility criteria in an open procedure must do so in accordance with the objective criteria and rules that are accessible to interested economic operators.

src: Die Anhänge I, II und IV der Richtlinie 78/764/EWG werden gemäß dem Anhang dieser Richtlinie geändert.
ref: Annexes I, II and IV to Directive 78/764/EEC are hereby amended in accordance with the Annex to this Directive.
draft: The annexes I, II and IV of the directive 78/764/EEC are amended in accordance with the annex to this directive.
hil: Annexes I, II and IV of Directive 78/764/EEC are hereby amended in accordance with the annex to this Directive.
compare: Annexes I, II and IV of Directive 78/764/EEC are hereby amended in accordance with the annex to this Directive.
